name: Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer with Ceramides and Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: A rich, barrier-restoring moisturizer that visibly plumps fine lines and wrinkles with ceramides and multi-hyaluronic acid...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Ceramides and Fatty Acids: Support a strong moisture barrier..- Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps skin..- Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Intensely nourishes dry, flaky skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: A deeply hydrating, fragrance-free formula packed with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, nourishing fatty acids & our vegan squalane to repair the skin's moisture barrier for dewy, healthy-looking skin without leaving a greasy feel. Feel immediate hydration and see improved lines & wrinkles over time...Clinical Results: In a 28-day clinical study of 35 women (ages 36 to 60), with twice-daily use:.- 100% showed improvement in skin hydration after 5 minutes.- 100% showed improvement in skin barrier function after 1 week.- 94% showed improvement in visible lines and wrinkles after 1 week.- 97% agreed their skin appeared firmer after 4 weeks.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Ceramides and Fatty Acids: Support a strong moisture barrier..-Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps skin..-Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Intensely nourishes dry, flaky skin....Water, Squalane, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isoamyl Laurate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Ceramide NP, Jojoba Esters, Sodium Hyaluronate, Euterpe Oleracea Sterols, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Ethyl Linoleate, Tocopherol, Isoamyl Cocoate, Cetyl Palmitate, Sorbitan Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Gluconate....The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to a clean face and neck, after your eye products and serums..-Use twice daily, morning and night...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove and dispose of cap..-Empty and rinse remaining product from jar..-Place in curbside recycling..-The outer cartonu202fis made from sustainable, FSC-certified sugarcaneu202fpaper andu202fcan be placed in curbside recycling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Confused and disappointed.  Used points to obtain testers of this product.  Loved that it had no scent. Testers are a white cream, absorb quickly, no fragrance.  Loved it, so I ordered the large size. Received a cream that was yellow in color,  had a lot of fragrance and had a very different texture from the sample size. Sent this one back. I have no idea what the real product is, lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer. Have used this for years, love the results.  Never greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is like Forrest Gump's box of chocolates: you never know what you're gonna get. Dry, oily, breaks out, flakes, eczema...depends on the day, even the hour. Everything I've tried from this line has performed incredibly well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this moisturizer after asking for it for Christmas. Boyfriend listened! I LOVE this stuff. It's so hydrating, but it doesn't leave me feeling like I have film of grease on my face. I'll definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my must have can't live without skincare product. Moisturizer that is so effective it can be used both day and night. I love the larger 3oz jar during the cooler winter months the feel and look of my skin is wonderful using this fantastic moisturizer. Not too heavy on my skin it absorbs well leaving my skin well nourished from early morning till late evening. Also compatible to wear under make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the same moisturizer since Sephora launched it in 2017 and I can tell you it is the same thing! I have tried other products to help my dry sensitive skin, but I always come back to this product. Seems like my skin loves squalene.!!!

reviews.review_title: Causes severe cystic acne on acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't write reviews, but felt called to do this one. I have used the copper peptide serum for years and it is awesome. I assumed that the omega repair cream would be good too. I was very wrong. It gave me many cystic pimples all over my cheeks. I stopped using it immediately. It has mostly cleared now. Even a month later I have hyper-pigmentation on both cheeks. I looked  online at different reviews (non sephora websites)this is very common for this specific cream.   I do not know if this has permanently damaged / scarred my skin. I don't know why it has such a high rating. If I can dissuade one person from wrecking their skin, I will. If you have even mildly acne prone skin, do not use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't have a beautiful shine to it, and if anything it makes my skin appear less radiant that I would like.  It's like they put a Mattifier in itu2026 and it dulls the way my skin can look. Most likely will not purchase again. likely so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just finished using this cream. It's so good for winter time. Love how moisturizing and smooth feels on my skin. Excellent choice for both day and night and you can layer it with your foundation. I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this asa gift a few months ago and loved it.  I used it all, picked up another one recently and I'm not sure if they changed their formula, but it smells so gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years and it was my HG. I didn't mind the smell because it worked so well and dissipated after a few seconds. But it seems they changed the formula to get rid of the smell and it does not work nearly as well. The texture is completely different and not as moisturizing. It now reminds of a drug store cream at 3x the price. I guess I'm going to have to find a new HG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer as part of a rewards set, and it was incredible! It felt smooth and very hydrating on my skin. However, I found it a bit heavy during the hotter months, so I recommend using it if your skin is extremely dry or in colder seasons when dryness is more pronounced. Overall, it's a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love This moisturizer super hydrating and light weight.  Good for oil skin people and for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry combination skin with acnes prone. It is hard to find a moisturizer that don't cause break out. I normally use Laneige sleep mask at night and moisturizer toner with suncream for day. That is only good for summertime.  Since i tried this moisturizer, my skin get enough moisture for fall and winter time without breaking out. I have used it for 1 month already and has no problem with acnes- freaking love it. Also, add another point for being fragrant free

reviews.review_title: love the product, HATE the priceu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: got a sample of this and unfortunately it's AMAZING. I have dry, acne-prone skin, and always have such a hard time finding moisturizers heavy enough to hydrate, but not break me out. My skin goes from dry and cracking, to dewy and bouncy in one use. Stays dewy looking all day and doesn't break me out. Only downside is the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this when I found out I was pregnant and needed to start using more pregnancy-safe products. It's ultra hydrating and hasn't irritated my sensitive skin. I even use this as a makeup primer! The value size is expensive but it did last me about 6 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this rich moisturizer it was too heavy or thick for my skin type, leaving my skin type greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's fine.  I like it but I would not buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it moisturizes my skin all day, better than other creams I have tried.  Keeps my skin looking hydrated and dewy.   The smell is awful tho I'm 58 years old

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely moisturizing. This moisturizer is a deep and dense moisturizer. I highly recommend it for dry skin. I have combo skin and only use it at night. I find if I use it in the morning I feel very moisturized all throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice, thick moisturizing cream for very dry skin. The ceramides and fatty acids help support the skins moisture barrier. Don't think I'd recommend for oily skin as it might be a bit too heavy. The ingredients are clean and I did not experience any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample size so I put aside the moisturizer I've been using to give this a try. Couple days later started noticing breakouts and now I have 4 new breakouts and this is the only thing that has changed. Disappointing

reviews.review_title: My go-to winter evening and nighttime moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a life saver in the winter!  It's a thick, comfortable cream that moisturizes and really locks in hydration without feeling waxy.  It doesn't burn or sting even if my skin is a little irritated, and it works really well with the Merit Perfecting Foundation/Concealer stick.   I haven't tried it under SPF, but if I'm going out someplace after sunset in the winter, this is my go-to moisturizer.  It's also amazing at bedtime and I don't wake up dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a rich yet non-greasy cream. It is unscented and has a natural scent that disappeared shortly after application. It felt hydrating and sunk in quickly. I feel like it would be good as skincare prep before makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the overnight rescue and love it, so when my regular daytime moisturizer wasn't cutting it anymore, I tried this. I have dry skin, but this moisturizer makes my skin oily and has given me a lot of breakouts, even after I quit using it for a few days to see if it was the culprit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not my first time using Biossance products and the squalane repair cream is top notch. It's thick and rich but sinks in quickly, leaving my skin super hydrated and plump without feeling greasy. The ceramides and hyaluronic acid have really helped smooth out my fine lines, and I appreciate that it's vegan and comes in recyclable packaging. It's become a must-have in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream! It's so refreshing and hydrating. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for an instant moisture boost to your skin. I honestly especially love using it on my belly during pregnancy to help reduce stretch marks. I know that's not specifically what it's for but personally I feel like it really helps! I also love that is lightly scented, especially due to being sensitive to fragrances during pregnancy as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think this cream is so nice. It feels luxurious, was easy to spread, and my skin drank it up. My skin felt so great after use. I wanted to love this but unfortunately it made me break out and is not the right product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing at long lasting hydration. I struggle with dry areas from acne this helped my acne feel not as dry and itchy. It did not cause any redness or irritation. I love this cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was thick and moisturizing. I saw a difference in my skin looking hydrated in the morning. Other than I didn't see any extreme noticable differences. It worked fine for my somewhat sensitive skin. I'd recommend to anyone looking for a heavy duty night time moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! I have been using for a little while now and love it in my routine. There is a balance to putting it on, not unlike other moisturizers, if you put too much it's a little filmy after drying. If using just the right amount no issues. It doesn't clog my pores or cause me to break out, which is a win win for my delicate skin.  I use in the morning and use a heavy moisturizer at night, just because I have verrry dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for two weeks now and have been really impressed. My skin was so dry from the cold weather and this really made a huge difference. My skin looks so much healthier and feels much better now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product . Leaves my skin super moisturized and not greasy. Looks great under make up. I would buy this again .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you need to moisturize the skin on your face, this is the cream for you. The cream has a very creamy texture and is absorbed very smoothly into the skin without leaving my skin sticky. It is very moisturizing. With prolonged use, I notice my skin is softer and more hydrated. It is very easy to add to your skin care routine. I combine it with my favorite serum and eye cream and they work wonders. I use it more during the day. I love that this cream is scentless and its purpose is to protect my skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Biossance for the free sample of the Squalane + Omega Repair Cream! Really love the feel of the cream, it's lightweight and velvety smooth. I used it day and night and it actually feels super good on. I layer sunscreen on top, and it doesn't pill. So far I like it a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I had longer to try this before writing this incentivized review but preliminarily, I like this a lot. I have oily skin but I understand the importance of hydration (helps the oil control). This has quickly become my favorite night moisturizer. I typically use 2 moisturizers at night for different purposes but this is an all-in-one for me. That said, it's not skin changing but it gets the job done efficiently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Me & my daughter both suffer fry dry skin on our faces & my daughter has excema as well so we were both really excited to try this moisturizer and we were not disappointed!! It has a pleasant smell and a smooth texture that absorbs immediately making my skin so soft. Just using for a week, my skin looks younger and my fine lines are less noticeable. I can only imagine what a difference it will make a month from now. Very thankful to have found this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Miracle worker!! I am 57, I have dry skin plus I use trentinoin. I have tried many moisturizers and most are okay unless my skin starts peeling due to my use of tretinoin. I received a sample of Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair and it seemed to work like a miracle so I kept getting the sample jars every time I could and only used it when I first noticed my skin was starting to flake and it worked every time. So even though it was more expensive than what I was using I decided to go ahead and get it. It is totally worth it to me. My skin feels so much softer and looks smoother. I have red other reviews that said it smells bad, I can not smell anything myself. I would definitely recommend to any dry skin person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer for winter! It's amazing! It's very hydrating and rich without feeling greasy and heavy. It absorbs very well leaving your skin feeling soft. My skin is sensitive and this moisturizer didn't trigger any breakouts. I get Seborrheic Dermatitis flare ups and it helped me keep it under control. It has zero smell which I prefer, I don't like strong fragrance smell in my skin care. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I have been using this moisturizer for about four weeks now. It's really been a game changer in my daily skin regimen. I knew it was improving my skin when one of my coworkers literally asked what I have been using on my skin and said I've been looking like I'm glowing! ( NO I'm NOT pregnant! lol) My pores are visibly smaller and this moisturizer doesn't leave an oily cast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed adding this product to my daily routine. With cooler weather approaching I have already noticed my skin drying up a little. With this repair cream my skin feels moisturized and replenished. It is the perfect consistency for smooth and even application. I can feel a difference in my skin when I use this cream vs. my prior moisturizer. I have loved the results so far. I received this product for free from Biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for about a month I will tell you it is a very good moisturizer and it feels so good on my skin. It did overtime help with my wrinkles and lines. The only down size was it did start to make me break out. Not horribly but like three that just kept popping up. So keep in mind it might break your face out. It feels a little likely at times but doesn't always hold enough moisture in the skin during really hot days and really cold days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by how hydrating this moisturizer is, but it actually hydrates really well! No harsh fragrances that can be irritating, which is good for my skin. I was a little nervous about the possibility of a breakout due to the squalene in this moisturizer, but so far everything has been good. The only con I noticed is I have to apply very little to my face if I use this moisturizer before applying makeup. If I apply too much my makeup will separate in areas, but overall great moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I start using it and since then I feel my face more bright and even. Also, I love the fact that I can use it under my makeup, I think this is a Plus u263aufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always a fan of Biossance. It's backed by a biotech company so they truly know what ingredients are effective. Also I like how quickly the cream absorbs and it's fragrance free. My skin feels soft the night after. My t zone does feel slightly oily though after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loving this product for my dull, dehydrated postpartum skin! My regular moisturizer just hasn't been cutting it since I gave birth nearly four months ago. I love waking up in the morning with soft, luminous, hydrated skin! Since I started using this moisturizer two or three weeks ago, my skin is looking MUCH better than it has since before I gave birth. It is absolutely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is fantastic for my combination skin! It provides long-lasting hydration without any greasy residue, leaving my skin feeling fresh and balanced. The silky texture melts effortlessly into the skin, making it a dream to apply. It also works beautifully under makeup, creating a smooth base with no creasing throughout the day. The only downside is the scent, which I find unpleasant. Thankfully, it fades quickly and doesn't linger. Overall, it's an excellent product that I highly recommend despite the minor issue with fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great moisturizer for the winter time and travel! It keeps my skin moist during the night when my skin needs it the most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well rounded nice product but personally I would not repurchase since I feel like it isn't hydrating enough for my taste. It might work for others.

reviews.review_title: This is a good cream for skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After I using this product, i feel it work on my skin. I read several of the reviews claiming this product smells terrible. I have asthma that is triggered by fragrances so I am very sensitive to them. I am not sure what all these reviewers are smelling because there is zero smell to the product I received. It is very creamy and moisturizing.

reviews.review_title: Affordable Luxury for Dry, Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream for free to review, and I'm so grateful for the opportunity, as it has been an incredible addition to my routine for my sensitive, dry skin. Having tried dozens of moisturizers over the years, including some much more expensive options, I found that very few live up to their promisesu2014but this one nourishes without feeling heavy, doesn't irritate, and leaves my skin looking radiant and healthy.  Skincare that is vegan, cruelty-free, and fragrance-free is a must for me, and Biossance checks all those boxes. Additionally, though not the most important factor in purchasing a skincare item, the Biossance aesthetic is on-point with its beautiful green glass jar and brushed gold lid. Once empty, I can think of dozens of ways to repurpose such a gorgeous container, and I greatly appreciate the use of such sustainable packaging!  I will definitely re-order once I finish this jar, though I suspect that this one will last for at least a couple of months due to its generous size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been testing the Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer, and it's easily one of the best moisturizers I've tried recently!  Infused with squalane, omega fatty acids, and hyaluronic acid, this cream feels rich yet lightweight. It provides intense hydration without clogging pores, which is a game-changer for anyone with combination or sensitive skin like mine. After a couple of weeks, my skin feels softer, looks plumper, and has a noticeable glowu2014even in harsh, dry weather.  One of my favorite things about Biossance is their commitment to clean, sustainable skincare, and this product is no exception. It's not just effective; it aligns with my values.  If you're looking for a deeply hydrating, skin-repairing moisturizer that works for all skin types, this one's worth the hype! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for a review and I took the time to try it for a few weeks. It's a nice thick and moisturizing cream that has been best for nighttime for me. I wake up with moisturized skin and haven't noticed and clogged pores or breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving the results so far from the Biossance moisturizer. This has boosted my skin hydration a ton and helped with the dry air. This is a heavier, thick product so maybe not great for oily skin folks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating! I use this on nights where I use my retinol routine as I tend to wake up really dry and flaky and this has helped tremendously. Even with the retinol my face feels dewy and soft in the mornings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream as my daily moisturizer this path month, since the weather is starting to get a bit cooler. It's helped keep the dry patches I usually get around my nose, at bay. I texture is thick and creamy but the cream doesn't feel heavy, blends right into my pores. I think I like this better than my cerave cream, because it's just as moisturizing but doesn't feel as waxy rubbing in. Would def rebuy this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect moisturizer for the wintertime because it is a thicker consistency. I would say it goes on thick and absorbs nicely. I wait a little bit before putting on my sunscreen so it has a bit of time to sink into my skin. No fragrance which is so necessary for a moisturizer. For me at least. This stuff is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! It's a little heavy for the day, but perfect for at night. It's so hydrating and my skin loves it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good. It leave my face feeling moisturized especially that I have psoriasis on some part of my face. My skin absorbs the product super fast when applied and leaves my skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to try this cream and I was very excited to get this in the mail. I do enjoy how moisturizing it feels. My only note is that i wish it was felt deeper in my skin, but my outer layer does feel soft wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved that this product made my face feel very hydrated. The most heavy creams feel oily and heavy on my skin. This one was a little thicker than one I'm used to, but I feel like my skin just absorbed it. I love the nice glow I had in the mornings when I put my makeup on. I just feel like it made everything blend together as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Biossance for the free Squalance + Cream! This is by far the best squalane cream I have tried. My old tried and true was The Ordinary because it was lower cost, but I found it is not the same anymore. This cream really does work well and stays working. You can instantly feel it moisturize your skin and what I love most about it is that you can feel your skin hydrated a few hours after. With my usual face cream I feel like my skin is back to being dry before I even get to apply my makeup. With this cream I do not have to rehydrate before applying my makeup. My skin has made great improvement as well these past few weeks that I have been testing it out.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting and free of fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this face cream for a 2 weeks now as the last step in my regimen after the serums and it's become a staple in my routine. The texture is rich, so you only need a small amount, which makes it really long-lasting. My skin tends to get extremely dry in the winter, and this cream provides the perfect balance of hydrationu2014it's deeply nourishing without feeling overly heavy. It sinks in beautifully, leaving my skin soft and comfortable.  One of my favorite things about it is that it's fragrance-free. As someone who doesn't enjoy scented skincare, this is such a big plus. I'd recommend it to anyone with dry or sensitive skin, especially if you're looking for something that's gentle, effective, and free of unnecessary fragrances.

reviews.review_title: Great texture, feel, and result the next morning
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how this moisturizer feels, it's a light very nourishing texture with no scents (which is a plus in my book - I do not enjoy strong scents). This goes on light and doesn't feel thick or unpleasant and my face consistently felt softer in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone skin like me, this unfortunately is not for you. The product says non-comedogenic but contains shea butter. I really wanted to love this but I cannot afford to clog up my pores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an incredible moisturizing cream. My skin is oily, but it tends to get a bit dehydrated in the winter. This is the perfect cream for the colder months. My skin feels sufficiently hydrated and smooth, and I like that there's no fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this moisturizer from Biossance as I've heard so many great things about it. The packaging of it seems so luxurious with the nice and heavy glass jar. It comes with a topper lid so that it doesn't leak during  transportation but also so that it doesn't get onto the lid. The cream is quite thick and heavy but because I have dry skin from using retinol, my skin soaked this right up and it felt so good. My skin felt so moisturized and hydrated. It doesn't have a really pleasant smell though probably because it's fragrance free so it doesn't have any perfume-y scent. Good for any one who needs fragrance free skincare for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has become a new favorite in my skincare routine. I struggle to maintain correct moisture levels in my skin. I have very dry combination skin. As a result, my forehead and nose have flaky patches. My skin will literally burn when I apply moist products. This moisturizer has single handedly helped repair my skin. It's extremely gentle and highly moisturizing. I have roscea, and very sensitive acne prone skin. This cream is thick, and I was worried it could cause me acne flare ups, and I'm happy to report I had no reactions. I love the fact the product is completely scent-free. I know others in the comments have mentioned a weird smell. I'm assuming they recently reformulated this cream, but there is not a hint of scent in the cream. I love the way my skin looks bouncy and hydrated after application. Makeup also applies over the cream like an absolute dream. This product is truly awesome, and I foresee it winning many awards in the near future.   I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this moisturizer my skin immediately feels more plump and hydrated. It's creamy but doesn't feel heavy on the skin. Additionally, it absorbs quickly and does not leave a greasy feel. It has a mild scent with more earthly notes. I find myself reaching for this moisturizer before my others. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Luxurious cream with lipids that supports the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this product for free in exchange for my honest review. Biossance  Squalane and Omega repair cream is deeply moisturizing yet feels light on the skin. I love that the brand stands against animal cruelty and uses sugarcane-derived squalane instead of the shark liver harvesting !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry skin and this moisturizer has actually done the trick! It's gives deep hydration and doesn't just sit on my face! I've had it for a couple of months now and it's definitely HG status for me now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a proper cream in the true sense of the word; it's thick and dense in texture but spreads beautifully across the skin and you can use it sparingly or build upon it if you find that you need deeper hydration or want to treat yourself to an overnight infusion that will leave your face soft and protected in the morning. The ceramides and squalene really perform as intended, they sink into the skin without leaving it feeling tacky or shiny. If you find that it's not absorbing the way you would like it to, I definitely recommend using a gentle chemical exfoliant to remove any dead skin and with it obstacles to the cream reaching deeper. It's perfect for a fall to winter (and all winter long) transition to a heavier hitting formula that will defend against the dryness and effects of the colder season, the especially in climates with more extreme weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so perfect for the winter time because my skin is getting drier. This is a heavier cream but doesn't feel heavy or tacky after applying it. I love the squalane and ceramides in this that keep my skin hydrated and plump. The ingredient list is clean and simple (also vegan if that's important to you).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is super hydrating and feels great in the skin. I have very sensitive skin and this did not cause any irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream smells nice and is velvety, but  unfortunately leaves my skin very oily. It might be good for someone with dry skin    Biossance kindly gave me this cream for free so that I can review it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has definitely kept my dry skin feeling soft without being heavy on my skin. It is a thicker moisturizer so if you don't have time to let it set i to your skin before applying makeup, you might want to use it just for night time routine. I would definitely get it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After couple weeks using this product, my skin got very smooth and moisture.  I live up On mountain  very dry. This product really helps. Will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shout out to anyone who has dehydrate skin, you need this cream for the cold weather! It's lovely, not so thick not so light it's the right consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for several weeks. I've tried all kinds of moisturizer in past for my dry skin that's starting to show fine lines and is dull. This puts a glow and moisture in my 33 yr old face. It absorbs quickly too and does not leave a sticky face. My husband also loves it, which is a plus point!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer for my dry skin! It feels thick and luxurious without going on too heavy or oily and always leaves my skin feeling soft after applying. I've used it under makeup and have never had a problem either. I also really like spot applying this to dry patches during the day to help keep them from looking flaky. Slight clean fragrance but doesn't linger!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've always struggled to find a good facial moisturizer. Sometimes they don't nourish my skin. Sometimes they leave me feeling greasy. The Biossance  Squaline and Omega Repair Cream was the best of all worlds. After my first use, I could feel a difference. There's no scent, so it doesn't irritate the skin, and it feels so good on. It's great for say and night, and I will definitely be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard good things about what squalane does for the skin, and I already love hyauronic acid, so I was excited to try this product. Loving it so far! No fragrance, and it feels very rich but applies easily and absorbs well. My face definitely feels more hydrated after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my evening moisturizer. It's super hydrating without feeling heavy or causing breakouts, which I sometimes get using a richer moisturizer. It layers well with other products and the packaging feels luxurious while being easy to access all of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this a lot - I also have the probiotic gel in the similar packaging. I have oily/combo skin and the gel version is great for summer and daytime. This one is a bit richer and it works well now that we're going into winter and/or for nighttime. One star off because it does make me feel a little greasy and there are alternative richer creams of this type that I prefer. I will use the entire jar but not sure that I will purchase once it's gone! All in all, a good product that would work particularly well for those with dry/combo skin or those needing more moisture in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. I have been using it daily on my dry skin and that my skin has been glowing since I've started using this cream. My skin has been feeling moisturized, smooth and it looks so much brighter. I like when I apply it, immediately absorbs into my skin and doesn't leave a greasy feeling. I also like that I just need a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for 2 weeks I can defiendelo say I will be re-buying this product again and again ! It leaves my skin feeling so plump and moisturized! I use it at night most of the time and I wake up feeling my skin hydrate and my skin barrier has never felt better !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! I received a free sample from BzzAgent and I'm so happy that I did (just in time for the winter months too!). I've been trying out a few different moisturizers in an attempt to control dryness and u201ctretinoin ugliesu201d from ruining my makeup half way through my day. Most moisturizers were too thin to provide hydration for the entire day, while others were too thick and pilled under sunscreen and makeup. This moisturizer was the perfect fit! It's creamy, soft, and luxurious. It doesn't pill, provides all day hydration, and can be used both mornings and nights. It's also fragrance free! I felt comfortable enough to use this moisturizer the day after receiving a Moxi laser treatment and my skin loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So hydrating. Leaves my skin plump, glowing, and does not cause breakouts. Absolutely love. Sensitive skin friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that acts up during the fall/winter in LA's dry climate. I've tried a few different moisturizers that I've liked (from Tatcha to fresh), and I feel like this one hits the mark in sitting comfortably between the two for me. It's not too heavy on my skin, there is little to no scent, and my skin feels great after a night of sleep (though note that I also do use a humidifier). I received this product in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_title: Love this light weight yet nourishing moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A deeply nourishing moisturizer without feeling heavy on your skin. I almost instantly noticed plumper smoother and calmer skin. It last much longer than my usual moisturizer. Does have a harsh smell as no added fragrance, I haven't noticed any irritation while using this either! It sinks in quickly and really helps with my wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is really good! I loved how it feels on skin, very light , and the skin absorbs it very quickly! Smells nice not too strong! My skin felt really good after two weeks of using it ! My skin looked fresher and life fully ! I do recommend using it!

reviews.review_title: deeply moisturizing with a light, non-oily texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great hydration, light and absorbs well, does not clog acne-prone skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream, it is very moisturizing but still lightweight. I use retinols making my skin very dry and this keeps it hydrated and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very rich moisturizing cream that i feel is appropriate to use day and night. it makes me feel moisturized and refreshed. I like that they found vegan sources for their ingredients. however, this cream doesn't go above or beyond for me, while it is good, it is a standard moisturizer. This is personally great for me, as i have serums that i like to mix and match depending on my skin needs, but this is a true moisturizer: nothing else, no frills. if you are looking for an all-in-one type product, this is NOT for you. If you simply need more moisture in your routine, then i would try it.   For transparency purposes, I was given this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this new cream! I have been using tretinoin at a higher strength and have been peeling BAD. This stuff soothes my skin and is so good for restoration!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo sensitive skin and love this moisturizer at night. I love that it does not have any fragrance and it doesn't smell at all. It is hydrating, not greasy, and doesn't pill. I have a bit of a rash and this has helped soothe it and relieve the irritation. I'll be using this throughout the winter to keep my skin calm and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is super moisturizing but doesn't leave your skin feeling heavy or greasy. Its lightweight but packs a punch of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks and feels so much better! Its hydrating formula with Squalane and Omega Fatty Acids and Hyaluronic Acid penetrates deep into my skin giving it that moisture and glow that it so very much needs. Fine lines are less visible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Biossance brand and the squalene!  This is a thick luxurious cream that instantly makes my skin feel hydrated,  moisturized, and soft.   It has a light scent that goes away.   The hyaluronic acid also helps to keep moisture in.  Great thick cream that I love to use morning or night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels great on the skin. There is no scent . Ingredients are clean . I do feel like it takes a while to absorb . But leaves a nice moisture barrier . I am used to gel based moisturizers but will use this for the winter time as my skin is more dry.

I received this product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest opinion. I have combination skin that is also sensitive, so many products tend to cause redness or breakouts. During the warmer months, I get by just fine with a drugstore moisturizer. But when winter comes around, I need something more hydrating. This moisturizer is both hydrating and soothing, and I didn't experience any negative reactions to it. While I wouldn't consider it a holy grail, I genuinely enjoy using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might be the best moisturizer I've used. It's extremely hydrating and works amazingly well with my routine. I use it morning and night (with retinol). My skin feels and looks great. Highly recommend especially during winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. Makes my skin look so smooth and glowy! I love that it is a clean product. It has a thicker consistency but absorbs quickly into my skin without feeling greasy at all. I've worn this under makeup as well and had no issues, it layered beautifully. Will definitely be getting another jar of this to get me through the winter season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoying this moisturizer. It makes my skin feel plump and youthful after just a couple of days of use. I love that it's fragrance free and a little goes a long way. It leaves a nice moisturization that doesn't feel greasy on my skin. My skin is usually pretty dry and makeup can emphasize the dryness - but this moisturizer has helped my skin look pretty flawless!

reviews.review_title: Great for stressed and dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good for mature, dry, or damaged skin.  I've been using this moisturizer for almost a week now, and have noticed a slight improvement in my skin health. My skin feels somewhat more glowy.   Having said that, I do have very dry/damaged skin, so I'll have tocontinue using to see if this product is really worth the hype.

reviews.review_title: It a good cream but no game changer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has a very nice texture. It's fluffy and not that heavy. I was able to use it under my makeup. I have a combination skin and lately, my skin has been very dry. I didn't feel a deep hydration, but it did help a little. Would I use it again? Maybe for summer. I do like that it has hyaluronic acid though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is slightly thick and smooth in consistency, deeply moisturizing. It absorbs into the skin very quickly, leaving it soft and delicate. I recommend this cream especially for people with dry skin. One note: the scent could be improved.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried the Squalane + Omega Repair Cream and found it to be incredibly light and comfortable to wear, especially appreciating that it's fragrance-free. It's great knowing that the company prioritizes clean, ethical ingredients and supports animal welfareu2014definitely a big plus in my book!  However, I have very dry skin, and unfortunately, this cream didn't quite provide the level of hydration I need. It might be ideal for someone with normal to slightly dry skin, but for extra-dry types, it may fall a bit short in moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE BEST moisturizer I've ever had! I use this all the time and I cannot tell anyone how much it has changed my skin. I absolutely love the glowy finish after and I am soooo grateful it heals my skin barrier and makes my skin feel so hydrating! Definitely recommended to all my friends and family! Super light weight and hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past couple weeks I actually really enjoyed this for the winter. It'll be great underneath my make up as well as it is not too heavy. I appreciate how it applied and would recommend it in the future to my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! I have combination, sensitive skin and it works very well to moisturizer it without making my face very greasy. My face stays soft and nourished for hours. I can see myself using this all along winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for about a week now and really like it. It smells nice, goes on smoothly, and feels extremely light. I have been using it as my nightly face cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Luxurious lightweight, moisture rich cream! Has helped heal my skins barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this Omega Repair Deep Hydration it's soo great for my skin! It's very hydrating and after a few days I've noticed a difference! I love using this at night before going to bed and the texture and scent is nice as well! Packaging is also nice and clean and great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice moisturizer, it makes the skin feels nourished and plump, also soft and hydrated. I didn't try under makeup, I like to use this as a part of my pm skincare routine. I'm thoroughly impressed with the results. It has exceeded my expectations in every way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing without making the skin feel oily or heavy. It goes in winter months or in dryer climates.

reviews.review_title: Works great for my dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used the cream every night for a week and can say that my skin feels more moisturized! My skin gets very dry the second it gets chilly out, so I can see myself using this cream all winter. Love that it has so many ingredients that help produce and retain moisture. Would recommend to those with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer ! It goes on light and is very hydrating. Love the packaging as well. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a good face cream, but not the best, most hydrating one I've ever tried. I would say it is best as a daytime moisturizer, but would probably opt for something more hydrating at night. That said, I do have extremely dry skin, so for someone with normal skin, this would probably work great. I don't think I would purchase this for myself, but I would have no problems recommending it for my friends and family who do not have very dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Skip this product if you have oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product twice daily for a couple weeks, I had to stop using it on my full face due to breakouts on my chin and lower cheeks. Using it on my forehead has not produced any additional breakouts. For reference, I have oily, acne prone skin.   It does make my skin feel softer and it is a good hydration product. It didn't wear well under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! Very hydrating and leaves my skin soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Biossance moisturizer truly helped my dry skin. I have been using it daily and my face feels so hydrated. I see a dermatologist regularly and she even commented that my skin was looking better compared to my previous appointment. I'm glad I finally found a moisturizer that works well with my skin and doesn't cause me an allergic reaction. If you're on the fence on this product, you should definitely purchase it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent, hydrating moisturizer that does not clog pores and provides long lasting moisture. Fantastic for under makeup and does not cause the foundation to separate. Just make sure to let it settle for about 10 minutes before applying. I was given this product for my honest review. I  have owned it previously multiple times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Biossance Omega Repair Cream for a few weeks now, and I'm thrilled with the results! My skin tends to be on the dry side, especially during colder months, and this cream has been a game-changer. It's rich and deeply moisturizing without feeling greasy or heavy, which is amazing for someone who dislikes that weighed-down feeling some creams can leave.  The texture is luxuriously creamy and absorbs nicely into my skin, leaving it feeling soft, plump, and nourished. I also appreciate that it's fragrance-free, which is perfect for my sensitive skin. I've noticed a big improvement in hydration levels and overall skin texture u2013 it just feels healthier and smoother.  Another major plus is the clean ingredients and sustainability behind Biossance's brand; knowing I'm using something both effective and environmentally conscious is important to me. Highly recommend this if you're looking for a rich, hydrating cream that doesn't compromise on clean beauty standards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this cream to be both hydrating and healing. I have combo skin and hormonal acne, and I usually have a few inflamed spots around my face. I felt that after using this as a hydrating mask at night the spots were less red in the morning, and my skin was glowing. And I love the sustainability aspect to both the product and packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this but it hasn't been my favorite. You have to use a lot to cover your face and it makes my hands feel oily after. I have dry skin so was hoping this would be more hydrating than it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great. I have very oily and acne prone skin. This product gave my skin the right amount of hydration without leaving any tacky feeling. It also did not make my skin break out. I am very happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely disappointed to find that as I repurchase each Biossance product that I've used for years..that slowly but surely I find that each product has been reformulated. Biossance was a brand that I loved and considered a staple in my skincare routine. The new formulations are not only sub-par but I've found I either have to discontinue use or return each product and look for an alternative brand. Wish they would bring back the original formulas! This new formula for example gave me an immediate headache and I had to wash it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really haven't found that perfect moisturizer yet until I stumbled upon this one! I didn't have high expectations before trying, but after the first day of using it I already fell in love. The consistency is actually perfect, it leaves a feeling of a perfect moisture barrier on your face that really feels like it's working. I have combination skin and it really has been perfect for me. I will be buying this once my sample runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for the past about two weeks and I swear it is so creamy so moisturizing and it is helping fine lines and not only that, but I swear it makes my skin look so more useful and plump and radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. With the seasons changing, my skin has become dry and scaly. This moisturizer renewed my skin barrier and restored moisture to my face. It had a light scent and was super absorbent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is truly luxurious. There is not a strong or noticeable fragrance, which is a huge plus for me. The texture is thick and creamy without being greasy. I have combination type skin (oily in my T-zone and jawline) and this moisturizer would be perfect for me year round. Give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream is a rich yet lightweight moisturizer that hydrates deeply without feeling greasy. Its blend of squalane and omega fatty acids helps repair the skin barrier, leaving my skin soft, smooth, and balanced. Compared to other moisturizers, this one stands out for its long-lasting hydration and calming effects on sensitive skin. While it's a bit pricey, the results are worth it. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a nourishing, clean moisturizer that delivers on its promises.  Would I buy it? Yes. Would I recommend it? Definitely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream, and it's been fantastic. It has a light, subtle scent that isn't overpowering, which I appreciate. The cream is super moisturizing but doesn't leave a greasy residue, making it perfect for everyday use. I'd definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful formula contains ceramides a fatty acid that aids in keeping the skin healthy, retaining moisture for supple skin. Hyaluronic acid, helps maintain youthful skin. A must for these colder months

As someone who has dry skin, I found this cream to be really hydrating. Consistency is thick and creamy which is perfect for a night cream or winter day cream. Aesthetically pleasing container on my countertop and light clean smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over a week and I am definitely seeing an improvement in redness and skin texture. Winter is coming and my skin has been suffering from the changing air and temps and this lotion keeps my skin hydrated during the day. A little goes a very very long way. It also layers well with the other products in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this moisturizer my skin has never felt so soft! I have dry skin naturally and this has helped immensely! I can visibly tell a difference in how my skin looks as well, it looks plumper and more even toned! This is the best face cream I have used, and will definitely be getting more! I got this for free in exchange for writing the review.

reviews.review_title: A must try! Great ingredients for dull skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Biossance kindly gave me this moisturizing cream for free so that I could review it! This actually isn't my first bottle and it was recommended to it by a Sephora associate for my skin feeling dull and dry. This cream is packed with such great ingredients. I was looking for something to help my dull skin look healthy and feel moisturized but not too heavy. I recommend giving it a try if your looking for a new moisturizer with these ingredients (like squalene and omega fatty acids) to nourish and help your skin from not looking dull, skin food!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is a lifesaver for my skin! This cream delivers deep, lasting hydration without feeling heavy or greasy. My skin feels soft, plump, and rejuvenated after each use, and it's gentle enough for sensitive skin. Plus, the added omegas really boost my skin's smoothness and elasticity. Highly recommend for anyone needing serious moisture and repair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
