reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for the past week and loving it! I have been a big fan of Biossance for a while now and always use their products. This is another gem! I have combination skin, so this product does a great job of keeping dry areas moisturized. This is now part of my daily nighttime routine and I wake up with nice, hydrated skin every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Biossance squalane+ omega repair cream for free so I could review it. Though I received this cream for free, I will be repurchasing once I run out! This is definitely part of my daily routine.  I have used this cream for about a week and it has seriously helped hydrate my face, especially the dry patch of skin on my cheek due to the weather. The cream is EWG verified (super clean ingredients) which is very important to me. The repair cream has minimal scent. When you apply it, the moisturizer dries nicely. It does not feel tacky, and makeup lays nicely over it. I definitely think my skin is much more hydrated, and bright. A little goes a long way! I use it all over my face and neck, and any extra I wipe on the tops of my hands.   The packaging is great. The product comes in a glass jar, again important to me as I don't want microplastics on my skin. I would definitely recommend this product. For reference, I have combination skin and I'm in my mid-thirties. I hope you find my review helpful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has honestly been amazing for my dry, sensitive skin. It's super hydrating without being too heavy, which is hard to find. It leaves my skin soft and smooth without feeling oily. I use it under makeup, and it absorbs nicely. It's a little pricey, but for me, it's been worth it to see my skin looking healthier and more even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been loving how moisturizing this cream is without making my skin feel heavy or oily. Having hyaluronic acid built in is nice too! Plus having no scent is a nice added touch. I definitely feel like I'm doing my skin a favor when using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd like to start off by saying I have the unfortunate combination of both extremely dry but extremely sensitive skin. This typically leads to issues finding something that is hydrating enough to keep the flakes at bay but still won't cause redness and irritation. Admittedly I wasn't optimistic when I first received this cream solely because on the initial application it didn't feel heavy enough to be as hydrating as it claimed. I'm happy to say I was dead wrong. I'm on day 5 of using it every morning and evening after cleansing with just the CeraVe hydrating cleanser and my skin feels smoother and more hydrated than it has in years. I have no flakes, minimal texture, and I've had zero itching or redness with this cream. I'm absolutely going to purchase this for myself when I run out.

I am a fan of this moisturizer. It keeps my skin hydrated and soft without feeling heavy or greasy. The combination of ceramides, omega fatty acids, and squalene leave my skin hydrated the entire day. It has the perfect texture for an overnight cream and leaves my skin glowy and refreshed the next morning. There is no irritating strong smell and the product was not too heavy so I did not break out. I already have 2 backups! As you can tell I would recommend this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As the season changes and the temperature drops, my face has been feeling a bit dry. The Squalene + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid by Biossance has really helped plump my skin with the needed hydration. A little goes a long way, and it feels extremely luxurious when applied. I also really like that it doesn't have much of a scent. I will make sure to keep this as part of my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin type is D R Y, I'm talking mummy levels of dehydrated! So I'm always on the lookout for products that hydrate and protect my long-suffering moisture barrier, especially now that winter is coming. I love that they've combined emollients and humectants, that way you get hydration while the Omega acids help to prevent transepidermal water loss.  Now, I know the price tag is a bit steep,  but it's so rich that a little goes a very long way! All in all, I'm very happy with the performance of this product, it is a powerful weapon in my fight against Sahara Skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! My dry skin just drinks this up and it feels so hydrating but not overly thick! I love the consistency of this so much, it is my new winter hero. After I use this my skin feels so plump and supple for hours. Highly reccomend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is luxurious and rich; it is incredibly hydrating and leaves the skin feeling super supple. I love that it doens't have added fragrance as fragrance tends to break my skin out or cause irritation. As someone with combination skin, I personally would not apply makeup over this as it caused creasing under concealer and foundation. Otherwise, I think this is a hit!

reviews.review_title: Ultimate Hydration: My New Go-To Moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer has quickly become my go-to moisturizer, surpassing even my previous holy grail favorites. The formula is rich and nourishing, delivering intense hydration thanks to its blend of squalane, omega fatty acids, and hyaluronic acid. I love how it leaves my skin feeling soft, plump, and comfortably hydrated all day, without any heavy or greasy finish. Each application feels like a mini-luxury, and over time, I've noticed a beautiful, healthy glow that has me reaching for this product consistently. It's the perfect choice for anyone seeking a moisturizer that brings long-lasting hydration with a radiant, smooth finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Biossance for sending me this moisturizer to review. I have recently upped my dosage for Tret so I had been flaking very badly. I was also experiencing an inflamed skin barrier. This moisturizer was amazing for dealing with that. It is SO hydrating. I absolutely loved this moisturizer. It truly seeps into your skin and hydrates deep inside. It is a bit on the pricier side. This product does ethically produce their squalene which usually comes from sharks. If ethical products are important to you and you can afford this moisturizer, I absolutely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely no fragrance!! Sensitive skin girlies will love this one! It is water based so it's a lighter cream, however i knocked off a star because it is still a little greasy and takes a while to absorb fully. It feels a tiny bit heavy on my face but i don't mind, as i run very dry. I love the glass pot and the clean ingredients! I will definitely be returning for this one! I received this product in return for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by biossance. This moisturizer has been great! It works great for morning and night and has been perfect now that my skin is drier in the cold weather. I love that it has no smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with the Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream! This luxurious moisturizer has completely transformed my combo/dry skin. The whipped texture melts into my skin, leaving it feeling instantly hydrated and plump. It's packed with nourishing ingredients like squalane and omega fatty acids that strengthen my skin's barrier and lock in moisture all day long. I love that it's fragrance-free and gentle enough for even sensitive skin. If you're looking for a moisturizer that delivers serious hydration without any greasy residue, this is the one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a free review but honestly I'm blown away by how good it is. It is so effective at my dry skin. I suffer from psoriasis and pretty severe eczema and this has been fantastic. It does not have any sense and it does not interact with any of my other creams. It drives very quickly and I feel so moisturized for the entire day to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer both morning and night for a week, and I'm genuinely impressed with the results so far! The texture is really niceu2014thick and hydrating without feeling too heavy or goopy. My skin already feels smoother and less dry, and even with my combination skin, I haven't noticed any extra oiliness. I'm really happy with the improvement in my skin and definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Review: Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream  I recently tried the Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream, and it's quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. The first thing I noticed was the cream's rich, luxurious texture. It's deeply hydrating without feeling heavy, and it absorbs well into the skin, leaving a soft, velvety finish.  What stands out the most about this cream is its formulau2014packed with squalane, omega fatty acids, and ceramides, which work together to nourish and repair the skin barrier. After using it consistently, my skin feels noticeably more hydrated, plump, and less prone to dryness and flakiness. It's also free of parabens, synthetic fragrances, and other potentially irritating ingredients, which is great for my sensitive skin.  This product has become a lifesaver during colder months when my skin is extra dry, but I think it would be suitable for anyone dealing with dehydration or seeking a more radiant, resilient complexion. While it is a bit on the pricier side, I find the results make it worth it, especially if you're looking for a gentle, effective solution to tackle dryness and strengthen your skin barrier.

reviews.review_title: A nice addition to my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has been a great addition to my routine! I've currently using exfoliating products like Tretinoin and my skin has become extremely dry. This has been perfect at moisturizing my skin and making sure my skin barrier is not compromised. I love that there is no added fragrance and this is suitable and gentle for my oily/sensitive skin. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this Biossance face cream! My skin always gets super dry when the seasons switch from summer to fall but this has been an absolute game changer. It gives my dry skin a new glow and the elasticity has improved dramatically. I've gotten lots of compliments and definitely plan to buy more. It is now a staple in my skincare routine. Trust me, you need this Biossance moisturizer for hydration ASAP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm impressed with this cream. I received it from Bzzagent in exchange for leaving an honest review. It has a great texture - thick but goes on smoothly and absorbs into my skin easily. No scent/fragrance (yay!). It definitely helped with dryness on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing and I feel like it helped with fine lines. I love that it doesn't have any fragrance either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is a dream! I get really picky with moisturizers because my skin tends to be on the sensitive side and I would also prefer a moisturizer that can function equally well mornings and nights. This moisturizer is that. It goes on incredibly smoothly and sinks in immediatelyu2014I actually look forward to applying this. Feels heavy enough for night but doesn't pull if I apply before makeup in the morning. I will 100% be purchasing this once it runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has become a lifesaver as the air gets dryer. It's light and rich at the same time, melts in quickly without a sticky/heavy feeling. There's a noticeable difference in the softness of my skin immediately, without it feeling like there's product sitting on top. I only take a star off because I wish it felt more u201cfresh,u201d though the simplicity and lack of fragrance are a benefit in their own rights. I did receive this product for free in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use. Has an odd smell but the product works so that is okay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this product. Tretinoin is part of my routine so I was worried about this further drying my skin out but it seemed to work well. I have been using this product at night and I enjoyed the thickness of this moisturizer and how it went on my skin. I wasn't a huge fan of the smell but it seemed to fade quickly so not a big problem. Overall it's a good product!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very moisturizing and i like that it is scent free. Gives my face a subtle glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free In exchange for my honest review. I'm super impressed so far! I struggle with super dry skin and now approaching colder weather this has been a really nice addition to my skincare. It looks and feels very luxurious. Not greasy at all it absorbs nicely and hasn't made me break out. So far so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With the winter months approaching, I've been in search of a hydrating, clean, glowy moisturizer and I've found one! A little goes a long way with this cream, I apply at night and wake up to dewey hydrated skin. It will be a new staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this moisturizer comes from plants. It is pretty thick but goes on lightly. It is non-irritating and unscented. My skin felt hydrated the next morning, and it did not cause any breakouts. I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fragrance free and very moisturizing. Absorbs quickly and leaves skin feeling supple & hydrated without feeling greasy. Skin feels already softer after 1 week of use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed using this moisturizer especially since I have dehydrated skin. It kept my skin hydrated for over 24 hours! I would recommend buying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful luxe feeling jar that looks beautiful on my bathroom vanity. I received this product just in time for the cold NY weather, after just a few uses I feel my skin is much more hydrated and even feel that it's protected from the cold dry weather. I have not used enough times yet to notice a difference in wrinkles. It is the perfect texture and allows your skin to breathe unlike some of the other facial creams. I'm excited to add this as a staple to my routine for winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Squalane + Omega Repair Cream for a few weeks now, and it's made a noticeable difference in my skin! This cream has a rich, yet non-greasy texture that absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling deeply hydrated without feeling heavy. I especially love that it's packed with omega fatty acids and squalane, which really help to reinforce my skin's moisture barrier and keep it soft.

reviews.review_title: Love the texture, not the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture! It honestly has saved my skin in the past couple weeks as the weather starts getting drier. My lips are getting chapped but so far my face and neck have stayed nice and moisturized.  I'm not big on the smell-it's veryu2026.astringent, but overall if it keeps my face looking this good I'm happy to put up with it and probably will put a cream or something on top so I don't notice it as much. I might start using it as a hand cream even :) I haven't noticed a significant difference in any acne or how oily my skin gets at times. I have alternated layering this cream with a serum from the ordinary, as well as using it by itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream is a game-changer for dry skin. Its rich, buttery texture absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling deeply hydrated without any greasy residue. Infused with squalane and essential fatty acids, it not only moisturizes but also strengthens the skin barrier. I noticed a significant reduction in dryness and irritation after just a few days of use. The subtle, pleasant scent is an added bonus. Perfect for daily use, this cream is ideal for all skin types, especially in colder months. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to boost their skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Squalane + Omega Repair Cream is a true skincare savior! Its rich yet lightweight formula offers deep hydration without feeling greasy, making it ideal for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Infused with squalane and essential omegas, this cream works wonders in strengthening the skin's natural barrier, leaving it looking plump, smooth, and radiant.  One of the standout features is its silky texture, which absorbs beautifully and layers well under makeup. I noticed a difference in my skin's elasticity and smoothness within days, especially in dry areas. Perfect for anyone seeking long-lasting hydration with a healthy glow, this cream is a powerhouse of gentle, nourishing ingredients that delivers luxurious results. Highly recommended for anyone looking to level up their skincare routine!

reviews.review_title: My New Favorite Moisturizer and WHY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product felt amazing when I put on my finger tips. It was so rich but not greasy. I have acne and rosacea and just started Adapalene (Differin gel) which works like a retinoid and can cause major dryness and flair ups. I've used this every morning and every evening and have ZERO dry flakiness. It has not caused my acne to get worse even right before my cycle or given me any issues. I'm not sure why some complain about the smell, I tried to smell it, literally smells like nothing. Once I get through this, it will be my go to moisturizer. More expensive than I would like but works better than even the Khiels advanced cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I did not know what to expect with this cream but I am so glad I got to try it! First of all, the packaging is so nice. It feels so fancy and luxurious. It does not have a strong scent or smell at all, so I would assume anyone with issues with fragrance would not be affected by it! When you put the cream on your face, it immediately feels so nice. It blends in immediately with no white cast or anything! It feels so high end! I used it for over a week and I can honestly say I feel like my face seems brighter, more awake, and I feel like the wrinkles around my eyes look better! I am so excited about this find!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the Biossance Squalene and Omega Repair Deep Hydration Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid! This moisturizer is lightweight but very hydrating. It does not make my skin feel sticky or greasy, but absorbs seamlessly into my skin barrier leaving it looking and feeling more hydrating! I love the clean ingredients and formula of the product also! This is my new go to moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you aren't a fan of how squalane feels on skin you may not like it. I'm 52 with combo skin for reference. First off, this is a rich and dense cream. Very luxurious feeling. Unscented. I used what I thought was a normal amount while skin was still damp. I recommend half that amount for whole face and neck. Otherwise it just sits on top of skin. This is excellent because you don't need as much. If you have dry skin or want bouncy firm skin I recommend this. I did receive it as a mini sample with my points. The sample is in a nice glass jar. Very heavy and luxurious feel and look. And ALOT of product as well. I'm sure this will last a month with daily evening use. I'll update after the month to give final thoughts. If all goes well this will replace my usual heavy winter months night cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the results of this cream. It's has gel/cream consistency, which glides on the skin smoothly. I apply it at night time and my skin is supple and soft the next morning and tighter. It locks the moisture and it absorbs really good, especially it's good with retinol and hasn't irritated my skin. I used it after my serums. It has no fragrance,  clean. It just has a nice faint scent which is pleasant. My skin looks smooth and soft and applying make up so easy after it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. I have dry skin and didn't need to use a face oil to seal it in and perfect for the winter season to keep you hydrated and moisturized with a healthy glow

reviews.review_title: A must have for winter hydration
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time right after taking a shower. I used it on my face and chest and I instantly felt smooth and moisturized. This cream goes on light and makes you  feel hydrated right away. You don't need to use a lot of this product either so a little goes a long way. I like that it is made with clean ingredients too. Since the weather is getting colder this is going to be a great cream to use to keep my skin healthy and moisturized! I can't say moisturized enough because this cream leaves you feeling amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not think I would love this product as much as I do. It's got this very airy whipped texture that glides on and immediately hydrates the skin. My skin feels hydrated hours after use. I've been using as the final step in my morning and even routine and have been loving it. I find myself grabbing for the product all the time. I have been using for 1 week and am excited to continue to use and see more results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer under my sunscreen and step one of my moisturizing Regine every morning so far my skin looks glowy soft and radiant it's been adding a lot of nourishment and moisture to my skin in addition but vitamins and Omega nutrients skin feels very soft to touch and smooth the look at

reviews.review_text: This product has been life changing as the weather is getting colder and dry. My skin has been so dry and this just moisturizes so deeply and leaves me skin with a clean feeling and not greasy. It's a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Biossance squalane & omega repair cream has been excellent on my skin. Its a face cream that does moisturize my face alot.

reviews.review_text: Love this cream. It's rich and moisturizing but doesn't leave my skin oily. I feel like it helps restore my skin barrier. My skin looks calmer and more plump. I like the consistency, the scent, the texture. I like to apply a thick layer at night to really hydrate my skin while I sleep and I apply a thinner layer in the morning.

reviews.review_title: My new go to for winter dryness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I looove this. My skin has been so dry with the weather changing and I started breaking out like crazy. This soothed my skin and didn't cause any further breakouts. It's definitely going to be my new winter moisturizer. I received this product for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product continually leaves my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed! It pairs perfectly with all of my other products and is easily one of my favorite moisturizers!

reviews.review_title: only moisturizer that doesn't make me break out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: amazing! only moisturizer that doesn't make me break out. super hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is arguably the best moisturizer for dry and sensitive skin. Ironically though, I have oily skin and it works very well to keep me hydrated and my oils at bay. I saw an improvement in my skin almost instantly after using. I love the texture of the whipped moisturizer and it absorbs into my skin like butter! The smell is very earthy in my opinion but it isn't off-putting. It dissipates shortly after it is absorbed into the skin. I always get compliments on how glowy my skin is. I've been using this moisturizer consistently and alternate between this one and the gel moisturizer for about a year now. I do not plan on going back to anything else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good moisturizer but I would not recommend it for people who have asthma,it triggers mine and it kinda smell like a foot cream,has the same consistency too.I hope it has a lighter or fruity scent so I could actually use it daily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I have dry and sometimes sensitive skin and this works so well. Can use it both day and night and always wake up feeling moisturized. Love that the ingredients are clean and vegan too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. It works really well for my skin, it moisturizes and dries down really nicely without making me sticky. Unfortunately, like many other reviews mention, sometimes you get a really stinky jar. I'd say it's 50/50, I've had 3 large ones and 4 mini ones and 1 of the large ones and 3 of the small ones stank. It smells like socks. It's very bad, but it dissipates within a minute. I keep using the cream becuse it works and it doesn't break me out. But the reviews aren't lying, you might get a stinky jar. I really really really hope they address that (because it does give you the ick after washing, cleansing, and prepping your face to smother sock cream on it lol it kinda ruins the self care vibe) but the formula is otherwise amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a bad reaction under my eyes after using it twice. It starting to get so itchy, red and swollen for about couple days. My skin burns and felt super irritated. I have never, in my life, had reaction to any eye creme (or facial creme) before so I did not pay attention to test it on the back of my hand first. I should have! Recommend everyone to test first and if you got reaction, putting on gel ice pack can help a lot.

reviews.review_title: The best treatment for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer for extremely dry skin. I cannot recommend it enough as I've been a Biossance enthusiast for years (since the release of their tea tree collection). I use this twice a day (morning and bedtime), and its moisturizing capacity has not disappointed me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is traumatizing. I woke up this morning to a swollen face with ugly bumpy skin texture, itchy dry skin all over my face and neck, tiny whiteheads popping up, breaking out into itchy rashes on my neck with red patches. When I first put it on yesterday, after a couple hours, I noticed skin fold lines under my eyes that I've never gotten before. I had also applied it on my neck as I usually do with lotions and after a while, my neck felt like it was burning and super itchy. It was dreadful. I immediately washed it off but it must have absorbed all into my skin. I've never had any reactions to skin products until this one. Buy at your own risk. I only got the little sample so I can try it. Thank god i didn't get the full size. I've been having a miserable day and I just hope it gets back to normal soon :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand this. I recently received a sample pack of this moisturizer and eye cream, and both were excellent. There wasn't a smell with either. However, when I went to purchase the large jar of this same moisturizer, it smelled awful! I couldn't purchase it with it smelling like that. Why did the large jar have such a horrid smell, but the sample didn't? I don't get it, but unfortunately I can't stomach the smell of the larger jar...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got a deluxe sample of this and loved it. Finally got around to buying the full size and the smell is horrid. I got half way through and couldn't use it anymore because of the rancid scent. Disappointing considering how much I paid for it.

reviews.review_text: I love this cream for my daily moisturizer. It soaks in and I do not have any dryness during the day. HOWEVER, it smells like a dirty gym bag/dirty feet the minute I apply it. Fortunately that smell dissipates very quickly and I can then stomach it. I just want to barf for the first 15 seconds whilst applying it. Blech. But it works so catch 22 I guess. I will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Beware - turned rancid within a month
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as part of a trial pack and LOVED how it hydrated my skin. I was excited so I decided to invest in the value pack ($82.00). Right past the return window of about 30-days, the product went rancid. Initially I thought maybe that's how it smells but I compared it to the product in the trial pack and it's definitely an issue with the value jar. I tried to keep using it but it smells way too rancid, so I'll have to throw it out. I've never had this problem with any skincare product I've ever used. It's really expensive so I'm shocked they haven't developed a more shelf-stable formula. I would not buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because of it's reputation for being a clean product. I received this product's mini sample not too long ago, and felt it worked good and no smell. When I got the actual product a few weeks ago, I did notice a weird smell to it. This product states that it's good for combination skin, However, I have combination skin - which depending on the time of year I can either lean towards oilier and dryer, but nowadays with going through menopause am on the oilier side. This does not work well with oily nor combination cream - despite being careful with how much product I apply on after washing twice a day - it leaves my skin very greasy/oily. It's on the heavier side. I do love all the other ingredients in it, I use their eye cream without any issues. I will not be buying again. And beware, the 1.69oz/50mL is actually a bit smaller quantity than expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an absolute holy grail product for me. I was so dry from retinoids and this moisturizer cured it all. I can even use tretinoin on my neck and chest which were previously too sensitive for tret when using this product. I tried Diuex and a few others looking for the best moisturizer and had the best results by far with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Formula changed! It used to be a rich emollient cream packed with Shea butter squalane and fatty acids that nourishes ur dry skin. They changed it to a more hydrating whipped water gel consistency that disappears instantly.. within minutes your skin is back to being dry. I wasted my money to have skin that is still miserable! It seems like brands are reformulating to have a velvet dry touch feel, but what about those with actual dry skin? Isnt this supposed to be for ECZEMA? Also the jumbo size is even MORE watered down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: . So I used to use this product before the brand filed for bankruptcy and ever since then I've noticed the quality is really bad.I do not trust this brand.The texture is like goopey sticky shaving cream. Every time I order the large size I believe they fill the top with hyaluronic acid to  fake the 100ml once that goopey stuff goes away you are left with less than half the jar filled with cream. Shady business. I wish they would just make this a dense cream and stop trying to make it hydrating and lighter it actually feels worse and dries out your skin and the inconsistency of the formula creates irritation. I get super itchy and red and the product pills. They should have kept the original consistency of a rich dense cream. A little product used to go a long way and it really helped with my dry sensitive skin. It seems like brands are reformulating and they are all starting to be the same consistency. Theres a purpose of having different types of products. They even have a gel version so im not sure why they think having goopey sticky gel would appeal to everyone..I also read on reddit a lot of people are buying the hand cream which is more moisturizing and only 15 bucks..seems like the brand doesnt know how to keep their audience or create a rich moisturizing cream anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: NOT MOISTURIZING AT ALL AND IRRITATES UR SKIN. FORMULA CHANGED. yup the reviewers ruined the formula that so many of us loved. It was a cult favorite for a reason. Super moisturizing and for the driest sensitive skin. The new formula, although the same ingredients, it is not the same consistency. It is severely watered down. They changed it to be a more hydrating product and melt in the skin no shine feels like nothing whats the point of spending 80 bucks to have a face that is drier than u began with. Yes its plumping but no moisture at all.. It used to be a rich cream that had some humectant properties now it melts into literally water. what they dont understand is too much gylcerine and hyaluronic acid and not enough emolliance causes ur skin to DRY OUT and pull water OUT! Because of this, you have to reapply and that is what irritated my skin. Dried it out and i ended up having to get hydrocortisone shots in my eye lid. if u have DRY skin do not get this. I have no idea why you guys dont buy ur gel formula tik tok brands glow recipe teenage brands and stop ruining the products for us dry skin sensitive types. ugh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A Sephora employee recommended this when I told her I was a little disillusioned with Drunk Elephant's polypedtide cream after having used it over a year. I was skeptical, but I actually really like this repair cream for its super moisturizing ability (and isn't greasy!). The first time wearing it, I got compliments on my skin. In the reviews here people have noted the smell. They're not wrong -- there is an initial whiff that's unpleasant when you first apply. It smells like Maker's Mark bourbon whiskey, which I always thought smelled like feet. It could be the shea butter. The scent goes away fast, though. This product actually has ten main ingredients in common with Augustinus Bader's The Cream (also smells like Maker's Mark) and for that reason alone I know that this formula is a good one. Augustinus Bader products are the best there are, but $230 for 50mL of moisturizer isn't in reach for me. This is a good alternative. 4 stars because I probably will keep shopping around after I run out, but it think this is a great product for the price.

reviews.review_title: I thought it was just my batch...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gel works fantastically, so I tried this for the drier winter. It worked fine as a heavier day cream, a bit on the sticky side. But I had to return it after really trying to ignore the smell after a few weeks. Like everyone else, the smell is horrible. It will dissipate over the course of the day, but each time I put it on I wondered if I was putting on a used or spoiled batch of moisturizer. The smell is strong. Like mildew. or Dirty wet feet. Moldy wet towels that have been left in the washing machine too long. A recently cleaned public pool, that smells like dirty chlorine.  Went back to the gel moisturizer.
