reviews.review_title: It honestly does not smell that bad you guysu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yall had me prepared for some massive stanku2026it absolutely DOES NOT smell that bad. It smells natural and slightly musky/dampish and dissipates in about 30 seconds. I prefer my facial products to have their natural scent and not be heavily artificially fragranced, so this product is a win in that regard and I'm happy I took a chance!! As far as performance, this stuff is AMAZING!!! I have really dry 40 year old skin and use retinols and acids (on opposite nights) and I need daily hydration, especially during dry Midwest winters,  but I hate the way deep moisture creams feel on my face. I can't stand that slimy suffocated feeling. Makes me cringe. I saw in a previous review that this cream worked for someone with sensory issues and they were right! I am really happy with this product and plan to buy the mega size as soon as my regular size jar runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product--partly because I saw it had good ratings on EWG as well. I believe the company changed their formula, as many people have commented on how it has changed.  I hate when companies do this. If it's not broke...don't fix. I have Rosacea, so I am always on the look out for good and clean products. Sadly, this item did not make the cut.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ideal for my normal but reactive skin. No strong scent. Thanks for that! Provides moisture but not heavy. I've been using for a couple of years now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is really nice u2014 it's a thick-ish moisturizing that's perfect for the fall and winter. However, it smells AWFUL. I debated returning for 2 weeks as it was almost unusable. I got used to it after that point but definitely proceed with caution, especially if you're sensitive to smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Provided my skin with no moisture- it felt like it sat on top of the skin. Skin was dry and itchy within two days. In addition, I haven't had acne and years and I've had a few zits pop up since starting to use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer that doesn't break my skin out by far. Very rich in the best ways. A little goes a very long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I really like this product, however I'm confused as to why Sephora is advertising it as a vegan product when on the first line of the ingredients list it says u201c Animal Musk/ Fats / oilsu2026.u201d  reallydissatisfiedto lean

reviews.review_title: Will be a front runner in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a travel size in a holiday set, it's so moisturizing that I just bought the full size! The only draw back for me is the smell. Does it bother me ? A bit. Will I still use it ? Absolutely. Some say it smells natural but it has a smell of heavily worn damp socks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the subtle, natural smell. Also: VERY moisturizing! It actually leaves a bit of an oily film on the skin (that doesn't get absorbed). I personally don't mind the dewy finish, but if you have oily skin, it might not be the best fit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely lovely!!! I'm very picky with my moisturizers because of sensory issues but this one is LOVELY. Moisturizing and no smell. Definitely expensive though....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream! I realized the best way to get passed the funky slightly dank smell is by layering my (nice smelling) retinol on top.   I have combination skin and this cream hydrated my dry areas but still kept my oily t-zone at bay. The texture of this cream is beautiful and non-greasy but rich enough to keep your skin soft and supple all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my skin looks and feels. But i do have to say it smells like cheese/feet. Efficacy of the product is wonderful. If it smelled good i would be giving 5 stars. But for $60 i would prefer it to even have no scent over the cheesy foot smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 2 large jumbo containers arrived half empty from Biossance. They claim it is an air pocket from shipping. However, I have purchased directly from Sephora in the past on several occasions and no issues and the containers are also shipped to Sephora.  Half of the container only has a little product on top and the bottom is completely empty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's more like 4.5 stars only because it has a very weird smell. the smell goes away pretty quickly, & once it does prepare for ur skin to reap in all of its glorious benefits. it gets my skin moisturized & bouncy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive, acne prone skin and this is the only moisturizer I swear by. Been using it for 3 years and my skin is amazing- people have noticed the difference. I think this also helps my skin stay fresh and has anti-aging properties. I also love that it is fragrance free because scents bother my skin and create problems. LOVE it.

reviews.review_title: not the most exciting, but my god it works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought this a couple years ago, after falling in love with the eye cream. I recall being unimpressed with the scent, and thinking it was ok but nothing special. Then, something happened to my hormones this year and my skin became much more dry & sensitive. It was red, patchy, flaky no matter what I did. I had a sample jar of this and started using it again. It is HEAVEN. It's the only thing that actually stopped my skin from flaking and gave it a glow. I will never use another moisturizer. It works very well under makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just another review stating how HORRIBLE and REPULSIVE the smell is!! It is only temporary but that initial smell is so vile that I can't keep using this product even though it does feel good on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mid 60's dry - Kiels squalene is not cruelty free!!!!  Will only purchase cruelly free. Tried Biossance which has an unpleasant smell - but, is the best, most SOOTHING daily moisturizer I've ever purchased.  No shine, feels wonderful, face noticeably more comfortable and smoother/even toned than prior.  One month of 2x daily with a few extra dabs for freshness during the day.  Highly recommend!  (Smells unpleasant- smell dissipates, doesn't linger on skin)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It really smells horrible! Im not sure how anyone enjoys the smellu2026..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the ultimate daily moisturizer for dry and sensitive skin! this is the only thing that has improved my dermatitis patches without irritating them further

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves a beautiful hydrated glow but not greasy looking. I don't notice an unpleasant smell at all, it just smells like clean skincare to me. I really love the texture of this cream.for my dry retinol using skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I.normally wouldnt reach for this because its out of my price range but after trying it, its become a splurge ill go for. Its moisturizing and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer for over a year, night time and daytime. With and without makeup and it's just perfect. I have sensitive combo/oily skin and I don't think I'll use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im almost through with the full sized jar and although the smell catches me off-guard,  the results and thorough moisture are amazing.  This has actually contributed to me having almost glass skin.  I noticed it started looking shiny!!  It doesn't make my pores gross and big either.  I trust this product and would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer for over a year. I have extremely sensitive skin and this cream doesn't irritate my skin at all. It leaves my skin feeling soothed, soft and nicely moisturized. It's a rich cream which I particularly like for overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even though I didn't notice any major difference I do like how hydrating it was when I used it and it didn't make my sensitive skin have a bad reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, but unfortunately, I got a really bad reaction to this product. I applied it overnight with my normal skincare routine. I woke up in a rush and just washed my face and applied my normal routine. I felt a slight sting after I washed my face and the same feeling  throughout the day but was too busy to pay attention. I also woke up with extremely dry lips, which was not normal for me. I washed my face in the night, and I only applied this cream, and I felt my face start to flare up and burn I looked at my skin closely and saw red flared bumps around my face and jaw line. It was really painful, and I ended up having to put an ice pack (after I washed my face). I applied a healing ointment, but I was still very uncomfortable. I woke up to a swollen face and really swollen lips, as well as itchy eyes.  I was a tatcha girl for many years, and I wanted to try something new! But I will be returning this cream and going back to my old faithful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really made my skin look and feel good as well as BETTER with each use! 10/10 Definitely recommend !!!

reviews.review_title: ive developed Melia on my eyelid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i purchased this eye cream with lots of exceptions. the consistency is thick and makes my concealer cakey and ive developed Melia on my eye lid. ive stopped using it. for the price im surprised. it was using it on and off to see whether the melia was from the eye cream. sephora wont give me a store credit due to the order was a little over 60 days. pretty disappointed. wont recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cream is so beautiful on the skin and is exactly what i was looking for but it literally smells like foot. sweaty, funky, walked a mile in these shoes FOOT. so disheartening, i cant get past the stench.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every moisturizer out there and at times put this one down due to price but always come back. I live in a dry climate, with sensitive skin and this is the only moisturizer that can handle all my skin needs. No breakouts, hydrating, and makes makeup go on like a dream!

reviews.review_title: Best fragrance free moisturizer, I have tried many
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin and rosacea. This is my go-to moisturizer that is fragrance-free. It is a thicker moisturizer that truly locks everything in- a little goes a long way. I have repurchased this product and will continue to do so. This is a quality product and would recommend trying if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Really bad smell so returned itu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the texture and was looking forward to using the moisturizer but it smelled so bad that ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I've used it for years and have recently gotten my mom to start using it as well. It works great on my sensitive skin, which gets dry very often very easily. I particularly use it in the warmer months since its quite nice and light. In the winter months I change to a slightly thicker moisturizer but always go back to this one once it begins to get warm. Fantastic product and very reasonable price. I pair it with their eye cream.

reviews.review_title: Excellent for night time or dryer/cooler months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer for a heavier night cream, or in the winter/dryer months day or night. It has no fragrance but has a slight smell to it - I'm impartial. It's neither pleasant nor unpleasant. It's rich but not greasy, it can emit a dewy effect, which I like. It has some powerhouse skin healing ingredients and the packaging is lovely. All in all, worth the money to me. I've tried much more expensive repairing type creams and they either all have too many ingredients, are scented or clog pores. This has none of that. I'm surprised it doesn't have better review tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone, combination skin and have been struggling with eczema around my eyes and mouth for the past 2 years. I've been using this cream for about 3 months now and haven't had any problems with breakouts or flare ups! Plus some of the fine lines I've gotten from my flare ups have disappeared.  I loving this as a nighttime cream or mix it with my daytime lotion if my skin is extra dry.  It does have a bit of a funky scent, but it really goes away after a couple minutes :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With all honesty, I hate the smell. It's fragrance free but it still has a weird scent. BUT, I love how soft and moisturized my face felt! I would totally recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Only moisturizer that works for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trial size of this moisturizer a few months ago and it is the only moisturizer that works for me. One jar lasts so long and works so well. This is my forever moisturizer <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this moisturizer so much given the results. But it gave me breakouts and caused my skin to flake. Did not work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: This cream has a luxurious texture but the smell is horrific.  Is smells like stale algae.  Maybe I can still use it when I'm experiencing severe congestion.

reviews.review_title: Too bad it smells like stinky socks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cream might be amazing, but I'll never know because it smells like stinky feet. I have used it twice, trying to talk myself into getting past the smell, but I cannot. Maybe this is a genetic thing, like cilantro, because I see some people gave it high marks for smell. It needs fragrance, natural or synthetic, or I will not be able to give it a real shot. I bought it because it was compared to Guerlain's Black Orchid cream for ingredients. I cannot get past the horrible smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING results! This hydrating cream is incredible! I started using this last winter to keep my skin moisturized during the cold Midwestern winter and it has continued to work wonders for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it with the cleanser and toner and it's working really well! it is very thick so I don't recommend for the day. I'm giving it 4 stars only because the scent is... nauseating for me to say the least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used it for a week but it's already repaired the damage (i.e. pimples, bumps) from the Belief Aqua Bomb. I would say it's medium weight, which I was concerned about for summer and my acne prone skin but it's working out very well. Like others have said, the smell is not great, smells like something is wrong with it but that's how it is... It'll only smell for a few seconds and if you really try to smell it (so, don't try and smell it).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free and am really enjoying it. It's lightweight which makes it perfect for the summer. It doesn't pill or leave my skin feeling greasy. I've also noticed less redness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizes beautifully but smells like old cheese and it's really hard to get past the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and I like using this product at night. I don't recommend for daytime use, as it makes my t-zone too oily. It doesn't have a scent, which is a plus in my book. Very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this moisturizer formula-wise and packaging.  It doesn't make your skin shiny and it's super hydrating.  The packaging is amazing. No tons of plastic and the 3oz is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best skin care product. my skin is acne prone.  since using this product, i rarely have a single breakout.   its amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how to feel about this one! I really like it, but hate the smell! Once it goes on your face you can't smell it, so I just put up with the 5 secs of cheeseu2026 but idk. I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the moisturozer smell like bad cheese or moldy ,it's smell so bad ! I am trying to ignore the smell and use for a week so so but it's just like bad like in top Of face ! Please save your money cheap moisturizer isbetter than this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Almost at the end of the jar and it doesn't feel like it's doing anything for me..and my husband agrees with me,  only when it's applied on the face,  it kinda smells like wet dog.. back to Tatcha we go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been researching for anything that would compare to Clinique Smart Night as it was discontinued. I have to say, i am very happy and impressed by the formula. Feels as hydrating and as rich and leaves my skin baby soft for my ulta dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream nightly after my moisturizing Serum and I like it a lot. The product is thick and feels very rich and moisturizing on the skin, and does not feel greasy. I have aging combination skin, and this works nicely for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this product. I am prone to facial redness and irritation and this moisturizer really helped calm down my redness. It has a somewhat cooling effect that I love. In the past I have used moisturizers that are meant to correct and soothe redness and they have all had weird smells. This moisturizer has little smell and works perfectly! I also love that it is a gel format so it feels lighter on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is not sensitive but this product caused a terrible rash and acne on my neck and all over the face. I've never had such reaction to any product in the past, even inexpensive moisturizes. Not so u201ccleanu201d

reviews.review_title: A must have for now on!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and this product has kept my skin uniformly moisterized.  I love using this with the rose oil, I've only used it for about a month and have seen a difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use 0.1% tret several nights of the week and this moisturizer is the only reason my skin can handle it. I wake up with zero dry patches and I don't develop the flaky skin from tret during the day. I will say it smells like funky when you rub it on your face initially but thankfully the smell dissipates in less than a minute. It really isn't a big deal like these other reviews are describing.  I used to use the SkinCeuticals triple lipid restore but since they raised the price I decided to look elsewhere for a close dupe. This is definitely it!! This feels a lot more lightweight but it definitely has the same moisturizing ability for a fraction of the crazy price I was paying before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not notice the smell until i read the other reviews....it really isn't terrible like everyone is saying. My fiance and i tried this together. We both really enjoy it. Light Weight and moisturizes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First, this moisturizer feels great on my skin. It's cooling and moisturizing, and it leaves a nice glow, but isn't sticky or greasy feeling. I've had no problems with it pilling under makeup.
I really love this cream so much, but unfortunately the smell is so off putting I need to find another one. The reviews that say it smells like rotten cheese and feet are right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i've used this product for a few days now, and i will say it definitely does a great job with moisturizing my dry skin. a little goes a long way, which i love. and it doesn't feel heavy on my sensitive skin. smell can be a little off putting however

reviews.review_title: A Desert Must-Have for Sensitive, Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, hydrating cream for sensitive skin. I have used everything (and spent so much!) on various creams trying to find something that is clean and deeply hydrating for my sensitive skin, that won't flare up my dermatitis.  A desert must-have!!!

reviews.review_title: A staple for my dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, just amazing. Deeply moisturizing and soaks into the skin. For those complaining about the smell, go find one of those hundreds of overly scented products.  This no fragrance cream is perfect for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite! Very hydrating for my dry skin and dermatitis, smooths my fine lines face wonderfully, and friendly to my gluten-sensitive skin. Dear Biossance: please don't ever change your formula!  I used to love Caudalie, but their formula-change sent me to this instead. [P.S. - I keep mine in the refrigerator to keep it from stinking like fish! Has a mild odor of stale Chinese food and old cardboard, but I layer a *very* small amount of Tatcha's Dewy Cream on top just for the nice Tatcha scent.] I like to top this with the Biossance Squalane Oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this as a moisturizer works like no other. However, I just couldn't take the smell anymore as it really grossed me out. Smells like dirty feet. Why can't they fix this problem? Since I threw it away I can't find a replacement that is this good. So, if you don't mind the smell that's okay but I just couldn't take it. FIX THE STINK!

reviews.review_title: A must have to my daily routine!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is absolutely AMAZING!!!! It definitely hydrates your skinu2026 I use it morning and night and it leaves my skin feeling soft, dewy, and glowingu2026 It is a thicker moisturizer which I love because I live in Chicago and our cold seasons can be very dry here but I still use it during the summer timeu2026 For those complaining that it smells horrible it has Omega as there main ingredient and I really hope that the company doesn't change there ingredients to add artificial perfumes to satisfy those complaining customersu2026 Another reason why I like this moisturize is because it's fragrance free and it doesn't trigger my rosaceau2026 I definitely recommend this moisturizersu2026 The smell will settle within minutes after applying to your face, and honestly it doesn't even smell that badu2026 Thank you Sephora for sending your customers free samples to try your products before purchasing it!!! I greatly appreciate it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used alot of different moisturizers and this one just can't be beat. It gives my skin a beautiful glowy and plumped look while keeping it moisturized all day long. My husband has even started using it because he can't believe how awesome it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells horrible. Good moisturizers but I can't get over the disgusting smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nasty, the smell is so awful. I think it does hydrates but sadly I also think it's breaking out my cheeks. This product is such a disappointment and the smell omg ,it smells like poop. Don't buy this.

reviews.review_title: Great but the smell be aware
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer but it does smell. Hydrates my skin well. I'm not sure I'll buy again because of the smell. I think I'll take my $60 somewhere else like skinfix. If you can get pass the smell then great for you! 1 star off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe how bad this product smells. I purchased two of the sampler kits from biossance and this product came in both. I avoid using it because of the smell. When I do use it I literally hold my breath, I'm trying to get through the two tubs of this I have so it's not a waste of money however I will probably just cut the loss and throw them out. It smells like manure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Never have I got so many complements on my skin! I've tried many moisturizers within the price range of biossance, and this one stands out for several reasons: you only need a small amount (helps justify cost), it's very moisturizing for my very dry skin, it leaves this smooth/shiny appearance that doesn't fade; it looks amazing under a tinted sunscreen, and sets in really well. I noticed people saying it smells like feet, fish, bad, etc. It is an algae product; I would say it has an oceanesque smell, but it fades right away. I personally don't mind it, and prefer it over fragrant smells. I got the smallest size as a points reward before purchasing the full size, so maybe wait for that if you aren't sure about the full size.   Don't buy this product if: you like mattefying products, this isn't for you - it has a shiny appearance. If you have oily skin - I have dry skin and love it; not sure how it would work for oily skin because it does have an oil-shine to it. If you really dislike ocean smells.

reviews.review_title: I dis not like the smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smelled terrible. Not sure if it was just this jar, but it smelled like when yogourt goes bad. Not buying again. The other one with squalane and marine gel smells fine. This omega oneu2026 nope! Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample via a promo offer and even though I said I wouldn't spend so much for the regular size and would just wait until I could get another free sample, I ended up absolutely loving this product too much. My makeup goes on seamlessly underneath no matter if I accidentalg left my retinol cream on too long or not. Fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced and the first 3 products are very strong supporters of skin health.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is super hydrating and seems to work well, but it smells terrible. The smell goes away after it settles into the skin, but putting it on is not pleasant. I won't be rebuying it.

reviews.review_title: This product is my Super-Food for my skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has given my skin a new life. Given my auto immune condition, my skin was needing all the moisture it could get and this was my life-saver. A must have for severe dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Biggest con is that it smells like feet wrapped up in seaweed. I hate the smell, but it does leave a beautiful glow despite my many skin flaws. I don't hate looking at my skin when I'm wearing this cream. Leaves my skin very hydrated overnight and soft in the morning. Can be a bit slick-feeling depending what you pair it with, but ultimately my goal is the feeling of my skin the next morning.

Cette creme est parfaite! J'ai la peau hyper sensible, seche et avec de la rosacee. Cela faisait plusieurs cremes que j'essayais et rien ne fonctionnait pour moi. Elle a sauve ma peau.        olehebrikse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: yes one of the best hydrating moisturizers I've ever tried.  I am 62 yrs old and it does firmed my neck skin in a short span of time.  It's quite pricy but it delivers the job, so it's all worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this as a daytime moisturizer for about a month. I like the way it sits under my foundation, and it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. However, it smells terrible. Almost like a dirty toenail or spoiled milk. I'll use it for now because it works and is affordable, but I'm actively looking to switch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! I have extremely dry skin and this has been the only moisturizer to help. BUT, it does stink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am leaving this review bc I never want them to cancel this product! I seriously have tried every moisturizer from the most expensive brands and nothing has healed my skin like this. I have rosacea, acne-prone, sensitive and combination skin. This helps anti-aging, redness, lowing acne. It is seriously the best. The smell isn't the best for 15 seconds but it's NOTHING compared to the benefits to my skin. Who cares about the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many moisturizers and this one is by far the best. It's rich and thick yet doesn't leave you're face greasy.  I use this as my base before makeup ( I let in sink in for 5 minutes) then apply makeup and it looks and feels amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dr. Stephens (a black woman dermatologist on YT) recommended this moisturizer and it is truly amazing. I try not to review products for my skin until 28 days after using the product to consider my skin cycle but this stuff is amazing as I recently used a producted that caused dermatitis (burning, itching, redness). I can say this truly repaired my skin within a couple of days. Ive been using it now for two weeks and it layers well with all of my other serumes and my mineral sunscreen. Oh and it lauers well woth makeup   I am still feeling it out I think it might be too strong for my eyelids but it is still an amazing product. People say I look like I am glowing.  This might just be a staple. I hope the gel version of this works out well especially for the summer. I like this company so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe my sense of smell is not as sharp as others but the scent is not a deterrent for me. It works exceptionally well, the smell dissipates as soon as you put it on, and my skin is moisturized all day. No complaints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this!  I've been using it for a few months now and have seen major changes in my skin. My skin was super irritated from my guy's facial hair.  This is the only product I've found that calms it down

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer smells like nasty rotten cheese (-1 star) but it is super moisturizing for dry skin types. I use tret 0.1% and this moisturizer helps my skin tolerate it much better than other moisturizers out there. My skin feels like silk when I wake up and I don't develop any dry patches throughout the night. The smell may be a deal breaker for you, honestly I'm still contemplating whether I should return it bc of how much it makes me gag when I put it on. If the smell is enough to make you not want to buy it, I would recommend the skinfix triple lipid moisturizer for a similar result (which also stinks but nowhere near as bad as this)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, this is the best moisturizer I have ever used. A little bit goes a really long way and personally I love the natural scent this has. It feels clean and healthy which is exactly what I am looking for. Anytime I switch moisturizers, my skin looks terrible. I always come back to Biossance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating, great for winter/ cold climates. Has never caused me to break out. Never had an issue with make up not blending well into it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how it looks and feels on my skin but it smells so gross.. I'll be returning it now after using it several times because it really puts me off. smells fishy or like seaweed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is this product suppose to have a terrible smell? Like slightly fishy? I hope it is suppose to smell like that and I'm not putting spoiled product on my face especially for the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the products I've tried from this brand so far. I got a luxury sample of this cream with my points. Excellent quality, and I wanted to love this cream but the smell is off-putting. It's so subtle, but almost smells like chlorine or cough syrup. And is the only reason I wouldn't purchase. Performance wise it's light weight, feels amazing on my dry dehydrated skin. And leaves it feeling so soft.

reviews.review_title: New staple! Better that water cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I swore by Laneige Water Bank Cream + Overnight mask and by Tatcha's the Water Cream. After turning 25, my skin started needed more moisture and these two did not cut it anymore. My skin wasn't rough, but my pores started getting bigger (because of dehydration) and my skin looked flaky under foundation. This had never happened before. I realized most moisturizers did not provide enough hidration. I got this in the Rapid Radiance Set and it was definetely a game changer. My skin feels pampered, plump, soft and calm after this. It's amazing, will be re-purchasing and will be keeping it as my go-to moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is incredible. To the people that complain about price, A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY! I had the normal size container and it lasted me nearly an entire year. You don't need to glob on a ton of this stuff. Take a small tiny dab and work it in. I get compliments all the time and I credit everything to Biossance products. My routine is basic and all Biossance. The Squalane/Amino Gentle cleanser, then Pore Minimizer, then Phyto Retinal, then Omega Repair Cream. I'm sure the other products are great but I'm a dude and I like to keep it somewhat simple. This stuff is ESSENTIAL, I just purchased a Jump size and I expect it to last me well into 2024.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is a pretty decent moisturizer! i have a small size of this and use it on my really dry spots at night and noticed that i am way less flaky in those areas when i have been using this! yes the smell is a little funny but i'd rather have that than an overwhelming artificial fragrance. i do knock a star off because this is insanely expensive, but it does leave the skin feeling supple and luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! It's thick and rich, feels wonderful and hydrates the skin nicely. It doesn't absorb immediately but isn't tacky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 68 yrs. Tried so many moisturizers but this one is by far the best. Unlike most that say they have great stuff in it this has them near the top of ingredients list. Clean product no PEG, EDTA etc.

reviews.review_title: ONLY CURE FOR IRRITATED ACNE SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ignore the comments about the smell. It's very faint and besides it is OMEGA. This cured and cleared my broken and irritated skin after 4 months all it took was this ONE product. Completely smoothed te truee

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just started using this but thus far ZERO smell! So weird to read these reviews. Hoping this won't change now that it's open to the air! Super moisturizing! The only reason I'm giving it 4/5 is because I just used it tonight.

I'm extremely disappointed with Sephora's service. If you're not going to provide the samples that you advertise, you shouldn't waste people's time by offering them as an option. If you're not willing to send free samples to me, even though I shop with you frequently and have never complained, then it seems like you don't value my business. This kind of treatment is unacceptable, and it makes me question whether I want to continue shopping with Sephora in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Yay - a great face cream under $100...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
