reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this moisturizer. it ticks all the boxes for me. The smell is a bit Omega-y lol, but disappears as it sinks in. Definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_title: I would pay twice as much for this amazing stuff!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this product! I'm on my 3rd jumbo size. It has truly changed my skin. I no longer get eczema on my face and eyelids, which I've struggled with for years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee this moisturizer! The initial reason I bought it was because I was looking for a CLEAN moisturizer (I put a TON of time into researching ingredients in skin care products) that would hydrate my skin after spending hours and hours on the beach in the summer (I understand the irony). This has made all the difference! I love it so much and started using the scrub too (highly recommend).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this moisturizer over 5 times now, and I continue to love it. It's a versatile product that works well for both my girlfriend and me, despite our very different skin types. Her skin is often flaky and dry, while mine is oily, yet this moisturizer does an excellent job of keeping both of our skin types hydrated and moisturized without leaving any greasiness or stickiness behind. It's gentle and doesn't cause any breakouts or irritation, which is especially important for my girlfriend's sensitive skin. The only downside is the scent, which I find a bit too strong. However, overall, I highly recommend this moisturizer to anyone looking for a gentle, hydrating, and versatile product that can work for a range of skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great - I like to use in the morning before applying makeup and it keeps me hydrated all day. The ONLY thing that would keep me from repurchasing this is the smell. It's something I'm having a really hard time getting past; it's super strong and I basically have to hold my breath while I apply it. If that wasn't the case I'd give this 5 stars!

reviews.review_title: If you're willing to pay up, it's great
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating and gentle moisturiser u2014 kinda mad that I love it because of the price, though. Took a star off for that, as there are comparable moisturisers for half the cost. There's no ingredients that should make it this pricey.   No fragrance is a huge positive, I don't get these negative reviews on that front. As long as you don't go shoving your nose into the product and giving a big whiff, you won't really notice a smell tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously amazing product. I'm surprised to see the feedback about smell; it's so subtle that I don't mind it and the product works so well and feels so nice that it doesn't matter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This beats the tatcha moisturizer and my cerave moisturizer! The price is the only thing keeping me away from buying the full size but sheesshh this is an awesome moisturizer for oily and combo skin maybe even dry skin! It honestly absorbs and makes the skin look sooo bright and plump ! If you can splurge first buy the mini size if its worth it to you buy it ! Definitely a holy grail !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this as a night cream! thick rich smooth texture  The smell isn't pleasant but not horrible.  Wake up to firm,plump, glowy skin my dryness is gone:) I want this In jumbo but the price tag.. that's okay for now because a little goes a long way

reviews.review_title: Rich Moisturizer that Improves Skin Over Time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect as a rich moisturizer. My face usually glistens after using this product because it is very heavy. Although it feels greasy, I actually really like it because my skin has really improved after using it. I have combination skin. I like that it doesn't really have a scent because it is natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like old cheese. The cream itself is fine, but there are better ones that don't smell awful- save your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really great product if you have dry skin. There's no fragrance which will catch you off guard if you're used to fragrances but it's not strong or off putting and you can't smell it on your face. I have really dry skin and live in the northeast. This has been a god send this winter.
I've been using this for a year now. It really helps with hyperpigmentation and it evens the skin tone and fades my dark spots. I use this lotion for colder seasons during the daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's great for hydration. Definitely hydrating. But it smells like rotten eggs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample the first time and liked it so much that I bought the jumbo. I have ichthyosis and dry, flaky, and acne prone skin, and so far, this cream has worked great for me. I love that it is a clean brand with recyclable packaging and no weird ingredients. It does have a particular smell, but I believe it's because it's fragrance free, so I'm happy with it. Be careful with the especially the jumbo size, especially because I dropped it on my tile, and it shattered ud83dude2c

reviews.review_title: Not a fan, feels heavy and oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do not get the hype about this moisturizer. I usually use Tatcha dewy or Farmacy Honey Halo (both super moisturizing and amazing!). This one, in contrast, though moisturizing feels so heavy for some reason to me. Like I have oil on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect nighttime moisturizer for dry skin. Works well as a daytime moisturizer during the colder months, so I prefer the rose and vitamin C for daytime. This feels so nourishing and makes my period there is a slight smell that dissipates very quickly, and for how well this product works, the smell doesn't bother me. face feels so soft, but it stinks and very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have sensitive skin and have never had a reaction to a skincare product before, but this caused red bumps to break our around my nose and mouth. Once I stopped using this they went away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use (and have been happy) with cerave and cetaphil moisturizers at night, but they have never played very well with my makeup; I have tried various moisturizers for daytime and this was just u201cnextu201d on my list to try. Yes, it smells like an aged soft cheese however, the smell dissipates quickly. I cannot smell it once I have blended the moisturizer completely into my skin. Initially I was very very nervous, my skin ATE this up. For about a week it seemed like my skin was a just sucking it up and I was watching a very quick demise of a very expensive product. I was not happy, but after several days my skin sort of balanced and I had to use a bit less. It was an interesting development; the temperature here has been consistently cold with no humidity to speak of, so I know my skin is the affecting variable.  I don't know yet if it is worth the money, but it plays nice with my expensive layering products and my skin seems to like it. While it is not as occlusive as I like for my night moisturizer, I will continue to use it for a good makeup base; it leaves my skin just slightly tacky enough to make my tinted moisturizer glide over the top perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! Smell is kind of bad, but you get used to it after a while

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer for about two years now. It's my go to night cream and works amazingly well paired with a retinol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. Finally something that works well. I use this for my morning routine in the winter and day/night in the other seasons. My favorite moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My winter and night time go to moisturizer. I find it is usually too heavy for summer, but as I live in the pacific northwest it works great as a night time moisturizer the rest of the year. I also use it during the day in winter if I am especially dry, however I only do so on no make up days as it doesn't work the best under make up imo. This is totally a night cream though despite it not specifying so, so I honestly don't expect it to look great under make up.   I find it works best if you have some kind of water based serum underneath that you let dry first, as the thick formula of the moisturizer helps lock in the hydration. It does a good job on it's own don't get me wrong, but if you pair it with a nice serum the combo effect is even better.   Absolutely love that there is a value size now. I share my skin care with my partner and the value size lasted us almost all winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was not sure if I bought the right thing but I loved how my skin felt so smooth and hydrated right after the first time. The texture of the moisturiser feels luxurious. It actually keeps the skin hydrated for a long time and feels the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best product for sensitive and dry skin especially during this cold weather . this will be my 3rd bottle.  sadly they discontinued it in my store hopefully it comes back ud83dude14

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah it stinks while you put it on but then the smell immediately goes away and what it does to my skin is so worth it! I bought the mini to test it out and I think I'm going to buy the full size. My skin is so soft and glowy every morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this SO much! It's my new fav in my lineup. Super moisturizing without being greasy. Wake up with smooth soft skin. I'm sensitive to scents but have not noticed a smell at all with this cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing!! I have mature skin and live in a dry and extremely windy climate, but this has made a world of difference in how bright and soft my skin is. I have sensitive, acne prone skin and haven't had any breakouts or reactions at all. My only complaint is that it separates my foundation if I don't use it sparingly, so I save this one for night time and use the rose moisturizer during the day. It does have a bit of a weird smell since they don't use fragrance, but it doesn't linger or bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my top five skin care brands. I've been struggling with dry skin and wanted to give this a try. It's smoothed out my skin and gave it a ton of moisture. I love it. I read about a smell, but I can't seem to find that problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer for a few days now. I have sensitive skin and this hasn't irritated my skin or caused breakouts. However the smell is pretty bad and makes me not want to use it. It smells like glue or something gone bad. Also I've noticed it's not a a little goes a long way type product and I need more of this moisturizer than other ones I've used. I'm not going to repurchase this just because of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been a moisturizing person until a friend suggested I start moisturizing my face. I was using the face wash by Boissance and randomly picked this cream, and I've been really happy. It doesn't leave much of a residue throughout the day, and my skin feels great. I can't recommend this enough!

reviews.review_title: My winter skin is in love!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample size in a value pack - I was really after the copper peptide serum, but for the price I didn't mind trying out some extras!   Given the regular price of this moisturizer I didn't want to like it, but omg i'm in love and will have to repurchase! I don't know if it'll work so well in the summer months, it may be too heavy, but for winter it's a-m-a-z-i-n-g! It somehow feels perfectly light, rich, and nourishing at the same time. A little goes a long way. My skin is just so plump and balanced after using this! It doesn't leave me looking or feeling greasy or shiny at all. It actually almost makes my skin look matte, but without any of the dullness or dryness.  I don't remember now if there was any fragrance in the ingredients list, but I don't notice a scent one way or the other. I am very used to fragrance-free products though/prefer that, so if you're used to sweet-smelling skincare, you may not like it. I haven't experience any irritation or breakouts from this at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Silky and hydrating cream , leaves skins beautifully glowing however it caused me to break out unfortunately! I have normal skin and was so disappointed it didn't work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After making a few big life changes April 2022 that began causing breakouts, dry skin, and making my sensitivity to fragrance even worse, I went on a multi-month journey to find a skin care regime that would work for me.  I went through probably 10 different moisturizers;  some that are just popular online, and some known to be effective for helping the concerns that I had.  This was the only one that checked all my boxes.  It helped my redness, calmed the dryness, and even aided in clearing up my acne (along with salicylic acid).   As mentioned in nearly every review, no, it doesn't smell great.  It isn't heavily fragranced like many popular moisturizers are, and one of the things in it likely produces the odd smell.  For some, this is an automatic deal breaker.  If you're like me though, sensitive to fragrance and don't mind the odd smell (which is only present during application), this is a great moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Hydrating and worth it despite the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, the reviews are right the smell is terrible but only for the first 10 seconds of skin contact. It smells like something rotting. Thankfully it doesn't last and I had my boyfriend smell my face multiple times. I have sensitive skin and this has been a lifesaver in the cold Canadian winter.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail Hydration, Despite the Smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream for the last 3-4 months and won't be stopping anytime soon! Between skin barrier issues and cold winters, I've needed a deep hydration cream with no actives and this has been perfect. This cream is incredibly hydrating without being too greasy, and leaves my skin looking plump, glowing, and healthy. I'm not sure what else to say, except that this is probably the best face cream I've tried and that I will be repurchasing despite the price and scent. Like others have mentioned, the product has a bit of a scent, likely due to the omega in it - I smell it while applying, but not afterwards/it does not linger. Given how the cream makes my skin look, it's worth it to smell the oil for 30 seconds.

reviews.review_title: Must have in my PM routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After reading other reviews regarding the smell being gross, I was hesitant- however the smell doesn't bother me and this moisturizer is perfect for the nights I use retinol and feels really nice.

reviews.review_title: buckleys of skincare: smells awful and it works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very hydrating without being greasy and leaves a nice glowy finish! the scent is unpleasant and it's very expensive u2026 not sure if I will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this because of the recommendations and reviews and love it. It's not to heavy for my combination skin, but is very moisturizing. I use it in my night time routine. I understand the other comments about the scent - it's not pleasant, but to me it's not too bad and I can deal with it since it dissipates after a few minutes. The few minutes of the scent is well worth the benefits of this moisturizer and I prefer to not have heavy perfumes added. I would recommend and will re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This set is perfect for those who want to give Biossance a try and I'm so glad I did! I've used many of these products before and have always loved the lactic acid night serum the most. The moisturizer's smell is worth it to me because it's SO lightweight but still super hydrating! Eye cream is underrated and the rose oil doesn't leave my face greasy under my makeup! These 4 products are now staples in my routine. This particular kit lasts me about a month. I highly  recommend! I just ordered the plumping serum to try and can't wait!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is amazing. It does not irritate my skin and leaves it looking nice. But the smell is horrendous. Don't think I can justify purchasing the full size with how it sort of ruins your relaxing routine.

reviews.review_title: It's a no from me dawg
reviews.review_text: I got this product because it was recommended via social media for improving texture however, I only used it for about a week and then had to return it because the smell is awful. For me personally I feel like it smells exactly like a wet dog.. I always look forward to my skincare routine, but with this in it I found myself dreading it, which was unfortunate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a 100 point perk. Man, is this a lovely moisturizer. Spreads beautifully. Whenever I use it, I wake up the next day with glowing skin. BUT THE SMELL. It smells like prosciutto, if that means anything to anyone. If it had a different scent, or even no scent, I could maybe justify the price, but as is, I won't be purchasing the full size after this trial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loved how this made my skin look and feel but I really couldn't get over the smell. Even after I washed my clothes, the smell would linger. stopped buying for that reason. super gross!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Three star because it works great...esp for someone who is allergic to a lot of products.. but!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IT SMELLS LIKE FEET!!! OR LIKE MY DOG WHEN HE HASN'T showered in a long time! Smells really bad...i keep thinking OMEGA says ALGE~~ ugh..smells horrible - i had to mix it with my Vit. C cream which smells like orange. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a hate love with this product!! I'll start with why I don't, the smell is AWFUL. I gag everytime I put it on! But it is super hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love what this moisturizer does for my skin! I use it as a primer before makeup and it's gives the most amazing finish & dewy look! However, it smells like dirty feet. Literally terrible & it lingers for a few minutes. However, I can get past the smell because of the results but it doesn't smell good.

reviews.review_title: Can't get over the terrible smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to hold my breath while applying this cream, it smells SO BAD!! Like something rotten, or moldy, or poop...it's just awful. Thankfully it was only a mini size. Sure it's moisturizing, but so are loads of other creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I, too, can't get past the HORRible smell. When I apply cream, I like to enjoy the experience. The hum completely removes the luxury from a highly-tooted product. Not to mention, it isn't stored in an airtight container  which rapidly diminishes its potency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/ combo skin and I really loved how lightweight this moisturizer is and that it wore well under foundation. I used this as my daytime moisturizer for the past month and I'm really loving it so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe I don't have a strong sense of smell, but I don't smell anything bad when I use this moisturizer. I really like this it's thick and moisturizing, but it doesn't break me out. I am on my fourth jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this repair cream in the warmer months which I think I'm going to stick to. It's a good moisturizer, but it's not cutting it for the winter months, my skin has started to get pretty dry. I'm trying also to eliminate other products from Biossance to see if something else (maybe the cleanser) is causing the issue. Overall, it's a nice product, but I don't honestly see any difference in my skin after months of using it. Seems just as dull.
I cannot be without this moisturizer, it's been there for my dry and irritated tretinoin skin, and now for my dry and flaky accutane skin! It's so soothing and leaves my skin happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't tell you what this does for my skin, because I couldn't get it on enough to find out.   It smells like when we are passing farmlands on a trip and they're putting manure out. I've read stinky feet, and if it only smelled like that, maybe I'd be able to deal with it.   G

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I wondered if I received a bad batch because this cream is stinky...and now having read the other reviews, I guess that's just how it is.  Other than the smell, I did enjoy this moisturizer. It feels good on the skin, very moisturizing and gives a subtle glow.  However, I can't get past the smell. I would not repurchase this, especially at that price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible smell which lingers. Extremely thick, leaves a greasy feel and look to the skin that I still had in the morning. Unfortunate, since it is made with good ingredients. Returned. Will not repurchase. rerecommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An absolute skin saver! Has worked miracles on my winter dry skin in less then 1 week of use! It spreads nicely over my nightly routine and has a pleasant clean light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. The smell is the natural ingredients. Squalane and tocopherol (vitamin E) can produce this smell. If you ever have smelled pure vitamin E oil it smells the same. Both ingredients are great for your skin. It doesn't smell good because it is a cleaner product and one that doesn't have perfume/fragrance in it. Give this a chance, it has done great things for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in the Sephora Favorites Sparkly Clean Makeup set. It has this weird fermented smell. I wouldn't have minded but I don't think it does anything special. Not worth the price tag. There are better moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used sooooo many moisturizers and this one takes the cake. It does it all!! I have combination skin that's super sensitive and breaks out easily but this stuff is straight up magical. Especially for Canadian winters

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'am a skin junkie and have tried many many productsu2026..this is a no go for me! Used it for 2 weeks with no results, it was a bit  moisturizing with very odd odor and no glow to my skin as other people reviewed. I also posted a review on company website but I guess because only gave it one star so they won't post it. This cream Not worth it for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. This cream is fragrance free, so for those who have sensitive skin this is something that you should give it a go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, it does have a weird smell right when you first put it on. However, the smell really does go away fast once you rub it in. In my opinion, it's worth it for how hydrated and smooth my skin feels and looks. My fiance noticed my skin glowing just a week or so after I started using it. I'd recommend this as a nighttime moisturizer as it is a little heavy for day wear.

reviews.review_title: Worked well for the first few weeks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did feel this was hydrating in the beginning, but did notice that after a few weeks, it left my forehead a little bit shiny and my skin overall didn't feel as hydrated. I bought this with a $15 off promotion, but am not sure I would repurchase at the full price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: felt it was left heavy on my skin even hours later. when I touch my skin at the end of the day I can feel the moisturizer maybe it works for other people but I didn't like it.

If spoiled milk was a cream, this would be it. It's a great winter-moisturizeru2026if it weren't for the sour smell. The texture is smooth and light and it doesn't feel heavy on my combination skin. Just wish it didn't stink.

reviews.review_title: Awesome hydration for for dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended by the beauty counselor at Sephora, and again I have tried many expensive creams for my dry skin, but this one has worked the best for me without feeling oily on my skin.
Absolutely awesome winter/night cream. The scent really doesn't bother me it's a product with no fragrance which may be causing the scent.

I have been using this moisturizer for about 2 months now and wow, it's super hydrating and leaves your skin dewy without looking oily! I have always had problems finding a moisturizer that would properly absorb yet not make me look oily. and this is the one!!! the smell is honestly not so horrible imo, you get used to it. Honestly this product is so great I don't even notice the smell. love love love it

You know that smell when you remove a band-aid to let a cut air out? Or the smell of feet after a long day of walking in the summer? Or the smell of pus that comes out of a closing or infected piercing? That's what this product smells like. It does not absorb easily either, so I couldn't hold my breath long enough to finish applying it, so eventually I had to smell it with every application. I don't care how good or bad this product may be, I am not okay with smearing my face with something that smells like stinking pus.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't absorb, just sits on top of skin.
reviews.review_text: yes, the moldy socks smell that lasts for about half a second when you put it on is really off putting, but I could get over it if it actually did what was promised. The bigger issue for me is that this cream is supposed to be great for dry skin but in reality it just sits on top of your face without absorbing. Sure, it might provide some protection by creating a barrier from the elements, but it doesn't help replenish moisture. If you try to put sunscreen or foundation over top of it they'll pick up the moisturizer and you end up with little pilled up balls of sunscreen/foundation mixed with the moisturizer that you have to wipe off meaning if you want to wear sunscreen or makeup you end up having to take off the moisturizer you just put on. I used less than half of the $60 container then stopped and tossed it.

This moisturizer has the most disgusting smell to it, I literally hold my breath when applying it. Honestly didn't have high hopes for this. But, I was so wrong, this cream is literally amazing. My skin is so hydrated and dewy and just feels so soft even the next day. I highly recommend this product. Don't sleep on it especially if you let yourself get past the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!!!!! My skin has been so dehydrated and I typically use the other moisturizer but I needed something more hydrating and this is it. I love this brand in general and was so happy with my purchase. It's not to heavy or oily. Your skin will instantly feel softer and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in search of a new moisturizer after recently starting a very strong retinol which took my previously oily/combo and acne-prone skin to Sahara desert level dry. My skin was flaking and angrier than I'd ever seen and my previous cream wasn't cutting it anymore. I was recommended this moisturizer and I absolutely love it. After a full day of use, my skin was way more soft, not flaking anymore, and no breakout to be found. I've been using it for a few weeks now and it has become my favorite moisturizer so far. I pair it with Tatcha's u2018Dewy Skin Cream' and they work beautifully together to keep my skin balanced and refreshed. It's very light feeling and doesn't really have a smell for those of you who don't like fragrances. The price is a little steep, but well worth it for the amount of product you get and the effect it has. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a must to my combo skin. I also have rosacea on my cheek and thecl cream didn't trigger it. My skin is really hydrated and smooth. I'm not a fan of the scent but it's ok for me because the cream work perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try a product with Squalene and came across this one, which my mother was a fan of. It didn't do enough for my dry/combo skin during the winter. I am also not a fan of the earthy smell of this product or I would give it another try in the summer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very heavy cream but didn't leave my skin feeling hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After having a horrible experience with another popular hydrating moisturizer, I've come back to this amazing moisturizer.  The smell can be off putting but I rather smell this than the overly fragranced one that broke me out in a few place twice and my face felt dehydrated and tight.  This moisture keeps my skin hydrated through a windy winter and drying heat. Its worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and this is one of the few moisturizers that actually moisturizes enough for me! love it and have, and will continue to re-purchase.

reviews.review_title: Great boost of hydration (safe for acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! This provides really great hydration and does not cause break-outs. I highly recommend for acne prone skin that is also on the drier side. My ONLY complaint, is that I am not a fan of skincare products that require you to constantly dip your fingers into the product, and is exposed to air at every use; as both of those make the perfect little petri dish.

reviews.review_title: Cursed with a good sense of smell
reviews.review_text: It smells, not good, felt a overwhelming need to wash it off after applying, concerned it might be contaminated with, let's just say, something that you wouldn't want on your face, it's is way too expensive to stink like this, there are better vegan options. I don't know why some reviews are saying it doesn't maybe those ppl can't smell or maybe the issue is not consistent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face cream ever. I have dry skin and this soaks in so well. It does not smell like feet like I've seen others say; It just smells like an unscented lotion, not bad at all. Plz plz never add any fragrance!  I'm on my third, and will definitely buy again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like feet but I use this religiously and it does wonders for my skin, now my mum loves it too!

reviews.review_title: love the results, smell will keep me away though.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I see a huge difference in my skin with this, unfortunately I have to move on.  I am to the point where I am struggling to put this on because of the smell.  It smells like toe jam, not feet.  I almost wish it smelled like feet lol that might be more tolerable.  I read on the Biossance website that they suggest adding some of their Vitamin C Rose Oil into it but it didn't help at all.  It does dissipate some, but I swear I get whiffs of it throughout the day? I am traumatized by it I think. I unfortunately must move on.  There are other really good creams out there.  Hopefully Biossance will make a scented and unscented version of this cream.  There is something else I think it kinda smells like but they will not post my review if I say it.  I will always use their Vitamin C, I absolutely love it! As for this cream, ah Bye-Bye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this is a thicker cream with no fragrance but I'm 99.9% sure this product gave me perioral dermatitis and with more research I've now learned that the ingredient u201cphenoxyethanolu201d is an ingredient that has high chance of making you develop dermatitis so I will not continue to use unfortunately..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was browsing in store for a new moisturizer and I was convinced by the staff to purchase the gift set with the Omega Repair Cream and I'm glad they did! The cream is unscented (despite other reviews claiming it smells like feet) it absorbs quickly and works great under my tinted moisturizer. I wouldn't say it's revolutionary and life changing but it definitely keeps my skin soft and supple through the winter months.

reviews.review_title: It's plant based ud83cudf31but not impressive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could love it. I mean it's supposed to help in older skin, since I'm naturally not producing as much. When shopping for squalane, look specifically for oils that are 100 percent plant-derived. Some skin care lines use squalane from plants, not sharks. Oil derived from plants is cruelty-free and sustainable. Which is GREAT, but the smell in this? Ugh. I hold my breath as long as I can, it seems to quickly disappear but it's not pleasant. I feel pretty dry after it soaks in. I'll keep using it - finishing the jar but not really sure I'll purchase another unless I notice a huge improvement.

reviews.review_title: Great Moisturizer but Smells like feet!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing moisturizer but it smells like a stinky feet! Please do something about the smell! I will probably finish this container since it is expensive and will most likely not purchase again if the brand doesn't do anything about the feet smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product for a week, I am already loving the results! But I just can't get used to the smell. I thought it was expired or something until i read the comments. It really does smell like feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Live this moisturizer! A little goes a long way. Light enough to not overpower, yet packs a delightful punch of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels smoother since using this moisturizer. The first moisturizer I've used in a long time that doesn't leave my oily skin greasy throughout the day. Very little shine. It does stink, but the smell fades soon after application.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my skin care
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this product moisturizes my skin throughout the day and night with one single application. My skin feels soft and lustrous. The smell was unpleasant at first but you get used to it and it only last temporarily. The price is pretty expensive that's why I gave it 4 stars, other than  that it well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like skin, light-weight and very hydrating but not oily. hands down my best moisturizer and the only moisturizer I have ever loved

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I was overreacting about the smell until my husband, (who has NEVER complained about a smell), asked me to please wash whatever was on my face off after kissing me. I thought mine just went bad, but after reading the comments clearly I'm not the only one that thought it smelled profusely of feet. Maybe it works well, but even though you get used to the smell on your face, others might not...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The worst smelling product ever. It smells like feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. You can see your skin getting plump after using it. Its smell might not be the greatest, but it really makes a difference in your skin's texture.

reviews.review_title: my skin thanks me for this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it's expensive, I totally get why someone would pass it by based on that alone. I personally love this and a little splurge on skincare makes me happy when I know I already love the product. I use it at night in the warm months and morning and night in the cold months. so far my skin loves it! I'm sure you could find a cheaper alternative, but I love this one personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a GREAT moisturizer and I love the product. However, do I think it's worth the price? Absolutely not. This is way too much money to spend on a moisturizer, especially considering the small size. I got this in a skincare Sephora set but I wouldn't purchase it for itself. Also, it's hard to get past the smell. It smells absolutely horrible. Sad because this is a great moisturizer, but you can get similar moisturizers for a fraction of the price, no need to spend this much money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Get a nose plug cause this stuff has a strong foot scent....really strong. I don't find this moisturizer better than any others that I have used. There are cheaper and better smelling option out there. In addition, I don't find this really moisturizes my skin either. I put this on and still feel like I need to add something more on my skin. Overall, I find this product pretty disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the mini size as the birthday gift last year and really enjoyed it. I've been using LaMer cream for years and I find this one to be a similarly as good but a much cheaper alternative. I have sensitive oily dehydrated skin and my skin feels nourished overnight after using this. It does have a weird smell that I have to get used to at first, but it doesn't stay on the face. Consider it being a muuuuch cheaper LaMer alternative I don't mind the smell anymore lol. I'm buying the full size now my cream is running out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell..... is not it. To be fair if you're like me and have a giant jar that you're using to not let it go to waste you do kind of get used to it over time, but it's not something I would ever want to spend money on again. I mean maaaaaayyybe if it had amazing results I could get past it, but it's just so... average. I've bought drugstore products for cheaper that are better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot go on any corner of the internet without this brand being aggressively being advertised and praised by any and everyone who has tried their products (most of whom are paid to give their opinion, go figure). So, I thought why not get a sample to experience the glory of these cream.  Very mild smell, and doesn't really have a very creamy texture at all, it oddly felt like putting on a dry cream. It certainly also felt like that on the face as well. While I will say it felt the same all day/ all night, it just doesn't have that nice ultra soft silky plumping texture or feeling that I want creams to give me - especially a repair cream. I'm not looking for greasy, tired of the whole slugging trend, you will never catch me putting petroleum on my face. But it just didn;t make my skin feel like it was being revitalized through the entire time I used it. I was comparing it to a Paula's choice Antioxidant Enriched Natural Moisturizer and First Aid Beauty Intensive Repair Cream, and both of them left me feeling so well moisturized and after all day or waking up after sleeping with either of these creams on, I had that same softness and plumped feeling. I just never found it with this cream, it feels lifeless. I even have a $10 moisturizer (from Korea) and that does the trick immensely better than this cream. Seeing how expensive this brand is and how much people sing praise about it all the time, I was severely disappointed and don't intend to test out anything else buy them. I would not throw it out but I am certainly not even going to choose it over the numerous good and much cheaper repair cream options that are already out there doing it better.

reviews.review_text: The face- a crucial area to moisturize as the years pass by. I received this product for free from Influenster and Biossance in exchange for my honest review. My only issue is while this product claims to be fragrant free, I cannot get over the smell. Especially because it's going directly on your face, you get a full helping of the scent every time.

I prefer it as my nighttime moisturizer, but it can be used in the day as well. I will definitely invest in this once I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This one is a winner! I'm a skincare junkie so I'm constantly trying out new products, specifically the ones that will slow down time and wrinkles. I have determined that for my skin moisture is key, I tend to be dehydrated more often than not so I'm always overcompensating on my face. This stuff is amazing, it is SO moisturizing! It has a great texture, soft and creamy but not too heavy. It doesn't leave an oily residue behind. And it smells wonderful. This has officially gone into the rotation for products I will continue to use.

reviews.review_title: Great product, don't like the smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this product. It is very thick, but absorbs well. I have dry skin that is acne prone, and my skin really likes this product. I tend to use this at night in a thicker layer, but it does work well under makeup if you give it a few minutes to soak in. It does not leave my skin looking or feeling oily. I took a star off because of the smell. It is an earthy/yeasty smell that I don't like, but on the bright side, it doesn't last long/linger. I got this product for free from Influenster for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very picky about moisturizer's as I have dry combination skin, which is hard to please. Most are too greasy or too dry and this is just right. I love Biossance for it's clean effective ingredients. This cream is the perfect balance of soothing moisture without being overdone. It absorbs nicely and doesn't sit on top of my skin. It contains only natural ingredients and is fragrance free. The texture is whipped and creamy but not too thick. It really is the holy grail moisturizer for me. I can't get enough! My skin is always soft and content after applying this. It has plant derived squalane and omega to repair the skin barrier. I can't say enough about this cream. I will continue to purchase in the future! I'm going for the jumbo next time. I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I got this free for my honest opinion. It's a nice cream! I like that it's not too heavy and can be used morning or night. Not much of a scent so good for sensitive noses. My skin feels so soft and you can tell it's moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first opened this bottle I didn't think I would like how thick this cream was but it wasn't heavy on my skin.  It was very hydrating and made my skin feel very smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite face cream! There is really no scent and the texture is so thick and creamy! Deff made my skin feel and look healthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is not here to mess around. You want hydration? YOU'VE GOT HYDRATION! The Squalene is a key ingredient that the package boasts their Squalene being made sustainably from sugarcane (which sounds pretty neat!) This honestly is great daily, if your face needs extra nourishment, but might be too much on oily skin. So, while using this product I use it only once a day or every few days to maintain moisture. Honestly, it's great to have on hand to pamper your face! The scent is very light, almost like a weak tea, though if you are more  sensitive to scents, you may find it more harsh. I personally like the soft smell, and I love how my face looks and feels within moments of using this repair cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved using this as it made my face feel so much smoother. It has a sort of strange smell but once you're past that, you'll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this moisturizer! It's thick, it's unscented, my skin just soaks it in after a day in the sun!  I received this product complementary from Influenster in exchange for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for my honest opinion. This is my first time trying anything from Biossance though I have seen the brand at Sephora many times. I can tell you that with the testing of this moisturizer, I am interested in seining what else this brand makes because this was a very high quality product that noticeably softened my skin to the touch and left it feeling highly moisturized. The texture is very smooth and the consistency is quite think, so a little can go a long way. The only reason I did not give this product 5 stars was because of the scent. It is rather strong and could be deemed unpleasant. I didn't totally mind it and thought it faded fairly quickly, but it is noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this cream! I have oily skin so I really prefer to use it at night instead of in the daytime because of how hydrating it is but It makes my skin feel very supple and there's a visible difference in how hydrated my skin looks after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes. I have dry acne prone skin and this product made my skin feel hydrated without breaking me out so that was a win! HOWEVER, The. Scent is kind of unpleasant and I couldn't quite get past it. Even my fiance commented on it when he got close to me. Overall a great product if you can get past the scent though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Decent moisturizer, with a pretty strong scent of herbal ingredients. This is a thicker consistency than I am used to, so I would recommend it for someone who has dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary to test & review. I was first of all very impressed with the ingredients of this product! It is claimed to be a squalane moisturizer & squalane is one of the first ingredients. I have oily/combo skin & this moisturizer wasn't too heavy & didn't leave me oily. I haven't been able to notice any big changes in my skin but I am still overall impressed with this product.

reviews.review_title: We love effective, pregnancy safe skincare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical of this one, but I'm honestly not sure why. This is a RICH face cream that helps my skin feel moisturized, plump and renewed.   I'm always struggling to find products when I'm pregnant that are safe and effective but this one is it. I love it and undoubtedly will finish the whole jar.   It does have a u201cnatural, herbalu201d type fragrance - I do enjoy but I know some people are more sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, this makes my face feel so hydrated! The texture is phenomenal! I will say there is a slight scent that is slightly off putting but it goes away quickly. It's definitely one of my favorite moisturizers and I plan on buying another when I run out! It's hard to explain but my face will feel dry & kind of tight & after using this my skin soaks it up and my face feels refreshed, soft and I enjoy using it! If your skin needs a little refresher give this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion is extremely creamy and rich. Once applied your face feels moisturized. I used this on a Hawaii vacation and my face never got dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never purchased a Biossance product before, but now I surely will! Very moisturizing and perfect underneath makeup. Highly recommend for dry skin. The scent isn't great, but it's not absolutely horrible. Will definitely be purchasing other Biossance products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Biossance product and I like it. I love how lightweight the product is while leaving my skin feeling hydrated.  It had my skin feeling plump and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin then you def need to get this cream. I use it during the winter or when my skin needs a little extra live. It is super soft and gets absorbed easily not leaving a greasy feeling. My skin feels hydrated and plump. I like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very happy with the hydration this provides my skin. It has a bit of an odd scent that's not great but the moisturizer itself feels really good. I like the thickness and consistency. Not a lot is needed to achieve moisturized skin. Overall, I'm very happy with it and I would recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite nighttime moisturizer! It's incredibly hydrating and I noticed more hydrated skin after just a few uses. It's not too heavy, so you could use it during the day as well! It's a perfect treat for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This item I would definitely consider repurchasing. It does the job it's described to do. I use it on my face after showers and it keeps me moisturized all day. It has a different scent compared to most but I actually like it. I received this item complimentary from Influenster to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Biossance, but all opinions are my own.   First things first, I LOVE this face cream. I have sensitive skin so I'm always a little skeptical about adding new things to my skin care routine, but this one was awesome. I'm 32 and have some fine lines and my skin is super dull in the morning, but as soon as I apply this - well minutes later - I notice fuller, more vibrant skin, and less fine lines. Like everyone else, the only weird thing about this product is the smell when you first apply it. It reminds me of wet dog, but it's honestly tolerable and lasts for seconds. And the results it gives overrides any weirdness. I love this product and would totally recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin that can get more textured and combo during the summer.  I still need a lot of moisturizing though and this cream is it!  It manages to be rich but light, nourishing but easily absorbed.  For me it is a great summer moisturizer for day and night.  Just a smidge in the morning wears well under makeup.  I can go a little heavier at night.  During the winter I would probably layer this up with an oil to combat dry winter skin.  So glad I tried this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review: I think it works great! My face feels so soft and hydrated and it keeps my skin flawless! I loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. This is my first Biossance product and it did not disappoint. I love how Hydrating and glowy my face is after I use it. It's the perfect product to kick start my day and leave my face feeling refreshed, the perfect plump and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster for testing purposes. This is a pretty good product, but I don't this it's for me. I have acne prone skin and when I used this instead of my curology, I broke out. For someone else, it's probably amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture. hoping to see results with regular use.! Squalene is one of my favourite ingredients and it makes the skin hold onto moisture. Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I revived this product complimentary for an honest review. I will post another review after I've had more time with the product. So far the cream feels very nice and dewy on my skin (and bonus points for the beautiful packaging!). My only negative is the smell is quite off putting for me. I'll let you know how it works in a few weeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it feels the cream is whipped and light. It absorbs so well into the skin, feels so hydrating & lightweight on the skin. It does have a slight weird scent but not noticeable when it's applied on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a jar of this Squalane + Omega Repair Cream for free from Influenster. I had been wanting to try Biossance products I've heard great things about their products and now I know why. I absolutely love this cream. The only thing I didn't really like was the smell of it, but other than that it's a great cream. It's a rich and very moisturizing face cream, it absorbs quickly on the skin. My skin felt so soft and hydrated, I use it morning and night. It has squalane, omega fatty acids, ceramides and plant sterols that deeply moisturize dry skin. I definitely want to try out other products, I recommend this face cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free complimentary product from Influenster and Biossance. I love the modern fresh feel of this product. I liked that you can feel luxurious on the face. I am 40 years old and products like these keep me looking younger. The smell is light on the nose. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is simply amazing. It made my dry sensitive very soft and hydrated. It has a very slight weird scent, however I didn't even notice it when I applied it to my skin. I love this cream so much. I highly recommend it if you have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was iffy about trying a new moisturizer. I have very dry and sensitive skin, but historically, I've responded well to squalene, so I figured this was worth a try. I absolutely love this stuff! The texture melts into my skin, but doesn't leave a thick residue. I use this both morning and night. Makeup doesn't pill on it when I use it in the day. The scent isn't the best, but I don't care if it gives my skin the hydration it needs. No break out with this or patches of irritated skin! 10/10 for me. Will be repurchasing and adding it to my normal routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels great, the scent is a little off though. It's not horrible but not pleasant either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this to try and review but definitely feel like it's worth the price.  I really liked it and saw results after first use.  Definitely will be adding this to my normal routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how rich and moisturizing this face cream is.  My skin type is combination but I feel like it has been a lot more dry with pregnancy. This moisturizer leaves my face feeling plump and looking dewy and it doesn't look as dry the next morning. It wears well under my makeup after it has absorbed and I like that I can dip into it vs pumping the cream out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer works very good. Smells alright. Would buy again and recommend.  #receivedfreeforreviewing #voxbox #complimentary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer compliments of Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I am OBSESSED!! My skin has never looked better. I have used so many types of moisturizers. This one keeps my skin hydrated without being greasy or heavy. My skin GLOWS. I have already ordered. I can not be without it. I have dry skin. It has minimal scent and just melts and absorbs into my skin like a dream. It has made my skin texture overall more smooth. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate that this is unscented and doesn't contain irritating ingredients. It's very emollient. It was too rich for my face (I got greasy), so I use it on my hands instead. One quibble: it should probably be packaged in a tube, since jar packaging can spoil the good ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice cream. I have used it 30 days straight and have seen significant difference in my skin. Definitely recommend it. I have received this product from influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this Biosense squalene and Omega deep repair hydration moisturizer. It really moisturizes and leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. It is very thick but absorbs quickly and does not leave your skin feeling oily. This doesn't have a strong scent,, I would describe it as earthy. Great for all skin types even sensitive. I will definitely recommend and buy this. I received this for free for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster for free, for an honest review. This is truly my absolute favorite moisturizer! Now the smell may throw you off at first, but it's not crazy strong and you honestly don't smell it once you put it on. I use this once in the morning and once at night after cleansing my face. After just a month my skin is so much softer. When you put it on it feels almost silicone like because it's so smooth, but even with extremely sensitive skin I haven't had any reactions and have only seen massive improvement in texture and tone. I will absolutely keep using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves my skin moisturized, soft, and doesn't break me out!   I have combination skin and I like how this sinks right in. I used at night so I'm not sure how well it works under makeup, but I think it would work well. My skin looked great the next day.   I did receive this product from Influenster and biossance in exchange for a review, but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is crazy thick. It feels really good going into the face, but doesn't seem to sink in well. It lays on top of the skin and feels a bit oily. Initially, the smell in the jar was off putting, but after placing it on my face it didn't bother me. I will definitely use as a night cream but I find it a bit heavy for the daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a really solid product. I liked the ease of application for this moisturizer and I thought the scent was light and very pleasant. I tend to over apply everything and I think this was a really great creams that goes a long way. It is definitely moisturizing to the skin. I received this product for free from Influenster and Biossance for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It's more of a winter moisturizer, so right now I only am wearing at night. Feels great on my skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has no scent to it, which is good, since my skin is sensitive. It's pretty good for moisturizing, but I would say it doesn't last long. My skin gets dry after 8 hours ish. The claims are a bit far fetched, i feel like my skin get more dried out from this than my dr jart

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer leaves my skin feeling super hydrated and smooth!! So many people complain about the scent and I agree it does have an odd scent but only for like 10 or 15 seconds it's not a long lasting scent you will only notice it when you first start to apply it and if you really don't like it you can just hold your breath for those 10-15 seconds, the moisturizer is worth it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was unsure on this product at first as my fave appeared to be irritated at first. Come to find out it was not this product but something I ate. I'm so happy I did not stop using it as I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited when I received this to test for free especially because my skin is really dry. This doesn't exactly sink into the skin it just dries ontop and leaves me with residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is amazing!! I have pretty sensitive skin since I'm currently using topicals for my acne. This cream is nice and slightly thick, and feels very milky over the skin. When I wake up in the morning, my face always feels very soft, supple, and moisturized. My only con with this cream is the smell--it has quite a strong musty smell which kind of makes the experience a but unpleasant. However, the smell does eventually die off. Overall, a wonderful cream that hydrates the skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the clean ingredients. Works great on my combo skin. Doesn't leave any residue and moisturizes really well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this everyday on my face. I love it. It's not heavy, absorbs well and makes my face feel great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer.  Extra hydrating without being greasy or making my skin oily over time. Soaks in quickly. Faint smell that doesn't bother me or linger

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the texture of this cream is rich and nourishing without feeling heavy. It gives a moisture boost to my skin leaving it plump and supple and leaves no sticky/greasy residue. There's some herbaceous scent to it, which I don't mind. And the most important thing is my combo skin absolutely loves this formula! Despite being on the thicker side it didn't clogged my pores or give me any breakouts. Acne-prone approved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream is incredible! My skin has never looked or felt better! Super hydrating and helps even skin texture out. I have combination skin and this works wonders for me. Definitely recommend for all skin types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works great on my dry skin from being in the pool and in the sun this summer. It is very light and works great on my sensitive skin. I recieved this product free from influenster for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, and this works amazingly as a night cream. The scent is a bit off-putting, however I prefer it to added fragrance. I wake up with plump, glowy skin and feel like I'm treating my skin well. Would likely rebuy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving the effects of this face cream. Leaves me feeling hydrated and provides a nice canvas for makeup application. It is unscented which I don't mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this every night for almost 2 months and I am in love! My face is so happy. I have rosacea and this has helped tremendously! It has a funky smell for like 3 seconds but then it disappears. It is so hydrating and it feels amazing. I 100% recommend this product! Thank you Influenster and Biossance for this amazing gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a nice moisturizer which thankfully didn't leave me greasy the next morning like many others. Didn't really see anti aging benefits, but it definitely adds moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works very well on my combination skin. It's light and very moisturizing. It leaves my skin looking nice and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skin cream really made my face feel fantastic. It's thick and creamy, and my skin was so soft after just a few days. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Drink of water for your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been getting dry patches and this completely took them away. It has a slight weird sour smell that goes away quickly so I'm not taking any stars away. I only use this at night cause of how moisturizing it is. But it really helped turn my skin around. Good amount of product too. This is a new staple for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for about a month now and I've gotta say, my skin has never felt and looked more youthful. I was looking at my skin last night and it was radiant and so supple. Im inching towards 30 and have used so many products to prevent more fine lines and dullness and this one is doing its job. I also deal with texture and breakouts and this month I havent had to deal with any of that. For the most part this is unscented. It does have a natural plant smell but it's very light. The formula is light and absorbs into the skin instantly. I will definitely be purchasing once I use this up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell wasn't as awful as I thought it would be based off of previous reviews I have read. The smell is definitely different though lol but it is definitely bearable. The cream does some pretty good work on my face when I put it on before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I have just started noticing some fine lines appearing on my face, especially smile lines around my eyes. So when I received this cream i was super excited! It is very nourishing and moisturising! Very rich! Since it is summer time and it is quite hot, i tend to use it a couple of times per week in my night time routine. It works great, and although i have noticed that my newly appeared fine lines are smoothing, i think i need to use it a bit more often. It will be a great staple in my autumn/winter routine, since it is a very rich cream! All in all, ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my review. I think this is a great moisturizer at this price. I like the thickness of the cream, and it applies great onto my skin! I like that it doesn't have a scent and is a clean product too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying that the smell is not for everyone . My husband one time got near me while I was applying it and he said it smelled like aged cotija Cheese ( it's a Mexican cheese) . Which does kinda smell like that but for me is not an issue . I really like that it doesn't have a overly fragrance in the product . I think sometimes it takes away from its benefits ( just my opinion) . My skin is sensitive and it didn't cause any allergic reaction . It really moisturized the skin which I enjoy applying it mostly at night and sometimes during the day if I used an acid or a retinol the night before . It is a cross of drunk elephant and Kate Somerville moisturizer . I do wish that the one I got had a spatula to get it out of the jar . Still I'm being picky about it and it is still a great product . Loved it so much that I got a back up  . Seriously recommend for anyone who is serious about there skin care and that is allergic to fragrance like me .   This product was send for free by influencer to give my full honest review .

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer does an incredible job keeping my skin hydrated and glowing! I wake up with soft and smooth skin and I love it. I only take a star off for the scentu2026it honestly doesn't smell great, but it definitely does what it says it will!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this product. The packaging first is super cute with the green and gold touches. The cream has a very minor odor which I appreciated so you didn't have to get past a scent you weren't a fan of. The cream is very thick but rubs in well, only need a little bit to cover . I liked the way my face felt even the next morning after sleeping overnight with it on.
