It does fill the fine lines but when you don't apply the cream, its visible again. My sunspots are still visible and haven't lightened yet but I only used it for about 2 weeks. The texture of my skin does look smoother for my acne scars on my cheeks but the crater acne scars and large pores are still visible and I haven't seen it heal those area yet. I still put sunscreen in the morning since this product does have ingredients that makes your skin more sensitive to the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the SQUALANE + OMEGA REPAIR CREAM for free from Influenster, Moroccan oil and Biossance. This product is indeed very moisturizing. It is a thick cream and you can feel it on your skin. I could only wear this at night since I do have oily skin and I found the scent to be an earthy smell.  The one con for me was it made my blackheads on my nose worse. If I wore this daily, I'd have to skip my t-zone area. I'm using the rest of this product on my neck and chest areas. I'm getting older and I want to help protect and moistureize those areas as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would of been 5 star if not for the initial smell I didn't like it even though its unscented. This works wonders on my very dry skin. After a few nights I saw a big improvement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance is a great PM cream since it has a creamy consistency. Hydrating doesn't  make me feel oily (which is usually my concern since I have combination skin).A little goes a long way so I usually like to use a small amount and gently pat it into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product I have combination skin type and I have been having break outs lately due to the summer heat and the lack of moisture this product helped clear up my skin and I love how moisturizing it is this a became my go to moisturizer it has no smell to me and it absorbs into the skin amazing a little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Biossance and Influencer in return for my honest opinion.  To start off, I have always loved Biossance as a brand but have never tried this moisturizer. In order to make my review as honest as possible, I discontinued use of my other serums and moisturizers. I suffer from dry skin or more over, dry patches that tend to catch my makeup and make it look less than ideal. I started using just this moisturizer in the morning and then at night using this moisturizer and then using Biossance 100% Squalane oil on top. My skin has become so much better and I haven't really been suffering from dry patches since starting this routine. This product is definitely going to be a repurchase and I'm so thankful to have been introduced to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this repair moisturizer. Since it's the summer time I only use it at night to hydrating and lock in moisture. I have notice my skin is very plumped the next day. Maybe in the winter time I'll try using this under my make-up during the day. I have combination skin type and I like it a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the way this product felt on my skin and I could see a noticeable difference after 7 days of continuous use. The only problem I have with it is the smell. I know one of the product features is clean unscented beauty, but putting something on your face that smells like wet dog is a bit distracting from that key feature. It doesn't last, but it does have a strong initial scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: while this product made my skin feel and look great, i can't get past the smell. at first i thought it had gone bad in shipping but after reading multiple reviews it seems its just common for this product. i received this as a sample and will not be purchasing in the future due to the horrible blue cheesy / moldy smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for my honest review from Influenster and Biossance. My skin is very dry and sensitive to fragrance. This moisturizer is perfect for my skin type. It doesn't have a fragrance and leaves my skin nourished without being too heavy. I will repurchase this again with my own money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from Influenster. Biossance has some very good products. This product would be great for dry skin. My skin is combo/oily and it was a little too thick for me. I prefer a lighter, water cream type texture. I do like the ingredients in it, just wish it wasn't as heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this is is an all in 1 product and has so many benefits. I have dry skin and it's usually sort of sensitive. This definitely helps my skin feel clean and refreshed. Plus I love the smell! I would recommend this to all my friend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using Biossance products. This one in particular make my skin feel refresh and nurtured. I would recommend this product for everyone.  I received this as a free product from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is really moisturizing and doesn't feel too heavy on my skin. I do like the packaging too. However, I don't like the scent at all, it smells musty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good moisturizer but I don't think it's worth the price. It leaves your skin feeling sticky and does not smell great.

reviews.review_title: Melts like butter, smells like bread
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick texture but immediately melts like butter and absorbs nicely into skin. Smells like a loaf of bread, not a great smell but not an unpleasant one either. I have combination skin with oily T zone and this worked great with my skin. It hydrated my dry areas and balanced my T zone. I received this product for Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I highly recommend for combination skin types and if you don't mind the smell of bread

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really good for the skin, it really did cool my skins redness or inflammation. But the downside is the packaging; it's a germaphobe I'd much prefer a pump. I tossed mine after getting covid, but I did love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster to try in exchange for an honest review.   I love Biossance, so I was super excited to try this out. I've been using it for a few weeks and have noticed my skin feeling a lot more hydrated. I have combination dry and oily skin, this time of year I was a little bit on the drier side and this helped me tremendously!   This moisturizer feels lightweight and doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy, even under makeup. I also like that it doesn't fragrance.   I love this brand for what they stand for and this is a really great moisturizer. I definitely recommend it for anyone looking to try a new moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer. I use every night and leaves it my face feeling super soft. I think it's a little heavy for my face under make up but I use a dab of it as under eye cream every day and seen a huge improvement. Will definitely purchase in future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is very hydrating! When I woke up the next morning, I felt like my skin had gotten softer. Disclosure: I did receive this free item via influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This could be a great moisturizer but I think maybe myself and others were sent a bad batch. I love how thick and moisturizing it was but then I noticed if I didn't use it my skin would get flaky which it wasn't before. I absolutely cannot get over the scent. It smells like old musty socks and there were little hairs in it. Maybe there was a bad quality issue I'm not too sure. I wish this was a hit but it's not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. My face feels softer and more hydrated than before. I definitely needed to use morning and night in order to get the best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

So I'm combining this with my daily face cream recommended by my dermatologist.

reviews.review_text: This brand is amazing!!! I loved when i received from Influenster to try I already in love with the brand. My face feeling so hydrated after using !!! Thank you Influenster and Sephora !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream day and night over the past month and I have mixed feelings. I really wanted to love this and I was thrilled to get it free from Biossance and Influenster. I have combination skin, oily and large pores in the T-zone but tight and dry on my cheeks. It's a thick cream and does seem quite hydrating when it's on but honestly I'm just not seeing the amazing results that other reviewers are. My bare skin still feels very rough. My pores are huge on my forehead and I'm breaking out a lot, which I don't necessarily think is due to this cream, but I'm breaking out beyond the usual places and they take forever to go away/heal if they even do. I think this just isn't the cream for me. I also hate the smell of it. I like that it's packaged in a glass jar, but that does make it quite heavy if you're carrying it with you. I might just set this aside to use only at night or in the fall. But I am unlikely to purchase this product.

reviews.review_text: I love a thick, moisturizing cream and this is the one!  My face seems more supple and clear in the morning after I've used this.  I'm trying to keep wrinkles at bay and keep my skin in good condition and this has become a staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a rich and decadent moisturizing repair cream with all the good fats (lipids) your skin needs to deeply moisturize without leaving a greasy after feel. This moisturizing face repair cream is formulated with lipids that mimic and support skin's natural moisture barrier which include squalane, omega fatty acids, ceramides and plant sterols which help nourish, plump, hydrate and feed your skin. I have combination skin and this worked great as my nighttime moisturizer, as I like to apply more of a rich cream at night. It leaves my skin super hydrated and plump the next morning. What I really like is that there isn't any synthetic fragrance or essential oils that are added, so it is completely fragrance free, but the ingredients themselves do emit a mild scent that should dissipate a minute or two after application. Sometimes my skin can tend to be a little sensitive and I didn't have any issues with this. I'm loving the Biossance line so far and will definitely be trying out more of their products in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalane+Omega Repair Cream helps deeply moisturize your skin and minimized the appearance of fine lines. I've been using this for about 2 weeks now and my skin does feel hydrated and feels smooth. Which I love because I have very dry skin. The only thing is the scent is not very pleasant to me, I do love something that works and has a delicious scent, that relaxes me.

Also, yes, it doesn't have a great smell but it honestly doesn't bother me at all and still totally worth using.

reviews.review_text: This stuff is literally amazing!!! Within the first week of using I had so many people complementing me on my skin! I use it at night and as primer before I put my makeup on. I have pretty dry skin so it worked really well for me. If you have oily skin I wouldn't recommend because it does get a lil oily. The only negative thing I have to say is the smell is bad smells a lil like rotten milk but I don't mind because of how good my skin looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this one so much! It's great and easy to use. I have oily skin and it works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! Little thick for me in the summer, but I'm sure my fave would love it in the winter. The scent, while faint, is just so-so for me. But probably best for sensitive skin. This also sinks right in, which is nice (not sticky on your face). I'm 36, so this is great for my u201cstarting to ageu201d skin ;)

This is a pretty good basic, thicker moisturizer. However, it's not worth the price to me. I can get a very similar product for a fraction of the price elsewhere (think Korean skincare). It also leaves a bit of an oily finish on my skin. I don't agree with other reviews about the bad smell. I use mostly unscented skincare, and I don't detect any smell from this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! Not only did my skin feel hydrated & soft, my makeup looked absolutely flawless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating but not for me. I initially loved this product but after some use felt it was a little lackluster. Did not leave my skin oily but I felt the hydration wasn't as intense as I wanted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lotion has AMAZING hydration! Biossance has great ingredients and I have yet to be disappointed in a product of theirs. This is a heavy moisturizer so I only wear it at night but it is worth the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice moisturizer and does a really good job of hydrating but it also felt a little heavy and it may have been better for them to introduce this in the winter months instead. I'm only using it at night as well because it does tend to feel a little oily. Other than that it's a nice product for chronic dry skin. I received this product complimentary from Influenster in order to write an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was great to get after the winter we had. My skin was left super dry and I had a hard time finding anything the would deeply moisturize and bring my skin back to life. This did that! This does have a weird smell as other have said, but it's because it has no added fragrances (which I prefer). I would recommend this to someone who suffers with dry skin and dry patches. For me, I think this is more of a seasonal product for when I go through bouts of dry skin during the winter. I don't think it's an every day, year round moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So when I got this moisturizer I didn't really expect anything since I thought it will just be another moisturizer that will not work on my acne prone skin since it might be too thick and oily for me. But to my surprise it's the best moisturizer that  I didn't know I need! And I am so thankful to have found it. It works great, I can see the difference overnight and it didn't break my skin out! Also I have a sensitive skin that I developed after giving birth so I am really careful of what I  putting on my skin. This is great and I don't think I can live without it. It also doesn't have fragrance so it's a plus. I love it and recommend it to everyone to give it a try please!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked how thick this cream was and how soft it made my face feel after. I have pretty sensitive skin and did feel like this made it a bit oily. I also could not stand the smell. It was so awful, almost like spoiled smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the benefits of this cream - moisturizing, lightweight, makes my skin feel refreshed and smooth..BUT the smell! It smells like sour milk or something is off. I saw a few people mentioned the new bottle didn't have a smell so I don't know if I got a bad batch? I can't stand using it because it smells so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. This has been my go to night cream and I absolutely love it. Definitely recommend trying out. Worth every penny. Makes my skin smooth and helps give a great moisture feeling if you have dry skin. My skin is horrible in the winter and this always helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Squalene + Omega Repair Cream complimentary from Biossance and Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  This is a really rich face cream that was made for dry skin like mine.  It has a thick creamy texture that takes a bit to absorb.  Although it's fragrance free, there's a weird scent from the natural ingredients, but that does dissipate after applying.  My skin felt very hydrated, and after a few weeks I noticed diminished fine lines.  However, for me this moisturizer is too heavy for the summer months, and I would most likely use it during the drier winter months when my skin really needs it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Actually a tiny bit disappointed - I've heard amazing things about Biossance products so was excited when Influenster sent me this product to test. It's moisturizing and did not break me out which is great, but I hate the scent. It's sort of dusty or perfumey... not your typical clean simple skincare scent. I may use up the rest of the jar on my legs because I didn't love the scent on my face. It's a nice thick cream, I may try Biossance oils but not repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very thick moisturizer, so definitely more of a nighttime cream. It does feel very moisturizing and nice on the skin. I'm on the drier side, and this feels nice and non-irritating. It's not scented with anything, so it does have a bit of natural scent to it, but it's not bad. Overall, I wasn't blown away by it, but I like it as a night cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Biossance repair cream is wonderful. It does have a thicker texture but it spreads evenly across this skin. It makes my skin look and feel so much better. My skin feels so hydrated and moisturized. It has helped with my dry and damaged skin. The only negative thing I can say is I don't like the way it smells. It doesn't have an actual scent but when it's first applied it has a non pleasant odor, however I can easily look past this because of the amazing job it does. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a thick moisturizer so if you don't like the thick ones I wouldn't recommend this. So since it's so thick I only use a little bit. It's not the best smelling moisturizer but does the job. Keeps my skin moisturized all day long if you use to much and it's super hot where you live and can look a lil greasy so only use small amounts. I also experienced a few breakouts when first starting this moisturizer they have calmed a lot now so I think it's was just my skin getting use to it but I know where it's so thick it can clog pores rather quickly so please don't use alot just a thin layer. Overall it is a good moisturizer but it's one of those ones that you have to be careful with if you have acne prone skin. This was gave to me for my honest opinion on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the good moisturizers. Small amount is enough for whole face and melts right into the skin. Since the product is fragrance free, there is an odd smell to it. But the whole point is to have skin care with no harmful ingredients so it does its job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so hydrating and truly amazing.  The only thing for me that was off was the initial smell.  It stinks so bad to me but once it's rubbed into the skin, it doesn't smell anymore thank goodness. I'll continue to use the product and would definitely buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer, it has become a staple in my nighttime routine and I feel like my skin is much more hydrated than it has been. I definitely plan to purchase it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice product! It's nice that it doesn't have any scent and definitely makes my skin smooth! I'm using it as night cream so far so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. The moisturizing properties are out of this world and it's great even on my oiler areas of my face. A little goes a long way- mark my words. The only thing that's slightly off putting is the scent. It's not scented, but it has a slight funk for a minute after you apply it. It does fade quickly though which is why I wouldn't give 4 stars. Overall, this face cream is freaking amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this brand. I have received a few complimentary products from them and have been thoroughly impressed. This cream is very thick so I wouldn't use it in the summer when it's hot out but overall it's very moisturizing. I recommend using it overnight for the best results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Squalane + Omega Repair Cream is a simple and no frills moisturizer. It is not scented/ fragranced, but rather  just smells like like the u201cnaturalu201d ingredients. This moisturizer deeply moisturizes my skin. I love the key ingredients of squalane, fatty acids and ceramides to deeply moisturize, and protect  and maintain a healthy skin barrier. I use this at night and always wake up to such soft and radiant skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! I have a hard time finding skincare that doesn't make my acne worse, but this is perfect on my skin. It's a thick formula, but is super hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like it. Its clean skincare. I can always appreciate the fact that its vegan and it keeps my face nice and hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this cream is both vegan and fragrance free. I use this at night as part of my brightening routine. So after my acids to moisturize my skin. I was up with soft glowing skin. I received this for my review from Influenster. I had no idea it was coming but I was so excited. It came right on time because the vitamin c moisturizer I purchase for myself was breaking me out. I haven't used it since receiving this. Purchase but be smart about it. You see it's thick and creamy, maybe you shouldn't use it under makeup. And if it's too heavy for daytime, use it at night .

reviews.review_title: Huge fan of this face lotion!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this lotion every night and some mornings. After a few days of use I started noticing improvements in my skin. Whatever ingredients are in here are magical. I had less redness, smaller pores, and less oily skin. I will be honest, it smells a little funny at first but you get used to the smell after a few days. It's not the worst they just obviously don't add fragrance but that is a good thing! I'd rather not have fragrance added if it would take away from the benefits of the other ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So, also a part of my coveted, complimentary #springpicksvoxbox was an offering from @biossance : its Squalane + Omega Repair Cream. Now, I've got to say that I've never come across a Biossance product I didn't adore before; truly, they usually work very well for me! So, I'm really sorry to say that I had some degree of difficulty even using this product. Outwardly, it looks promising: nice packaging, definitely a u201ccreamy-cream,u201d and it's from Biossance. That alone would likely get me to buy it if I were out at Sephora and in the market for a new cream. But if I did, I'd be disappointed. For me, I couldn't get past the smell. Now, it's advertised as unscented but I got a strong, almost-nostalgic smell of chlorine-mold-mildew-y pool deck at the local Water Park, and I think we all know what the kiddos do in the public pool at their discretion. I don't know if it's the squalane or what, but the smell is so off-putting it's borderline offensive to the olfactory receptors. A hard (yet sorrowful) pass for me; maybe it's a wonder cream and will work for others who can get past the smell.  2 out of 5 stars for being non-comedogenic and vegan.  #complimentary #SpringPicksVoxBox #biossance #texturelove #MoroccanoilBody @Influenster @biossance @mizani @moroccanoil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but I'm not in love with the scent. It's super thick which I love and it makes my skin feel amazing. I feel like it could be more hydrating than it is but overall it's still a great moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is very thick and creamy and would be ideal for someone with sensitive dry skin. I have normal skin and prefer something a little less thick. This has noticeably clogged my pores and made my skin more oily. It also should be fragrance free but definitely has an odor to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent thow me off every time. However, it does go away after rubbing it in. I've been using it for a month now and haven't noticed any changes. I like it for its moisturizing ability but other than that it's mid. I received this complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really impressed with how moisturized my skin feels with this cream.  It has a scent that kinda reminds me of a white wine and it's very smooth.  It leaves my skin a bit shiny but overall I like it and how well my skin is responding

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this moisturizer! So smoothing and soft on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream although expensive works my skin feels so moisturized this is the second time I've purchased it. I will continue to use it, so glad I found it:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a free sample of this moisturizer and boy am I glad I did! I live in the dry climate of Colorado and this hydrating moisturizer has saved my skin. It soaks into my skin and leaves it supple without feeling greasy or thick. This is great for me day and night since it's so dry here, and it is safe for my rosacea-prone, sensitive skin. I'll be using this product for the foreseeable future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my mid-thirties so my skin is starting to dry out, I'v had very oily skin in the past, but this does a wonderful job of hydrating my skin! It's a little  heavier of a cream so it's great for dry skin. It doesn't feel too greasy and absorbs nicely. I do have mild acne and  and blackhead but this this doesn't make it worse at all.  The only problem is there is a pungent smell when you first put it on. It dissipates almost right away after application but is still is off putting. I did receive this free from for testing purposes but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great ingredients! I have dry skin and I loved the moisture it gave me. I did receive this for free to review and that is my honest opinion. I think it's a great product and scent it just nice and fresh no extra perfumes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product received in Trendmood's Box. I am glad to try out new product that works for my skin without irritation. I'll re purchase and recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer for free from Influenster, Moroccanoil, & Biossance for my honest review. When I got the product I was a little skeptical because my skin is so dry and very sensitive to a lot of products but I wanted to give it a try. After just the first night of using it, I felt such a difference! My face feels amazing and hydrated & it doesn't have a strong smell. This is definitely a product I will be getting more of!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really hydrating! After using it for a few months it made the fine lines around my eyes a little better. No complaints about this product I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I live in the mountains and the sun really dries out my skin, I loved how hydrating this was and the texture went on well without leaving my skin oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It has a light scent, nothing overbearing & it leaves my face feeling smooth & moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a woman with auto immune diseases, I constantly struggle with severe dry skin and flaking on my face so a good hydrating cream is vital. This biossance repair cream did wonders for hydrating my skin, leaving it smooth and glowing. I also felt less chapped for longer periods and loved the appearance of my skin as I used it over time. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is the tea tree oil smell, which although faint, I could smell and is one smell I absolutely hate, but even that wasn't enough to keep my from using it. I do recommend this product for anyone looking for hydration! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Not great for very dry skin or under makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from biossance and Influenster  in exchange for my unbiased review.   I tried this moisturizer and while it's nice that it's unscented from a fragrance standpoint the smell is off-putting to me. The cream texture of the moisturizer felt nice going on but I didn't notice any lasting improvement to the moisture in my skin. Lastly it separated foundations and makeup that I never have issues with under thicker moisturizers

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! A little bit goes a long way. It sinks into my skin very quickly leaving it feeling moisturized but not heavy or greasy. I don't notice any scent. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this complimentary for my opinion from influenster. It's a thick and creamy formula which is great for when your skin is dry especially during winter weather. I like to use at night so it has time to soak in since it is on the thicker side and helps feel hydrated and refreshed in the morning. Love the fact that the box is made out of sugarcane which is very innovative and great for the environment. Works well on sensitive skin since it's very natural not my favorite but is still a pretty good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this was a bit too hydrating for me so I could only apply it at night. It's definitely moisturizing and would be great for dry skin. My main con is it has this very off putting smell to me. The product is fragrance free which I usually like, but the natural smell of this is not pleasant at all. Luckily the scent doesn't linger.  I received these products for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel as though this is good for my extra dry skin. However, I feel like it is a bit oily/greasy and don't care for the way it makes my face feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a very neutral smell which I like. No overwhelming fragrance. However, it is a bit oily so I use it at night for extra hydration. Overall I like it but unsure if I would purchase as I received this in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was on my list of products I'd like to try since a Sephora employee recommended it , I was super excited when I received it from Influenster in my vox box in an exchange of a review. My skin is a little on the dry side so I really need to moisturize all the time . I love the texture and that it's long lasting and very smooth , I love touching my face after applying the cream. Personally I don't mind the smell at all.my skin feels so much younger .As a mom of young kids, my face looks tired but I did feel the difference using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this moisturizer. It's light but thick at the same time. Absorbs beautifully and is such a gorgeous product. It's a new must have in my routine!  I received this product for free from biossance in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super light weight feeling on the skin, but also just the right enough amount of moisture! Little to no smell which I like. Packaging is super pretty and appealing! Would recommend to others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this deeply moisturizing plumping cream! I have seen a clear improvement in my face and neck since starting and I am motivated to keep using! I love that it's plant derived and the packaging feels expensive. The shelf life of this cream is 12 months from opening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love the biossance squalane + omega repair cream. This face cream is not greasy or heavy at all, but deeply hydrates and leaves facial skin feeling clean, healthy and radiant. Definitely incorporating this product into my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really happy with this moisturizer, it leaves me skin soft and silky with looking greasy !

reviews.review_title: Once you get past the smellu2026.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is awesome and truly makes my face feel SO good and so soft in the morning. But the smell for me, is a drawback. It's not exactly offensive, but it's definitely off putting esp for a product to put on your face. The smell doesn't linger once you put the product on, so it's tolerable. The product does work though and I absolutely do recommend it!!!! Just prepare yourself for the strange smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i like how the formula is of this cream and the hydration but i the smell is weird. it is not a pleasant smell but once you put it on your face it goes away. i received it complimentary from influenster but idk if i would buy it when i finish it only because of the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent leaves a lot to be desired but I love how moisturizing this lotion is. My skin quickly absorbs the product without feeling tacky or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary of influenster. I usually don't use this type of product but it was great to get the chance to try it out. I can really tell this is high end and love how it's made with natural ingredients. The fragrance is nice, but not too strong. I have bad dark circles and this has helped with that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! It feels amazing and works. I live in a very dry area so I'm always looking for the most moisturizing things and this is one of them. I feel like people complain about the smell, or should I say lack of fragrance but I think most people don't understand that you do not want to put any scented product on your face! I think the natural smell is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say this product is seriously so amazing! I love how thick it is, but also how quickly my skin absorbed it. A little goes a LONG way! The jar is a substantial size, and will definitely last! My skin is combination, but during the summer months I tend to be more oily. This has been perfect for a day cream AND night cream. The price point is steep, but for the quality ingredients, I feel that it is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although the smell at first put me off, the way my skin glows after using this stuff is heckin' amazing!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 34, and I want to do all I can to look my age (or even better, younger!) and I'm pretty sure this will be the ticket to that goal!   There is not a scent to the cream, it's very neutral smelling, which is great for those with sensitive skin! I've been putting it on and then doing gua shua, and because it is so soft and silky, the stone glides right over my skin. I can't wait to see the long term results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Influenster. This is a great moisturizer and keeps my skin very soft. I use it every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in my trendmood box. Super hydrating and nourished my sensitive dry skin! Would repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Biossance Squalane +Omega Repair Cream was not for me. While it was very hydrating, I found it to be too heavy and greasy. I tried using it under my makeup and it caused my foundation to just melt off. I would say this for very very dry skin or for a specific drying event such as following a big chemical peel or sunburn. I personally won't use it daily because it's just too much for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer I used it a while back in samples I received I was very excited when I received it complimentary from influenster its very moisturizing feels very nice leaves skin feeling plumped and feels very smooth doesnt feel heavy or oily and u will see a difference in ur skin helps with fine lines I definitely recommend it its definitely one of my faves

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made my skin very hydrated, I have combination skin. Both dry and oily. This works good with my skin type and has long lasting moisture, highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was okay. I did not like that it took awhile to absorb into my skin. My skin is well hydrated while using this. There is also no scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love anything Biossance does! I have used an entire bottle of this up before receiving this and I can say it is super moisturizing. It has a gorgeous texture. Something that I particularly like for winter when my skin is suoer dry. I love their use if Squalane in their ingredients because it always seems to sit super well with my sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, typically dryer in the winter months. Regardless of the season I still experience dryness all year round due to daily cleansing. That's why I'm thankful I have Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream to replenish moisture and hydrate my skin after cleansing my face. I love the natural scent it has as well! Scented skincare is so overrated and irritating to my skin.  I have used half the jar now and I am soo happy! The packaging is 1st class as well, the glass jar, the labeling the box it comes it is all top notch. I do wish it came with a spatula for no contamination, but I am using one I already had!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. My opinion is my own and based on my experience using this product once nightly for about a week.   Pros: great ingredients, great packaging, super hydrating  Cons: overpriced, off-putting scent (which does fade after you apply), thick/heavy/greasy  I've been a fan of Biossance 100% Squalane since pre-launch (I was a product tester). I've been purchasing and using that oil since it was available. I haven't been a fan of their other products, mostly because they contain fragrances or other ingredients which can be very irritating to sensitive skin. I was so happy to see a fragrance free option geared toward dry and sensitive skin.  My first thought when I opened the box was how small the container was for this price-especially since it's a glass container. My next concern was the weird and unpleasant smell of the cream. It smells like an ingredient has gone bad. I did some research to see if this was a common concern and it definitely is. I think clean beauty has gone a bit too far with fear mongering about the dangers of parabens. I encourage you to do your own research. This really smells like the olive oil has gone bad. Shea butter is not the best smelling either but I've used lots of fragrance free products and never experienced this type of scent. For a company that started so scientifically and that is priced as is, I expected better.  The texture is heavy and while it did absorb somewhatu2026it left an overly heavy/greasy layer on my skin. It felt really similar to using a product with dimethicone (which it doesn't contain). This is far too heavy for day use in my opinion, especially in the warmer months. I patched tested several times on my arm, leg, and hands before trying this on my face;  the odor and heaviness made me concerned about a reaction. I didn't experience any irritation but I didn't like the feel on my face. I really prefer a cream that fully absorbs. Try a sample first!

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. This is a nice general moisturizer. I have sensitive skin and it didn't break me out at all. It has no smell and feels nice on the skin. It isn't too heavy, but it is enough. I do love the clean ingredients! I personally like the oil better though.
