reviews.review_text: I received the products for free from Influenster, Moroccanoil, and Biossance.   I received a 50 mL jar to sample for my honest opinion. The texture is thick but soaks in quickly and left my skin feeling moisturized all night/day (I use it every morning and night). I'm not sure on the long term use, as I've only had it for a week but my husband said my face feels softer to him already. My only complaint is, I don't like the smell but it absorbs quickly and then I add my daily products over it so it's only really an issue for a few minutes. Will be buying once I run out of this jar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I can't get enough of this stuff! It goes on thick but my skin immediately soaks it up. It's not greasy or overbearing on my t-zone. My only complaint is the jarring smell that usually goes away when I layer sunscreen on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy using this and my morning moisturizer. It sinks into the skin nicely and leaves my face feeling soft and hydrated. I don't believe there is fragrance added but there is a bit of a smell. Otherwise I really enjoy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product. it has a wonderful consistency, and my face feels so soft and moisturized. however, i am not a fan of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for review from Influenster and Biossance. First off, I love Biossance products and all I have tried to date have been fantastic. This product was a tad on the heavy side for me. Maybe because the weather is warming it didn't agree with my skin but this may be a great dry/winter product. I will say I one night I concentrated this on a dry patch on my face and it felt fine. I think I'm just going to have to find the right balance with this one. Smell isn't great either but it's a natural skin care type smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this free for review from Influenster. It's a thick an very moisturizing cream. Though it has no added fragrance it does sort of smell like the sesemy sticks in a bowl of pubmix which is a bit weird to have on my face.  The packaging is sleek and pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is lightly scented. Not offensive. Absorbs easily and plays well with other products. Recommended for sensitive skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful nighttime moisturizer for me. It's too heavy for my combo/oily skin during the day but I enjoy using it at night, and will likely enjoy it more again in the fall. I think someone with dry skin would probably enjoy this during the day as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin type. I appreciate that this product is fragrance free at least in my opinion.  There is no fragrance or overpowering scent.   My face feels soft and hydrated. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice face moisturizer, very creamy and really does wonders  for my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot speak to the effectiveness of the product because I only used it for about a week before I returned it.  This product smells so bad. I don't like a fragranced facial moisturizer, but I need it to not stink. I couldn't tolerate the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked that this cream wasn't too heavy but just thick enough to make my skin feel hydrated both day and night. It has a regular moisturizer scent, nothing heavily fragrant. It made my skin feel very smooth. I would highly recommend this to anyone suffering dry skin and much more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's a great moisturizer and I wanted to like it SO bad, but I can't get past the smell. I realize it's considered fragrance free, but it was not a good smell. I will most likely keep using it, as I don't ever like wasting a good product. I do think everything else about it is wonderful, just dislike the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my Vox Box and I love it! It's so hydrating and feels really nice on the skin. I like to use it at night it makes my super dry skin feel so hydrated when I wake up. Definitely recommend if you have dry skin. It does have a scent but it's not very strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a hydrating moisturizer! From the very first use, I saw a difference in now soft, dewy and plump my skin looked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer does moisturize my skin. The one downfall is the smell. Thank goodness the smell doesn't last long. But it still bothers me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure that this cream is suitable as a day cream. The cream has a dense texture and I would say it is nutritious. I liked using it at night. In the morning, my skin was moisturized and pleasant to the touch.

I have dry skin and initially I loved this because it moisturized my skin but as the days passed it made me start breaking out which made me sad because I really did like it but my skin is sensitive to some products so I guess there is an ingredient that didn't mesh with my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I never heard of this brand before, I don't even really know what squalene is but lol so far it makes my face feel so nice and amazing! It also smells really Good lol. I know the benefits is also supposed to be good I definitely recommend this, I got it complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is thick and great for cold winter months when your skin is super dry. It did not cause any breakouts for me. I also did not notice any bad smells others have mentioned.

reviews.review_title: moisturizing w/o breakouts but bad smell + package
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and finding a thick, moisturizing lotion like this for my nighttime routine that doesn't make me break out is really tough, but this lotion has worked extremely well for me on all fronts. That said, I really hate the smell. It smells like a foot! And the packaging isn't great eitheru2014it's gotten harder and harder for me to unscrew the cap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best face cream I try. my face is super hydrated after using it. I really love it.  received the products for free from Influenster, Moroccanoil, and Biossance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not my first time using Biossance brand but it is my first time trying this cream. All I can say is WOW! This repair cream is so thick and moisturizing, my skin just drinks it up! It's perfect to use as a night cream. My face seems so much more hydrated in the mornings. I've only been using this a little over a week but I've already seen some improvements. It's best improvements are after 28 days, so I'm looking forward to seeing how it helps with a couple fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have combo skin and this is so nourishing and have great ingredients! I think any skin type would love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely hydrating cream. I use before bed to allow it to really soak in and wake up plump and refreshed. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how hydrating this is. A little goes a long way and does the job without being heavy on the skin or feel like I have layers of moisturizer on like some products can feel. Getting closer to 40, extra moisture is sometimes what I'm needing, and this definitely helps. I received for my honest review from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing!!! It does not feels greasy, heavy or uncomfortable. My face is so smooth and pretty. I didn't break out my face and does not have a strong smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super creamy and moisturizing! My skin hasn't had any issues with this. This cream helps with the dry patches I have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I got this complimentary in my Influenster Voxbox, and honestly it pretty good. It does great with moisturizing my skin at night and not clogging up my pores, another plus for me is the fact that it's plant based that's another 10/10! However I took one star away due to the smell! The smell is absolutely atrocious..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is beyond wonderful. I love how thick it is. Goes right into you skin and hydrates it.  Nice scent;  nothing too strong and the scent disappears after absorbing. I think the formula is great and I can tell this will improve anyone's skin appearance. I have combination skin and didn't make my skin look greasy at all. It was perfect. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer, I have signs of rosacea in my skin, and this moisturizer doesn't irritate and even improve it. I am not a fan of the smell, but i can live with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so moisturizing, and it sued my irritated skin from over exfoliation. It moisturize my dry patches with no problem. And it did not clog my pores. I had no break out after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for cold weather when your skin is very dry. It's thick and I feel like it will melt off my face today. There is hardly a scent to it. I would recommend using it in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand. Everything they put out is amazing. Same for this product. Amazing. Love it. Recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Great Moisturizer With An Unpleasant Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary & I have to say this is by far the best moisturizer I have ever used. My face gets dry around my nose, lips, & in between my eyes. You usually have to apply moisturizer a few times a day because you can see the dry skin. With this I don't have to. I apply it in the morning & it lasts all throughout the day. My husband borrowed some the other day & now he is also using it daily. He agrees that it works great. I would have given it 5 stars but I did find one thing I disliked. It is not the most pleasant smell & when you apply it you can smell it on your face for a few seconds. Thank God it goes away because it's not good at all. Hopefully they can figure that out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a good cream to repair and provide intense hydration then this is it! I have combo-combo skin and this helps when my skin needs the ultra rich repair and hydration. This is thick but I can feel the hydration instantly. This has hylaronic acid which plumps the skin, the fatty acid to help restore the skin, fighting wrinkles and fine lines. This is also a clean beauty brand. This feels great on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this moisturizer. A little goes a long way and it made my skin feel very hydrated but not greasy. I didn't LOVE the smell which is why I took one star. overall, I liked it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like a warm sweater for my dry, winter skin. For some reason I've developed this teeny flake on my skin that keeps coming back. This Omega repair cream has helped get this area of my skin feeling nourished and supported during winter months. Now that we're in spring time, I'm usually reserving this as my night time moisturizer. I usually use this in combination with a hyaluronic serum and depending on how dry I'm feeling I either top it with straight Biossance Squalane oil or leave as is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing. It works well under makeup so been using it in the AM as well as PM. It makes your skin plump and hydrated without the greasy feeling. It's light weight and absorbs so well! Definitely looking forward to trying more products from Biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisture goes on smoothly keeps me hydrated all day & night. I use it in the am & pm, it doesn't irritate my skin or cause it any redness. It has helped with my dry areas and doesn't feel too heavy and greasy on the skin. I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Biossance to review and give my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cream for dry skin. My face has been feeling a little bit dry after my pregnancy and this cream feels like heaven. Not too heavy not too light. Just perfect. No fragrance which is amazing too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this product. I received this product complimentary of Influenster and was super excited. The product is full size and bigger than other moisturizers. I love the ingredients and that it's vegan, cruelty free and non toxic. It feels really good on my skin, it absorbs well and leaves me feeling super soft. A little bit of a weird smell but I don't mind at all. I definitely recommend and will be trying more products from this brand! Very satisfied.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, hydrating cream! A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I was SO happy to be selected for this campaign because I love Biossance products! I have been using this cream for over a week now and I have noticed extreme hydration in my skin. I have noticed if I use too much I will break out, but I quickly figured out the right amount for my dry skin. This is especially amazing to use at night as a night cream, but if you don't have oily skin it's also great for morning as well. A little goes a long way. I love that it has ingredients like Omega and naturally derived squalene. I have already noticed great results and will be definitely purchasing once I run out. I highly recommend this cream especially for people suffering with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream came into my life at the perfect time. I'm an esthetician and I have been using a pretty strong cream with hydroquinone and tretinoin as ingredients and I have been using this on the days I don't use that. Before I was using this product I was peeling by the end of the week, which was fine but annoying. With this my skin has been peeling far less and I have a radiant glow! It smells a little like cocoa butter which I like. A little goes a long way and it absorbs nicely. 10/10 would purchase this again. I have been recommending to clients as well if they have dry or normal skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for a while now and I'm honestly unsure of what it's supposed to do but what it does do is make my skin feel hydrated and less flakey. I really love the heavy green glass jar. It feels high end and for the price, it should. Biossance products as a whole area usually pretty great and this one is no different. It feels cool when I apply it to my skin and I always love that sensation because it seems to just calm all my redness. Overall it's pretty nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. This is the first product I am using from Biossance. While I thought this cream will be thick and heavy, the texture of it was deceiving. Right after the application, it absorbed into my skin right away leaving it silky and smooth. For its richness, it is uniquely lightweight. I truly enjoyed how it feels on my face. I think it's great for being worn under the makeup with a primer. The smell was somewhat off-putting, it has the earthy notes of umami, but I was not bothered as it evaporated quickly. I think it lacks richness for a night time moisturizer, but if you pair it will a sleeping mask - it will be perfect. Great product, I truly enjoyed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It took my skin a few days to enjoy this, but now it has replaced my usual moisturizer! I'm currently battling a bout of acne so my face is extra dry with the added acne treatment. This moisturizer wasn't cutting it on its own for the first few days, but I stuck it out and my skin adjusted. Now, two weeks in, I find myself reaching for it over my other products. The smell is weird but I only get a whiff of it every once in a while. The texture is the clear winner! It's stark white and of so creamy, but when it hits the skin it's a tiny bit cooling like a gel. Truly lovely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: t feels nice on the skin and gives good hydration without making my skin oily. The smell is not great. Not too terrible to not use it but just not wonderful. Doesn't break me out. And works fine on my sensitive skin.   Received complimentary from Influester for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from Influenster. I love this brand so I was excited to try this moisturizer. It's super hydrating and light weight. A little goes a long way and it sits well under makeup. Definitely recommended.

reviews.review_title: Change the scent and I'd be a fan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this but I cannot get passed the smell, it smells like feet. I tried it on my hands and it definitely has a hydrating power but the smell is just one I can't get passed. I got this as a sample thankfully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing product. Feels so hydrating on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this! I'm a big fan of the brand and this was my first product to try. This cream is absolutely amazing! This rich texture hydrates my skins so well. It doesn't sit on top of it like some creams it obsorbs and feels so silky. It also made some of my wrinkles or lines less depth and made them look smoother. I love how it make me more satisfied with my natural skin and not wanting to throw a bunch of makeup on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No! Smells so bad! I couldn't even put it on. #complimentary #SpringPicksVoxBox #biossance #texturelove #MoroccanoilBody @Influenster @biossance @mizani @moroccanoil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This helped add moisture to my skin which I feel like I always need. It is scented but it didn't feel overpowering to me. I felt it help lock in moisture and didn't cause any breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. It does smell, but considering I still have lack of smell from Covid, it doesn't bother me. I find that it isn't too overwhelming for my skin, it calms down the redness. I would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich and dreamy face cream. I can't believe how nice this is. My skin is so dry and this literally adds the moisture my skin needs. I like to use this day and night. I love that it's fragrance free and great for sensitive skin. I can't wait to try more from Biossance. I would recommend this to anyone that has dry skin and needs a pick me up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried the Biossance squalane oil and wasn't very impressed, so I wasn't sure what to expect with this moisturizer. I'm actually pleasantly surprised with the level of hydration it provides. I've been using it for about a week now and my skin feels supple and hydrated. My only complaint is that there is a very faint unpleasant smell when the product emulsifies in your hands as it absorbs on your face. I can't describe it, but it's very odd. Other than that, I've been enjoying it! Thanks, Influenster for providing this product complimentary to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a free trial from influenced her and biossance for my honest review. Honestly this is one of the worst smelling creams I've ever put on my face it smells exactly like stinky old socks. They didn't add any fragrance but maybe they should have. Doesn't seem to absorb into my skin very well either and doesn't seem to moisturize very well as it claims. I was really looking forward to this considering the price point. But was very let down mainly because of the scent. The glass jar is gorgeous. Other than that I don't have many good things to say.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love skincare companies that really research high performance clean ingredients. Previously I didn't care what I put on my skin but these days I have educated myself.  Biossance has been recommended regularly during my research on products.  Biossance Squalane + Omega Repair Cream has important omega fatty acids that fortify, restore and plump the skin. In addition to skin identifying ingredients that are found naturally in our skin dermis. This moisturizer has a whipped texture that glides on very easily. This will be good for all skin types; especially oily. No heavy residue feeling on my skin after using, and it didn't irritate or break me out. Unfortunately; I suffer from hormonal breakouts but this actually calmed my skin down and imitated the healing process. Definitely recommend 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A really good moisturizer for me. I'm combination, but struggle with the dryer parts of my face. Not really prone to acne as much, but I think on skin barrier level or perspective, this may be good for any skin type. I use it as a final step to my regimen, after my chemical spf (daytime) or any acid treatment I use (nighttime). It's pairs so well with most of my skin treatments (serums, etc). Smells funny upon applying but goes away pretty quick too. Good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooou2026I love that Biossance didn't add fragrance to this cream, but I concur with the other reviewersu2026the scent is not good. It's a big turnoff for me. I wanted to love this so much, because I love the clean ingredients! It's a great moisturizer as well, but I still needed more moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this a week and I'm in love. Usually no matter my skin care routine by the end of the day my face gets flakey from having dry skin and wearing foundation every day doesn't mesh well all the time until I added this to my routine!!!

reviews.review_title: Great product, not so good scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't get past the smell on Biossance squalane products. I'm usually okay with fragrance free clean natural products, but this is one the situations that I wish they added just a little bit of fragrance to mask that scent. Having said that, the cream is great. It worked phenomenally for my dry skin. I've been trying to be consistent about using it every day for the past couple of weeks despite the scent and it works well in keeping my skin hydrated and smooth. I just wish there was something that could be done about the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the natural ingredients in this product. This is extremely moisturizing so you only need a little to go along way! I would recommend this for the dry winter months or for anyone with dry skin. I received this complimentary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review from Influenster. It's rich and creamy texture that does absorb well. However I can't get past the scent of this. Not sure if its added fragrance to mask the scent of the ingredients or the actual ingredients themselves. It's a nope from me.

reviews.review_title: Deep Hydration for Those Who Need It
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the standard size in a box from Influenster and was very excited to try this. I have normal skin, combination at times. I will say this is a thicker cream and while fragrance-free, it does have a scent because of the ingredients. It will be strong at first, but dispersed after a few minutes. If you're sensitive to u201cearthyu201d scents, this may not be for you.  As mentioned, this is a thicker cream. It may be suitable for the winter, but this would be too thick for me during spring/summer. Maybe if you have very dry skin, this would be great, but for me, I would only use this as part of a night routine.  I tested it out twice as part of my morning and evening, and while I didn't look oily, it felt like that after some time.  I think this is better as part of a night routine, but it wouldn't replace my daily, personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream from Influenster for my review and I really, really wanted to love it.  It is incredibly hydrating and for my combo/ oily skin, it is a great overnight cream. Daytime, not so much. I love the texture and the skin care benefits that I can clearly notice. BUT the smell is too strong and too pungent. Think seaweed. I have to hold my breath when applying it and it is a bit of a deterrent for me, unfortunately. And I'm not someone who is sensitive to fragrance or scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This feels so good on my skin that a simple review won't be enough. It makes my skin so smooth and it is so hydrating without being greasy, not runny and very creamy. I love it being unscented, my sensitive skin appreciates it. I use it morning and night I can't get enlighten  of it, skin feels supple, smooth and soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, 100% would buy again. It is so moisturizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cream. Not greasy. No string smell. My face liked it. I received this free to test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and I was so delighted that this moisturizer didn't cause any breakouts some times oily skin still needs a little boost. The smell is unique not my favorite but the texture is amazing and it just melts into your skin.

reviews.review_title: Great for dry skin, but funky smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product if you want to introduce ceramides into your routine like I did. It's definitely a thicker moisturizer but dries to something lightweight. I'd recommend if you're feeling particularly dry or are about to travel. The only downside is the smell. The cream itself smells super funny at first but it fades. I was honestly worried my had soured somehow but upon reading other reviews, that's just the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from influenster. I absolutely loved this product the first time I tried it. It absorbed into my skin completely and didn't feel sticky or greasy. The only thing is be careful around the eyes, my under eyes felt very greasy at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: As a person with a sensitive skin and acne prone i love that this moisturizer did not gave me breakout! So glad i tried this in the trendmood box

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my trendmood box! I do love this moisturizer so much! It leaves my skin super hydrated and soft. The only downside is what everyone else has brought up-The smell. It does go away after a few seconds but ughhhhh I just hold my breath for a few lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, I see a difference in my skin when I use it. My skin seems more balanced and it's been great for texture. Love everything I've tried from this brand so far. I received this in the Trendmood vol 15 box and I'm looking forward to more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received in my Trendmood box! It's a new holy grail moisturizer. Not tacky after application and leaves my skin so smooth. Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Biossance squalene and repair moisturizer in my Trendmood box and I absolutely love it! It has made my dry skin so soft and smooth. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a new one from a trendmood box. Previously been using this cream. I have combination oily skin and this goes very well with my toner, treatment for hyperpigmentation, serums you name it. Layers well, not oily, does not break me out and best of all, does not leave my skin greasy! Well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item from Trendmood Box. This moisturizer works well with my combo skin. It is extremely hydrating without making my skin oily. Unfortunately, I'm not a fan of how it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great night time/ cold weather moisturizer. Leaves skin soft, supple and moisture. Not everyone may like the scent however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love anything squalene! Great for a night cream don't apply too much or It can feel a little heavy because of the olive oil. Got this thanks to my Trendmood box!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bomb, love the way it feels and the ingredients are always top notch and ahead of the gang.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in my Trendmood Box and I can honestly say that if I hadn't received it in my Trendmood Box I probably wouldn't have never tried it and I'm so glad that I was introduced to this product. I have overall very dry skin with an oily T-zone and this moisturizer worked very well for my skin. I particularly have been using it at night after I wash my face because I noticed that that's when it's the most drying. The texture is thick and there's not much of a scent at all so I appreciate that. A very small amount of product goes a long way which I also like. I did also use this as a make up prep base and it worked very well. I recommend this product Elise obtaining a sample to see if you like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin with some fine lines. I love Biossance and I love their ingredients. I use this religiously and I have not experienced any irritation. It's emollient and moisturizing and I love the the super light scent. I got this free from Trendmood but I'm glad I did!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin so sometimes creams make my face oily but definitely not this one! I had no smell to it. Feels great going on my skin. Doesn't feel heavy or cakey. I can definitely feel the hydration. I can feel a sheen of if when I touch my face but definitely can layer with make up or as is. I love it tho perfect light hydration for my face.  Received free from  influenster and biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite night cream for my combo, hyper-pigmented, occasionally sensitive skin. I'm on my 4th jar and every time I try something new, I come back. I love the natural smell from the omega oils and how it spreads, looks, and feels on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo oily skin and this moisturizer works really well with my skin it is a bit thick so I opt to use it as a night cream and I absolutely love it I don't get too oily throughout the night so I wake up feeling balanced and moisturized I love the ingredients and how it's a clean product definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Biossance and have dry skin so was thrilled to see this. I suffer from dry patches on my face. This moisturizer did the job and left my skin glowing and soft! Did not irritate my skin either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since my skin cannot take fragrance and artificial stuff, its the best brand for my skin type. It's pure and the company has such a good vibe. I'm using right now the gel moisturizer and my skin has never been so smooth, and now I'm using this one for my cheeks. The combo is simply fabulous !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Man, this cream is a nice consistency and feels great on the face, but the smell! Ugh. It reminds me of mosquito bug repellant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time purchasing the regular sizeu2026 I had gone through 2 of the little size jars that come in a set. This is a great moisturizer but I hated the smell. i bought it again because i couldn't find snything rlse that worked as well despite the smell but the new jar has NO smell!! The company must have changed the formulation after all the bad feedback on the stinky smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my favorite moisturizer ive been using all winter! it's a very rich cream with great ingredients and it's super moisturizing. makes my skin feel so nice even for a dry skin girly like me

reviews.review_title: Love the product, hate to smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What everyone says about the smell is true. When I first play it to my freeze I thought that I had let water run on it because it almost smelled like wet dog.   Now, if you can get past this and your skin is dry this is an excellent moisturizer. I have dry, cracked skin, patches and rosacea. Ever since I started used in this my skin has calmed down immensely. All of the dry patches have disappeared and I feel like even some of the redness went down.   It has a very rich texture however once applied and spread into the skin it melts into it. I'm really hoping they can get rid of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Acne city!! I'm not even prone to acne. I have literally never had acne on my cheeks. I'm so upset. This is so messed up. I don't know how my face can recover from this. Do not use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Despite all the positive reviews I was very exited to try the product. However I also could not get over the pungent smell. After using it for over 4 weeks I developed acne all over my cheeks. It definitely was the offender as since stopping, my skin has improved to baseline. I cannot even return the product since its well outside the return policy timeline. Hard for me to recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little does go a long way with this one. I can see this being my new moisturizer for the winter months! I've also starting using lactic acid in my skincare routine that gives me slight tingly feelings which I find a bit irritating but this cream is thick, moisturizing and soothing, keeps my skin comfortable! It really does make me feel like it's repairing my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream saved my skin barrier. I'm a stay at home mom of 1, my skin was falling apart. I'm in my late 20s. I've never bought products anywhere but from the drug store - this was my first time and it changed my life. This product saved my skin barrier and my skin started retaining moisture again. I finished the mini size. Looking to repurchase the bigger size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is the only product where my skin feels hydrated. I have dry skin with mild rosacea and I have been searching for a product where my skin actually feels soft and hydrated- this is it! The only downside is it is quite pricy, but I will keep buying it because of the quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer I've ever used. The texture is incredibly rich, and it absorbs into my skin like a dream. Unlike other moisturizers, this does not sit on top of the skin or feel greasy. It makes my skin feel so supple and bouncy and soft.  Let's talk about the smell. I am not particularly sensitive to bad smells. I am a nurse. Does this product smell bad, as a few other reviewers have noted? This product does have an odd, stale smell. I would not call it foul. But when your apply it into your skin, the smell goes away like magic. And let's not forget why there is an odor: THIS IS A CLEAN BEAUTY PRODUCT AND THEREFORE IT HAS NO FRAGRANCES OR PERFUMES. The smell you're smelling is the special ingredient that is good for your skin: SQUALANE.   Do I think this product is worth using? Absolutely. Is the smell so bad it would deter me from purchasing it? Not in the least. I will continue to use this product. It makes my skin look amazing and I have been getting compliments. Give it a try. There is a small sampler size available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing but not too heavy! Has an odd scent but you get used to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I got a sample of this with my order and I was really thinking how bad can this smell. Like it can't possibly outweight the benefits. Honestly I wouldn't recommend this product. There are so many other well formulated products that no scent. I don't see why they released this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the reviews were exaggerating on the wet dog smellu2026 but they weren't. I thought I could get over the smell but couldn't. I returned it and got something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer - thick and feels great going on. I use it at night, but would be fine for a day cream. I sometimes mix it with the Rose Oil. I don't notice any bad odor that some mention. Smells mild to me and does not linger. Also, I love the heavy glass bottle. It works well for repurposing too - for paper clips, travel pill case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't get past the smell to even notice any results, but I can promise there were none. WHOSE IDEA WAS IT TO PUT A FACE CREAM ON THE MARKET THAT SMELLS LIKE UNWASHED FEET? WHO SMELT THIS AND THOUGHT THIS WAS IT? WHO THOUGHT u201cTHIS IS THE PRODUCT IM PROUD OFu201d? It smells terrible and does nothing but cause me skin irritation.

reviews.review_title: super moisturizing for dry and acne prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and tend to get acne around the time of the month and no cap this stuff keeps me from breaking out, I'm so glad I tried this! it's very thick but u only need a little bit for your whole face! Paired with seaberry oil *chef's kiss*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Greasy, slides, clogs pores, I got the small version and glad I did, beware if you break out or any normal to oily to combo skin, it's literally not worth it and I expected a lot better from this company. Pretty upset that my cheeks are all broken out now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer for night time. I wake up with hydrated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer I've ever used. It's not as pricy as Lamer Cream  or Fresh Ancienne Cream. But it works almost the same effect especially with the vitamin rose face oil. I will keep purchasing this amazing cream again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cream, but it smells like feet. It would be nice if there wasn't any smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic moisturizer. The most perfect consistency and not too light but also not too thick. No fragrance or irritants (and let me tell you, my skin gets easily irritated), great ingredients. I am pretty lazy, so going through a whole skincare routine isn't enjoyable to me but I actually get excited when I put this on. Only thing that I could think of that's missing is there is no spf in this. If there was, I'd prob start crying with joy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This literally makes my skin feel like butter. I have been using the IT cosmetics confidence in a cream moisturizer for 5 years and I thought it was going to be my ride of die until this jar of gold came along. I have really sensitive skin and I break out fairly quickly. Not to mention I also have rosacea, but this does not irritate or make anything worse. I feel like it's more cooling if anything. I tried the mini size but I ordered the jumbo right when I got the chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want to repair your barrier, are super duper dry or are having a bad reaction to something apply this with the Biossance pure squalane oil and it will make your skin bounce back and heal!!!! Trust meee the smell is nothing compared to what the long term benefits of this are! The first picture is around 9:34am the after is the same day but 10pm the results are amazing!!!! This works miracles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good quality, the cream is a little thick and soft but it does not moisturize my skin very well, which is sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream really works and it's a clean product.  It doesn't smell bad al all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer I've ever used! Doesn't smell the best, but the smell dissipate and it's easy to overlook when you see the results this moisturizer can have on your skin's moisturize barrier

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good moisture when used but the smell is terrible. It smells like dirty feet :( Wish they would improve the smell of this cream because I otherwise love Biossance products.

reviews.review_title: It works but it also smells bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This helped a lot with texture and it does exactly what it says but it does smell like a rotten banana. It's the only reason I won't repurchase. If you're indifferent about that kind of stuff, you should definitely purchase because it works amazingly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Purchased the mini size to find a new moisturizer and switch up my skin care routine (try some new things). I'm not sure if what I received was a bad batch, but this product smells absolutely putrid and can't use it. SAD!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love biossance! They are clean,gentle and effective!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't get past the smell. Despite holding my breath during application- it still gets you. Had a small breakout within 2 days as well so I definitely won't be purchasing the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer smells like feet. It reeks. Yes, it goes away quickly, but you shouldn't have to hold your breath when putting a product on your face. I've worked my way through some of it but I can't see any noticeable difference from other products I've used, and some of my acne has returned. I don't know if that's a coincidence, but it doesn't matter - it's nothing special, and this needs to really be a miracle product for the smell to be worth it. I wish I could get a refund because it's totally unusable for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes it does smell like a wet dog lol but I prefer that than have it smell good cz of added scent in it. The smell goes away after a few seconds and to me it's worth it Cz i haven't had dry patches on my skin since using the biossance skincare routine. This moisturizer is great for my very dry skin yet doesn't feel heavy and my makeup applies well over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample. It is amazing. It's doing wonders for my complexion. But I only came to review to say the u201cvalueu201d size isn't actually a value!! If you do the math, the 50ml size is only .86u00a2 a ml, while the u201cvalueu201d size is $1.33 a ml.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yep, this smells like spoiled yogurt but dissipates quickly. It is a decent moisturizer and absorbs quickly. I use a high percentage of retinol nightly and sunscreen daily which makes my skin sensitive. This does not irritate my skin. Just wish it felt a bit richer when applying. Overall good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this cream before it was sold in Sephora and when it was $50. It does wonders for my dry skin especially since I live in the desert. I was hesitant to buy when the price went up so I tried other moisturizers and even tried samples of La Mer Creme Radiance and thought I was going to be a La Mer convert because of the experience from the samplesu2026 but La Mer was not hydrating enough for me in this dry spring weather so I turned to this again and fell in love all over.   It does have a scent of raw sugar which I can see some people not liking, but I have never experienced the smell of feet while using this. Try buying directly from Biossance for this cream in particular!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 69 years old.  This is the best moisturizer I have ever used.   I have very sensitive, dry skin. It immediately makes my skin glow and feels moist.  I apply just enough to cover my face and neck which is about the size of a nickel.  Sometimes 2x a day sometimes once depending how my skin feels.  I have gotten into reading the labels to make sure the products I put on my face are clean and this fits the bill.  My daughter uses it too.  She lives in a very dry climate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it I heard such great things about it but I didn't get the hype. I did not like it I don't think it did much for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent texture, gives long-lasting moisture for my very dry skin. I ignored the reviews about half-empty jars as I understand how selling by fluid oz works, but when people say it smells like feet, they're right. It 100% smells like feet. I'll keep using it for winter skin but won't be rebuying.

reviews.review_title: exceptional but the quantity is lacking
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Started off with 15 ml trial size. Instantly fell in love with it. My sensitive skin just loved it. It may seem thick but absorbs well and doesn't leave a film behind. Has a mild scent but weird enough I don't mind it at all and infact like it lol.  One and only con is the quantity you receive. When I bought the 1.7 oz bottle, there was a big air pocket in there. To me that seems like a shady tactic.  Other than this, I really recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried, but couldn't do it. I was drawn to this moisturizer because I believe in clean beauty and the specific ingredients. But the smell, my god, I cannot put that on my face. I had to dispose of the whole jar after just a week. A big disappointment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite winter moisturizer!!! I use this for 6 months out of the year and then switch to a lighter moisturizer for summer (pink cloud by herbivore). My skin was moisturizer without being oily all winter and my fine lines and wrinkles were visibly reduced which was surprising!! Highly highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice moisturizer, but I'm 50/50 on if I will repurchase. It does have a very faint, strange smell. It moisturizes well, but I have used other brands that were just as good and a little more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS STUFF STAANNNKKKK. But it does moisturize very well but I'd rather buy one from YTP for this price & it will smell better

reviews.review_title: Not sure about this one yet.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm still on the fence of whether I love this product or would do without... The cream is thick and definitely moisturizing, but it might be too thick. I do find that this is a bit greasy, however, it layers really well with other products. I find that I have to let the scream absorb for about a minute or two before I apply my SPF and any makeup products. I have been using for about 3 weeks, and it is winter, so I will wait to see if I see any major differences or if the season change affects my opinion. Right now, I would recommend to anyone with severe dryness or as a good cold weather protectant.

reviews.review_title: Cannot get past the putrid smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the concept of all-natural which is why I bought the sample set but, right from the first time I used this cream the smell made my stomach turn. Given how great the other products are from this line it is baffling how rotten this cream smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! I have super dry skin and this has saved it this winter.

reviews.review_title: The odor can knock you over.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample size and noticed the awful odor. Thinking it was just a bad jar, I moved on to the bigger size. It also s bad. When  I contacted the company to ask about this, I was told it is all natural without perfumes but you can mix some of the rose oil to alleviate some of that odor. Rally? I've used unscented natural products before and they have NO odor. Don't tell me is is the smell of the  natural ingredients. Won't be buying this again even if it does moisturize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating. Didn't irritate my skin. I like the thick texture of this moisturizer and a little goes a long way. Coming from someone who has roseca and very sensitive temperamental skin, it's rare I'll find a product that actually works. The scent didn't bother me at all to me it wasn't overpowering like others moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cream! I was super skeptical and took forever to buy it bc of the price point. However, I immediately saw a change in my skin and have already bought a refill. It is so hydrating and leaves my skin plump and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a lot of Biossance products but I was honestly pretty disappointed in this cream. It wasn't bad exactly (it didn't make me break out or get rashy) but it didn't help my skin in any way either. For the price, I'd hoped it would do more, but I've done better with drug store night creams that are a quarter of the price. It also smells like rotting flowers, so there's that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Does Biossance ever read reviews? People are complaining everywhere that this cream STINKS. It smells putrid and spoiled, like sour milk or feet. I was SO disappointed, as I loved the weight and feel of the cream. They either need to recall a huge bad batch, or reformulate the cream. It's expensive and with the millions of other competitors out there that do NOT smell like gym socks, they are losing money. Until I find out it's been reformulated, sadly they are losing mine. Fix this already!!!!

reviews.review_title: Great for my oily skin in the winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This worked wonders on my oily skin in the winter. My face always looked bright and hydrated after using in the morning and night. Might be too thick for summer but will def use again when it gets cold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Did not irritate my sensitive skin.  Great for winter dryness/so moisturizing.  Does not leave greasy residue - skin drinks it right in. Cons:  Smells like a wet dog.  Thankfully, the smell dissipates quickly but it was surprising and unpleasant at first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the ingredients however for me with combination skin, it did not work for me. I rarely have red irritated bumps appear on my skin. I needed something more moisturizing for the cold season and this was too much for my skin. Nothing against the product, just my experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: lovely texture! i've actually bought this stuff twice & had to return it both times. something in this product's ingredient list just clogs my pores like crazy & i found it to not actually be moisturizing enough for my dehydrated skin (especially in the winter :/) a better option for the same price would be the yttp adaptogen cream & you get a bit more product with that one at least!   if this moisturizer works for you im incredibly jealous because the texture & smell of this cream are sooo divine & i would gladly use it for the rest of my life if my skin didn't hate it so much! damnu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very impressed!   I got this in a kit because I wanted to test the Rose Oil. The oil was meh, but the Omega Repair knocked it out of the park. If you have combo to dry skin and especially mature skin, this is an HG. It has beautifully hydrated and plumped my skin for 4 weeks now. I noted reviews about its smell.  I didn't not notice it until I applied the cream without a serum. I use a serum before any moisturizer, but in a hurry recently I just used the Omega without serum.  That is when i noted the smell.  No biggie really, but I can understand the criticism. Apply a serum, any serum, before applying the Omega Repair Creme and it will not smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard such great things about this brand but I found this not at all moisturizing. My skin feels dry and stiff after using it and eventually I even developed a little dry flaky area! :-( I also don't like the smell. I did like the nice thick creamy consistency. Unfortunately just didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating and non-irritating! Does wonders for my dry, sensitive skin.  It is non-greasy and does not pill with other products. Only downside is the smell. It is not too noticeable over the course of the day but distinctive when applying it in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looooooove the omega repair cream!! It's so creamy and luxurious! I have super dry skin and use Tretinoin so my skin is always flaking. I was using other heavy creams/moisturizers and nothing helped until the omega repair cream. I pair it with the Vichy 89 serum and it's like magic. My skin is moisturized, healthy and glowing! I do acknowledge the smell that other people commenting about but it has never bothered me. I don't get moldy feet vibes from it. It's not like a sweet smelling product, but I personally don't hate it. I love this cream and will definitely repurchase when it goes on sale on the Biossance website :)

reviews.review_title: Great cream - no clogged pores or breakouts.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is very rich but has not caused any breakouts on my somewhat sensitive skin.  I recently over-exfoliated my skin and it became irritated, so I used this cream at bedtime and by morning, my skin had calmed down and felt hydrated and super-soft.  I don't ever want to be without Omega Repair now, especially in winter - it's a must-have for cold, dry climates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this skin care line , their steaks and oil are great too , give the Skin hydration and brightness   Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how my skin looks when I use this! It dries nicely and doesn't feel oily or sticky.  Definitely a staple in my skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been using the First Aid Beauty ultra repair cream for years and in the last month my skin was dull, dry and not absorbing the creme.  I decided to give this a try with the small 30ml container and it changed my skin! All my dry patches were gone and my redness from my pre existing acne scars are starting to fade. This has been a miracle worker. The smell is strong but goes unnoticed once you rub in! Worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Saw no difference, distinct unpleasant smell. Fragrance of products, for me at least, is important. Should never be strong m but definitely needs to be at least pleasant. This one is neither. Wouldn't waste $ on this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this! I've been using it every night and most mornings for about a month. I had a few dry patches when I started using it and now my skin looks so happy and beautiful. Combined with my other products my fine lines are reduced. it's great. Reading other reviews, the scent is what bothers most.. while there is a slight scent, it doesn't bother me. it's not strong enough to be bothering, unless you are extra sensitive to scents. it isn't added perfume, so that's a plus. anyway, I love it. will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because my skin has been so dry this winter. Been using it for less than two weeks and haven't had a dry patch since, so it's doing exactly what I need! However, I read reviews before buying about the smell and decided to buy anyways. It literally smells so horrible upon application. I can't even describe it but it is bad. Luckily it goes away after a few seconds, but truly stinks so bad when rubbing it in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i was iffy on buying this because of the reviews about the smell but i really needed something that would help moisturize my skin as it was very dry and flakey so i ended up getting the smaller one to test it. the smell personally doesn't bother me, it's not as bad as some people make it out to be. if you're not hyper sensitive to scents and really just want something to hydrate very dry skin i think it's worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was not a fan and not necessarily cause of the smell but the amount of hydration it provides. I have combo skin with dull skin in the winter so my face isn't like super dry. I anticipated better results from a $58 moisturizer. My cerave cream gives me more moisture. I will go back to my Fresh youth preserve moisturizer which is amazing!!! You will wake up glowing and still hydrated. With this one my face isn't dry when I wake up but it's not glowing. It's not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a great moisturizer for evening. The smell I started to notice near 2/3 way through recent jar. It's very unpleasant. I am considering trying a different evening moisturizer once I'm finished this jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a set. It works really nice, feels good and isn't heavy or greasy. Took a star off for the SMELLLLLL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell didnt bother me but this just didnt perform.  Better options are out there for sensitive, aging skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this awhile ago and used it nightly, but I wasn't sure exactly what it was doing for my face to justify the $$$ so I moved to cerave. I then developed this weird redness on my face and just by fluke I used this moisturizer again for a couple of nights and the redness dissipated by A LOT. Well worth the $$!

reviews.review_title: if you can get oat the smell its good one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I suggest smelling this product before you decide to purchase. To me the smell is a dealbreaker. But if it is not for you then you may love this product! For me I feel that there are plenty of moisturizers out there that are thick and for dry skin that don't smell, not necessarily have a good smell but are at least neutral.   How I use this product. I use this moisturizer day and night. I apply after washing my face, toner, and a serum. Now when I apply this product I take in a deep breath, pat and it into my face, close the jar, step outside of the bathroom, breathe in, and the smell is mostly gone by this point.  The benefits of this moisturizer are getting rid of my dry flaky skin, being really sensitive I've never had the this moisturizer sting my face even after skiing, and a calming effect of the skin.  I won't repurchase because of the smell. I will use the entire tub.

reviews.review_title: Smells like Wet Dog but Works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream smells like a wet dog but works really well.  If you can get past the smell you'll love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great moisturizer can't really say anything else. I bought the jumbo size and will keep coming back for more.

reviews.review_title: Half of the jar was empty!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this until I opened the jar up and half of the content was missing. It seems like this is a common issue. Many previous reviews mentioned the same issue occurring. How do you advertise this cream as a 1.69 Oz and fill the jar only half up, especially when charging $58 a jar?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one is a no for me. Smells like tequila when you first apply, it does dissipate quickly. It is very thick and not in a good way. It feels like you are putting body cream on your face. Feels heavy and sits on top of the skin- doesn't feel like it absorbs. Wayyy better clean moisturizers out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great moisturizing cream! I received it in a set I bought in the winter sale. There is an absolute downside though. It DOES smell disgusting, like dirty feet. I find the smell lingers, even using the rose oil over it. I'm sorry, but feet is not what I want to smell like. I know it's a natural product, but I feel it would be better with a hint of scent, maybe lemon, or rose. I absolutely cannot use this on my face and neck because of the lingering odor. Maybe I'll put it on my feet, but my feet smell better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thick, effective moisturizer. I have extremely dry skin in the winter and this works great for me. I will say the other reviews are correct that it smells a bit when you initially apply, but the smell fades quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. It's hydrating and soothing. It also has really helped calm my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well and a great moisturizer for the winter months! Feels a little heavier so I don't know if I would use in the summer but it made the skin feel great and well moisturized. Gentle ingredients and fragrance free. It does have its own scent which is a little off putting the first few times you put it on but I got used to it and barely noticed it after the first couple of days. It goes away after a few minutes application as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. I have acne, my skin is hypoallergenic. sometimes dry or oily. Most big brands even if they claim to be oil free or noncomedogenic still make my face unhappy.  Not the case with this moisturizer. I put it on under my mineral sunscreen.  People are speaking of an odor. Well I looked at some of the pics of the consistory of the cream. I think the company might have fixed the odor because I smell absolutely no odor and the consistency of my cream looks more firm. Also the odor could have been from the squalene. I think that is what makes this Moisturizer so great though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed. It's perfect for my dry, sensitive skin. For years I've used Belief True Cream and I think I like this product even better. It's deeply moisturizing and soothing. Even in the winter it's the only moisturizer I need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: if you have dry skin this is literally the perfect winter moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am thinking to return. But I see others are noticing a rancid smell also.  Didn't make sense none of their other products have this odor?   Maybe it was a bad batch I'm going to see if I can exchange.  I can't use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have gotten a couple of minis of this and I love it. The consistency is perfect for my combo skin as a night moisturizer. It softens without being greasy and my skin drinks this up. Really helps my barrier because I use actives and tretinoin. It does have the smelly feet smell but I don't mind it. Goes away quickly and I know it's from the natural ingredients. My only issue is I wish they would package this in a tube and it is pricey, but it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Suffered from a compromised moisture barrier due to over exfoliation.  I use this at night and it's great.  Not sure about the smell others mentioned.  Mine smells like nothing.  It's a bit too heavy to wear during the day under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is lightweight and absorbs into my skin quickly; skin doesn't feel oily or tacky after, just hydrated. Can wear it under makeup and it doesn't pill. Would give it 5 stars but it smells absolutely rancid; I hold my breath when applying and the smell doesn't linger on my face after it absorbs, but the smell makes applying the product really unpleasant

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream! I don't notice the scent that everyone else is sayingu2026 it does have some sort of a scent but not in a way that's overpowering or off putting in my opinion. I only use this cream at night as it's a little too heavy for me in the morning with the make up I like to wear but it puts the moisture right back into my skin on these dry winter nights! I wake up with soft skin and no dry patches. Will be buying again :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream but I will have to agree with the other reviews. It has a really bad scent. I am going to finish using it but i wont purchase again because of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick and creamy. it goes on well and my skin was always very moisturized, if not a little greasy without a powder on top.   it did start to smell a little by the time I reached the bottom which weirded me out. but since its unscented maybe that's normal.  Maybe I got an expired one? or maybe I should have kept it in a cooler location...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing moisterizer. It leaves this very cushioned feel to your skin. I love how even and healthy my skin looks. Pretty much skipping vase face makeup because of this this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect moisturizer for my dry skin in winter. I originally got a mini size to try it out, and bought the full size because I liked it so much. I use this as part of my PM skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I saw other comments saying it smells like feet- low and behold, it does. it doesn't bother me much though. it is a thick cream, great for winter skin. I use the vitiman c + rose hip oil and then apply this and it's pretty leaves my face well moisturized and a good base for makeup without piling. I got this as part of the unstoppable glow kit as I really wanted to try Bioessence. I'm not disappointed, but I'm not a die hard fan (yet?) either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as part of the unstoppable glow set. Like many recent reviewers, this moisturizer had a disgusting feet smell, which only developed after a couple weeks. This makes me believe this product had a bad batch. It's unusable to use on my face due to the smell so I'm finishing the container by using it on my hands

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
