reviews.review_text: I purchased the value size on Biossance's website and am unfortunately not a fan of this moisturizer at all. I just cannot get over/used to the god awful smell no matter how many times I've used this now. It smells like feet/body odor or something, I literally have to hold my breath to use it. I'm just trying to get through and finish the jar because of the $$ tag. This moisturizer unfortunately is not moisturizing at all either. My skin feels really dry when I wake up in the morning after using this before bed time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was part of the unstoppable glow kit. I got it for myself since I've read a lot of good thing about it. I really wanted to love this product, but the scent is unbearable. I tried it a few more time to get used to it, but I just could not. It was even worst with the serum!  It is really moisturizing tho. I tried it on a few different moment: - I have a combined skin type and thin skin. Honestly, for me, it made me more oily. That was during the beginning of winter. - Recently, my skin had been going toward a more dry skin type with the colder weather, and so this cream actually didn't create that oily film!   This is why I am giving this product a 3/5... as I can see how this work well on really dry skin - during winter. I still won't use it unless I really need to. :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin, this moisturizer is definitely a dry skin saver. I  love It u2764ufe0f. I will absolutely be using it forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give 2.5 stars only because I was able to purchase it when it was on sale and secured the jumbo size due to hearing the good reviews about how moisturizing it is. It is indeed moisturizing and I wake up to glowing skin after sleeping with it the night before, but as I'm applying it I really cannot stand the smell. It's not even a pleasure scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just had a baby so I went from oily skin to super dry skin. I had no clue what I needed. This hydrated my skin & didn't clog my pores which is what I was looking for. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing but gah I hate the smell. That alone would prevent me from buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always battle with dry skin during the Midwest winters and have been unsuccessful in trying to find a moisturizer that keeps my skin feeling hydrated for more than 10 minutes after I put it on - even when I've resorted to heavier creams. I've been using this biossance moisturizer for about a month now, morning and night, and I can tell that my skin feels and looks so much healthier and hydrated than it ever has before in mid-January. I will be using this regularly from now on. Some people remarked on the smell, but I don't really think the smell is bad or even that strong. You don't smell anything after putting it on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me this moisturizer is perfect. I have normal to dry skin. The smell isn't as bad as most of these reviews make it out to be. It just doesn't have a fake flowery fragrance to cover the scent of the ingredients. Also the smell doesn't linger after putting it on, but the moisture stays all day for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice product super thick and oily--it is a squalane moisturizer so that make sense. I have normal to dry skin Mostly normal skin. Although it is a nice product I wouldn't buy again.

reviews.review_title: super hydrating and lasts without being greasy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating and solved my dry spot areas around my nose and forehead during the winter. The initial smell may throw some off but it is an amazing cream and I am sticking with it! Skin stays hydrated all day without being greasy.

reviews.review_title: For Dry Skin, Not Very Dry
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm living in Colorado during a drought. I'm drinking water and sitting by a humidifier like it's my job lol. I was using this moisturizer at night and have been loving it. It doesn't smell, I'm sensitive to smell and this smells like plain lotion. However, since the climate has become so dry, my dry skin on my nose has started peeling again. I'd still recommend this moisturizer to everyone, it's hydrating and healing. I wake up with firm and fresh skin. But if you live in a dry winter climate, it might not be enough. It isn't for me. I'll have to switch to a heavier moisturizer, but will buy again in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really love the formula and consistency of this moisturizer BUT the smell is so bad! I thought other reviewers were being dramatic when they wrote how awful it smells, but it really does smell gross. It smells so bad/strong (like feet) that I actually hold my breath while applying. I would repurchase but the smell is so pungent that I won't be buying again :(

reviews.review_title: Want to love but the smell!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product in a gift set and wanted to love it for the skin benefits but was just so turned off by the smell - it's really off putting and granted you probably only smell it for about 5 seconds as you're applying it but for that price I would expect a more luxurious or pampering experience - the texture of product is good but the smell makes it something I would not buy again - will stick to my Drunk Elephant Protini moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely recommend this moisturizer for all skin types! I noticed my skin looks smoother and it absorbs into the skin nicely! It does not feel heavy at all! An amazing anti aging cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was indeed moisturizing and did not pill under my foundation. However, it was not moisturizing enough to get rid of my flaky patches. I've seen other reviews about this smelling like feet, but it smelled more like Play-Doh and would disappear after a minute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tres hydratant, belle texture. Cependant, l'odeur est desagreable. Pour cette raison je ne commanderai pas ce produit de nouveau.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is, hands down, the best moisturizer I have ever used. It surpasses Annemarie Borlind, Dr.Hauschka and a whole bunch of others I have tried. Reason being, it fully moisturizes and doesn't leave a sticky or greasy feeling or look. It feels 100% replenishing and I no longer have dry bits or in any way aware of my skin during the day. For reference, I am early 50's, red hair, freckled and love the sun. My skin tends to be on the drier side. I couldn't recommend this more.

reviews.review_title: My go-to night cream in the winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of ceramide-heavy creams and this one is the perfect balance of hydration without the heaviness. The smell is a little strange but it's not too much of a bother. And I love that they've made a bigger size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I appreciate all natural products for my skin, if the ingredients go bad quickly without preservatives, its time to reformulate.  This cream was in a starter set that a Sephora employee talked me into trying.  While the other products are ok, this one has a HORRIBLE odor...like dirty feet or something.  I'm not sure what I can do since it was a set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The feet smell makes me gag and it caused me to breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this when my go to from Clinique was discontinued.  I have very dry skin and it works for that.  When I apply during the day, my face is greasy looking.  For me, will be a night time product, but not during the day.  It does have a bad smell but that doesn't bother me, it fades quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this a couple of months back and just opened it (sealed). The smell is so putrid I cannot use it! I noticed another reviewer on their web site called the odor sour feet! And that's what it smells like to me. Would like my money back. Too afraid to use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this moisturizer. But for the price I can't say it is worth buying again. It feels lovely on the skin. The glass container is sleek. The smell is nice. But it isn't life changing. Great, but not quite sure if I will restock unless if there is a sale or promo going on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with extremely dry and dehydrated skin, I'm constantly on the lookout for an effective moisturizer. This product is incredible - deeply hydrating without being greasy or pore clogging, and just a tiny bit goes a very long way. Doesn't pill under makeup, and doesn't look greasy under sunscreen alone, just glowy. I love that there's no fragrance. Price point is a bit high but I feel like it's efficacious enough to justify. I saw results almost immediately. It's also helped do barrier repair damage control when I've gotten too crazy with acids. Biossance does great little mini sets - def try it out if you can!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect night cream for winter or colder months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have very sensitive skin and easily break out; this cream is very soothing and always leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. It's quite thick, so not ideal for daytime use but perfect for nighttime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of texture to my skin, especially my forehead. I've been using a really expensive murad moisturizer for the past two years, and haven't seen a huge improvement. I picked this up in a Holiday Kit to mix it up. It has changed my skin for the better in just a few uses.  The texture has improved because my skin is SO much more hydrated and plumped. I actually picked up another from being so excited. I have had a couple of pimples, and my skin can feel a little oily in the morning, which is not normal for me, but it is overall so much better, and its still new so hopefully will even out a bit more.   I'm overall super happy and looking forward to using this moving forward!

reviews.review_title: CAREFUL IF YOU HAVE ACNE PRONE SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does clog my pores and makes me break out. One of the first ingredients is u201ccaprylic/capric triglycerideu201d, which is made from combining coconut oil with glycerin. I love using pure cold pressed extra virgin coconut oil to remove my makeup, but when it's on my skin for longer periods of time, such as in a moisturizer, it clogs my pores and breaks me out.  If you have acne, or are prone to breakouts, I would not recommend this. Every time I use it I wake up with bumps, clogged pores and white heads. Doesn't matter what serum I use underneath. I only use this cream on my neck now.  Some people may not have issues with coconut oil in moisturizers, but I wanted to put a warning out there for anyone with skin like mine. It's not a cheap cream so I hope I saved at least one persons skin with this review. Love other products from Biossance but this one is a big no-no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product recently and thought it had already gone bad the moment I opened it because of a rancid, old sweaty gym bag smell. I looked online and realized that this is just how it smells. I buy all unscented products so am used to mild smells from unscented formulationu2026 but this truly smells horrible to the point that I dread using it but am too cheap to stop since it is expensive. It's a nice lotion on the face but I just cannot get past the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So moisturizing without being thick and clogging! ALSO.. Does NOT smell like feet. I guess if you're used to heavily perfumed products, it might be different. I don't use any scented products so it smells fine to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I have been using this for about 10 months now and it's helped with my redness and dry skin. It absorbs so nice and isn't to heavy. It's great for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Perfect winter cream, but smells like feet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very, very rich and moisturizing, which is perfect for me as my face tends to get really dry in the winter.  Like some of the reviews state, the cream has a rather unpleasant/feet-like smell when applied, but dissipates quickly when absorbed in the skin.

reviews.review_title: great for sensitive dry winter skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pleasantly surprised with how beautiful this moisturizer is. It also leave a such a nice glow and is so amazing for dry sensitive skin. I would 100% recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like feet; that has been established. The benefits of this cream, however, far outweigh its fleeting offensive smell. I'm perimenopausal and suffer from hormonal breakouts on my chin and cheeks. Everything clogs my pores right now, but this does not. It has greatly improved the look and texture of my skin. A little goes a long, long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for 3 days and it's a great moisturizer in the winter. My dry skin soaks it all up and it feels so much better. I agree one of the reviews below. The cream does smell like feet. Good thing it goes away quickly. For it does for my skin, I will tolerate the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: Long lasting moisture for my dry skin Lightweight Leaves skin feeling cool and dewy in texture, never sticky Does not pill when layered with skincare (outside of brand) and makeup  Cons:  Smells like feet. I hoped I would be able to get over it over time but I still only breathe through my mouth when applying this. Fortunately, the smell disappears when sunk into the skin / after rubbing in, so it is tolerable. You may think I am being dramatic, but I am a nurse and have had a fair share of awful smells : )  Still 5/5 for me, would recommend and repurchase.

reviews.review_title: good product but smells like bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer feels really good my oily skin. Goes well under makeup to! Took off a star because it smells awful! Like feet almost. I just avoid smelling it and it's all good but I don't think I will repurchase due to the smell.

reviews.review_title: Not for me but could be for you.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you aren't from South Florida and have normal to dry skin I'd recommend this product. But if you are and you have normal to oily skin, then I'd recommend it's sister the squalene + probiotic gel moisturizer. This one i found to be too rich and creamy and would leave my skin too oily especially if I'm running errands. Also I'm not keen on the smell, it's fragrance free but it has a strange smell at first but wears away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by the brand in exchange of my review. Biossance is my favorite my brand, the cream is very moisturizing, good for dry skin. Besides, it does not has any fragrance, so even sensitive skin can use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am seriously obsessed with Biossance products, and this cream is no exception! I really love the lightweight texture. It absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn't leave a tacky feeling like some can. It does have a scent, but it's a very light scent! This makes my skin feel very hydrated and dewy!

reviews.review_title: Sooths Exfoliated Skin, Heals Dry Patches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Squalane + Omega Repair Cream complimentary from Biossance.  This is a rich, buttery moisturizer with an earthy scent that doesn't linger long after application.  It is intensely hydrating without feeling heavy or greasy.  My dry skin loves this cream, especially after using retinol or exfoliating products because it makes my face feel calm and soothed.  Within a week and a half of starting to use this moisturizer, two dry patches on my face were completely healed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love everything about this cream for me to try and it is amazing my face was so soft and the smell was so nice and not too strong I am very sensitive to smells and this was just right I would highly recommend it to everyone

reviews.review_title: great for eczema but smells like sweaty feet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With the weather creeping into winter my skin has become so dry and flaky. My eczema has also been flaring up and nothing seemed to keep my skin hydrated. But after getting this, my skin feels SO hydrated and nourished. It also relieves my eczema and flakiness. But dang! It smells like sweaty feet after a long day or like some kind of foot fungus or athletes foot. I have to hold my breath when applying it. Luckily the smell goes after and it ends up having a play dough scent. I normally am not sensitive to scent but geez. I wouldn't mind a little fragrance or something to balance the smell out lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i tried this moisturizer as part of the whole kit. i love it. it os gentle, redness on my skin is disappearing and it does not feel heavy. sticking to this one now.

reviews.review_title: My oily skin was STILL DRY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a Houston, Texas dry cold weather approved. My skin is oily and this did not provide enough hydration. I've been using it for more than a week and my skin is as dry as a desert. I usually buy only one heavy duty moisturizer once a year, hoping I can return it. Also, it smells like wet feet, it does go away tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted from bioessance. I received this in exchange for my honest review. I received this a couple days ago so I haven't seen any dramatic changes. It's a very nice cream I plan on using it for a few more weeks to see what kind of changes occur with my skin and I can do an updated at that point. Unfortunately in the two days that I've been able to use it it hasn't caused any irritation I do notice I have a more do we look to my skin and I really do like the feel of it. It has no scent and I can I continue I will continue to use it I just haven't gotten a chance to really be able to see any changes. Thank you for letting me use your product and I look forward to getting an update on this particular product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is really nice and thick. I've tried their gel moisturizer before, and this is a much better for thirty winter skin. This one is heavy, and a bit greasy, so it probably wouldn't work for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I really like this, it has a very earthy smell to it, I find it nice. However, I had two samples of it and I kind of broke out. It is very moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best morning/ daytime moisturizer. Lightweight enough and absorbs into skin before makeup! Good to use for skin prep before applying makeup!! Never makes my skin feel dry during the day!! Barely any smell. Love love love! Originally bought this when i was on accutane and my derm approved of it! Have been using ever since!

reviews.review_title: Great for eczema prone skin day and night
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this cream is amazing year round for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Best moisturizer for mature combo sensitive hormone skin! I originally bought this in a kit to try out the product line after discussing my skin issues with a Sephora employee. My t-zone was oilier than ever with dry patches in my u2018mask area'. I saw more fine lines and wrinkles daily. Redness and irritation as well with breakouts worse than my teens. I'm in my 40s for reference. This moisturizer melts into my skin in under a minute. My skin feels an instant relief as I apply with the softest skin texture I have ever had. My skin is balanced throughout the day including my 12-14hr night shifts without requiring blotting my t-zone! My pores are tightening up and my coworkers tell me my skin looks AMAZING! No more itchy, patchy dry skin under my N-95 as well. For me, this is a holy grail product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer feels great and hydrates well. The only negative is that for about 30 seconds, it smells like dirty feet. It goes away quick so I would buy it again because it feels so nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer is thick, rich, buttery smooth and perfect for my dry skin. It is heavier than a regular moisturizer and the texture is more comparable to an overnight mask. The natural scent of the ingredients is a bit unusual but thankfully it dissipates quickly. Since the moisturizer is 100% fragrance free, it is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Squalane + Omega Repair Cream is an amazing nighttime moisturizer and is perfect for the cooler months ahead or anytime your skin needs a moisture boost!

reviews.review_title: Leaves my skin feeling soft and nourished
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If it is possible for a cream to feel u201cextra softu201d then, this cream does.  It glides on so nicely, absorbs immediately, and leaves zero residue.  I apply it liberally at night before bed so my skin can reap the benefits of the fatty acids while I sleep.  My skin is usually on the dry side, but in the morning my face feels soft and hydrated.  This is the first cream that I have used with plant based ingredients that mimic skin's natural cholesterol, which is probably why I don't have any clogged pores after using it! I received this Squalane + Omega Repair Cream from Biossance in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a very rich cream but not greasy at all. I love the texture which give my skin a very nice moisturizing and without feeling over heavy. It makes my skin super soft and doesn't pile with my other skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is great, it is so nourishing and hydrating! I can really feel it making a difference for my combination skin type. My skin looks more clean! I have been using it for day and night routines and i wasn't having any problems. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with this cream! It's thick and rich and just the tiniest bit minty. It takes a little while to rub in, but the payoff face is dewy, soft skin. I can't use this in summer because it's too heavy, but in dry, cold winter, my skin is screaming for hydration. This jar was complimentary from Biossance, but I have purchased several times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am honestly so in love with this amazing moisturizer by biossance. Tye ingredients are amazing no harmful ingredients in it. It felt so nourishing and hydrating on my skin. I havw dry skin and I recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very interested in try all kinds of products from Biossance. And this cream is perfect for my combination skin in the harsh winter at northeast. The ingredients are cruelty free, and hydrated my skin so well. It is smooth like a cloud. Overall i like it very much. And i like every products from Biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is being perfect this cold time of year.  My skin was quite dry.  In a few days I could see a great improvement using this face cream.  I have combination skin, but in the cold my skin gets dry.  This cream is a great help in hydration.  My skin absorbs well and I like the feeling my skin is right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so nourishing and hydrating! I can really feel the Squalane making a difference. It really plumps up my skin! Despite my skin being sensitive, I've had no issues using this in both my day and night routines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given Biossance Squalane+Omega Repair cream in exchange for my honest opinion. It's a thick moisturizing cream that makes my skin feel so hydrated and supple. It comes from a plant derived squalane. It's a clean beauty product so no harmful ingredients included. I love this face cream and believe it could not have come at a better time with winter emerging from the shadows and I live in Ohio so we tend to have many cold days and evenings. This will help to keep my skin happy and moisturized throughout the season and keep me happy not having dry cracked skin. I would definitely recommend and would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is gifted by Biossance for my honest review. I have dry skin and I love this cream! This cream is thick and it's perfect for cold winter. I use this cream both morning and night and my skin feel great and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is incredibly hydrating. I have been using it as a nighttime moisturizer because I have combo skin and prefer something a little lighter for the daytime. I have to say I have really been enjoying it that way! The texture is on the thicker side and it's super moisturizing on my skin. On the nights that I use this, I wake up in the morning looking glowy and my face is so soft. This cream doesn't have the best smell, it's a little funky I will say, but it doesn't linger too long once applied. Since I only use this at night the scent is not a big deal and not a dealbreaker for me. I will be using this throughout the winter months when my skin tends to get dry patches from the cold. I received this cream complimentary from Biossance for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG, I love this cream, I have dry skin during the cold season, this cream does me wonder. My skin feels smooth and looks amazing. It is fragrance free, but it does have a little odd smell. I totally recommend if you have dry skin like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this squalane and omega repair cream. It works great on my combination skin. It is hydrating and very light on the skin. My skin feels softer and deep hydrating. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's one of my favorite face creams. The texture is heavenly. It's thick and super moisturizing. But it's not heavy or grease. The cream deeply hydrates. It works for all skin types. Love that it's fragrance-free.

There has not been a Biossance product that I have tried that I have not loved and this is no different.  I have combination skin and most of the time, with it being extremely dry during the winter.  This moisturizer is extremely hydrating for my skin concerns.   It has helped with my fine lines, elasticity and of course with the dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is rich but non greasy. It soaked into my skin with a gentle applying and it doesn't cause my skin to breakout. A little goes a long way. It makes my skin very soft and my fine lines are less visible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the way this cream makes my face feel so hydrated after use! I have a lot of dry patches of skin and this really does the trick. The cream just feels so luxurious on my skin. There isn't much of a scent at all which is fantastic for me. This has definitely been my favorite part of my nightly routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Biossance! This is one of my favorite face cream for winter season and the gel version is good for summer season. The cream is very moisturizing. The ingredients are safe to use. Even I was pregnant and I was using this brand!

reviews.review_title: Great moisturizer, half empty upon arrival
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. However, I was skimming the top of it with my finger at first but about 2 weeks into use, I dipped my hand in and a big air bubble popped. The moisturizer deflated to be half empty. I really enjoy this product however I don't want to pay $50 for a half full jar:/ I was pretty sad. It is really moisturizing but not worth it at that point. Not sure if I'd buy again anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love everything from Biossance including this moisturizer! I have combination skin but my skin can get dry in the winter. This is just what I need right now and gives me so much moisture! I love how it feels on my skin and it's not oily as well. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice moisturizer! I love squalane and how good it works for my skin. This cream makes my skin very hydrated and soft. It doesn't have any scent and made of clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm super obsessed with this. I love using acids in my routine so I have to balance it out with very nourishing and hydrating ingredients. This has a very smooth cream consistency that melts into the skin. It leaves it very soft and hydrated without feeling greasy. I have more combo skin so I use it at night but I feel like this would be perfect for those with dry skin. Upon reading other reviews my jar came fine. It doesn't have a scent to it at all which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed to receive this product I was in need of getting a good face cream. The smell is good not strong and feels real smooth. Definitely recommend this product for people with dry or combination of skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels fine on the skin, I don't think it's any thing special and definitely not moisturizing enough for my dry to combo skin. It's just sort of basic, I really prefer the plumpness I get from Drunk Elephant's Protini moisturizer. But more than the formula is the smell, I can't get over it. I don't mind non scented products but this smells like something that's gone off or expired and it just grosses me out. Unfortunately I won't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift from Biossance. I have a dry skin. It is a great moisturizer, it felt very gently and rich. My skin feels instantly plumper and really moisturised. It does't leave a sticky residue. I will definitely repurchase. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this repair cream for a couple of days now and I must admit that on day 1 it made my skin feel hydrated. I have very dry skin and as each day passes by I can see my skin is starting to look healthier and more hydrated.  It feels softer and more supple and the dullness is slowly lifting. Can't wait to see how good it looks in a month or more! Very excited! I received this product complimentary from Squalane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Decent moisturizer for nighttime or a day without makeup, as squalane oil leads to an oily cream.  Jar was already very rancid upon opening.  It was so terrible I would hold my breath when I put it on.  That's what you get when you have plant-based oils and no preservatives (olive oil, which this includes, are the worst in my experience).  The oil goes rancid very quickly and smells horrrrrrible.  You would have to gamble to hope you would get a very fresh jar and use it up very quickly, and I don't want to gamble with my money like that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing repair cream deeply moisturize my sensitive skin without  leaving a greasy after feel.  It support skin's natural moisture barriers and I feel very hydrated after using. You have to put in in your palm and then apply it on your face so the texture won't feel that thick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been having some pretty bad eczema breakouts on my hands and eyelids and heard the Squalane in this was helpful. Within 2 days I had a significant improvement, and within a week I was healed up. I've continued to use it daily in both areas, as well as the face wash, and have had only minor flares. Not sure it would work for everyone, but I'm buying my second jar. Worth the price for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream, very rich, only reason it's not 5 stars is the price.

reviews.review_title: you only get half a jar. that's twice this happen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: See the pictures. What's up saying the jar is a certain size for the same previous price but half full. It's the second time this happened. I love the product, but not shady marketing. Hopefully they'll make it right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED. I recently purchased this cream because I suffer from dry skin, AND OMG it's life changing. Since I started using it I've found that my dry patches are gone and over I my face feels more hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with others that it smells like feet lol but the smell doesn't linger it goes away in seconds. I have only been using it for a couple days and I love it. I'm dry around my mouth and a very oily nose so far my dry spots don't turn up and my nose doesn't get super greasy. Curious to see how my nose reacts to it in the summer tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating. Perfect for overnight. Great on my sensitive skin. I don't think it smells like anything and if it does, it's not strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Will never buy another moisturizer again. I use this at night and during the day in the winter. Super hydrating but isn't heavy or oily.

reviews.review_title: Excellent u2014 and the smell is fine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff does a great job of hydrating me all day without shininess and calms my skin down. Other creams leave me feeling tight by midday u2014 not this stuff. I wonder if the complaints about the smell are from those used to highly scented creams; my skin doesn't tolerate those well, and I find this smell very light and not off-putting at all. It's just not going to hit you over the head with a fresh or floral smell. But is scent the main thing you want from your facial moisturizer anyway? I'd rather have the performance. I only wish it was cheaper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself works great, but I had to take stars off because this honestly smells horrible. It smells like feet to me. The product makes my skin feel amazing and hydrated but I really wish it smelled better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like it just sits on my skin. It does actually work and is somewhat moisturizing but feels heavy and sticky for hours after applying. I would say it's similar to F.A.B's most popular moisturizer so if you like that one you may like this. My favorites are Peter Thomas Roth Water Drench, Skinfix Barrier, and Murad nutrient-charged water gel. So if you also like those, this Biossance moisturizer may not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is changing from oily to a combination type so I've been on the search for a suitable moisturizer for at least two years. Needs to be moisturizing enough to withstand Boston's long winter but also not to give me a shine on the forehead in one hour after applying. Almost nothing has passed the test so far except this one and drunk elephant's LaLa.   Honestly I was tempted to give it up on the first try. It smells like putting some kind of seaweed snack on the face. Not exactly disgusting but definitely not refreshing. Now I'm through the 0.5oz trial size and surprised to find it to be very moisturizing and nourishing, but I still cannot get over the smell. Just weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the way this feel and how it work, but CANT get over the smell. It is very hydrating and leaves my skin feeling moisturized without being heavy. I also have sensitive skin and this did not bother it at all. But, the smell is just so bad I will finish what I have and not replace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So hydrating! I'm on accutane and this Has been a lifesaver

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's hydrating, but nothing special if you have very dry skin. It definitely needs help. The smell is a little odd but not strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very acne prone and sensitive skin, and this cream is amazing. It calms any redness and irritation and doesn't break me out. I use it at night and when I wake up my skin looks so bright and refreshed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face lotion is amazing. I previously used Drunk Elephant's Lala Retro face cream but this one is even more hydrating for my dry skin. Doesn't make me too oily for the summer months and perfect for fall/winter/spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a moisturizer for my dry skin especially now that the weather is getting cooler. I bought the mini size that came with the vitamin c rose oil just to try it out before committing to the full size jar. I applied the moisturizer after my serums & then the vitamin c rose oil as the last step in my nighttime routine. I was really impressed by how soft & hydrated my skin felt in the morning. I've tried so many different moisturizers in the past but I don't think I ever remember getting results this good. Also I'm not sensitive to smells & didn't notice an odor as much as other reviews I read. However I took off 1 star because the jar wasn't as full as I thought it should be & there was a big air bubble in the middle. Other than that if you're looking for a moisturizer for dry skin I would definitely recommend giving this one a try. I'm willing to purchase the full size jar because this cream is truly amazing  & hopefully it will be full of product without the air bubbles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry skin, so the fact that this is a heavier moisturizer reallllly helps me. It smells amazing, melts right into my skin, and is the only moisturizer I've ever used for more than 6 months. I ove this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I really like this. I have combination dry skin- oily at my temples and along my jawline with super dry skin in my t-zone. I was using a different night cream, but I live in a place with constantly changing weather that has wreaked havoc on my skin.   I started peeling and got very dry and extremely itchy. I bought this on the recommendation from an in store employee and it offered immediate relief. I've used it for a few days and while a minimal amount of peel is left on my skin, my face feels much more hydrated and quite soft. Yes, there is a little bit of a smell that I really don't like. However, the cream doesn't have much of an odor just sitting in the jar unless you hold it right up to your nose and it goes away within a second or two once it's rubbed in to your skin.   It is ultra rich though, so be prepared when you apply it. For me personally, this is definitely not a cream I would want to apply in the morning under makeup. It's way too heavy. But as a night time treatment, it's really, really good. A little goes a long way with this one. Take the advice from other reviewers and start with a small amount and add more later. Because I haven't used this for long enough, I don't know what it really will do for fine lines and wrinkles, but the significant boost in hydration is definitely enough to warrant five stars, even with the odd smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's an okay moisturizer. You definitely can find one better for the same price. I recommend the Sunday Riley Ice moisturizer instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves your skin looking even and smooth, so it works well in that sense, but it has too much oil in it. My pores are so clogged now. This just sits in them and although my skin looks more hydrated and plump, my pores are so much more visible on my forehead, chin, and nose. I'd stay away if you have combination or oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does it smell a little funky at first? Yes, but all of the pros make you forget that. I have acne rosacea and this moisturizer has helped calm it without causing any flare ups. I've also noticed a visible difference with my little forehead wrinkle line. My skin literally drinks this stuff up and as others said a little goes a long way. In my opinion it is worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: Melts in to skin, little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because I'm looking for clean beauty and need good moisture because I'm also using Rx  that includes Retina-A and Niacinamide. Because Retina-A makes your skin sensitive, I need a cream that's very moisturizing, without feeling oily and doesn't contain added chemicals or irritants.   I will say I'm really impressed, I really like the formula and how it warms and then melts in to the skin.    It appears thick in the jar but once you warm some between  your fingers it glides right onto your skin.  I started with LESS than a pea size amount, warmed between my index fingers and dotted it on to my face.  My suggestion depending on your skin type is to start with less and add more.    I see people have commented about the scent.  I'm recovering from covid and cannot smell anything so to me it's unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as part of a Biossance kit and I can't stand the scent of this. Every time I open the jar to use it I just get and overwhelming scent of rotten eggs! I do not recommend this at all. Sticking with the gel instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic product. It works so well to keep my skin hydrated, especially during the cold Canadian winters. I also use this as an extra moisture barrier on the nights that I am using Retinol. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cream, I actually have extremely oily skin and use this at night lightly to help combat excess oil production. Finding good moisturizers with fatty acids is hard and I know some ppl say this has an awful smell but I feel like they may not be used to fragrance free cosmetics imho. I really love this product to me it has a light undetectable scent and make any skin so soft and appear fuller and plump the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really amazing moisturizer, works well for dry skin and make your skin feel soft and hydrated. But it smells awful, at first I thought that the smell wasn't so bad but after a while I started noticing that the face masks were trapping in the smell. I would totally recommend this moisturizer if you can get over the smell.

reviews.review_title: My skin is so soft and hydrated!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has been by far my most favorite face cream to use at night. Biossance is always worth every single penny. Me and my three best friends all you Biossance, and we are absolutely in love. It keeps my skin very hydrated and soft. I get facials once a month, and my esthetician even raves over my skin and asks about my skincare.

reviews.review_title: Decent Rich Moisturizer, but Awful Smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer is very thick which I'm hoping once dry winter comes around it will truly show it's effectiveness. But due to how thick it is with not a lot of moisture I'm not sure how much is being absorbed into my skin. Also the smell is awful. I appreciate everything this company does, but the smell is just so bad. Will not repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great moisturizer to use during the winter and/or during your nighttime regimen. The consistency is creamy and the cream is very moisturizing. It works very well following a lactic acid serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! I personally love that this cream has no fragrance because I am sensitive (topically). The smell is mild- people who are complaining about the smell would probably be the same people complaining about a cream smelling like perfume. I think it's worth the earthy smell because this moisturizer has brought life to my dry, dull complexion. A Paula's Choice rep recommended this to me and said it was underrated, she was not capping. I would recommend this to anyone with sensitive skin. 10/10!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeee this product so far. I have really dry skin but also have been suffering from acne since Feb 2021. I got this product a few days ago and my bf as noticed a difference in my skin and saying it looked so soft and almost like I had foundation on. I do notice that my skin feels softer. Usually when I wash my face my skin feels so dry and I need to put moisturizer right away, but not with this cream! I can wait a minute or two after washing my face without it feeling dry! My cream doesn't smell at all and I haven't had any breakouts with it other then the breakouts I had before using this cream (hormonal Imbalance). My skin feels moisturized from morning and even till night to the point where I don't have to reapply! AMAZING moisturizer and such a life saver! A little also goes a long way, I apply a thin layer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite moisturizers, alongside the adaptogen deep moisture cream from youth to the people. I use it at bed almost every night with an active serum by is clinical. Soft as a baby. I have tried a LOT of moisturizers and this one feels clean, soft and makes a noticeable difference/feeling in my skin.

reviews.review_title: Great hydration and price, but that smell...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like the feel / weight of this face cream.  I love that it's plant based.  This product hydrates well and keeps my skin feeling smooth without feeling oily.  However, there is an odor that I can't get over.  Not sure how to describe it, other than what my husband calls spoiled playdoh.  It does dissipate after a couple minutes. I really like the product feel and results overall, but unsure if I will purchase it again due to the smell.

reviews.review_title: Relief with one use. Smell not bad at all.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have only used this once (yes once) so I don't know yet if it's going to break me out. I will update if it does; however, I wrecked my very sensitive skin with trying the lactic acid and vitamin c serum in this line (because all of their other products had been working so well on my sensitive, flush prone skin). I threw caution to the wind and I shouldn't have. Lol. My skin is crazy sensitive and I think I wrecked the barrier with those products. One use of this cream has my skin feeling relieved. No more dry, burning sensation and the flushed reaction has calmed down. I don't think it smells much at all and what I do smell is not offensive like others are stating. Maybe something changed? I'm only saying this because the other reviews about smell almost made me not purchase. My experience is it's very neutral smelling without actually smelling much at all. Smells like non-fragranced,  earthy cream which is what my skin needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many moisturizers for my dry skin, this is the only one that doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is fine. I like this brand a lot but I was disappointed with this one. I wish I would have returned it but I missed the cut off to return and had to keep it. It makes my skin look a bit oily, I only use it with my AM skincare not my PM skincare. I won't use it if I have plans outside of the house that day. Too much oil comes through my make up too.  I also hate the smell of it. It smells like old dust or something. No fragrance scent but it doesn't smell good at all. It is a thick cream so a little goes a long way. It's a decent product but I would never purchase it again.  Pros: deeply moisturizing, big jar so it lasts a long time Cons: scent, makes skin oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is underrated. It basically has everything that a good moisturizer requires (i.e., glycerin, sodium hyaluronate, ceramides, etc.) and doesn't contain any questionable ingredients. I especially like that it doesn't contain dimethicone, because despite claims that dimethicones (or other silicones) won't clog pores, I always find that my pores are clogged after prolonged use of such ingredients. I also love that there is no fragrance in this moisturizer, since fragrance is unnecessary and is often an irritant. Although the smell of this moisturizer is unpleasant (it reminds me of manure or a farm?), the scent is not long-lasting and can be easily overlooked given the effectiveness of the product. I have tried SO many different moisturizers and this is the ONLY one that keeps my skin moisturized without inducing breakouts. It also saved my skin when I accidentally over-exfoliated (e.g., retinol/glycolic acid burns). My only issue with the product is that it can be tricky to apply given its thickness and sometimes the jars are not filled enough. But despite these minor inconveniences, I will continue to buy the product on a regular basis, at least until something better comes along.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have it and gel one. Although I love the gel this one Ian not that fan. I feel it on my skin after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. I never do reviews but I just received this jar and there is a big air pocket in the side. I've seen other customers complain about this problem as well. There is not 50ml of product insideu2014 not worth the $$ if you can't fill the jar properly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is great, but I can't get over the smell of it. It's like a glue/play-doh smell that I've noticed in a few different clean beauty and skincare products.

reviews.review_title: Strange, Musty Smell and Lingering Filmy Residue
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just finished a deluxe sample of this. I only use unscented skincare products, so I'm used to that 'ingredient' smell. I brushed off reviews saying it smelled like wet towel, but it REALLY does. It really more smells like socks that have been in wet shoes all day. It does fade quickly, but it's not the best sensory experience.   I found this cream to be fairly light despite the thick texture, and thought it left a little bit of a filmy residue behind- almost like there was too much glycerine and not enough oil. The old formulation of The Ordinary's Natural Moisturizing Factors+HA left a very similar film.  I thought it was okay- it didn't break me out or cause irritation, it didn't leave my skin greasy or too under-moisturized, but it also didn't make my skin look or feel amazing and smelled like wet socks, and Sephora sells a couple of other moisturizers in the price range that I really enjoy, so this is one I'd definitely pass on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this hydrating amazing moisturizer, the only reason I did not give it 5 stars is the scent is a little hard to get used to, other than that it has helped my tired dehydrated skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Primarily bought this because of the clean status on EWG. Overpriced for what it is, but haven't found any comparable products so I keep buying. I think the people in the reviews are being REALLY dramatic about the smell - it never bothered me and I was hesitant to buy it in the first place due to those negative reviews about the smell.

Everyone complaining that this jar arrives half empty is correct based on my experience. Like others, mine arrived with a huge air pocket in the center of the jar and all of the product was clinging to the sides of the jar. I thought it might just be that the jar is large-ish and the neck of the pot contracts quite a bit and a lot of product is hidden under the lip. However, when I finished the jar, I tested the volume capacity of the jar by filling it with 50 mL water. The water came nearly to the brim.  I sent a complaint to Biossance and they brushed me off, saying that sometimes air pockets form and if I tapped the jar gently the product would level out, but because of the volume of the air pocket there was no way the product would have leveled out even to the bottom of the neck, where the thread begins.  This cream is very nice and I have no complaints in that regard, but because the company dismissed my complaint so easily I just won't be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturized my face great didn't leave my face feeling oily I like the overall feel of it, But what I do not recommend is the smell of it is horrible. My boyfriend actually commented that my face smelt like puke, And I can no longer get over now that stuck with me, I can smell it in the container and it does have a terrible smell, Very unfortunate because it feels like a good product but definitely not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great, mid weight moisturizer. Not too heavy and absorbs pretty quickly. Great for drier times. Only reason it's 4 stars is because it smells a bit weird to me. No reason not to buy again though. I enjoy this one more than the gel one from this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SMELLS GROSS. LIKE FEET mixed with some other nasty smell that you can't quite put a name to. I wrote Biossance directly, they insisted it was unscented. I went to a Sephora store to check out the tester and it had the same gosh awful smell. I would so buy it again if not for the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't get over the smell. However, it does feel very nice and moisturizing on face.

reviews.review_title: This product works. Get over the mild smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Synthetic fragrances are bad for your skin.   Those complaining about the smell should look into un-clean beauty companies that use synthetics to cover smells of chemicals. In this cream, essential oils and hydrosols may alter the formula in a negative way rather than just mask the earthy, mild, herbaceous scent in this cream.  This stuff is fantastic. Dramatically different change in my skin after a week. Plump, less wrinkles, less crows' feet, softer skin. Absolutely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very happy to have found a cream that I can use as a night time moisture that's not loaded down with heavy silicone. The smell is a bit weird, but not really as dramatic as some reviews say. This product is rich enough that it helps to curb the itch that comes with retinol, yet it's light enough that I can even use it during the day if for some reason I'm feeling drier than normal. I also like that it's not loaded with random actives, and it's just doing what it says.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream to use during the winter when my skin dries out really badly or a few times a week to rehydrate after retinol. I found that I can't use this daily or it breaks me out. The smell is odd and not my favorite but bearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes there is an initial weird smell but it doesn't linger and I can see how someone who normally enjoys products with scent can be turned off by this. But if you can get pass that initial smell, this is a good basic cream. I have trouble finding moisturizers that doesn't cause breakouts and one is a winner. This absorbs well for me ( combo skin), works well with serums, and keeps my skin moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so sad to write this review because this is the perfect cream...except for its awful smell. The best way to describe the smell is that of dirty feet!! it's particularly unfortunate because I love the texture, I love how moisturizing and non-greasy it is, and most of all, I love that it's clean (it's rated super well on EWG's Skin Deep website). However, the smell is revolting. I am returning it because I cannot imagine continuing to put and smell this product on my face every day. Please, Biossance, reformulate this to address the stink factor and I will be devoted to it forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love everything about this cream, but the smell is so bad that I can't justify repurchasing. Not only does it smell bad in the jar, but the smell lingers when I apply it. I've used other unscented creams before but none smell as bad as this one. If you can get over the smell, this cream is incredibly hydrating and has an amazing consistency. I have sensitive, dry skin and had no issues using it.

reviews.review_title: Nice cream but doesn't smell great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just finished a sample of this product, and I thought it was a decent face cream. A bit too thick for daytime in the summer, but it's great at night. I admit that it doesn't smell nice, but the scent doesn't linger. It absorbed into my skin quickly and didn't feel greasy.

reviews.review_title: Near perfect, wonderfully hydrating, slight smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 4.5 stars  I truly don't understand all the reviews mentioning the smell. If you're used to heavily fragrances products or extremely neutral moisturizers that don't have any oils like Squalane in them then yes, this will smell different.   I'd describe the scent as an intense unscented lotion  there are earthy notes but it honestly just smells like squalane and it's not noticeable at all once you start rubbing it in. I'm highly sensitive to fragrance in products and lingering odors so ai was cautious after reading the reviews but was removed to discover that it works great for me.   PROS:  - thick cream that glides onto skin and absorbs easily - super hydrating and makes my skin look plump and healthy - high-quality glass packaging that can be repurposed  CONS: - packaging. The jar is nice, but I wish this came in a tube or a jar that had a fully open top so it's easier to get out all of the product - for some the smell may be a deal breaker, even if it's brief - no makeup scoop included. For this price the least they could do is include a little plastic scoop to use with the jar.   If you're concerned about the smell, go to a local sephora and open the jar. Try not immediately react, give it a few tries to see if you really dislike it or if it's just unusual. Try it in person for a few days and see if you can live with it as the benefits it provides are just too good to let something small turn you away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A really good moisturizer for night time - thick and creamy but not greasy. I probably wouldn't use this during the day given how thick it is. Skin looked glowing during the days after I used it at night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. As a person with multiple chemical allergies and sensitivities, I am left out of most of the skincare landscape, which is becoming a problem as I age. This product causes no irritations or rashes and makes my skin glow. People I've known for years have been complimenting my complexion since I started using it. Yeah it smells--so what? The smell lasts for a second and disappears. I am extremely sensitive to smells, and I find it not a hindrance at all, especially not for its wonderful benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this. I had heard good things about the brand (and I actually am fond of their lip balm and their eye cream), but I just can't get over the smell of this cream. The formula itself has a nice consistency and I guess is moisturizing (but not as good as cerave), but the smell is so bad. I really wish that I had read reviews before purchasing this cream because apparently I'm not the only one bothered by this. I'm at the point where I'm seriously considering relegating it to be my designated foot cream, but at 58 dollars for 1.7 oz that seems wasteful. Ugh I dread putting it on my face and having to smell it each morning. Awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream smells so bad if I knew that it smelled this bad,  I probably would've not bought it. It works well it's a good cream it just smells so bad. But the smell is only there when I'm putting it on my face after that I can't smell it thank goodness. I wouldn't get it again, there are other creams that work just as good at smell amazing and don't smell like wet dog

reviews.review_title: Great for Very Dry Skin and Barrier Repair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear I've been using this for over a year and never noticed a smell, so all these reviews truly mystify me. I went back and checked and there is a slight smell, but it's so very light, dissipates almost immediately and it's not a bad smell! Honestly, I've been through a few jars of this by now and never would have even noticed a smell if I hadn't read the reviews here.This is what a lot of fragrance-free beauty products smell like.   But performance-wise....I have very dry, sensitive skin and I really like this cream, especially mixed with or layered with a nice oil (the Biossance Squalane or Rose Vit C oil, or Stratia's Fortify oil or Drunk Elephant's or the Ordinary's marula oils are all great.) Or any nice squalane, marula, maracuja, argan, rosehip or jojoba oil would work, too. Also, just use a tiny bit of the oil if you try this method!  Almost removed one star because occasionally this cream can make my skin sting very slightly for a few seconds. Not sure what's in it that does that. It could be because my skin is just that sensitive, or it might be because it contains a small amount of hyaluronic acid (which sometimes makes my skin sting a bit). Only lasts for a few seconds, and the oils buffer it if you use them. And this cream really does seem to heal and hydrate my dry and sensitive skin. It's a great barrier repair cream if used consistently. I'm not inspired to write many reviews, but this cream inspired me. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes it smells, but only for a few seconds! The benefit and change this gives my skin is worth 30 seconds of smell. Background: I used to have extremely oily skin, and then suddenly I turned 29 and it changed to very, very dry. After 30 this spring, my forehead was so dry that if I touched it, flakes of skin would rain down like dandruff. I tried all sorts and they would only keep it at bay for a few hours. I bought this a week and a half ago, and it has changed my face! You only need a little and it has made my skin so smooth, so hydrated, and has improved the redness in my skin - and I noticed this on first use!

reviews.review_title: Helped my combo, acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been waiting until I finished this half way to write a review. I'm in love with this moisturizer! Regarding the smell, I don't think it's as bad as people say in the reviews. I don't even notice it after it absorbs into skin. I have tried Sunday Riley, La Roche Posay, Belif, Kiehl's, etc for my combo, very acne prone skin. This does not break me out at all and keeps me very moisturized throughout the day without it making me too oily. I actually have been wearing a tiny amount of this under my foundation and it still looks and feels great. For night time, it pairs really well with the Biossance Vitamin C Rose oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I did not like this product. It smelt and I didn't notice a difference. I have been using this product as my night cream and I have to say it's amazing. It's very rich and my skin feels so much healthier. It does have a smell but honestly I'd rather have that smell than anything on the market that's scented that's gonna irritate my skin. Btw my Skin type is oily/ dry and I have a lot of redness on my cheeks and pores. This cream helped calm my Skin. Ok

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: literally goes on so nice! makes your skin feels soo nice! but.. it smells so bad! it's something i can deal with, it only smells for a couple of seconds then you can't really smell it. so far it's working great for my skin (i have combo skin- oily t-zone, dry everywhere else)

reviews.review_title: Smells like feet and cause break out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like feet, my husband asked me to check descriptions carefully to make sure it's for face.... The worst is this product breaks me out within 3 days of use. My skin type is combination. I stopped for a few weeks and reused again, break out occurred in 3 days and 7 days later I have to stop use this because the acne on my cheeks are horrible. I stop use this and my acne are gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There I said it. It smells like feet. It's super rich but the smell is to off putting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good product for dry skin! I suffered from dry skin and there's nothing I used that is good than this! Must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product works but it does smell funky for a split second when you apply. Luckily it doesn't linger and goes away immediately. Have used unscented products, and tried items from their other product line, but there is an undeniable smell with this one. If you can live with it, not a bad cream but not great either. Just average for my normal & dry in spring/winter skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination-oily skin but recently my skin has been very dry. I saw this in a Sephora inside Jcpenney for 50% off and figured I'd give it a shot since I've heard a lot of good feedback about biossance line. Now when I tell you that this thing works, this thing worked overnight. The second day I was using it, my skin was back to its usual oily type. I am so happy I tried this product. I might not be using it a lot right now because it's summertime, but will definitely be using it at night and during winter months. Only downside is the smell. It smells awful while applying on your face but it definitely goes away right after application. I'll compare the smell to a jar of fish oil supplement or pool chlorine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's a nice product if you can get passed the smell.  I have no idea what these other reviewers mean by u201cthat's what a product smells like with no fragrance.u201d  That's crazy, bc this products smell is overwhelming so if that's the case they SHOULD add a fragrance to it bc people who are sensitive to scents won't use this anyway lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but the smell is truly awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing but smells funny. May or may not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've searched high and low for moisturizers that are clean but also avoid common allergens (like tree extracts and fragrances). For new users, the smell is what the product smells like because it has no fragrance. I'm on my 4th jar of this and I don't notice the smell anymore.  Very moisturizing, not oily and helping with wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cream in the sample kit. It is the first cream that rivals my Dr. Jart ceramidin cream and is made with clean ingredients. Very hydrating, but stinks quite a bit. I use it as a night cream as it's thick and rich so I don't really care though.

reviews.review_title: My favorite moisturizer for glowing skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has made my skin so soft and so radiant! I have been using it every day for the past 2 months and I can tell my skin has more elasticity. Has definitely helped repair and restore my skin after using too many harsh products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, but based on the video of this product I thought it would help with my rosacea. As soon as I put it on my whole face started stinging. I had to wash it off immediately. This might work for someone with normal skin, but if you have sensitive skin, I wouldn't recommend it.

reviews.review_title: LOVELY results; smells like a dead animal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has NEVER felt as smooth and velvety as when I use this moisturizer at night. It's a real delight. HOWEVER, as many others have said, the smell is truly hideous.
