To me (not to be gross, but), it is vaguely redolent of roadkill. Fortunately, I don't notice the smell even a few minutes after I apply it, so I still use it, but be warned. It's WEIRD.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I accidentally ordered this moisturizer instead of the biossance gel one. Since stores aren't open right now, I decided to give this one a go. Doesn't work any magical wonders for my skin, it's very average. But I can't get over the smell!! It almost smells like rotten beer to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works wonders! Great for those with sensitive or stressed skin. Especially recommend as a night cream. Locks in hydration til morning. Certainly would work as a day moisturizer too if you wanted. Worth the price, a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite moisturizer; it's lightweight but still deeply hydrating which is perfect for my combination skin. There is one small flaw (not even really a flaw): the smell of this drives my cats CRAZY and they will stop at nothing to lick the moisturizer off of my face. So cat owners...maybe don't cuddle your kitties until the moisturizer is totally absorbed.

reviews.review_title: can I give this like 80 stars?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this more than 5 stars, I would. I'd give it all the stars omg. This is honestly imo, the best moisturizer I've ever used. Once I turned 25 my skin got dryer than the Sahara, this moisturizer truly made allll the difference. It's incredibly hydrating, and makes your skin feel baby smooth. I personally think it absorbs pretty well. Idk if I would suggest this for someone who is oily. I think it would absolutely be great for oily skin (when I was oily, I still liked hydration) however if anyone doesn't like something that isn't super quick absorbing, like a gel moisturizer, I probably wouldn't suggest it. But WHEW if you're dry!? GET THIS LIKE YESTERDAY!!! I've been using it for a year and it will absolutely be my go for however long it keeps working for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new favourite moisturizer! My skin always feels so soft and plump after using, I originally got this as a sample and it was so good I had to buy the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream ive used so far. Everyone complains about the smell but that's just what squalane smells like. Ive had dull and acne prone skin prior to using this and now im u2728glowinu2728 i mix it with the ordinary Hyaluronic acid & b5 day and night and during the day i use ilia. 100% recommend esp if ur near 30 or above.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a winter of dry, red, cracked skin followed by a spring break sunburn, my face looked terrible.  This stuff turned everything around.  The skin under my eyes tends to dry up and look flakey all day but that is all a thing of the past.  Soft and refreshing.  Absorbs into my skin so that my makeup no longer looks cracked and cakey.  A huge deal for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so moisturizing it leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth! By far the best I've tried! I keep seeing bad reviews about the smell but I think it smells natural!! People aren't used to natural smelling creams, everything has artificial fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've completely fallen in love with this moisturizer! I have combo-leaning oily skin and I used this AM/PM in the winter, and am continuing to use it  in the PM for the summer. The texture seems quite thick initially, but as you start working it into the skin, it kind of bursts into a more whipped, lightweight consistency. It is so moisturizing, but doesn't cause my acne-prone skin to breakout and leaves it so soft and supple. A little bit goes a long way. As for the scent, this product is fragrance free and to me, it just smells like any other fragrance-free product. After application, the smell is not noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a thicker cream and the consistency is decent. However it doesn't seem to be as moisturizing as other creams I own with similar textures. The dealbreaker for me is the horrible smell. It honestly smells absolutely rancid.

reviews.review_title: Not a full jar, has big hole in the center
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a brand new jar from Sephora store and then when I opened it at home, it is not full, has a large hole in the center, and you can see it is not a full jar, just like someone else also mentioned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this moisturizer would be better for someone with oily/normal skin. I have dry skin and found it to not be moisturizing enough. And either having to apply it twice or use something else to give me much needed moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beware: have used countless skin products including retnoids and more. I used this and my face started burning, redness and itchy. After further research I see a lot of people saying the same. Beware and patch test first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 3rd purchase of the omega repair cream. Does what it promises and leaves my combination skin soft and plump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a lovely rich cream formula, but unfortunately smells so bad I can't finish the jar. Customer service told me it's just the fatty acids in the product, but it's a dealbreaker for me. It smells rancid and you can smell it as you apply it to your face. The gel cream doesn't have this issue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this consistently now and I really enjoy it. It's hydrating without being too heavy and doesn't cause my acne prone skin to breakout. I love that it's fragrance free and has nice ingredients to repair my skin barrier especially if I have over done it with actives. I use it at night and add a couple drops of my  Tata Harper  retinoic oil and I wake up with happy skin and clear skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer. I have dry skin and this product works perfectly. Light weight, not greasy. Makes my skin soft and hydrated for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The only face cream that can save my dry sensitive skin!

Yes, yes, yes! This is so lightweight and moisturizing.  I have incredibly dry skin and I have struggled so hard finding a moisturizer that actually worked for me and kept my skin feeling smooth all day. This totally worked for me.

reviews.review_title: excellent product but it does smell like a wet dog
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry and very sensitive skin. 9/10 things I put on my skin either make me itch or make me breakout. This moisturizer does not bother my skin at all! It is very hydrating and soothing but doesn't feel greasy at all. I would have given this 5 stars but I can't lie, it smells like a wet dog. I only notice the smell for a minute as I'm applying it but it isn't a super pleasant experience. It isn't horrible to the point that I won't use this but it does not smell good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product for my dry and sensitive skin. Very moisturizing without being greasy. I especially like to use this after my retinol to protect my skin barrier. This barely has a smell so don't listen to the other reviews, this is what fragrance free products 'smell' like!

reviews.review_title: Its Nice, just missing a lot of product in jar?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It says clinically proven after 28 days where it shows results of fine lines being diminished, but tbh I don't even think there is 28 days worth of product in this jar. I opened it and there was a giant gaping  hole to the right and it was just missing heaps of product. I don't smell anything off about it and It is moisturizing, but it doesn't leave me dewy, in fact its more matte on me. I like it, but I have not noticed any changes in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! My face was so dry so I bought this in a smaller size and now have purchased the the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. Its a thicker formula, but not greasy at all. It leaves my skin feeling super soft and supple - seriously, sometimes I just like to feel my face a little afterwards it's so nice!! If you have skin that tends towards dryness, I recommend it as both an AM & PM moisturizer - it's my go-to now, though for summertime I might need something lighter (we shall see). Also, as for the smell that other reviewers have mentioned: this product is fragrance free, and to me, the scent of the product is fairly neutral and not at all bothersome. If you're not used to products without the extra fragrance added, I suppose you might not like the mild botanical smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly finicky skin that's perpetually rosacea and eczema prone, so I'm particularly picky about my moisturizers. For reference, I've tried a wide variety of moisturizers, ranging from FAB to Skinfix to Kate Somerville to Belif... I also have a tub of Cerave that I mix with a few drops of squalane if nothing else is working. Not to say that any of the ones I've listed are bad - it's just that this moisturizer works wonders for me! It's definitely a thicker cream but it spreads beautifully and works under sunscreen (though I'm not sure how it would be under makeup). I personally haven't noticed any scent, but I certainly have noticed that my skin isn't dry when I wake up anymore! It is a bit pricy and I'm sure you could find comparable moisturizers at a lower price (like Cerave + squalane), so I'd recommend trying out a sample before going all in. That said, I'll certainly be repurchasing this when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unlike most of the reviews, I did not find the smell of this product repulsive or anything. I didn't really mind it.  The product is nice and thick and very hydrating for my skin, and honestly I really liked that. However, my skin would consistently break out the day after I would use it, which was really disappointing as I really wanted to like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is sooo hydrating. It feels really nice on my face and is a holy grail as someone who uses prescription tretinoin. However, the smell is so bad haha. I've honestly never had a product that smells this bad in my 10yrs of skincare addiction. I bought a big ol jar of this though so I'll be finishing it off. I might consider not buying again because of the smell.

reviews.review_title: Skin absorbs this moisturizer easily & is SOO SOFT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Started with the sample size of this and fell in love! Just ordered the full size jar. It is super absorbent and makes my skin feel silky soft! It has a very light finish so there's no sticky finish after you use it. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: it smells funky but has performed well so far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this today and tried it on my hand real quick and it's been like 3 hrs and that part of my hand is still so smooth! I washed my hands a few times and just finished washing the dishes and I'm pretty impressed! Only putting 4 stars for now because it smells so weird... like I've never smelled anything like that on what I'd consider a luxury product, it may take some getting used too tbh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer works well for my normal/dry skin. I use it in the morning and at night. I have noticed a difference in my skin (moisture and appearance). A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and I love it. I have oily skin but I've learned that if I add moisture to it especially deep moisturizer at night, my skin produces less oil. The screen smoothies on beautifully and sings into my skin. It is a thicker heavier cream so I only use it at night and not under my make up during the daytime. I wake up with soft, dewy skin and less visible lines it does have a funky smell though! There's no smell when I apply it but I sleep with my sheets pulled up around my face and I noticed my top sheet will develop a smell. It's really hard to describe the smell but maybe a little like cheese?? It's definitely not something that would deter me from purchasing it. Overall it's a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is absolutely wonderful and has completely transformed my skin to beautiful smooth and glowing!  Love it and I'm a customer for life!! Use it with the rose oil and lactose acid and vitamin c serum and you will be amazed at the results!! Does not irritate skin at all it's very gentle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the sample in this, it worked really well on acne and it is very hydrating. It reduced blemishing and redness on the face. Definitely will be buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was plumped up my skin sooo much. It's dewy, glowing and hydrated. I love the smell it's a light creamy smell. Not as thick as I thought it would be but this lightweight cream does wonders. 4 stars because I wish it was cheaper but 5 because I will continue to purchase despite price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight yet ultra hydrating. Sits perfectly under makeup and other products. I like this product better than others I've tried by far.

reviews.review_title: Fabulous lotion - I hope you can hold your breath
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream works so well. It has transformed my skin. I use it at night and it moisturizes my dry, parched skin. I would give it 5 stars if not for the smell. What on earth is wrong with it? It smells like moldy play-doh that someone stomped in with their sweaty feet. I am super sensitive to smell and this one is just.....BLECH. I have perfected my application technique so I don't smell. Take a deep breath and hold it in, apply quickly, then immediately apply the rose serum before breathing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used 100 points to get a deluxe sample of this before committing to the full size and I like how rich it is for night.  It absorbs well into my skin, but the thing that prevents me from giving it 5 stars is that it smells like Cheetos and makes me want to eat Cheetos every time I put this on my face.  So I'm not quite sure I will be buying the full size just yet. Maybe when winter comes around I will because this is a little rich for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This feels so amazing on dry skin. I don't get the bad smell everyone's talking about. It has a smell, sure but it's not terrible the way everyone says it is. Anyway it feels super luxurious on the face and super hydrating . I have extremely dry skin and this is the only one I've found so far that I can put over my flaky irritated skin from using retin a . I love it and will continue to repurchase over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this cream upon recommendation in-store. I needed something more hydrating that could target my neck wrinkles from years of looking at my phone. It is good, but I wouldn't swear by it. It is quite hydrating and isn't sticky or oily, but the smell is awful. I also haven't seen any real changes in my neck and I am almost done the jar. May not get again.

reviews.review_title: Won't repurchase, cheaper ones out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, I don't love it. Good as a nightcream. I wake up with my face feeling soft and fresh looking. However it is a little to thick and weirdly slipery to use under makeup as an everyday moisturiser. I would recommend it if you have really really dry skin that needs special care. I gave it 4 stars because of the ingredients, results and the fact that it is clean. But I have to admit I would not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I'm so glad I did. I have not been loyal to a moisturizer because I'm trying to find one that keeps me soft primarily and then also buffs out fine lines and wrinkles. I also have this breakout patch on my forehead that the serums finally have worked on. This moisturizer is a perfect weight. It's not really heavy and not too light. I could see using this every season. I had to write a review though because I saw some people commenting on the scent, which I though was odd. There really not a strong scent to this. There is a scent, but nothing I found offensive to the point I'd write a negative review about it. I'll definitely buy the full size jar

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic facial moisturizer! After trying to use retinol again, without any success because it burns my skin  leaving it red, flaky and painful.  I needed a cream moisturizer that was soothing and moisturizing.  This along with the serum from Bioessance my skin has improved so much and feels and looks amazing.  Fine lines are less visible, my skin is more even toned and my skin is more supple.    Smell isn't great but the results are worth it!  Will buy again and again!

reviews.review_title: Perfect PM moisturizer for combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't mind the smell of it as it wont lingers. I have combination - acne prone skin and this moisturizer works perfect for my PM routine as i tend to dry out in the evening. I'm on my 2nd tube now, the only reason i don't give 5 stars is the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect face cream for winter months or dry environments. I'm prone to breaking out from just about anything that I apply to my face - with the exception of Biossance products. I love to apply this at night because I wake up looking completely hydrated, plus it smooths away fine lines. Best part is that my skin has zero reaction. I haven't noticed a weird smell, personally, and I always need to make sure my face lotions are fragrance free because of how sensitive my skin is. This checks all of my boxes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a great scent but I don't smell it once it is on my face. It is just ok- not sure if I can justify repurchasing at the current price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone is being super dramatic about the smell!!! Please do not let that deter you from buying this !! This lotion has worked wonders for my dry skin. I love it because it is really hydrating and absorbs into my skin fast. Doesn't leave it greasy or anything. Great for sensitive skin

reviews.review_title: jalapeno cheddar chips from old dutch!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream's texture is lovely. it is light but thic at the same time, almost whipped like. I have combo dry sensitive skin and found this cream to be deeply hydrating, soothing, and keeps my skin supple and firm. Ive tried it for AM and PM routine and both results were lovely. To be honest I was quite surprised at how well it worked for my skin.  I did take off one start due to the smell. When you melt it in between you fingers and initially put it on it smells like the jalapeno cheddar chips from old dutch LOL the smell goes away  after ~3 seconds but while you massage it in the smell is definitely that! and then goes away. I just dont breathe for the first few seconds and then im good haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample in the lunar new year bundle.  I had high hopes and it works as a good moisturizer if you can get past the initial shock of the smell.  I'm so glad it's a small tub that I got for free because if I had to use this every day I would have returned it.  The smell is so off putting that it literally is the most noticeable thing about this product.

reviews.review_title: one star off for the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like something burnt, but I like the texture. Given its price point it's a pretty good product.  I use it as a day cream and it's moisturizing enough for my dry skin without feeling sticky or peeling off. I use it with biossance's vitamin C serum and think they make a good combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this cream, but sadly it is not for me. As mentioned by multiple other reviewers, the smell is odd - to me it smells greasy. I have sensitive skin and unfortunately this cream made me break out. I was using it as a night cream and would wake up with blemishes every morning after using it. A real bummer as I love the Biossance eye cream and was hoping to have a magical skin duo with this repair cream added to my routine. I was only able to withstand it for a couple of uses. I will likely give it to my mother who's in her 50's and hope it works better for her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample twice & It's been three weeks that I am using this moisturizer. I only use it at night time & in the morning I wake up with glowing,healthy & soft skin. I found it alittle too oily for my combo skin in day time.The only thing is the weird parmesan cheesey smell .It goes away immediately after applying on the skin but I have to stop breathing for afw moments .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best moisturizers I've ever used. It was the only thing I changed in my routine when I tried it and most of my started to clear that day. I am definitely going to purchase and continue to use this and I would highly, highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this! Rich cream that doesn't clog pores! This is a great cream for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face cream!! I've been using it for probably a year now and my skin has never been better. During dry winter months this cream helps my skin stay moisturized and holds the moisture in all day! No flaking skin anymore! It's not greasy and goes on smoothly. It's also helped my skin from drying out underneath a face mask all day. Best investment for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: This makes my face so soft! I started tretinoin and this is the only product that moisturizes my face enough that it stops flaking.  I don't understand the bad smell reviews.  I'm glad there's not a lot of fragrance chemicals in it. This product is so worth it!

reviews.review_title: Rash on cheeks, but nice hand cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product because it's so clean, but it doesn't agree with my skin. Other Biossance products work well for me, especially the plain Squalane oil, but this one gives my sensitive skin a rash on my cheeks. I know many people complain about the smell, and I will admit it doesn't have the best fragrance when you open the jar, but it goes away almost immediately after you apply it, so I don't think that's a big drawback. I've decided to use this on my hands and it has become one of my favorite hand creams! My hands are smooth and soft in the morning after applying at night before bed. I'm giving 2 stars because I wasn't expecting a negative reaction on my face, but the rash goes away as soon as I stop using it so it can't be that bad. If you don't have super sensitive skin like me, then you may love this, so it's worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this cream. I have a dry combination skin. Well, it moisturizes well and skin feels soft but I just can't get past the unpleasant smell. I'm wondering how a lot of people do not notice the smell. The smell doesn't stay on skin, but I couldn't use it any more. Like some of the reviewers said, it smells like stinky feet. It's too expensive to waste it, so I'm using it on my hands and feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't even remember how many times I've already repurchased this. The product is hands down one of THE best I've ever used and I'm not exaggerating. I've used plenty in the past but this one is amazing. And I barely ever leave a review.  Amazing ingredients no fragrance (I don't get why some are complaining about the smell it's not bad at all, just smells like a normal non scented smell). Fragrance can't irritated your skin over time anyway. It goes on so smooth, it absorbs well and leaves skin glowing without being greasy. It's hard to find a moisturizing that actually moisturizes your skin and I say this because this product is the only one that's ever helped within top 2-3 days after using tretinoin and getting flaky skin. Now I just use this and then tretinoin on top as my skin can't take retinol without drying out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing moisturizer! I have combination skin, sometimes very dry and I can use this day and night. I love that it's fragrance free with clean ingredients. Great for anyone with sensitive skin (everything breaks me out.) Also doesn't disturb my makeup.

reviews.review_title: Great clean option for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good heavy moisturizer for very dry skin. It was a saving grace every night during the first month of adjusting to tretinoin cream - it repaired the dry flakiness. It doesn't aggravate sensitive skin. I'll be purchasing it again in the fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves this. Great moisturizer and protection to use with actives. The smell is just a neutral unfragranced cream smell, people going a bit over board with the scent descriptions...

Absolutely love this cream! Received it as a sample and will for sure be buying the large jar. I have combo skin so I only use a cream when my skin is thirsty boy this stuff does the trick! It feels silky smooth when I apply it and absorbs perfectly in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It didn't do much for my skin but it doesn't cause any irritation. If you're using retinol and need a moisturizer that doesn't irritate your skin, use this. Too expensive though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it since the first use!!! The texture its amazing! My face was craving for repair! Its not heavy and my skin absorbes it very well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wish I did not waste my money on this!!! Did nothing for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible scent. It's a nourishing cream but the scent smells like spoiled yogurt. It's very difficult to get past the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This is such an amazing luxurious moisturizer. It honestly goes on like buttery velvet and sinks in quickly leaving skin soft smooth and hydrating without greasiness. I do 4 dots one on the forehead two on the cheeks and one on the chin and rub it all in so that it's even. I was worried when I used this because I have very acne prone skin and my skin breaks out often when I try new moisturizers but I've used this over 2 weeks and I have no new acne! So is say if you're nervous about using a thicker cream I'd say this one is a safe one for us acne babes! I was nervous because of the u201cShea butteru201d ingredient but just trust me this is the good good. Also it will probably last you your entire mortal life you need so little. So the price actually is justified for me. If you're on the fence this is me telling you through the screen this is the beat moisturizer I've ever used and a good moisturizer makes a big difference to your moisturizer skin barrier. And I use a lot of exfoliating products I need to protect it well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! Super moisturizing and gives my skin a nice glow without feeling too thick or greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new staple night cream! Feels hydrating but not overly thick on the skin. Scent is light. Worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin with dry sensitive patches around my nose and mouth. This cream has calmed those areas so well! This is a thick cream and has a nice thick feel on the skin. It sinks in but there will be an emollient feeling on the skin, almost as if you used a facial oil. I personally love this feeling and I like the way it looks. I can see how the next person might not. I love this for my sensitive skin but it might be thick for someone who isn't necessarily dry. As for the smell, yes it does have a faint smell, like feet. It is faint though and it dissipates. I can see how the smell can turn someone off but it doesn't bother me. The benefits to my skin far out weigh the subtle smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like so many others, I ignored the comments about smell, wondering how bad it could really be. Well this smells like a combination of feet, dry ramen noodles, and vomit. It also felt super oily on my face and made my face look super greasy. I got a sample size with my points so luckily I didn't pay for it, and I'm going to continue to use it up on my neck where I can't smell it because I don't like wasting product. But I'd never buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, aging, combination skin. Quite the combo. This cream us nourishing, but not greasy. I've tried so many creams and this is the best so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this cream has no scent. It's a thick cream but works well with my dry skin. It's good for the winter months or at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well worth the price! I smooth this on my face, neck, and decolletage areas every night after toner and serums. Skin is plumper, smoother, and wrinkles are lessening, too. Instant gratification plus long-term resultsu2014win win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first more u201cbougieu201d price point moisturizer.  I was hesitant to spend the money but I'm glad I did! My skin is extremely dry and I was previously having to layer more than a few product to feel like my face was hydrated and protected. This luxurious cream took care of it all. Will definitely be buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has really helped with my comedonal acne. The smell isn't bad at all either. I am super disappointed it hasn't been back in stock every time I check Sephora. Im almost all out and am in desperate need of more. No other moisturizer has been as good for my face. The moisturizing effect also lasts which is important for me because I get dry skin a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ran out of my SKII and instead of buying another $235 cream, i decided to give this a try. Wow- what an amazing moisturizer. It was truly luxe and my skin looked amazing and dewy afterwards. Great quality product and the price is an added benefit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels amazing on my skin, I received the sample and I will be purchasing full size! Doesn't make me oily just gives a healthy glow! Perfect cream for after use of retinoids.  Please do not add scent, I don't know what other reviews are talking about an unpleasant scent. I don't smell anything bad, A good cream shouldn't have scent!
It's ok just a cream. It really doesn't being anything to the table. I would buy it again. It's not bad it's just not good. Hope it helps

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the texture of the cream, it's not greasy. It feels light on the skin even though it feels like a thick cream but I don't love the smell. At first I thought it might have been off but having read the reviews I realized it seems to be the common complaint. To me it's smells like feet or a gym bag. Thankfully for me it doesn't hover too long. Won't buy again for this reason. Putting scent aside, overall it's okay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels good on my skin, nice and creamy but not a greasy feeling. It doesn't smell that great but it doesn't smell that bad either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get where reviewers are coming from about the smell, but I think they a little overkill. For me, it's really hard to find moisturizers without unnecessary fragrances. I have sensitive skin so this is very appreciated. This moisturizer has worked great. I use it at night. Thick but not too heavy, never leaves me feeling greasy. I'm really liking a lot Biossance products. Good ingredients. Totally recommend.

reviews.review_title: Saved my skin while using retinol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only moisturiser that's been able to properly hydrate my skin after I started retinol. It's full of simple and effective ingredients like Squalane, Shea Butter and Ceramides without anything unnecessary. I'm surprised to see that many people dislike the smell. I personally found it very forgettable and not distracting at all. It smells like a standard product without artificial or natural fragrance, plus the smell goes away pretty quickly. I've tried lots of products both in the drug store and high end but this moisturiser is really what does it for me especially because I use potent actives. A little also goes a long way so the price isn't too bad when that's factored in. Will definitely be repurchasing

reviews.review_title: Horrid smell. Please add some essential oils.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The reviews are consistent- good moisture- horrible smell. Thankfully I just got a sample. To me the odor was like dirty underwear. Truly terrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had to go wash it off my face. It smells like vomit and I kept getting whiffs. Never again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this cream a 3/5 because it was smooth and gentle on my skin but it smells like cardboard.
Love the brand and overall really liked this product but I had to knock off a star for the odour. Unfortunately I couldn't continue using it for this reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product since I have liked o the Biossance products in the past. It's rich feeling and does feel like it does a great job of moisturizing and smoothing out fine lines. That being said, it does have a bit of a funky odor - not terrible but not pleasing either. Would not recommend this for those who are sensitive to scent. If you're not, then it should be fine. The smell is the difference between 3 or 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always wanted to try this moisturizer but it was never in my budget. I was able to use my insider points to get a free mini size recently, and I'm glad I did because there is no way I would ever spend $75 CAD on this product. It's a good moisturizer for sure, but it doesn't do anything more than any other cream with ceramides from more affordable or drugstore brands. While I appreciate it is fragrance-free, the smell was very off putting (it kind of reminded me of soy sauce, but if it were fermented? didn't like it at all). This moisturizer definitely works, but the cons outweigh the pros for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have super dry skin, this is great. It's fragrance free and feels instantly nourishing on the skin. It's definitely pricey though. If you can't afford it there are cheaper alternatives that will do the job. But if you want to splurge on something nice, this is very nourishing without any irritating ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a solid moisturizer. Smells exactly like every lotion or cream that don't have fragrance. Not my favorite of all time, but does the job well for the price. My only complaint is it doesn't work well under makeup. Doesn't quite soak in enough. Its not as thick as tatcha but also not as silky as algenist. It's Best as a night time moisturizer, IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best for stressed skin to help with recovery. I stopped using other products and only use this am and pm for a week and my skin looks and feels so much healthier and the texture has also improved. I love the texture of this cream, it melts into some kind of watery gel texture upon application on skin. It takes a little bit to absorb, around 5 minutes, so in the morning, I would wait around 10 minutes to apply sunscreen and then foundation. This is the best product from Biossance in my opinion, I used the probiotic gel before and I wasn't impressed with it. I am oily and my skin is loving this. It does help with my oiliness as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream smells terrible- like rancid wax. I hated putting something that smelled so bad on my face. It goes on thick but left my face very greasy. I felt like I needed to wash my face after a few hours. Will not finish this product. If you want a u201ccleanu201d moisturizer, I recommend the CeraVe night cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS CREAM! It just feels great on the face and really does the job to moisturize without the greasy feeling to it.

reviews.review_title: Brought my skin back to life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This managed to bring my skin back to life after a face mask wrecked it. My skin was red, cracked, peeling, and uncomfortable. To help restore it to its natural state, I used this along with a mild cleanser, and was back to normal in just a few days.

reviews.review_title: Actually works which should your EOD priority
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For about 45 days I have been using this at night along with the biossance SPF in the morning and have truly seen a difference in my skin. My skin looks hydrated and plump vs. typically dull and dry. Quite shocked to hear people say they dislike the smell... get rid of the mindset your facial products should smell like flowers and candy. I LOVE that it doesn't have a strong fragrance because I know it's made with real and clean ingredients that my skin can full benefit from

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this after I apply my retinol cream and it's so hydrating. I've tried other creams from drunk elephant and cerave but nothing makes my skin feel so soft. I wake up with my skin still smooth.  Everyone is complaining about smell, but I really didn't smell anything.

reviews.review_title: not hydrating enough and caused breakouts
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not for acne-prone skin or oily skin  Not hydrating enough, skin became greasy only after a few hours and I had some breakouts at the end of the day, I didn't see any other benefits either, not sure why there's so much hype around this product

reviews.review_title: Best winter and post tretinoin cream moisturize!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, with more dry in winter and more oily in summer. This moisturizer has been a lifesaver for me. I apply it at night and next morning my skin looks so radiant and supple, especially during winter. It has a very smooth texture that just glides into my skin. It's very moisturizing and my skin feels soft and supple without the greasy feeling.    This is my go to for winter and I also use this moisturizer after I apply tretinoin. I usually wait 30 minutes after applying tretinoin. Before using this moisturizer, I would have irritated and peeling around my lip and chin area. But ever since I started using this, I don't have any side effects of tretinoin.   After applying this moisturizer, I put Hibiscus Unspottable Correcting Oil to lock in all the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: okay so the smell isnt great. I'll admit but after using this at night for a few weeks every night i saw improvement. My skin has been going through just about everything. Using different things to combat my acne, acne scaring and dark spots was stripping my skin of the other things it needs. My sensitive acne prone skin has not been so moisturized in such a long time. My advice hold your breath if you dont like the smell. The smell does NOT sit on the skin for long so its worth it as a night-time cream and i definitely see it repairing as it suggests.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and I love how hydrating this is. I get compliments on my skin every time I put this stuff on. It does have a not so great scent to it but for someone who does not like fragrances or essential oils in my product I can appreciate that no fragrance may equal an unpleasant smell but it goes away so quickly so doesn't bother me. It does leave a dewy finish that some people may label greasy but I enjoy the look and feel. My go to moisturizer !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is nice, but the smell isn't for me. It's not strong, but when I was applying it it made me uncomfy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I literally made this account so I could post a review on this cream. THERE IS NO SMELL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product. I get dry skin near my mouth and chin and it really helped

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been on Accutane for 7+ months and this cream has kept my face and neck moisturized even thru winter. I've tried other lotions and creams including Cerave, but my skin feels tight after a couple hours. I was using this cream before Accutane, but I am so impressed how it's working for my face while on Accutane. Due to the cost I purchase when there are discount promos, either thru Sephora or Biossance. I don't notice a scent with this product even though many reviewers have. I apply this cream morning and night after using a hyaluronic acid serum+thermal water or hyaluronic mist. With this combo I don't have to layer Aquaphor at night. I recommend this cream to anyone who's focus is moisturizing their face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so in love with this moisturizer! I'm so picky about moisturizers because my skin is so weird. I'm 36, have combination skin leaning more to the dry side, get a few break outs and flare ups that last forever on my chin and forehead and use prescription retinol that drys my out a bit more. I've only used this in the winter so far but I think it'll be my all year nightly moisturizer. I was going through an especially hard time with my skin when I started this. I had upped my retinol a bit causing dryness and wearing face masks has been causing extra chin and jaw breakouts. I started using this at night as my last step in my skin care routine and it has totally healed and hydrated my skin after just a few days. My skin feels smoother, more hydrated, plumper and my breakouts are disappearing (not for this but from finding a moisturizer that works with my acne medication). I'm so happy I finally tried this! I noticed the very very faintest smell when first applying but people in the reviews are being extremely DRAMATIC about the scent. I'm really sensitive to scents and this has almost no scent to it. There is the faintest lightest scent that is from the actual active ingredients of the product that are helping your skin. The thing is Biossance didn't add any harsh fragrances or chemicals that are terrible for your skin to try to entice you into trying the product...we should all prefer this to smelling like vanilla while damaging our skin. Thank you Biossance for always using safe, effective, cruelty free and sustainable ingredients only!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample...LOVED IT!!  Bought a full size.  I have very sensitive skin and this cream did not make it break out or react.  Quite the opposite.  It left my skin very velvety.  I dont mind the smell at all.  I will certainly buy again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much. I find it very hydrating without overwhelming my skin with heavy/pore-clogging product. It is also great for sensitive skin; my skin always felt softer and appeared less inflamed after using this. I even applied it to an irritated patch of skin on my wrist and this product helped to soothe it. I also love the ingredients and the fact that Biossance is so picky about what they put into their products. I could complain about having to put my fingers into the jar but I love the product too much for that to influence future purchases.  I also had my mom try this (late 40's) and she also noticed an almost immediate difference in the texture of her skin; she directly commented on the softness and hydration. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been dealing with very dry/rough skin during pregnancy and this made my skin feel much better/softer after 2 days of use morning and night. It definitely smells bad, but luckily dissipates quickly. I didn't want to remove a star since the product itself is so effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got 2 samples of this and I really wanted to love it. After one week: Most people here talk about the smell, but I didn't really notice anything. What I did notice is that it does not sink into the skin, it just sits thereu2014 like at some point throughout the day I would touch my face when I had not put on make up for the day and I would feel it on my skin in the afternoon still just sitting there, grease box slick feel. For the first time in a year I broke out with little tiny white heads in places where I don't ever break out. For that reason I rated it poorly and I will go back to Caudalie all day. Never should've switched. I am now reluctant to try other products from the brand. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really glad I just got a mini of this because I can't stand the smell. I don't know that it's a truly bad smell, but it's off-putting to me. It's kind of like stale chips or something, kind of salty and oily. It does a decent job on my skin, but I wanted to see if it compared to the Tatcha Dewy Cream (which I love but don't love the price and added fragrance) and I wouldn't say it works better and the experience is definitely less pleasant, so I think I'll keep looking for my holy grail cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made my skin feel amazing and didn't make me breakout. It can feel a little oily, so I use it as a night cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found as far as the smell goes, that if you warm it up in your hands the smell disappears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is horrible, it makes you gag. If I could even move past the smell, I wasn't anything amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this moisturizer!! my cheeks are really dry and my t zone is oily. this is nice and thick but absorbs quickly and doesn't feel greasy. it makes my skin feel plump and velvety.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial size of this, and while it feels very hydrating it smells SO BAD I could never get the full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ignore the reviews about a u201cbad smellu201d! This product has no fragrance which is amazing for the skin and it doesn't smell bad, in fact it barely has a scent at all.... nor does the scent linger after the product is absorbed. I've had literally no irritation at all despite having dry, acne prone and sometimes sensitive skin. I have seen wonderful results with steady use over the past 6 weeks with twice daily use. My skin feels and stays more hydrated throughout the day which is a huge game changer for anyone going through harsh and dry winters. Although this doesn't have an advertised u201cplumpingu201d affect, I am still noticing overall more plump skin, and it may be that it is just hydrating me SO effectively. Lastly, it absorbs quickly and layers easily, so you don't have to worry about putting sunscreen or anything else on top. If you need a scent, just layer their vitamin C and rose oil right overtop of it, they combine quite nicely and make my skin so so soft because they also both have squalene. I just HAD to write a good review because it's ludicrous that the overall rating has been dragged down over a smell..... this is a moisturizer not a perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a prepackaged sample. Biggest con is the smell. Smells like protein and farts. However the scent doesn't last long. On the skin, it feels moisturizing, slightly oily. But not moisturizing/life changing enough for me to buy this. Better off with Cerave Night cream. Appreciate its clean formula though, so i know why they wouldn't mask the smell of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail product. I spare no expense on my skin and this is better than the product my dermatologist recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely moisturizer. Skin feels hydrated and calm after use. That said, it says it's unscented but there definitely is a smell. Unfortunately to me it smells like your fingers after eating Cheetos. No other way to describe it lol. Not sure if I'll rebuy this product for that reason alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: An absolute miracle product. I have suffered with mild eczema on my face for years. It often made applying foundation annoying because it would never look smooth even with primer. Instantly after using this product my skin felt so hydrated and smooth. Two days of use to dry skin patches gone! I cant live without this now!  Picture taken with no makeup and no filters.

reviews.review_title: Best moisturizer I ever used, smells weird though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot tell you how much healthier this moisturizer made my face feel. It is light and non-greasy, and hydrates your skin like nothing I've used before. I have an acne-prone face (it's pretty persistent) and this shockingly didn't break me out. I would give it 5 stars, BUT after using two samples and getting a full size, I gotta say...this stuff smells a little funky. I can hack it, because I truly love the results, but I can understand the smell putting people off. Still. I will continue to recommend this moisturizer to everyone I know. Regardless of how it smells, it makes your skin so plump and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have oily skin, I wouldnt recommend it. The texture is too creamy for me, and doesnt leave a good sensation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty unimpressive for the price point. My face felt very dry after using it overnight. I will be returning to the FAB repair cream instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This really does smell like feet. I initially ignored the reviews about the smell because I thought I could probably deal with it if it worked well enough. Not only did the smell linger for about 20 minutes after application, the cream ended up breaking me out as well. Unfortunately, this one had to go back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Heard about Biossance Squalene from a Youtuber and LOVE that fact that this is fragrance free. You certainly tell because all you smell when you put it on is the cream/chemicals in the cream which is weird to get used to but I know I'm putting clean ingredients on my face. I use this as part of my night time routine and do believe it has improved my skin - I have acne prone/combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best moisturizer. I have sensitive, dry, acne prone skin. I struggle with face products. This brand in general is magical but this product in particular is glorious and well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tends to get dehydrated and dry during winter months, stressful times, etc. etc. And this cream is rich enough to set me back to my default normal skin state. It feels luxurious, and when it dries, or settles rather, my skin feels soft and plump. It does not leave tacky feeling as if it dried on top of your skin rather than it sunk into dermal layers. Really impressed! I keep going back to it again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My obsession, this has really been helping my winter dry skin. I know people complain about the smell (& honestly it doesn't smell great) but I'm really happy to find a high quality and pretty luxurious face cream that's fragrance-free. It's well worth the few moments of less than beautiful scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was amazed at how much  better my skin looked.  Especially my neck!  But I can't give it the last star because the smell is stinky. I will probably still buy it in the full size because my skins looks so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great inclusive moisturizer that is easy to spread. Gentle nature scent, will buy again. Can top this off with a thicker cream for small sections if you have flaky skin. This does well over inflamed/irritated skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Recommended by a SA for my insanely dry and peeling skin. It helped me get through a rough patch, but I don't love it. I use it when my skin starts reacting to the world, but the fragrance isn't particularly pleasant so as soon as my skin normalizes, I switch to another product. My skin issues are environmental and not product use related.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A dermatologist on YouTube recommended this product for hyperpigmented dry skin.I will get dry patches where my hyperpigmentation is located. Got this as a sample and instantly it worked!!! Going buy the big one tomorrow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THE SMELL! I've been using this product for a couple days now. I have dry skin and my face feels fantastic and some say it smells like fish and I'd say those people have other issues to look into.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the sample version and immediately after putting the cream on clean skin it feels like my face absorbed all the moisturizer.  I have severe eczema and a lot of redness and all my dry patches are all gone after putting this cream. unfortunately it's a bit pricey but I think its worth it if you have a skin problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm shocked by how good the reviews are for this moisturizer. I'm still looking for a vegan and CF replacement for my CeraVe, and this was one of the products on my list to try, but I decided against it due to the price tag. So when Sephora offered it as a redeemable, I was pretty excited to try it! Unfortunately, I'm not impressed. I have a bunch of skin issues that impair barrier function and a fragrance allergy, so the smell is a non-issue for me. The ingredients are nice, but the product itself wasn't all that moisturizing - certainly not better than my $14 drugstore moisturizer. I also found it super greasy, probably because of squalane being the second ingredient, and even after several hours, it had not soaked into my skin. I ended up wiping it off because I couldn't stand it anymore. I have normal-dry skin, so if it's too greasy for dry skin then I'm not sure who it's for. My skin conditions are under control thanks to my current routine, so maybe it's nicer for repair instead of as a maintenance product but it just didn't do it for me. Three stars feels generous, honestly, but the ingredients are good, it's vegan and CF, and the packaging is gorgeous so it gets points for those. It's just not a great formula and it's incredibly overpriced for what it is, there are nicer moisturizers that cost significantly less per oz. If your skin can't get enough oils, you might like it better but I still think you could get the same effect and save money with a different product.

reviews.review_title: Feels nice, didn't work for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels nice but I broke out on my chin and cheeks. I've not had sensitive skin, and generally only breakout lightly as part of my monthly cycle. Regularly wear and wash my masks, and the only thing that changed is a started using this at the end of my very simple night time routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels amazing. I used it one night and I woke up with hydrated soft skin. It has zero smell. I am not sure what other reviewers are referring to when they say it smells bad because it literally smells like nothing. I love how clean of a product it is and that I don't have to worry about harmful chemicals on my face. It is definitely pricey but I plan on splurging on a jar as soon as I run out of the sample!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I didn't even have to give this product 1 star. I have tried several Biossance products, and this is definitely my least favorite. The scent is the heaviest in the beginning of application, and as it dries, it goes away.  However, the initial scent smells like dirty hot tub water and it is EXTREMELY unpleasant. I have dry skin and thought this thick cream would soak up into my skin, but there is a little bit of sticky, tacky feeling after application.  Do not recommend. Not worth the $ and honestly, the smell is putrid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Repaired my skin barrier. it's super moisturizing without being greasy. perfect formulation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is fantastic!!! I really can't say enough about it. I have sensitive dry skin and have tried an insane amount of moisturizers. I used this for just 3 days at bedtime only and my skin is the best it's ever been! I will be sticking with this from now on. Yes it's a little pricey, but a little amount goes a long way. Yes it has a not to pleasant smell, but goes away quickly. It absorbs nicely and your skin feels like silk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, to expensive, but feels so worth it, will ask for every Christmas and birthday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my too go moisturizer! I keep going back every single time. any time my skin is dry or congested it helps so much. I really recommend this moisturizer it layers so well with any other products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Meh. I feel like it's fine but not anything extraordinary. If you need a basic moisturizer it works, but it's also a bit expensive to be as basic as it is. I'm not sure what squalane does but I didn't really notice a huge difference before and after usage. I have other moisturizers that moisturize and smell better, like Charlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream and LaNeige's Water Bank. The smell on this one is a strong, oaty smell, and while usually I don't mind that, it's a bit too much in this cream. Meh. 3 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am literally angry at how much I love this moisturizer. The texture, how soft & plump my skin feels.. even 12 hours later I still feel it sealing the hydration in on my face. I am angry because the smell is just too much. It's giving me sweaty gym bag vibes, sorry I know that's gross but honestly, this is such a great formula..I wish I could find a dupe for this without the smell :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's about as good as any moisturizer out there. I cannot get over the smell. It smells like mildew when you first start working it in the skin. It goes away in about one second but I hate the smell, it makes me flinch every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells awful & my skin looks the same / lowkey worse than when I started it. One of the first skincare products that I couldn't finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This review is strictly for the smell.. and I'm glad I realized my sample was not defective/the only one. When I rub this product between my hands before applying it gives off this terrible stinky feet smell that I cannot continue using it...

reviews.review_title: moisturizes but probably too much for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this when i redeemed my points. Love the ingredient list, and i think it is really moisturizing. The smell is unpleasant but not as bad as what others are saying about it. I can only apply it at night because it does take a long time to be absorbed but it doesn't bother me as I feel I need that when I use retinol with it. Price in on the higher side but is reasonable because it looked like it can last as you really just need a little amount to cover your face. I am still waiting to see more results from it, thus the 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample in the value size. Nice, thick and moisturizing but I literally cannot handle the smell ! Wish they could have added some skin-safe essential oils to mask the smell a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with highly sensitive, dehydrated and dry skin, this has rapidly become one of my favourite creams. Every time I have a flair up for any reason? I can just use this and it is sure to calm my skin and make it feel better the next day. It has not clogged my pores, it doesn't leave a greasy film and sinks in nicely. Definitely will get backups and will recommend to my closed friends.

reviews.review_title: I LOVE IT! Go buy this & your skin will thank you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this cream! It makes my dry skin silky smooth and glowy. It's wonderful for cold winter weather here in Calgary, Alberta, Canada! I also use it in the summer but only at night because it's a heavy cream. I'm on my third jar of this luscious cream and I'll happily keep buying it! The packaging says it's unscented and I've never noticed a smell like everyone else says there is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Folks, this stuff is amazing!! I got a trial size last week and I'm loving it so far. It's not greasy at all but it's moisturizing enough for the dry parts of my face. My combo skin is very happy. :) Also, it's like silk under makeup. So far no breakouts using it, and I'll come back to update on more long-term benefits.  As for the smell, you guys had me almost not buy the stuff, thinking it would smell like feet from across the room! It is absolutely not an issue. You have to really stick your nose in the jar to smell it, and even then it's just a little play-doughy. This is just what un-scented cosmetics smell like - the ingredients that are in them, without being masked by horrible perfumes.   Definitely recommend, even if I do find the price a little high.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As the last review, I redeemed points for trial-size. It's just okay. It seems hydrating, but soaks in at a fast rate, almost left feeling dry. However, I feel the smell wasn't as bad as people are complaining about. I don't plan on buying full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews and I was super wary at first cause of the price but this stuff literally cured every single one of my skin concerns. I have dry skin prone to breakouts and this stuff took care of it all. It makes my skin bouncy and soft and I honestly don't know how I lived without it. Please buy this it's amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Redeemed this in trial-size from the Bazaar for 100pts, and was sadly underwhelmed. While it does not cause my combo-skin breakouts and sensitivity, it didn't impress me as a cream compared to other moisturizers I've tried (Tatcha, First Aid Beauty)...  Another star is knocked-off for the scent: since there are no added fragrance, the base cream smells like sour-urine from the pot, and when smoothed over warm skin, turns into the smell of stale wheat-cereal...  For the price tag, look for other alternatives that you might enjoy more UNLESS you are one of the ultra-sensitive-skin-type that can't have any added fragrance in your cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is the cream I've been looking for my whole life lol it's a very hydrating and moisturizing cream that doesn't feel heavy or greasy. Absorbs amazing and evens my skin tone. Seriously a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is IT. A lot of people complain about the smell but I personally barely smell it and it really just smells like plants. It makes my skin so bouncy and keeps me hydrated without making my face oily. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't break me out or irritate. Overall it's probably the best moisturizer I've tried so far. Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I previously used the Fresh Creme Ancienne, but the fragrance started to aggravate my sensitive skin. This product has a smell, but it doesn't smell like added fragrance, which I highly appreciate. It is an unpleasant smell, but I only smell it when applying the cream. After using the Biossance cream, my skin looks hydrated and plump without any redness or signs of irritation. This cream doesn't feel as thick/balmy as the Creme Ancienne, which I would apply at night and still feel on my skin in the morning. I do think the Creme Ancienne was more hydrating, but this one is hydrating enough for cold/dry winters. It sinks into the skin quickly and I don't feel like I have anything on my face. Unlike Creme Ancienne, I can use it day and night. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect moisturizer for me- so rich and creamy without being overpowering and making me oily. I don't know what people are talking about regarding smell- it doesn't both me at all, never even noticed it. I've repurchased multiple times and my skin definitely looks better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the consistency of this product. It goes on smooth and it is hydrating. I have not noticed my fine lines disappear though. I love that its fragrance free for my sensative skin but the natural smell of this moisturizer is awful :( it does smell like feet...so i just plug my nose when i put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tatcha water cream doesn't cut it for me during cold Canadian winters. I'm oily combo but dryer in winter and this really helps ! Pretty thick but absorbs well. Doesn't make me extra oily. Moisturizes even my problems areas (usually get a very dry and irritated nose area). Really like it but the smell is aweful. I have to mix it with my dr Weil serum because I don't like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far I love this cream!! I have very sensitive and dry skin, and it's taken me forever to find lotion that doesn't irritate it. I've been using for about a week. You do have to start with a small amount and then go from there. The first time I used it, I took way too much which made me greasy, so a smaller amount is perfect. Super moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works well, feels a little greasy, very expensive and smells awfulll

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: cured my flaky nose after two nights I swear to god, I also use the hyaluronic serum by the Ordinary, best combo. But this works!! You will not regret this but especially if you have dry skin, also whoever says it smells so bad like it's literally the most subtle smell. You can't smell it after you apply to your face, it's not overwhelming either, I rather have a faint u201cehu201d smell than fragrance anyday

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a sample and will definitely purchase the full size! I Overdid it a bit with the retinol lately and this is such a wonderful welcome relief to my slightly u201csunburnedu201d feeling skin. So appreciate that it's fragrance free which I think is necessary in a repair cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark spots caused by sun exposure and this cream has done wonders, I noticed changes after one month. Another plus is how good my skin feels, so fresh and soft. I'm a fan  u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous winter moisturizer, but it smells like stinky feet! I'm not usually one to get caught up in how a product smells so long as it works but, I just can't bring myself to purchase (originally received as a reward sample). If it wasn't for that, I would absolutely buy the full size & recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been curious to try this for some time, but the oils in it kept me away. My skin is combination and sensitive. The ingredients were referenced by Dr. Alexis Stephens on YouTube as being great for evening skin tone and hyperpigmentation, so I decided to give it a try. BIG mistake!
