This stuff broke me out into itchy red bumps that turned into deep and painful whiteheads in some places and blackheads in other places. The packaging says that it is non-comedogenic and many reviews say that it did not clog pores, so I'm guessing this is an allergic reaction rather than a pore clogging ingredient. So, if you have sensitive skin, try this with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream works fine. For the price, I would expect something more moisturizing. However, the really terrible thing is the smell. It smells terrible. every time I put it on, I think to myself, God, this smells so bad. I hate the experience of putting it on. I'm going to finish it since it was expensive. but I will never rebuy. I wish I had just returned it, but I thought I would get over the smell. I have not. For someone with normal skin and a not so sensitive nose, it's probably fine. But for me, it's meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and applied at night over a YSL serum after using a glycolic wash. I woke up to the plumpest face and pores looked smaller. I think my face was thirsty. My face did not feel greasy but I did wipe with a toner. I am not sure if it was the combination of steps but I'm digging the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer so much, it feels so comfortable during winter and looks great under makeup. I usually reserve thicker moisturizers for the evening only, but I have been using this one during the day as well and my skin doesn't feel oily at all.  People keep talking about the smell, but I love it. It's a bit play-doh-y, but that's what a product with no added fragrance smells like, which is why it's good for sensitive skin. I think they made a fragrance-free basic moisturizer that still feels luxurious for people with sensitive skin and is well worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The older I have gotten the more dry my skin has been. I've tried many other moisturizers for dry skin and I have to say this one has been by far the best. It keeps my skin so soft and glowy through out the day. I have read from previous reviews about the bad smell. Keep in mind That this cream has Squalene, it's not going to smell like roses. The smell does not bother me at all, knowing I'm giving my face all natural ingredients with no added fragrance. I love love love. And I will definitely be buying more in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this cream in a sample and loved it. But my dumb dumb self kept shopping around (because I'm a product junky) and was failing miserably with horrible skin flare-ups. I kid you not, after a particularly bad reaction to a particular cream, I went back in to Sephora and bought another sample size (because I wasnt ready to commit to the real deal) and within days, my skin looks infinitely better. I have dry, sensitive skin and this is now part of my go-to for my winter arsenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I love the gel too, but this winter my skin is so dry and breaking out in eczema. I was using my eczema prescription cream and it was taking forever to even shrink the breakouts. The first night I used this I woke up in the morning and my eczema was GONE. 3 patches, just gone! Needless to say, I'm sold.

reviews.review_title: Best for Fine Lines and Wrinkles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very confused reading all of the comments about stinky feet.. I bought this moisturizer 3 times from Biossance's website and the smell of it is exactly like Squalane if you know what it smells like. It smells like Squalane mixed with an oil from a fruit or vegetable. This product is the best for skin that is suffering and for whenever you want your skin to look like it's healthy. It diminishes fine lines and heals pimples very quickly. I use it in conjunction with their vitamin c rose oil and my skin has never been happier. Also, for the people who are saying this moisturizer is too heavy, that is because you are using too much. I have Normal skin, I only put one finger in the jar and I use the one dot for my whole face. If you're putting 4-5 dots of the moisturizer on your face you are using way more than enough. Only one dot and it should cover your whole face. This moisturizer works best in the winter time and especially before going to sleep. You will wake up glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as prt of the skincare set that came with the Vit C oil and phyto-retinol serum. My skin loves this moisturizer! It looks glowy and smooth. The one thing I cannot get over is the SMELL. It smells like sweaty feet. The smell goes away, but it ruins it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite Biossance product! It is super hydrating cream that leaves my very dry skin hydrated and dewy. It's very similar to Lala Retro (Drunk Elephant), though I think this is a bit more hydrating and long-lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if I've received a container that has gone bad or if this is what the product is supposed to smell like, but the cream smells like wet dog. The scent dissipates after 15 minutes, but my skin was dry and flaky an hour after application on my normal skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It's dry and gross winter skin time for me right now and this just smooths all of that away. It really is very repairing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This may be my holy grail moisturizer. I have dry sensitive skin and this stuff really helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing. Doesn't break me out. But, the smell is pretty bad. It quickly dissipates after application, but it makes me not want to purchase this again and try something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love how moisturizing this cream is it's nice for the day under makeup because it soaks in without leaving a greasy residue. I like to add an moisturizing serum at night with it because I like the extra hydration but that is not a necessity. It has a very light natural smell and a little goes a very long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The answer to dry, winter skin. Only use this at night on face/neck and it soaks in, slightly dewy then matte after a few minutes. I've used this along with my anti-aging serums and haven't had any negative reactions. Plumps up my fine lines. Really love this cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never hated something so much I had to return it, but this smelled like feet and turned my combo skin into an oil slick. Only good thing was that it somehow didn't break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A good moisturizer, nothing mind blowing, but does the trick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this cream in the spring, it was too heavy for me to use throughout the summer. I would use it at night but even still it was very heavy.  I returned to this product about a month ago now that winter has set in here. With my regular cream I noticed that my skin felt dried out by the end of the day. Wow! I love it! Even laying it on thick, it sets into my skin perfectly. It doesn't stay heavy on your skin at all. My skin normally leans toward the oily side, and this cream does not exasperate this problem. This is now my day cream, and it always leaves my skin feeling perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was originally given a trial size of this from a friend and decided to use it as an eye cream to start. I meannn--the hydration it gave under my eyes alone was incredible. Since my late 20s, I've noticed that unfortunate line that comes from aging and dehydration in that area, and I felt like this moisturizer plumped and evened that area basically overnight. Once I ran out, I knew I needed to buy it. It's lightweight, hydrating, and absorbs quickly on my skin. A little bit can go a long way, but I've been taking liberties with my new jar. The quirky smell it can sometimes give doesn't bother me at all or linger on the skin. Actually, the smell is almost comforting knowing that I'm putting ingredients on my skin that had/bring life and that it isn't perfumed and drying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This soothed and repaired my very winter-damaged skin.  Highly recommend.  I am now on my third jar.  I will never be without it. I love that it does not have silicones or added botanicals. No fillers, no gimmicks.  This cream is no nonsense. It is the perfect winter cream, especially for those with reactive, sensitized, or damaged skin barriers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. Not sure what it is but it keeps my skin moisturizer and soft throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this on a whim last winter and thought it would be cute to not repurchase after I scraped the container clean. NEVER AGAIN!! This is my HG moisturizer and I will use it forever. Not sure about reviews saying it smells bad u2014 their container must be rotten or something. I absolutely love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer for normal to dry skin. It leaves the skin glowly and plump. I purchased this product even before trying it. I am satisfied with my results after 6 weeks and I will definitely repurchase again. I love that the packaging comes in a glass jar and recycled lid!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not one of those people that can smell the most subtle scents but this cream really stinks!! It has a terrible smell... like wet socks that have been sitting around for days, sweaty workout clothes that didn't get aired, etc. It really is awful. It does, however dissipate within a minute of putting it on the skin. And it is hydrating. But the smell!! I'm afraid I I smell like the cream I've put it on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this moisturizer for approx 3 weeks. I had a reaction to another product line (Riversol), and my face was severely dehydrated. Within one application I started to feel relief, and now my skin has never been better. I have tried many other brands (DE Lala, Eminence Organics, Clinique, etc.), but have had the most success with this product. My skin is no longer red, blotchy and desensitized, but happy, healthy and hydrated! Highly recommend if your skin needs to be healed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination oily skin and found this cream to be a tad too heavy. It is a very rich cream. It also takes a long time to fully absorb into the skin, it was well over an hour and my skin still looked shiny. The smell is a mix between old cheese and sour wash cloth but it does dissipate shortly after application.

reviews.review_title: real good product. except for the smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: lovely texture. thick but not too heavy. sure a bit pricey, but often can find some kind of sale on biossance website. overall a really good product. they why knock off a star you ask? it smells horrible. I gag everytime I put it on. but the scent disappears quick enough. but the initial 10-15 secs is horrible. yet i have been reaching for it almost every night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using it when my skin was really dry and sensitive due to allergies, cerave and cetaphil felt like fire when I applied them so this was the last thing I had to try. it worked, and I love it, I'm also acne prone and this hasn't bothered me at all.  it does have a weird smell but it doesn't bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was initially skeptical about purchasing this moisturizer, due to reviews about it smelling like u201cfeetu201d. I am so happy I looked passed those and ordered it anyway. I would not describe the scent as feet at all, it has more of a natural earthy scent (which is better than having added synthetic fragrance). The cream itself goes on smooth and clear, and has done wonders for my complexion. It brightened up my dry winter skin, without leaving an oily residue. I highly recommend this and will definitely be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Well, I bought this thinking it would be a fragrance free dupe for the tatcha dewy skin cream. It's not, doesn't have the same skin feel at all, but it is a nice cream, works well and has a good texture and doesn't have fragrance or essential oils, which I don't like putting on my personal face. It's also very simple, which is good if you have a complex routine. I just doubt that it's worth the price... I feel like you could get a simple moisturizer that's just as good at the drugstore or on yesstyle for less. But if you want to spend money this one is decent.

reviews.review_title: Skin feels nice but smells horrible
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product but it smells so bad that I had to return it. I do think that it is a good moisturizer but not worth purchasing - especially since it's also pricey.   I do recommend their rose oil, eye cream, and night serum though.

reviews.review_title: Smells bad to some worth it if you can get past it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, I am SO GLAD I'm not the only one who thinks this cream smells like feet. I asked my husband and he doesn't think so but I wrinkle my nose every time I use it. However, it is a great moisturizer and since the smell doesn't linger I think I will most likely repurchase. I got it as part of one of the sets and have been using it at night but with the winter air drying my skin I have started using it during the AM and it feels so hydrating without feeling too heavy or sticky. I also love that it's a clean product. I have combination skin and am acne prone and have not had any bad reactions to this product.

reviews.review_title: A 5 star cream that smells like feet!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a 5 star cream that smells like feet so, I give it a 3. I LOVE this cream however, I cannot get over the smell. I will use up this pot and then move onto another cream. Perhaps Biossance will evaluate the sensory experience of this product, as the smell appears to be a common turn off in the reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! I've paired it with the Biossance Squalane Serum and it's done wonders for my skin almost instantly. I have extremely dry skin with redness in my cheeks and this cream is definitely repairing both. I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Deep moisturizer for dry or sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (5) points:  (1)  I purchased the Squalane & Omega Repair Cream with my own money, so I believe this is a fair review.  (2) I use prescription Retin-A (aka Tretinoin) so my face can get VERY dry, like parched dry, and sensitive. In those occasions, any moisturizer I put on typically burns.  I mean, everything from CeraVe to Drunk Elephant. However, this moisturizer does not. It definitely gives my skin extra moisture when it needs it most and does not burn. Impressive. (3)  I didn't notice any smell whatsoever. I noticed some reviewers saying it smelled really bad - I think they should return their product bc it likely has spoiled somehow. I don't think my product has any particular scent to it. (4) It does take some time to sink in. (Tho admittedly I put on A LOT of the cream - you could always use less). You may like this - it gives your face a glow. If not, then you can use it as a nighttime moisturizer. Personally, I don't have any issues applying it before I apply my makeup in the morning. (5) The ingredient list is so amazing. I can actually recognize most of the ingredients. This cream contains lots of quality ingredients for your skin.  BOTTOM-LINE - Deep moisturizer for ultra-dry or sensitive skin. Quality ingredients. No discernible smell.

reviews.review_title: Purchased three of these so far!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used points to get a small version of this stuff, I have purchased it twice since, also bought one for my sister who is a nurse, and my mom who thinks she moisturizing but really isn't. It's thick and creamy, but my skin really likes it. It's probably too creamy to put powder makeup over so you may want to use at nighttime if you do powder. I cannot believe I'm saying this, but I like my face with this on it rather than foundation - gives me that natural glow of my dreams.

reviews.review_title: The Holy Grail for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this on a whim after watching some YouTube reviews. I've been going back and fourth between SkinCeuticals Daily Moisture and Peter Thomas Roth's  Water Drench. I still had some dryness from time to time so I've been in the market to try something new.  I've used Biossance for a week and I couldn't be happier. The texture is fantastic and my skin is perfectly moisturized all-day long. I've read some reviews that there is a foul smell, but it smells completely fine to me. I even put my nose to the container and while there is a slight scent, it is very subtle and completely indiscernible when you apply it to your face.  I do appreciate that this product is cruelty free. Vegan too if that's important to you. It's a little pricey but it works so well I'll be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the cream itself, but it does take up a little bit of time to sink into the skin. I only used it for night time, but my combination skin would hate this for day time. The smell is the biggest thing that will prevent me from repurchasing. Not bad, just not worth repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: WORST SMELLING FACE CREAM I'VE EVER USED... so sad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing. Absolutely amazing. My skin feels so moisturised and plump and fresh within seconds of rubbing it in. But why the 2 stars? The smells is unbearable. It's a mix of milk-gone-bad sour and old wet socks. If I wasn't so sensitive to smells I'd keep this cream in in daily regime. The moment I opened the box, the smell of the cream hit me like a ton of bricks. I thought it was something else from outside since my washroom window was open but I smeared a pea amount on my chin and almost threw up. The smell also lingers all day so I found it so hard to concentrate. Having to wear a mask all day long with the smell of this cream stuck in there is terrible. I'd definitely go in-store and try a small dab of a sample of the back of your hand before commiting. I bought it online and sadly had to return it because I can't bear the smell. I'm so sad because it's such an amazing formula - for dry, combination, even oily skin, this cream would work wonders especially in the harshness of Canadian winters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely repurchase items. I'm flat out picky about quality, ingredients, and how it actually works. After a few applications I realized it's my holy grail. Non-irritating to my easily clogged skin, soooooo moisturizing where others fail, quality product. Love love love. After about half way through the first jar did have a little bit of an earthy smell to it, but I have not had that with the second yet. Thinking it's keeping it in a cool dry place that may be the trick to avoid any smell developing. I'll always get this, coupled with Belif aqua bomb cleanser or Thesis daily cleaning oil (not sold at Sephora but an irreplaceable product for cleaning/makeup removal in ONE).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite moisturizer for my dry skin. My skin feels so lush and rich after using this!

reviews.review_title: Does what it is meant to do..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was visiting NY for a few days in November and suddenly, my skin started drying and flaking. It was so bad that I didn't want to leave my hotel room. I went into Sephora and a very personable guy helped me find this! Fast forward to a week of bi-daily usage, my skin was softer and no more flaky. This was probably the best face moisturizer I could have asked for at that point. It did repair my dry skin and gradually, the glow of my skin was back! I did realize it worked better for my skin in winter than other times of the year. About smell- I personally didn't find it great but it wasn't awful either. And my husband who immediately gives me a feedback regarding any/all fragrance didn't seem to mind it.  Overall, it did help me with a bout of dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly? Probably the worst smelling face cream I've ever used. This product made me realize the importance of fragrance in certain product, but jokes aside, I actually don't mind bad smelling product if it means there's no fragrance in it. I really like the texture, reminds me of la mer soft cream version. Works pretty good for the price. Finally, if you can't stand any irregular scent in product don't buy this, it really do smell bad. Try to find it in store first and see if you can handle the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I have tried rom this brand and I AM IN LOVE! I have very sensitive and dry skin and was needing something more powerful for the winter months. I love how this product does not have any fragrance and I actually like the smell and you get used to it quick. I put this on in the evening and my face feels less dry in the morning. I can't wait to try more products from this brand as they are clean and have good ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best cream I've ever used. I have tried so many products searching for something that would hydrate my dry sensitive skin, and this product is just wonderful. It's a heavy cream but my skin soaks it up immediately and it leaves my face feeling so hydrated and soft, not greasy at all. I could even use this in the summer on the dry portions of my face while using a lighter moisturizer for the rest. It does have a subtle unpleasant smell but it goes away quickly after applying. I don't mind the scent at all, I'm actually really happy they didn't add fragrance to the formula. It's a pricey product but I would 100% recommend it, it is sooo worth it. I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer. Only thing I've found that is hydrating enough in winter but doesn't break me out (I battle combination acne prone skin that gets scaly and cracked in the cooler months). Feel improved texture in skin with consistent bedtime use. I saw lots of reviewers talking about a negative odor but it doesn't bother me. It smells a little strange during application but it quickly goes away and it's a tradeoff I'm willing to take because I love how my skin feels. One of my favorite skin care products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt like I had to write a review because of my experience, but I guess everyone noticed a similar issue - while moisturizing, the smell is terribly unbearable, I think the u201ccheeseu201d comparison is the closest to what I've experienced as well. However the moisturizer does work well, superior to the Youth to the People brand that also has squalane in it. I'll finish using it but probably not repurchase again unless the formula changes.

reviews.review_title: try a sample before you buy...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging and the cream itself has a really nice texture, but causes redness with my skin (I have rosacea). If you can get past the stinky feet smell that goes away after application and your skin isn't sensitive this is a nice hydrating moisturizer. Try as a sample before buying, not worth the risk for how expensive it is, IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin absolutely loves this stuff! So moisturizing and soothing, and doesn't break out my dry-combination skin. Love the texture. My skin looks and feels so healthy when I use this, and especially when paired with the Biossance rose oil...*chef's kiss.*  I personally don't understand the comments about the smell. I consider myself to be pretty sensitive to scents, and I find the scent of this to be extremely mild and simple - not bothersome at all. It also basically dissipates soon after applying it. As others have noted, this has a bit of a natural scent to it, but I honestly prefer this much more over artificial scents.  I've never left a Sephora review before, but I felt like I needed to give this product the credit it deserves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really weird and the smell is strong. It doesn't linger but makes the application process not really enjoyable. My skin is still dry after using it. This was a blind purchase since we ca n't test anything now. Will return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin seems to react to almost everything! Even things formulated for babies usually make my face burn. THIS product is soothing and hydrating to my skin, has no strong scent and is cruelty free to boot! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted badly to love this. But the scent is so bad I almost gagged using it. On top of that, the cream did not feel like it sunk into my very dry skin. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finished kiehls ultra facial cream (also great) and wanted to try something u201ccleanu201d. I remember redeeming a Biossance kit months ago and enjoying it. Definitely took some a few uses for my skin to purge. Light bumps but was back to normal after a week. It's good as a daily moisturizer. What impressed me was their ingredients. I looked up every single one, and they're all beneficial for the skin! With the exception of the last few but I know other moisturizers that have even scarier ingredients. Not mind blowing but moisturizing and worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this moisturizer. I have extremely dry skin (especially in the winter) and I find it difficult to find a moisturizer that actually makes my skin feel soft, supple, plump and not greasy -- but this did all of those things. I was not bothered by the smell of it, but it is pretty pricey. It is for that reason that I've continued to try other products, but so far the only other moisturizer that is comparable is the Lala Retro Whipped Moisturizer by Drunk Elephant & they're the same price. SO, this winter this very well may be my go to.

reviews.review_title: find something cheaper, it will do the same thing.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: its an okay cream but overpriced and unfortunately clean at sephora doesnt mean anything to me, neither should to anyone else. the glycerin in this is what makes it good, but i can get that in cerave or first air beauty for a fraction of the price. the smell is not good as everyone else mentioned, the hydration is okay but nothing special. will not purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Best cream for plump healthy skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream and now a staple I will use for a long time. I love how nonirritanting it is and the results you see are amazing. My skin looks plumper, healthier, and more youthful. I don't mind the scent. I didn't realize how dehydrated my moisture barrier was til after i found this cream. It is thick, but it's nice to work it into the skin. I also think it has some brightness ability. You don't have to use much so it lasts a long time which justifies the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this worked well to hydrate my skin when i started using retinol. it is not too thick. didnt break me out. however, i have not seen any other particular benefits for the price point. the main drawback is that the cream smells very strongly of old cheese. i have never used any product that smells quite so unpleasant

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very soothing thicker night cream, but the smell is horrible. I have been trying to use it up on my hands because I can't stand the smell on my face. This came in a variety pack and I will not purchase a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is so off putting. Every time I put this cream on my face I am shocked again at the smell! Not worth it for $58.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne-prone, very sensitive skin. This is one of the only creams that will calm my skin down and not irritate it when I apply! It's thick and creamy yet rubs in well and absorbs quickly. I truly look forward to putting this on every night. It does have a bit of a smell, which doesn't bother me but might others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smell is pretty bad but feels nice. It isn't as thick and is more lightweight then I expected - feels a bit milky. While there are better moisturizers, I appreciated that this wasn't irritating on my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of moisturizers but I've not seen results like the one this gives. I have dry skin but this makes my skin so moisturized. I always come back to this moisturizer no matter what. Beautiful packaging, amazing results. The ingredient list is amazing, no fragrance and it's just so good.  It's a little expensive so I only use this once a day.  I switch between the one by FAB and CeRave but neither of those give results like this one. If you have the money for it, or are willing to splurge on a moisturizer, this is one of the best choices out there :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what is in this to make it so amazing, but it is! It has completely calmed down my reactive, acne prone skin. I've gone from lots of breakouts to a clear complexion using this at night and the probiotic gel in the morning. I haven't changed anything else in my skincare so I'm attributing my newly clear skin to this. A hefty price tag, but I will gladly pay it for such great results. This is definitely in the richer side, it would be too much for me during the day but is excellent for overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is just OK. Did not cause any irritation or breakouts but did not notice any significant changes in my skin. I have used SO many higher end and drugstore moisturizers and this one is just mediocre. This might be ideal for individuals with super sensitive skin, but does not do anything impressive. I still use this, but not routinely and typically just use it as something to apply before makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry (eczema) and sensitive skin. I love this cream! Rx steroid creams can't be placed around your eyes, but it's where my eczema is the worst. This cream is quite thick and only a little is needed. It greatly reduced the redness of my eczema after one day! I've always used fragrance-free lotions and creams because of my extreme sensitivity and the smell of this is just fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo/acne prone skin and have tried many moisturizers on sephora (belif, philosophy, caudalie, dr.jart, tatcha) and I found this to be the best. It's moisturizing enough to leave your skin super smooth and hydrated yet not making it oily.

reviews.review_title: NOTICEABLE IMPACT ON SKIN - SMOOTHER AND GLOWY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product every night on my skin before bed. I've noticed a significant difference. My skin is smoother and it has helped with fine lines. Fine lines isn't really a huge problem for me, but i do have some on my forehead that have disappeared some, i use this in combination with the lactic acid serum. It doesn't make me break out or clog my pores. I almost feel like it reduced dark spots too ... I'm not sure. Maybe just because everything looks more glowy it appears less blotchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and live in Northern Canada. This is the *only* product I have tried that actually nourishes my skin in the winter months. Some people don't like the smell, but it doesn't bother me because the trade off of having supple, moisturized skin for a bit of a funky odour on first application is fiiiiine by me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally never write reviews, but I ordered this because it came in one of the kits. This smells awful. In skincare, a little fragrance will not phase me. I've used a lot of products before and this shocked meu2014negatively. This is the worst smelling product I've ever used. I wish it was better. I'm not sure it does anything to my skin either. It pains my nose to put it on my face and it's not cheap therefore I gotta keep using it. I will not be purchasing again due to the scent.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail for my Skin Barrier!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail moisturizer.  I'm on my 4th or 5th jar and I have rarely ever done that.  After starting on a tretinoin, my skin was very sensitive, dry and crusty.  I got this as a trial size with one of my Sephora orders and decided to try it.  It restored my skin barrier in just a few uses!  Yes, it has an earthy smell because of the omega oils (I assume) but I'm super sensitive to fragrances and it doesn't bother me at all and dissipates quickly.  I hope Biossance never stops making this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Biossance. Started w/ the squalane gel & it's been my favorite moisturizer ever since..it helped clear & balance my skin after going through a year of a horrible break out. Lately I've been really wanting to try their other skin care products & bought the limited edition sampler box ... my goodness, fell madly in love with the squalane omega repair cream! completely exceeded my expectations! It's like putting face butter on my face, so smooth, glides on so easily & absorbs fast & perfectly... & leaves the skin instantly hydrated & looking healthier & with that subtle u2018plumped' effect, it just feels like u just fed the skin all the nutrients it needed! I personally love it! I think it's powerful enough u can use it once a day, that's all I need for my skin. I would say use the gel for when your skin doesn't need extra hydration and use the cream for when it's extra dry it needs a little boost or overnight... love this product, high-quality & effective. No break outs yet either, was worried about that b/c leaves moist dewey effect on skin & just feels like so much hydration. The other one I've tried so far that I loved too is the eye cream, I'll do a separate review but that one is definitely super hydrating to the eye area too. Thank u Biossance! Ps. u2018The smell' of the cream does not bother me at all, it's neutral & barely anything at all in my opinion. I appreciate that about Biossance too, it is mostly odorless without those added strong artificial scents I've had w/ other brands. The cream is subtle effective & pleasant to me, 5 stars:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the texture and weight of this moisturizer. It doesn't feel too thick and greasy and not watery at all. I think it might be greasy for someone with very oil skin though. There's no dramatic change in my skin and wrinkles but it does look less dehydrated. That being said, I don't expect any product to erase irreversible damage. The worst thing about this is the scent. Maybe someone with a less sensitive nose can handle it, but I have to hold my breath while applying it. It smells like something sour and animal fat. I might not repurchase bc of the scent and because there's many other moisturizers to try. I won't toss it though bc I do think it works decently well and hasn't caused any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as a sample and I wasn't a fan. It doesn't smell very good and it's very thick. Even if only using it at night it left a greasy feeling on my face and I didn't get that u201chydratedu201d feeling after I applied it. Won't be purchasing again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This first thing I notice about this is the scent. Since it's a clean product, there are no added fragrances. I'm not sure what it is, but I imagine damp fish food. After using it for a week, I never got used to the scent. Sometimes I feel like I'm going to gag, it's just awful. The scent definitely lingers and takes a long time to wear off. It's rather off putting. otherwise it's white and comes in a jar. Easy to put on, thin enough to spread. Takes a bit of time to sink in. I haven't noticed dramatically any differences compared to a regular moisturizer. Would not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this moisturizer in their top shelfie kit. it works really well with their squalene +phyto retinol serum  I really like the consistency and skin looks fresh the next morning .I end up buying full size :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I should step in and defend this face cream based on the comments about the smell. I was using algenist genius and wanted something less pricy to slather over serums morning and night and now I'm on my third jar of this. no breaking out, super moisturizing but not too greasy. I use it before bed and in the morning under sunscreen, primer, and makeup without any pilling issues.  And I didn't even notice the scent. it just smells like face cream with no perfumes added.  Would highly recommend

reviews.review_title: the answer to dry skin struggles!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loooove Biossance!! I've been on the hunt for a good moisturizer that has Squalane in it (hyaluronic acid just isn't moisturizing enough for me) and this is the perfect one! Since it is a clean natural cream, it does have an odd fragrance but I don't notice it unless I go out of my way to smell it. It leaves the skin feeling plump and so hydrated. I've been super dry and flaky around my mouth area and since I've used this cream I haven't noticed any dryness. Totally worth the price point, I'd recommend to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a deluxe sample. I really like the consistency, it's thick but not too thick and it definitely moisturizes. And I have read other reviews about the smell and I can see that it definitely does have a smell I don't think it's gone bad I just think that it's the smell of the natural products that are in it but it does smell just like a foot a stinky foot but the smell goes away fairly quickly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so here's the rub (literally) This is maybe one of the best moisturizers I have ever used. I got the mini/sample version as my sephora birthday gift last year and use it as a night cream and firstly, with this stuff a little bit goes a loooooong way. In the approximate year I have had it, I've only just recently ran out, and the sampler is only 5ml. I have oily/combo skin, with very prominent acne scarring/dark spots from hormonal acne I got after high school (I am twenty-three.) so as you can imagine I've tried alot of different products/methods. I started layering this on top of a rosehip oil before I go to bed and it really has helped me skin immensely, just by preventing new breakouts and really helping my mosture barrier. My skins feels cleaner, smoother, my skin tone looks more even, and less dull. It is a thicker cream so if you lean oily you're not gonna have a good time using this in your morning routine, but putting this on as your last step before you go to sleep you're going to wake up feeling so plump, hydrated, and bouncy. The ONLY complaints I have are the smell at first is a little funky. It doesn't linger for long at all and it's not overpowering but at first I was concerned it went bad, until I found out that's just the smell. Secondly, the price definitely makes me cringe, but maybe that's just me. I WILL be purchasing the full size, but you better believe I'm not gonna tell people I dropped 60 dollars for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the cream as a night cream. I love how you don't need a lot to have your face feeling moisturized and the next day my skin is glowing! This has helped me save on using so much moisturizing in my morning routine. I use Drunk Elephant protini as my day time moisturizer and now I only need about half a pump. It does have a faint fishy smell but goes away within seconds! I can't stress enough how much I love the way this moisturizer makes my skin feel baby soft and creates a natural glow! A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I find this to be very moisturizing and doesn't cause me to break out. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer, I can see why some people say it smells bad, but it's not horrible and it goes away. I feel like it smells herbal?... idek but I'm so picky with fragrant products and refuse to purchase if there's a strong smell so it can't be that bad. It leaves my face so moisturized throughout the day, I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product using my points. I absolutely loved how my skin felt so moisturized especially following it up with my night routine serums. when you first apply it for like 2 secs it smells really bad BUT thats it the smell literally disappears right away. I will definitely be checking out more of their skin care line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: M skin is very temperamental; its dry and sensitive, and surprisingly not many products work for me. I love the feel of this cream - its rich without feeling heavy. It has no fragrance and it pairs well with my serum.  Its definitely combated the dryness without causing any breakouts, however, besides that i haven't noticed any significant difference in texture or complexion.  Would I buy this again? Definitely. Its a great, safe, option for a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly hydrating cream with amazing ingredients but the smell made me feel physically ill. I don't mind avoiding fragrance because my skin is sensitive, but the natural scent of this product was so bad I was holding my breath while applying and eventually just gave it to a friend. If the smell was more tolerable I would have continued using it because it truly works great for dry/sensitive skin and I have a lot of respect for Biossance as a company. I recommend it for those who don't have strong senses of smell but I couldn't handle it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i recently bought this product to try and at first i thought it was really good. but after getting a terrible sunburn and hoping for a cream that would help, this cream really proved itself. it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the texture and ingredients. Super moisturizing! I have dry and sensitive skin and I used this at night. Unfortunately, I couldn't get past the smell. It honestly smells vile. I use only fragrance-free products so I'm fine with unscented things but this was really tough. Will be returning but loved the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been cycling through moisturizers for months now, trying to find one that doesn't break my combination skin out. I tried EVERYTHING. When I found this moisturizer my skin was seriously dismal, after being through the wringer. I have been using it for about three weeks now, and it seems to be really working. It absorbs quickly and has evened out my finicky skin. My only qualm is that my stubborn nose acne still seems to be surviving...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never been in a better state since using this moisturizer. Stays hydrated and plump alllllllll dayyyyy. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is dry, but also acne prone and has large pores. It has changed over the past year and I was struggling to find a moisturizer that worked for me (I used to use only gel moisturizers). I was surprised that this cream has done me so much good. It is soothing and you only need a small amount to moisturize your face and neck. I found it particularly good in the winter. It does make my skin dewy which I don't always want. Just something to keep in mind. There is no discernible scent, and the consistency is not too heavy or thick, but it is stiff in the jar. I would definitely repurchase and recommend to people with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing and doesn't feel heavy on my oily skin. It's perfect for daytime wear and works well under my makeup.

reviews.review_title: I researched this product for a while...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was apprehensive to purchase this because of the price, but I bit the bullet and don't regret it. I switched to this from BareMinerals Butter Drench because of the ingredients and I also have very dry skin. I never use moisturizer alone, it's always at the end of my routine but I still noticed a difference after the first night. With butter drench, I would still wake up with dry patches on my T-zone even after layering oil. With this, I didn't change my routine and still layered oil after applying but I woke up still feeling soft and moisturized. It's unscented, so I don't understand the other reviews that say they can't handle the smell. I will update my review as time passes but so far, I do love this moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. This is the only one I've ever tried that doesn't break me out. It absorbs quickly, my skin looks and feels amazing, and the natural ingredients make it even better.

reviews.review_title: THINKING ABOUT IT? DON'T THINK...BUY IT!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Never thought that I would switch from CeraVe moisturizing cream. Personally, I like moisturizers that come in cream form and easily absorb into my skin. This has everything that I love and then some. This cream makes me feel so rich and luxurious while applying it. It goes on so smooth and just ugh...there's not enough words to describe how much I love this moisturizer!! It's the perfect product to seal in my serums. I would say I have acne prone skin and this product did not make me break out. But I didn't expect it to bc Biossance is a vegan line! I bought two little trial sizes with my Beauty Insider points during checkout and I can't wait to purchase the full size. This quickly became my new moisturizer and CeraVe was given to my bf haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product from a sample set. The texture is good so I give it credit for that.   But it has a terrible smell, smells like saliva

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cannot take the smell. Holy Moses, it's bad. Can't speak to the effectiveness bc the smell was so off putting I threw the sample out.

reviews.review_title: LOVE as a Nighttime Cream for Combination Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cream for my nighttime routine.  I have combination skin, so this is definitely too heavy to be a daytime cream for me.  However, it definitely keeps your skin nice and moisturized while you're sleeping.  It had an odd scent to it (or I guess lack of scent), so keep that in mind.  It's not a bad scent by any means, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never written a review on here but felt the need bc I have been looking for a moisturizer that not only helps the skin long term but shoes immediate effects. I live in FL so it's perfect for the more humid weather, not too heavy and sinks right into the skin. I didn't purchase from Sephora, I stole it from my mom who did. Will definitely be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really impressed by this product, I switched to face oils a couple years ago, this is definitely as nourishing as an oil. Works really well with my sensitive skin, doesn't feel greasy or heavy on the skin whatsoever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's my favorite moisturizer. It feels so smooth and makes my skin so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a huge fan of this product. I bought it in hopes that it would help my dry cheeks, but it didn't really do anything for my skin. It would probably work better for someone with more normal skin. Also, it has a very unpleasant smell when you first apply it. I was going to return it, but thankfully my brother liked it so he is going to finish it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, but I could not get past the smell. Definitely get a sample to try before buying the full size. I have dry skin, but didn't really think this was drastically better than other hydrating moisturizers I have tried. I tried to finish my sample quickly because I didn't like the smell that much. I did get a really bad cystic zit while trying it, but I don't think I used enough during a long enough period of time to confirm that this caused any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live in a dry climate and have always struggled to find the right balance between moisturizing but not oily. This product is that. it makes my skin feel great, soaks right into the skin without leaving a layer on top and makes my skin feel hydrated despite my climate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used this product for 2 days now. And even on the first night using it I could see a big difference in my skin. My pores were smaller my skin looked firmer and healthier.   I will continue to use this and update in a month. As I replenish my skin care products I will look to Biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I feel my skin is improved and looks more supple. I keep mine in the fridge as oils can be susceptible to heat, light and oxygen. It feels very refreshing to put on too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have cystic acne , as well as dehydrated skin and this oddly helped it sooo much! It definitely helped calm the redness in my skin and allowed it to feel way less itchy. It was not clogging or anything and helped with fine lines as well as breakouts (even though the product is not made for those with acne). This is thick and very hydrating for most people but I had to move to something more hydrating because my skin was quite damaged by most likely the topical acne products I've used in the past. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For starters, I have very sensitive, acne prone skin. I purchased this moisturizer in an attempt to rejuvenate my moisture barrier. I'm currently on my second jar of this beautiful stuff, and I plan to keep repurchasing it! My skin responded so well. There is a very earthy smell upon application, but the scent goes away quickly. I absolutely love this stuff.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT BUY if you breakout easily.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin, but breakout easily. I was told the ingredients in this product were clean and gentle for your skin. I used this for 2 days and immediately broke out in large red pimples all over my face. It clogged my pores so bad and honestly made someone with dry skin look oily! It took me weeks to reduce the damage completely. Needless to say I returned this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE IT. SMOTHER ME IN IT. I stopped using this for a while and immediately noticed my skin was more irritated and dry. This is worth the price. Especially if you have dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing cream for drier skin. The texture is so nice and almost light weight but still so nourishing and feels amazing And healing on the skin. Especially on stressed out skin, it's a must. My only complaint is I wish they could somehow make it in a pump style jar or tube because open jar packaging like this is just always a negative for me. But the positives so outweigh the one small negative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very lightweight but moisturizing. A little goes a long way. I am on my second bottle of this and absolutely love how soft my skin feels after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this moisturizer. It saved my skin! I had to start using a prescription retinoid for my adult acne (I'm 27) and it really dried out my skin. I started using this morning and night and my skin barrier is back to normal! No more flaking! And no breakouts! The only issue is the packaging. I've seen others comment that after a while it starts to smell. I have found this too. It wasn't enough to notice, but when I opened a new bottle I noticed that it smelled much nicer than my old one. I think it is because as time passes, dipping your fingers into the bottle deposits bacteria and those accumulate in the product. I solved this by tranfering the cream into a pump bottle that I bought of amazon (kind of looks like the drunk elephant protini bottle). It's kind of a hassle, but the product is so good I don't mind. I hope they switch to more hygenic packaging in the future!
I noticed my skin and eye wrinkles were both softened after using this cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked how nourishing this cream was, very hydrating for my dry skin. However, it always clogged my pores, therefore, caused tiny breakouts. The rich formula of this also seemed to accentuate my poresu2014they looked SO huge!  The smell of this product was also a bit of a turn off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Je recommande fortement. J'ai reu00e7u cette creme en echantillon, et lorsque je l'ai essaye, evidemment la premiere chose que j'ai remarque est l'odeur, mais evidemment elle est sans parfum alors elle ne peux sentir la rose. Apres une seule application dans le visage, je suis tombe en amour. Elle est riche, epaisse, mais s'etend tres bien et on a pas l'impression de porter un masque. Elle reagit bien avec le maquillage et ma creme pour les yeux.  Elle est dispendieuse, mais apres avoir essaye plusieurs autre produit ici et lu00e0, je ne vais pas hesite a l'acheter quand j'aurai termine mon echantillon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer for about 6 months. I use it as a night cream because it is a little heavy. My skin has been good, not worse, but not better. The biggest thing and I hopped on the reviews to see if I was imagining it, it smells bad!! It did not smell like this when I got it. It says it's good for 12 months,but it smells like the others review describe. I'm tossing it. I have probably a good month of product left, but it smells so foul. I would definitely say there are better moisturizer out there. Maybe if you use it quickly, it won't be a problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have complicated skin (dry, acne prone, sensitive) and I'm currently really enjoying this moisturizer. It's rich yet not super heavy. And not greasy, but effective. It's helped the severe dryness I get from being on prescription benzoyl personify/clindamycin gel for my acne. This product performs well under makeup and pairs well with SPF. The price is a bit steep but it's not a deal breaker considering the quality of the product. Everyone keeps saying this smells u201cbadu201d but to me it just smells natural, not bad at all. And it's fragrance free so of course it's not going to smell great like a perfume would. Overall, if you've got the money to spend or have been debating on trying it, do it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I used this cream, my jaw dropped at how lovely the texture is. It has a very silky quality to it that makes it the most enjoyable thick cream I use.   I have combination skin that easily becomes greasy, and I have never had a problem using this product. I wouldn't go wild and slather it on thick in the summer time if you're like me and have combination skin, but a nice thin layer of it works perfectly for me.   I'm very confused by the reviews commenting on the smell. It definitely doesn't have a fake, sweet parfume smell, but it also doesn't have a u201csouru201d odor. I find it to have a pretty plain scent, similar to other unscented products. But, everyone's scent is different, so it's possible it comes off more earthy to others.    The price point is high, but the quality and clean ingredients justify it for me. This is the first Biossance product I have used, and I'm really looking forward to purchasing others. Their new mask is in my Top 3 on my skincare wishlist right now (and it's a longgg one).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried the mini pack they have. It does have a noticeable scent, however this didnt bother me. I just didnt feel a difference and certainly wouldnt buy it for almost 60$ alone. Ive been testing out this product since like february so its been part of my routine for a while. Was hoping for a better result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't notice any difference in helping eye wrinkles.

reviews.review_title: Ultra rich, works well, but smells bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good night cream for my combination skin. It's very hydrating and leaves my skin feeling soft. I even saw an improvement in texture after about two weeks of using it. However, the cream is very thick and has a weird, yeasty smell to it. I wouldn't recommend it for daytime use during the summer as it makes my skin look very shiny/oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this since I have dry skin (sometimes it's even flaky/has eczema). I can't seem to find the perfect moisturizer that doesn't make me break out. I used this cream and keep ending up getting a pimple or two after I use it. This also has a really weird smell to it, I'm not sure if it's old or if that's just normal? I do however really like the oil and that actually smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but unfortunately I just don't. I feel like I need so much product to be able to cover my entire face and the price point is too high for a product that won't last that long. I also don't feel like it absorbs into my skin well and kind of leaves an oily or greasy feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells bad - sour. Not absorbent. Not worth it. Good in theory

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry-combination sensitive skin. We have very cold and dry winters in Canada so I needed something that could really moisturize it. This is definitely the best cream I've ever purchased. At first I thought it might be slightly pricy, so after finishing it I tried looking for other creams. It didn't take long before I came back to this one.  I must say it's important to like thick creams, as this cream is very thick. A little goes a very long way! I also love that it has no fragrance so it doesn't irritate the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer so much. I have very dry skin, especially in the winter, and this stuff made my skin feel so smooth and locked in the hydration really well. I do wish they had a larger size, but the product itself is unmatched. Bonus points for it coming in a glass container and compostable packaging.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail for Acne-Prone / Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail. I am so glad I tried this because I know now it will become a staple. It has great ingredients and a little goes a long way and it looks great on my skin. It is just enough hydration and doesn't pill if you choose to use a face oil after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been the best moisturizer I've ever used. My face ranges from oily to dry (to the point of eczema), super sensitive and acne prone. The only con is that it's really expensive... However, no other moisturizer works as well as this does for my skin. I've strayed away from it in the past because of the price but I always come right back because nothing works better for me. I use it as my night time moisturizer (I only use sunscreen as my moisturizing step in the AM) and I have been using it for years now. I can tell a huge difference when I'm not using it. My face stays moisturized throughout the day and night and I don't ever feel that tight, pulling sensation when your skin needs to be moisturized. Also, one jar lasts me a few months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination dry skin and it was not moisturizing enough for my skin. Switched back to Clarins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample from a Sephora purchase. This was the first Biossance product I ever tried and I really wanted to like the brand and the cream. However, this cream did not work well for my skin. I have dry and oily combination skin. I tried the cream once in the morning on my clean face and it gave me a few acne on my cheeks on the same day. I guess the cream was a little heavy for me. It felt tacky during application and took a long time to be absorbed. The smell was also distinct and very medicine-like, which I liked, but some people may find it unpleasant. So, I would recommend to try it as a sample first if possible before purchasing the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wish I had read the reviews before purchasing. I saw that other people had a similar experience where this caused malia/white bumps on my jawline. I did find it hydrating but honestly was such a shame it had this reaction. Would also like to add that I've never had sensitive skin nor have ever had reactions to moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am still trying to find the perfect hydrating night cream that will provide deep moisture while giving my face that glow. I was debating between a 3 or 4 star for this cream and I decided that it was a 4 star cream as it still does give me hydration at night time without making my skin too oily in the morning. I definitely do not use this in the morning as it would be too heavy/thick for my skin. It also has a kinda funky smell, but I attribute that to the Squalane? Not totally sure on that one. I'm definitely not IN LOVE with this product, but it gets the job done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing moisturizer!  I don't normally use exclamation points but this product is worth it. I mainly use this product as a nighttime moisturizer, after I apply either the Biossance Squalane + Vitamin C Rose Oil or the Biossance Phyto-Retinol Serum. After I use it, I notice that my skin looks and sometimes feels renewed (refreshed is impossible, without a latte macchiato in hand). It's almost as like you wore highlighter to bed and it didn't come off on the pillow, your skin looks dewy and feels hydrated after a hard night sleep.  First, all you'll need is 1-2 dime size dollops of the product, warmed up in your hands, and it smoothly glides across and nourishes every part of your face and neck. Using too much, it'll start to feel heavy.  Understandably, for some individuals this product will be too rich for their skin, this product is made for those with naturally dehydrated skin (like mine). It doesn't always matter how much or how often you stay hydrated, sometimes your skin needs a little boost from your skincare routine. The omega fatty acids and hyaluronic acids in this product will do the exactly that, give your skin the boost it desperately needs.   I cannot complain when I have an eczema flare-up either, it doesn't irritate the outbreak spots at all. Seriously, my desert-skinned sisters, try it.   Listen to your skin, be kind to your skin, love your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was bought upon the recommendation from YouTube personality Susan Yara. Unfortunately it didn't work for my skin. I have acne prone sensitive skin and I was hoping that this would help to replenish hydration in my skin after the recent start of retinol but it didn't not work. It caused more small bumps along my jawline and cheeks. It was expensive so I will keep it and just use it as a body moisturizer (I tested on my legs and it does not cause a reaction)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry combination skin, somewhat acne prone. I am always hesitant towards thicker creams for clogged pores but this one has worked great. It is thick and creamy but seems to soak in well overnight and is not greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best moisturizer I've ever used! I've never been someone with u201cglowyu201d skin and this does it. I have very sensitive acne/prone skin and acne did some work on my complexion. This has helped heal breakouts and gives me a dewy look overnight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this product as a sample, and I found myself reaching for it over my other moisturizer time and time again.  I use it every day - morning and night - and it's amazing.  I have normal to dry skin, and a little bit of this at the end of my skincare routine is just heaven.  It goes on so smooth and isn't too heavy or greasy.  I often combine with a little Biossance Squaline + Vitamin C Rose Oil for that perfect moisture glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I am incredibly picky and was hesitant about trying this out, but I have been nothing but less than impressed. It feels great, isn't too light or heavy and the packaging is really nice. I like using this at the end of my night routine but I'm looking forward to using it in mornings once I use up my current am moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had the horrible combo of bumpy acne and dryness that made makeup apply so horribly I would be torn between covering my pimples and revealing my scaly textured skin, or show my red and bumpy face to the world. My acne started at 13, I'd go to derm after derm and dry my skin out with one topical treatment after another. This past year I've began exploring skincare on YouTube and discovered my acne was due to my over-dried, and in turn irritated skin. I ditched my drying topical treatments and bought the youth to the people kale cleanser, and this. Simple as that. I'd remove my makeup with micellar water, cleanse, and apply the cream, would sometimes also pat cereve moisturizer on top. I have no issue with the smell complained about in a few reviews, If anything it's a relief to me as fragrance is extremely irritating to my skin! In a week a noticed a huge difference, months later I'm the most confident I've been in years. Biossance is by no means on the cheap side, but the results I've gotten out of this cream are leaps and bounds more than expected from a moisturizer. Clear skin and the restored confidence is priceless to me!! Photos are before and after I started using :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I love this moisturizer. I've been going through some trial size moisturizers I've gotten, including belif moisturizing bomb, yttp super berry mask, both of which I was super excited for and somewhat disappointed. This one I wasn't excited for but wow, I love it! I was actually so sad when it ran out when normally I'm just looking forward to trying a new product. I'll be ordering them full size ASAP. This moisturizer is a great texture, leaves my skin feeling plump and hydrated. The smell is not great but it's fragrance free which is a huge plus for me. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING!  When I first started using it, I wasn't sure but I do use it in combination with my Dr. Dennis Gross products as well as my Ole Henrickson.  I have several Biossance products that I love and this one has turned out to be a top favorite for me.  I have skin sensitivity issues so I have to change it up and I have to mess around with it just like a cook would in the kitchen for a recipe and I've used eye creams around my mouth to help with lines and I'm going to try this on under my eyes now because it is EXTREMELY rick and does REALLY well with my skin in conjunction with the other product lines I've mentioned above.  I'm 47 and I've done some cigarette smoking and I'm trying to stop and if I had not taken care of my skin so much over the years I would look really bad right now but these products ARE helping me improve my skin while I taper off smoking/quit.  Read some articles about aging/smoking/turning 50+ and what happens and that will definitely help one quit smoking HOWEVER...my skin looks amazing because of these products.  It's definitely taken a hit due to medical/personal issues but these products have been EXTREMELY IMPACTING on recovering my skin, again, I just turned 47.  Biossance + Dr. Dennis Gross + Ole Henrickson = TOP FAVS + well priced especially considering the return of these products.  Investing in a bit at a time helps as well as using enough/not to much and ensuring you fully use all of the product.  I've cut tubes open to get the rest of the product out.  I do NOT waste my skincare products and I ensure that I use ALL of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and loved it so much I bought the full size.  This cream is lightweight on my skin and absorbs nicely without leaving my skin greasy or shiny.  I think the squalane has helped with my hyperpigmentation and pimple scars as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
