reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is my go to for my skin. It smells a little funky but it is extremely moisturizing for my combination skin, which gets a little more dry in some seasons. It's my go to! Really helps it hydrate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW!  Great product.  I have very sensitive skin but had heard great things and figured try it out during the spring sale. The first morning after i used it at night my skin was soft and hydrated. Been using it for 2 weeks and I have added it in my regular night time routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thick, rich and creamy. Leaves my skin feeling well moisturized, plump, and dewy after. No oily residue. My skin is typically very dry (especially around my nose) my skin feels very quenched after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 27 and recently started to notice that oil free moisturizers didn't provide enough hydration for me. At first I thought this cream would be too heavy but it's perfect for my acne prone combo skin. This feels very soothing and moisturizing and absorbs beautifully. It's great for sealing in all your serums and is plumping. I previously used the biossance gel cream, and this one provides more of a moisture barrier with just a small amount. The smell is faint and you do not smell it when it's on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Listen. This moisturizer is everything, from the company's focus on sustainability down to the fact that I'm now a radiant goddess. It's perfect for my normal to dry skin. I use this at night and wake up perfectly moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I thought it would be a good fit but it always breaks me out. I'll go through phases of using it because it's a full jar in my cabinet but this is the last time. I have 5+ new zits on my face after using for the past 1.5 weeks. To recover I'm using cold pressed jojoba oil as a moisturizer that's simple and my skin has started to clear up. The gel one they make is much better but still prefer my origins moisturizer because it's cheaper and doesn't bother my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a smell but not overwhelming it's bearable.  It has like a medium thickness consistency to it.  So I find you can wear it on its own and makes the skin soft or pack your skin with other products like serum, other hydrating cream and use biossance as the last step as a barrier.  Help maintain all the good stuff in your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin so I like a moisturizer that feels creamy and doesn't dissipate too fast.  This one does the trick.  I will definitely buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail moisturizer. This is the best moisturizer I have found and I have tried a lot. Better than drunk elephant. I have sensitive skin and this makes it feel  amazing. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer/repair cream! It does smell a little funky but it's definitely not a strong smell and it's not overpowering. I have normal skin but I'm prone to dry spots  around my nose. This cream eliminates the dry spots, shrinks my pores and leaves my skin smooth. Its a great winter moisturizer. I like the probiotic gel cream in the spring & summer when my skin isn't as prone to dry spots. But this is one perfect during the winter because it's heavier and it's also great after using an exfoliating soap or mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Breastfeeding has given me super dry skin that is textured (no amount of increased water consumption was helping). I was at the point where I was putting on face creams multiple times throughout the day. That in combination with little sleep was wreaking havoc on my skin. After using this for a couple days, my skin has improved drastically. It's comfortable to wear during the day as well. Doesn't feel heavy or sticky.   Yes, it does smell quite terribly. BUT you can literally smell it for only a few seconds before it dissipates. Just breathe through your mouth during application. I prefer this than fragranced creams. Totally worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the oil face wash of this line but for me the cream was okay. I have a really dry and dehydrated skin, this cream feels reallllly good on the skin but it was the first time I spent so much money on a moisturizer so I was expecting better results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second jar of this stuff! I use it at night and I wake up with the most supple, well hydrated, glowing skin! This moisturizer is emollient and I know some people don't like the smell (its fragrance free though!), but it is extremely effective at hydrating and repairing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this at night. I don't find it overly thick where it's sitting on my face like the DE Protini peptide (which I do like) I find that it sinks in nicely and doesn't break me out. AND YES it smells like feet but you don't smell it unless you stick your entire nose in the jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample. I didn't notice any bad smell as others have stated. I don't have sensitive skin by any means. I started to notice a bunch of little red bumps around my cheeks and down to my chin. I finally stopped using this product and it took about a month for my skin to go back to normal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price... it's not worth it. It doesn't absorb well and it feels heavy on the skin. I won't purchase again. Feels more like a night time mask to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Being a lover of light, fresh scents....I hate the smell. But the smell does disappear once you put it on. And for any real skincare junkie you'll get past it since the concession is baby soft skin without the grease. I first tested the sample and fell in love enough to buy the full jar from the actual Biossance website [because it shipped faster than Sephora]. I hope Biossance never discontinues this eitherwise I'd be S.O.L.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this in my nighttime routine because it is so hydrating. The only con is the smell. I hate the smell but after i put it on, i don't really smell it; it is just the initial part of getting it out of the bottle that i smell. But other than that, i love this. I have somewhat normal to combination skin and it does not leave me feeling greasy or oily. It simply leaves my skin soft and moisturized. Def recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always had nice skin but now that I'm approaching my 30's, the drinks and late nights are catching up. I've tried a LOT of masques but this one is different - my skin not only feels amazing after rinsing it off, it still feels amazing well into the following days! The brightness in my skin is returning and it actually feels healthy again. 100% worth the price!

reviews.review_title: Smell funny but good for a night time cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to find a good deal on Biossance website and got it $20 off the retailer price. I would purchase it again as it works great for a nighttime cream, except it smells funny, but tolerable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I love this moisturizer. One of the best ones I've used. It really moisturizes the skin well and also has good ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually can't use new products because my skin will react. This only made my skin better. I have acne prone skin. I saw it reduce my redness and evened out my skin tone. It gives a glowing effect. I have combination/oil skin and I thought this would be too heavy. It is thick, but you only need a pea size amount. My skin feels plump and alive after I use it. Totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good moisturizer, but it's too greasy for me. I have to use it at night because it's too oily to put makeup over and it takes forever to sink into my skin. The one thing I cannot abide is the smell. Everytime I put it on my face I think it's gone bad, even though it's brand new. Will not repurchase when I run out but I will continue to use it at night until it's gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute go to moisturizer. Now in my mid 30's, my years of zero skincare and sun exposure have started to catch up to me. I have definitely combination skin, dry around my eyes and in the middle of my forehead and cheeks, but oily around my nose and hairline. This product works very well for me. I use it every single day, day and night. More at night, lighter amount during the day. (Especially if I'm going to wear makeup.) I love that it seems to lock in my serums and treatments. I do not notice any smell, and I also don't find it oily as others have complained about. I also have chronically chapped lips and use this over my lips at night which has made a dramatic improvement. For me, this is a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav moisturizer!! Makes my skin super hydrated and soft!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great moisturizing cream. I love the texture (not too heavy, not too light).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this at night time because it's a bit too heavy during the daytime for me. When I first tried it I thought it smelled bad, but I think it was just me getting in my head after reading all the comments about it smelling bad. To me it doesn't really have much of a smell at all which is fine with me. It's very creamy, deeply hydrating (which I need being on tretinoin) and sinks in pretty quickly. I also use this around my eyes as an eye cream and it's doing wonders keeping my eye area hydrated and plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed improvements within a week using, had a fare up with Rosacea..redness in T-zone area and small tiny red bumps on nose and forehead, so I gave this a try and skin is almost back to normal. Definitely would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to buy the trial size before investing in the big jar. I've heard amazing things about biossance and was so excited to try! I have very dry skin and have been looking for a moisturizer that provides me hydration without feeling greasy. Unfortunately this was just not it. It did make my skin feel soft, but I felt as if the product just sat on my face afterwards and didn't fully absorb into my skin. My skin felt greasy and cakey. I would only use as a night time moisturizer. I prefer the squalene + probiotic gel moisturizer from biossance. I really like that one so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased a sample through my points. This is a very thick moisturizer (which I loved) with a  peculiar smell. It's not the best smelling moisturizer but the smell didn't bother me really ( I don't really know how to describe it). I found that my sample actually lasted me awhile which was awesome! However, I did find that this moisturizer really didn't do much for my skin. I noticed that it made my already oily skin even worse throughout the day. I did also get a few minor breakouts nothing crazy though.  This is a moisturizer that I have no plans on purchasing in the future BUT if you are interested in it I'd definitely recommend getting a sample or two first before purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it's very moisturizing and the smell to me isn't as horrible as everyone says it is. it gets three stars because all though it does feel good on the skin, it doesn't seem to be as repairing as it says it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for many years. I do love how hydrating it is. It's gentle and a little goes a long way. It doesn't have much of a smell which I don't mind....it's hydration is incredible though! One downfall, it does leave the skin a little oily after a couple of hours.

reviews.review_title: Works Well on Dry Skin, but Smells Unpleasant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the sample twice daily for a week now, and it is wonderful for my dry skin. My skin is very moisturized all day and leaves my skin smooth and awake. However, I can see this being too greasy for normal to oily skin. The creamy texture is on the oily side, like any other squalane product I have used before. The biggest draw back is the smell. It's a pro and con. Pro because it's clearly formulated with added scents, but I wish they would somehow neutralize the smell. It smells like a cross between melted plastic and feet that is really hard to get past. However, it disappears shortly after application when it gets absorbed and not strong enough for others to notice on you. If you are someone who have dry skin and sensitive to a variety of perfumes and essential oils, I would recommend this. I would consider purchasing the full size, but I will be trying out other products first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros - it is hydrating and locks in any serums or concentrates you put on prior Cons - it's probably hydrating because it's very greasy. It doesn't seem to absorb into my skin as easily as their resurfacing serum so it leaves a greasy feeling after application. It also has a funky odor I imagine because of the all-natural ingredients, but it doesn't last very long.

reviews.review_title: I thought I was the only one who didn't like smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of the cream is great for my dry skin and it is not too greasy or sticky or anything like that on the face. But it does NOT smell good. So if you're looking for something that smells good, then you don't want this (unless you like the smell of shoyu). But to a point it's good because you know there's no added perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not awful I just didn't feel any difference in my skin. It is a bit of a tacky and sticky formula when first applying which I'm not a huge fan of. It smells ok but overall it's not worth the price. Better to save your money for tatcha or fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too bad the smell is terrible ... I was looking forward to washing my face again right after using it. It smells like wet dog... However, very hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is so awful that I thought that it was expired... I ended up using it as a moisturizer for my feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this because I've heard such great reviews & I do love other Biossance products. I received a sample of this product & my skin slightly feels irritated/burning when I apply it.. and also I really do not like how it smells. My skin is on the dryer side & somewhat sensitive but I do not have a reaction like this with many moisturizers. Wouldn't recommend this for sensitive skin but maybe it works for some people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not good for my sensitive and dry skin. Feeling dry, and I don't like the smell. Not feeling repaired. Any hydration cream would be better than this. Will not buy this again for sure. Just wondering if there is an unlike list so I can put the things I don't like in the unlike list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and it cleared away my bumpy forehead! It's so amazing. I used it on my face and I do not get any breakouts. I introduced the line of products to my mom who claims facial creams burn her skin, she loved it so much I bought her the sample kit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Biossance and my skin loves this moisturizer. I took one star off because of the packaging - I hate dipping my fingers into the pot. I'm actually buying a new one as my first pot started smelling off and it's only two thirds gone. Biossance should change to a dispenser of some kind (Drunk Elephant's pump style comes to mind) or provide a small scoop that can be washed between uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and the whole Biossance line. I have sensitive, acne prone skin that get irrated easily.  I feel very safe whenever i use Biossance product. My skin has been very stable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this brand from Shiseido. It gave my face a burnt feeling a little during the first 2 weeks. But after that I see a drastic improvement in facial surface and smoothness. I am stunning by the result in a matter of weeks. I am using this along with other Biossance products which helped boost the improvement faster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While is is very moisturizing I can not get used to the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a nice cream for sure, and great ingredients (love that its fragrance free). However, the price is such a dealbreaker. It performs like a regular moisturizer for someone with normal skin. I don't have VERY dry skin but when I wake up with this moisturizer my skin is dry. For the price point it's just not worth it because it's nothing special. Also it only lasted me like a month and a half. I give it 3 stars for the lightweight feel and great ingredients, but it was just not for me. If you have really dry skin I wouldn't say this is a miracle product for you (and it should be for the price...). Still like the brand tho and that the squalane is ethically sourced

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this with my points. When I used it I loved the way it made my skin feel. I have dry sensitive skin and this moisturizer really made my skin feel hydrated and plump. However the next morning I woke up with little bumps all over my forehead. I stopped using it for a few days and the bumps went away. So I tried to use it again and woke up with tiny bumps on my forehead again. This was the only new product I added to my skincare routine. I really wish it didn't make me break out because it felt really nice on my skin. I would recommend if you don't have sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream! I've used up two samples and I'm about to purchase the full size because my skin craves it! I have acne prone combo skin and it helps keep my skin glowy, It's thick but soaks into my skin without leaving it greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST nighttime moisturizer ever!! The air where I live is very dry and no other moisturizers that I tried could quench my dry skin, but after a few nights of using this my skin is soft and supple again! My skin is also very sensitive and I am prone to eczema and redness on my cheeks, but after using this the redness and a few dark spots on my cheeks are completely gone. I seriously can't sing this cream enough praises, I'm on my second jar already!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this moisturizer every night for months and LOVE it. I have combination skin that can lean towards dry and this stuff is amazing. It's deeply moisturizing and doesn't cause breakouts. I used it over the winter on my annual trip to Canada and it's the first time my skin wasn't dry. The only drawback is the smell. It doesn't smell great but the results are fabulous. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Do not purchase this cream if you have combination skin that leans towards oily skin. I use it exclusively for the night time. This cream feels too oily on combination/oily skin especially if moisturizer is not the only product you're using in your night time routine. Maybe it's more suitable for other skin types. Noticed breakouts on my forehead the morning after the first time using it, but maybe it was just a coincidence. Haven't noticed any extreme breakouts since, but its just too oily for me. Doesn't feel nice on the skin. I feel it shouldn't be advertised for more oily skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this on top of my DE morning routine! Would purchase full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and live in a very hot and humid climate. Even then, I don't feel like this cream adds to my oiliness at all. My skin feels so hydrated when I wake up and I love how this stuff really glides on and sinks in. Very pleasant experience. People tell me all the time my skin looks glowing and I have to equate it to this cream. One thing to note is this is too heavy to wear in the day, only good for a night cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this along with the night serum. SO GOOD! I'm an oily girl so a little goes a long way for me and it gives me the healthiest glow when I wake up! It does take a while to sink into the skin but that doesn't stop me from loving this stuff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically have combination skin but lately my skin has been on the very dry side. This product keeps my skin hydrated and plump ALL day. I put a lot more of it on at night and use it kind of as a mask. However, if you have oily skin this product will be a little too much for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a good moisturizer for people with dry skin, but I found that it was too thick and has too many emollients for my oily skin. Although the product says it's good for oily skin, I would be cautious when using and purchasing this product. I've found that the squalane and ceramides in this cream together over time ended up clogging my pores and making my skin break out. I also had small acne dots under the surface of my skin that an esthetician ending up extracting.

reviews.review_title: Good for Oily skin in winter!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer. I have oily and dehydrated skin and I bought a sample with my points. It's a very thick moisturizer, but not as thick as a night cream. Even though it is thick, I really feel it absorb into my skin and I don't feel like it's sitting on top of my skin. It's GREAT as a pre-makeup moisturizer. I don't know what fragrance people are talking about. It smells like the ingredients that are in it, just like all the Elemis products smell like the plants they put in it. I've never had a problem with either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had hoped this would be a good cold-weather cream but it's too thick for my skin, which tolerates Kiehls Ultra Repair and Dr Jarts Ceramide well; I started getting small pimples after the first day of use.

reviews.review_title: weird earthy smell, hydrating, nice consistency
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I wasn't sure how to feel about this product. The smell really turned me off but I decided to keep using it. After using it for a week, my skin was more supple and my pores were smaller. Unfortunately, to my disappointment the results didn't last long. That's usually how my skin is though. It responds to a new product initially but then it stops working. I still continued using it because i like the hydration it provided and the consistency. The smell is a big turn off but I continue using it in hopes of one day getting the results i initially got. :D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am trying a sample of this product, obtained with my VIP points. I normally don't care much about the perfume, I actually prefer low or natural/plant flavors. This cream has a mild smell which is however really difficult to handle for me. I find it to be so so unpleasant at the point that I would not buy the product! Noticed some pimples also after use of the cream for over 7-10 days. not my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes you break out. I tried all biossance (got the kit) and cystic acne on skin even from use 1. I waited for 2 days, cysts subdued and tried again just to see(I'm an idiot) and it broke out. Please don't buy this until u get a teeny weeny bit of it as a sample a d you patch tested it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't write reviews. I've been a VIB Rouge for maybe 8+ years.. but I felt obligated to warn others about this product. I'm not sure if Sephora sold an expired jar, but the smell is really off-putting.. I tried using it for a little under a month, but the horrible, seemingly algae smell is too much. I won't be returning, I had it on my vanity for a few months or so before using, but definitely not trying again. Before you buy, I would suggest have a quick whiff, and if it smells off, maybe go with something something else. I experienced no immediate, beneficial results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked it in the beginning. I think it is a very good moisturizer however my skin/face feels dull after two months of using this product. Not sure if I need to change my toner or just get a different moisturizer. I may change it up just to see if anything changes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really felt like this gave me a huge punch of moisturizer with a nice finish and feelu2014and I'm very sensitive to textures.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skin felt and looked awesome, wasn't crazy about the smell. I am really into this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It may be pricey but in my opinion it is worth it! I feel hydrated all day, it really locks in moisture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this moisturizer six months ago and fell in love!! Ordered 4 more and used them all up. Very moisturizing during winter months. Didn't feel greasy and caused No breakouts. The only downside is there's not a lot of product in the jar. It only last for about one month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely moisturizing, leaving my face feeling so nice and lasts all day. Love, love, love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing! Perfect for Ottawa (Canada) winters! I have dry and sensitive skin and this did not caused any irritations. But the scent is huge turn-off, very unpleasant, so I gave it 4 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, a great moisturizer! I definitely prefer this to be used overnight rather than in the morning before my SPF and makeup because of its thick texture. My only issue with this moisturizer was that it didn't do amazing things for my skin. Yes it did hydrate it well overnight, but I don't think it was the MOST hydrating product I've ever used. As for the scent, it doesn't really have one. If anything, it is super mild and very clean smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is light and suitable for wearing during the day. It hasn't caused any breakouts.  The smell is unpleasant, but better than an overpowering fragrance. Clean and simple.  I bought this  as a 100 point sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heart Biossance! I'm not old, I don't look old. I'm 30 but this product has made me aware that I have aged  because it's been so good it's reversed it and actually made me aware of how I looked a few years ago. It's a total win! I use it at night with their retinol and it's such a great combo. I'm honestly shocked at how good it is

reviews.review_title: Not too thick or too thin, just perfect.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm surprised reviewers thought this product was thick. I have large pores and can't use drunk elephants Protini or especially LaLaRetro. This is like a lighter whipped protini that does not clog my pores and leaves my face feeling lovely. There's something about putting it on that feels nurturing in an odd way. I've used so many natural products but this one especially my skin gave a bright Yes! to. I use it along with the squalane rose oil and I'm very happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face moisturizer! I have recently moved to Colorado from Florida and my skin was struggling with the dryness. I tried a few other products but this one is exceptional! Love the smell and consistency and it definitely keeps my skin soft and moisture.

reviews.review_title: Had the trial size. Used it all. Won't repurchase
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this. The reviews were amazing, and I desperately needed something to sink into my skin and heal it from over exfoliating. Fortunately, it did keep my skin hydrated, but it never sunk into my skin, so when I went to wash off my face at the end of the day, this cream would get wiped off along with all its hydrating benefits. [sigh...] I wanted to like this so much too! Save your money for Biossense 100% Squalene oil! Now THAT stuff is worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice face cream. I have been using this a night during the winter when my skin is drier. It would be too heavy for me in the summer.  No noticeable fragrance and it sinks in to the skin well.  It leaves my skin feeling moisturized,  unlike some others that after an hour it feels as if I put nothing on. I would recommend if you are looking a for slightly heavier cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thought this would be great for my dry skin but it was surprisingly too heavy and too greasy. My skin couldn't absorb it even in the tiniest amounts. I don't think squalane agrees with my skin. Not a bad product, just not right for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this based on multiple reviews that were nothing but positive from you tube influencers. Unfortunately because i have sensitive skin prone to break out that's exactly what happened. Broke out under my eyes, around my mouth and chin.  Returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing texture and good hudration! Love how fast it absorbs. It was the only cream that didn't burn my skin after using retinol for a few days. It really feels u201ccleanu201d.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product texture of very rich and nourishing; however, it's too heavy and unfortunately lead  to break outs. I'm highly disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a rich but not greasy formula, it absorbs very fast into the skin and the 2nd day I woke up, my skin feels very plumped. Ingredients are extremely well-chosen, but I would not say it helps with fine-lines or anti-aging. Overall, it's a great moisturizer that I would recommend for normal to dry skin, or combo skin for winder time

reviews.review_title: Good clean product with no visible results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's not a bad cream. I like the ingredients of this cream. Because there is no fragrance, it smells a little sea-foody (because of the omega, I assume). I've used it for a few days, I can't say I've noticed any difference compared to my regular moisturizer and night cream. Not sure if I'll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been suffering EXTREMELY dry skin this winter, way more so than what was normal for me.  During this time I ran out of my previous skincare regimen (which honestly, wasn't helping much with the dry skin anyway. My skin just drank it up, and after 5 mins it felt like I had never used anything at all.) I needed a new moisturizer until the one I ordered (from a DIFFERENT well known line) came.  I'm sure I damaged my skin horribly by using this drugstore moisturizer somehow... my face WAS ANGRY.  I was hoping it was just resurfacing from my resurfacing cleanser. But it continues FOR WEEKS, and  I have been using that, every other day, for a year and a half with no issues. When the new moisturizer came, IT GOT WORSE. My face would burn HORRIBLY, and it seemed like my face didnt even want to absorb it... I ended up up with red, dry/flaky patches on my neck, and under my eyes were peeling and so sore.  Enter in Biossance. I bought the ENTIRE  anti-aging line and my face loved it immediately  After using this moisturizer, my face is finally so soft and not peeling/burning anymore... Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can tell it is a good quality moisturizer. It is just not for my skin :( Too heavy and broke me out a bit. I have combination/acne-prone skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal/slightly combo skin.  I only took one star away because it's too moisturizing for my face.  So it sits on my skin a tad and makes me oily.  But the product is great.  So if you need some moisture in your life this is the moisturizer for you.  I now use their gel moisturizer everyday and I'm never switching!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best moisture cream!  I have highly reactive/sensitive and dehydrated skin. I recently had incredible dryness where no moisturizer or oil was helping. Literally 10 mins after applying something my skin was so dry and absolutely no oil. I think I damaged my skin barrier. So step in Biossance cream. Wow. Within one use my skin felt more plump and hydrated. Safe to use AM and PM, but now that my skin is finally re hydrated, I'll prob just use at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't break me out, not greasy at all, moisturizing BUT yes, it really stinks. But I can deal with it knowing that it works for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually use this as an eye cream since i got free sample sizes. works like a sleeping eye mask and I don't get puffy eyes anymore. giving it four stars because of the annoying smell of cheese. i prefer skincare without any fragrance but thankfully the smell doesn't bother my skin. I also have combination skin and it hasn't broken me out in the 2 weeks or so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cream.  I bought it after I had a bad reaction to retinol.  It definitely helped my skin recover, which was the positive... unfortunately it also led to horrible breakouts.  If it weren't for breaking out my skin so bad I would have definitely kept using it (even ignoring the unpleasant smell).  I think if you're lucky enough to not breakout, this cream would do wonders plumping and softening your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer. I use it more in the summer and fall months, when it's a bit warmer. I use something that's more hydrating in the colder months. I do like the way this moisturizer goes on and soaks in, it does not sit on your skin like other moisturizers do. I tend to use it at night because I prefer to use a moisturizer with SPF in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They recommended this moisturizer to me in store so I got a sample to take home before I bought anything for my dry skin especially since it's so high priced. The moment I put it on my skin it was so soft, refreshed and glowy. I was in love and decided to finish using the sample for the next couple of days and then go buy the jar. THANK GOD I DIDNT. I broke out after the 3-4th day of using it on my cheeks and I never break out on those areas so that's how I knew this product was not for me. A great moisturizer but I'm sad it broke me out especially since my skin doesn't normally do that to begin with except on my nose (which also broke out even more)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Biossance products have it all in my book. First and foremost, they work really well. I  am in my 50s but have taken good care of my skin and I am very picky about my products. They're made from good clean ingredients. And the packaging is great u2014 beautiful but mostly paper and glass, and the containers are either little pots or bottles that the top comes off of so I can get all the product out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of high end moisturizers & some are not worth the price tag. I put this on and was so impressed. The texture, feel, & quality were superb. When I woke up in the AM, my skin was still dewy. I got this as a sample, but when I finish my current moisturizer, I am 100% buying this.

reviews.review_title: Oily finish, clogged pores, extreme breakout
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample. On first use, it felt oily (although I normally love thick creams). I had high hopes for the product because it is on the clean list and I used it for about 1 week before my face completely broke out - chin, cheeks, and temple. Oily finish, clogged pores, extreme breakout - everyone's skin need are different but I personally wouldn't recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is the best moisturizer I've ever used. Yes, the smell is not great but I'd prefer a natural scent of whatever is really working vs a fragrance on my skin. I've had dry, flaky skin on the sides of my nose and drier cheeks for as long as I can remember, and no other moisturizer fixed the dryness. After one night of use, this cream did. It's not greasy at all and absorbs easily, and has become my go-to moisturizer for most nights.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First face cream that has thoroughly moisturized my face from morning till night u2014 no tightness or flakes mid day even through the rough Chicago winter. As an added bonus it literally leaves behind zero grease. Instead it settles down to a smooth, velvet-like finish that feels like you've already applied primer. Best face cream ever for my dry/combination skin, and the only one I've been thoroughly satisfied with through my 15  years of trial and error.

reviews.review_title: the best thing that has happened to my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is awesome. I have combo sensitive skin and it just melts in and smooths out any bumps  without feeling sticky or greasy. It didn't wear great under makeup with sunscreen so I'm keeping it to nighttime use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: amazing texture and consistency but i felt like i had to use A LOT of product. the smell IS bad but it wears off quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product! This really helped me out when I was using tretinoin for my acne which made a skin super dry and flaky. After using this for over a month, I can say that it repaired and strengthened my moisture barrier. And I also don't think the cream really smells like anything. The cream has a very light non-offensive scent that I don't even notice. I've already bought my second container!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice, thick cream for dry skin. I got mine as a 100 point reward and the tiny jar has already lasted me well over two weeks. I haven't noticed a bad smell that other reviewers have mentioned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't recommend this product because of the smell and my skin did not feel like it was moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although this product has nice texture and is moisturizing, it smells terrible! I am mixing a few drops of tea tree in to cover the smell up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample and my skin loves it. I've tried other products in the Biossance line and have been super impressed. And it's packaged in glass that can be recycled! I wanted to try a heavier night time moisturizer during the winter and this stuff is great. It soaks right in, doesn't feel greasy, no irritation or breakouts, and I don't wake up feeling tight. I've had been using the Biossance gel moisturizer for daytime and really like it but it's been pilling a bit and not playing well with the Tatcha sunscreen/ pore perfecter, which I also love. I tried the Omega Repair under the Tatcha and I think I found a new perfect daytime combo. Win-win! Happy skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Attempted to use product but I could not stand the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd rather have a cream that actually does what it says than one that just smells good bc it's full of perfume. This cream is amazing and it really works. The smell takes some getting used to but I am in my mid-30s and expecting my second child. I want something clean yet effective and this is it. Don't be put off by the smell just because they don't want to have overly-drying perfumes in there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product but...  1. It smells like dirty socks  2. It doesn't really u201crub inu201d or absorb that well. It just sits on my face and feels waxy almost!? 3. Honestly not that moisturizing and repairing feeling. Just feels like a mediocre hand cream. WAY overpriced for the quality.   Laneige is way better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this cream is just horrendous omg !!! Won't purchase it just because of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I got this in trial size from a friend and only used it because my Clinique Moisture Surge ran out and I needed a nighttime moisturizer before I could run out and get more of my usual stuff.  At first I wasn't very happy with the smell or texture of this cream and told myself I would only use it for this emergency.  However, after a few nights of using it  consistently (was too lazy to get to my nearest Sephora quick enough, apparently), I started to notice how much I would glow the next day and how soft my skin was becoming.  I eventually used the whole trial size and absolutely love it.  I looked up the ingredients on the EWG website and found this was rated a 1 so I'm very happy with that as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Holy. Grail. I have been looking for a moisturizer that actually soaks into my face instead sitting on top of it but doesn't leave my face feeling heavy. I actually use this as a day cream and for the first time in over a decade went foundation free because of the nice glow and radiance this gives my skin. The smell is a but musty like old gym shoes but it doesn't linger at all once you rub it in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product although it does turn my face a bit red. I have sensitive skin and am use to getting random reactions. I still find this products works great so I use it sparingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I went my whole life thinking my skin was super oily.  I'd try moisturizer after moisturizer and they all just sat ontop of my skin, making it even more oily.  I recently found out my skin is actually dry, and the moisturizers I was using weren't penetrating the skin to actually provide the moisture.  This moisturizer is the only one that actually works.  My true test of a good moisturizer is if I wake up in the morning after washing my face and using the moisturizer the night before and seeing if my skin is oily. The first time I tried it, I was so pleasantly surprised.  I never write reviews for products, but I felt this one deserved it.  Seriously, if you feel like you've tried everything and want to give up, try this first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a trial size of this and although it is very moisturizing, it's not my fav and not worth the price point in my opinion.  It claims that it doesn't leave your face greasy but it does and it doesn't sit well under makeup.  If you use this, use it before bed.  I also have to agree on the smell, it doesn't smell great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It took me about a week to fall in love with it. I don't care about the lack of scent. I prefer unscented, but I don't smell what others smell. It's just a scent free cream. There's no crazy odor. I use this at night and it keeps my face hydrated until morning. Very happy that I could sample (with points) two jars before deciding it's fantastic. I see calmer skin, almost no redness (I have rosacea) and overall youthful appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cream as it goes on smooth and is very moisturizing...however, the smell is HORRENDOUS. The cream smells like a sweaty jockstrap that has been left in a gym bag for a week. I wish I were exaggerating. The good thing is that the smell dissipates very quickly. So, if you can hold your breath while you first rub it in, then you're good to go. But really, Biossance would do well to try and fix that issue. I would say I would give this 3.5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a sample size and I really like it. I have oily/combination skin and it didn't break me out at all. It's a great moisturizer when your skin is feeling dry and I also noticed the lines on my forehead less visible. It does have a weird smell when applied to the face but it goes away right after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was very hydrating, and it made my skin feel very smooth and soft. Oftentimes, Squalane leaves my skin feeling greasy, but this cream didn't leave a shiny residue on my face. I'm definitely considering buying a full size.

reviews.review_title: WASTE OF MONEY( gives me breakouts)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews for a product but this time I had to come up here because I HATE this thing. This is so overpriced and such a WASTE of my money....... First of all it gave me breakouts over my chin and my jaw. I didn't want to think it was this so I tried to use it again after my break out went away. Nope, my face broke out again!!!!!!!! I don't know too much about ingredients but I bought this because I saw all kinds of skincare channels raving about the ingredients in this.  In addition, I feel like the texture is really weird, it is almost waxy and it does want to blend out on my skin evenly or skin in. It leaves a film on my skin with a white cast, not that I mind the white cast b/c I use this product at night, but I mean I have dryer skin and I live in upstate NY(winter here is terrible)so I like heavy things. This thing is heavy but it is floating on the top of the skin, not really moisturizing. Plus it smells like straight plastic.  Anyways, PLEASE DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY on this product, it is stupidly expensive. Go get something else like the Curel cream or the belief moisturizing cream (not the gel version) or anything else. Please guys, I think even cetaphile at the drugstore works better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would say that this moisturizer was actually very drying for me.  I have oily/combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a game changer! I was stuck using FRESH night time moisturizer to try and keep the dryness at bay in the winter on the PNW. I wanted to step away from fragrance and have tried unsuccessfully to find something that wouldn't agitate my acne prone/sensitive skin until now! This moisturizer is incredible. My skin isn't dry anymore (which I never thought possible) and looking so dewy and clear! Best moisturizer I've ever used. Worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this free with my points, only because I didn't like the other options.  I'm thrilled that I actually used it because it is the best cream I have ever found for my combination oily, clog prone skin.  I am 59 years old, and the last year or so my cheeks have been getting very dry, and nothing I tried really seemed to help.  Even with moisturizer and a hydrating foundation, my skin still looked dry and lackluster.  I have to be careful what I use on my skin because it is very prone to clogging and whiteheads, so I had started layering several lighter weight products to try to moisturize my skin,  This cream is like a miracle.  First of all, there is no detectable fragrance which I love!  It hydrates my skin beautifully, yet does not cause my pores to clog or cause breakouts.  Wears beautifully under makeup.  I have been using it morning and night since I tried it, and I am going to Sephora today to buy the full size jar.  I would give this cream 100 stars if I could, it is that wonderful.  I want to say thank you Biossance for making this fabulous cream.  I am so happy that I found it.

reviews.review_title: Wow!!!!! Permanent addition to my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this using my points and I am pleasantly surprised by this product. I already loved the sqalane oil for my hair and skin, but this is amazing! My face feels so hydrated and smooth! Absorbs quickly even though it's a thick cream. After using this for only a week, I can already see a huge difference in my skin. Will definitely be purchasing the full size! The 11 lines between my eyebrows has virtually disappeared and nothing I've tried has helped..... until now! Get this one! You won't regret it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always see such wonderful reviews about this product so I used my points and got a sample. I'm not sure if the sample was bad but the smell was horrible, rancid. I used a small amount anyway and had to wash it off within an hour. I ended up with a red rash and itchy skin. I'm glad I didn't spend money on this product. A fragrance that bad makes me want to stay away from all their products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. Very thick and moisturizing. A little goes a long way. I notice a real difference in my skin when I consistently use this everyday. The scent isn't great, but it doesn't bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not super impressed by this moisturizer. It wasn't too rich which was nice but I didn't feel very moisturized after using. The price is pretty steep for uneventful outcome. Won't be buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product about a week, and I'm really enjoying it. I was looking for something really hydrating for this time of year, but not too heavy, as my last moisturizer was a little heavy (still a fave though). So far I like it a lot. its smooth and lightweight. I think it looks really good under my makeup as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased a sample of this with my beauty points and i am thoroughly impressed! I've been using it under my eyes at night time and under my primer for about a month. It has done wonders for my dark circles and gives skin a generally healthier feel as well. I will be purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. My skin has never looked better - it is so soft, and very hydrating. I had dry spots on my face that have completely disappeared!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The amount of product for the cost is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I love the way this moisturizer leaves my skin feeling, and I feel it is SUPER hydrating, it is worth mentioning that it leaves my skin quite oily before it fully absorbs. The oily feeling I experience doesn't last more then an hour usually, however I would definitely have liked to know that prior to trying it. Other then that this is an amazing moisturizer with quality ingredients.u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!!! I live in Colorado and this winter has been brutal on my skin. I'm sensitive/dry/red and this is doing a wonderful job of evening out skin tone with a great amount of hydration and NO BREAK OUTS!!!! Even my husband is stealing this from me, if you are thinking about it go for it. The price is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample with my beauty points.  I couldn't even use the sample because it had a rancid smell to it. I love Biossance's rose oil!  Not sure if I got a bad sample or if there is something wrong with this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in my recent order and didn't really have any expectations. I have dry and sensitive skin and figured I would test this out. It has a really lovely and thick texture, and it is quite hydrating. It does take a bit to truly sink into the skin so this works better if you use it at night. It doesn't really have a smell, its fragrant free, which is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live in a dry climate, so having a reliable moisturizer is crucial, especially in the winter months. I made the decision to switch the natural skincare products and I've had great success with a cleanser, serums, and eye cream, but I'm really struggling with a moisturizer. After reading reviews and doing some research, I thought this one sounded like a good fit but I was a little disappointed in this cream because I found that it sat on top of my skin for most of the day instead of sinking in. It didn't cause any problems like break outs or irritation but it just made my skin feel sort of sticky and heavy, which I didn't like. I prefer when my moisturizer absorbs and leaves my skin feeling supple and hydrating but not weighed down. Unlike many of the other users, I didn't mind the smell very much and I love the ingredients list so I'm bummed that it didn't work out for me but it just wasn't a good fit. It's still worth trying a sample size because it seems to work so well for other people but it just wasn't compatible with my skin and my preferences.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a heavy hydrating cream for Canadian winter that would replace my absolute fave (Lala retro) but this sadly wasn't as hydrating as I wanted for a night cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in one of my Play! boxes and didn't think I would use it. I figured it would be one of the samples I tossed aside. I started using it as my going to the gym cream, when I needed to put something on, but I noticed how amazing my skin looked and felt when I used it. Needless to say, it has graduated to being one of the face creams i use regularly, and I always scoop it up if it's available as a reward or beauty offer. It wears beautifully and really calms my sensitive skin. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample and love how thick and rich this feels especially on my dry winter skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with my rewards not too long ago. I've used up most of it but couldn't finish it due to the strong smell. I liked that it was super hydrating but just couldn't stand the odd smell. Similar to other reviews, I thought it smelled like cheese or even u201cfishyu201d at times. It was a gradual smell and wasn't initially this odorous. Otherwise, would have given 5/5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised by this! DE's Protini is my go to but I ran out and decided to just use the deluxe sample I got of this. I'm not normally a fan of richer/thicker creams but this one didn't feel suffocating or heavy at all. I have combo skin and my usually oily t-zone didn't get oily at all. Skin felt perfectly hydrated and moisturized, balanced and refreshed. It wears beautifully under makeup. All I put on on top was a bb cream (also ran out of my Armani foundation) and got a bunch of compliments on my skin. By end of day make up is still intact, better than usual! Very impressed and now buying full size of this instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Rich and creamy and absorbs well into the skin. I personally love rich moisturizers so this was perfect for my dry and sensitive skin. You use really little because it is so hydrating and absorbs well into the skin. The smell is NOT that bad and is definitely tolerable. Please do your research on how essential oils and fragrance is damaging to the skin and the long term effects on it. It is much better to have no fragrance in skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this with my points and it is fantastic on my dry winter skin! No fragrance. I would actually buy a full size of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very nice. thick and creamy but a little went a long way. left my skin feeling babysoft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great, rich night time moisturizer that doesn't have fragrance or essential oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure why some people are complaining about the scent of this moisturizer. It is really not that bad. There is no reason why skincare should have added fragrance! I have dry skin during the winter months and this skin leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plump all day. New favorite for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff STINKS! Like cheese and feet.  I honestly thought it had gone rancid when I first put it on my face, until I did some research and learned about Valerian Root. Turns out this ingredient is great for skin, bad your nose! Ha.  But other than that I think this is a great moisturizer. It's got a dense texture, but leaves your skin feeling hydrated rather than greasy, and my sensitive skin looks slightly less red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a deluxe sample with my VIB points and LOVE this stuff.  I have sensitive skin already and had a Skinpen micro-needling treatment the other week, so had to be even more gentle with my skin, while still wanting to use great ingredients to maximize my results.  This cream has been amazing.  I'm looking plump and smooth without irritation.  While applying, it has a faint smell of really good Valerian root, which does stink, but that disappears once dry.  And if you equate Valerian with good things like I do, no big deal.  I much prefer to not have perfume in my skincare products, since I can't use anything with added fragrance.  My only issue is that jar packaging tends to make ingredients degrade faster and allow more bacteria into the product over the course of its life, so I prefer tube packaging.  It looks less glamorous, but I like my products to work just as well on their last day as their first.  I added this to my favorites list anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really really love this product. The feel is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a deluxe sample with my points and I'm glad I did. I really enjoyed using this moisturizer, its rich and hydrating and when I wake up, my skin is soft and less red and inflamed. I think a lot of people will enjoy using this. My only complaint is that the smell is not pleasant if you're sensitive to smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After just two weeks of using this cream, the texture of my skin has completely changed. My skin is smooth, soft, fine lines are no longer visible and little imperfections are GONE! My skin looks the best it has looked in such a long time. I have minimal rosacea that has completely disappeared since using this cream. I couldn't be happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I also got the deluxe sample of this and thank goodness I didn't buy it. It leaves an oily film on my skin and it makes me feel like my face is suffocating. It's also causing breakouts and I'm not prone to them at all. It's just not the right product for me. I have a very sensitive sense of smell and didn't find it to be as extreme as many others so maybe they are working on that?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial size sample of this. I am on the hunt for pretty much all new skincare products after being diagnosed with a fragrance and linalool allergy. I also have very dry skin. This cream fit the bill with clean ingredients and no sensitizing essential oil extracts. It's a very nice rich cream that's perfect for daytime wear during the winter months. I personally don't find it has a bad small at all - it smells like nothing. I will be purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream more than food probably. Absolute miracle in a jar, leaves my combo skin smooth and glowing and DOES NOT clog pores or cause acne, it actually helped me with my overall texture and got rid of tiny bumps I had on my cheeks. My sister with dry skin loves it too, works great for her as well. I recommended it to all my friends and they fell in love with it, one friend told me that it saved her skin when she went to Norway and it was freezing cold. She had cracks from the cold and after applying this cream, they went away in a few days! This is definitely a night cream because it is a bit heavy and leaves a slight shine but it quickly goes away and I can feel my skin hydrated and nourished throughout the night.  I recommend it to everyone but especially to people with oily, sensitive and acne prone skin. It will do wonders! The smell is not the best not gonna lie but at least they don't put any fragrance in it so you know it's all natural. Biossance products are absolutely amazing and I swear by this brand, very gentle but extremely effective!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to swear by Drunk Elephant's Lala Retro moisturizer but after moving to a new state with a different climate my skin got super dry and dehydrated and my skin's moisture barrier got basically destroyed. I tried for months to get my skin looking and feeling good again and to restore my barrier. Nothing seemed to do the trick so once I ran out of my DE moisturizer I bought this and I am so glad I did! Within days my skin is more hydrated, moisturized and supple feeling than it has in a long time! It also is a rich, thick cream but doesn't leave you feeling greasy and it doesn't feel heavy. Also works well under makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream hydrates and moisturizes my face without leaving a greasy feeling.  Keeps my skin from drying up all day.  Would give this product 5 stars if it wasn't for the smell, I have to hold my breath when I put this on in the morning and at night, kinda smells like vomit.  But other than that, would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I used to have eczema and this cream really hydrate my skin.  However, it does have a bad smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, and am so glad it doesn't have added fragrance. As someone who suffers from rosacea, that is really appreciated as fragrance can be irritating. Doesn't irritate my skin, and is great for nighttime moisturizing in the dry harsh midwestern winters.

reviews.review_title: after trying everything, this is the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I have dry, sensitive, combination and acne prone skin. I literally tried 10 moisturizers or more last year, to the point where my friends were making fun of me. This moisturizer is the only one I could find besides bee yummy skinfood that made my skin feel hydrated for more than a few hours, like a rich cream, but did not cause break outs. Best of all, it actually reduced my sensitivity and I believe has built up my thin skin, so now I can use products that I was too sensitive for. I hope this never stops being made! My only issue is the unhygienic packaging, although I appreciate the sustainability...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I'm looking at other reviews, I can't fathom someone would down rate a product that actually works just because of the smell if you are a real skincare junkie and take your skin seriously, I'd never get rid of a product that seriously works. Personally, I don't smell anything. This product makes my skin baby smooth and isn't pore-clogging, also it leaves my face fresh and doesn't feel greasy or heavy. I totally would recommend this product! I also love the ingredients in this, there's nothing in this that is problematic and not great for your skin. :)

reviews.review_title: Smells horrible but seems to work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample.  Right off the bat, the aroma is horrible. It smelled like feet. I won't buy it just for that.  If you can get past the smell, then I recommend it. I used it at the end of my nighttime skincare, layering this cream over a lighter gel lotion. I have to say, my skin was silkier than usual the next morning. If it didn't smell so bad, I would actually consider purchasing the product for regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally smells exactly like the old skating rink I went to as a kid: stinky old sweaty skates and burnt popcorn. I am totally serious that's what this smells like! kind of ruins how nice it works.

reviews.review_title: Great if you like the smell of feet....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try something new and really wanted to like this. I tested it out for a few days but (like a lot of other reviewers) I just couldn't get passed the SMELL. Like musty old FEET. The cream has a nice consistency and felt alright on my skin, not too heavy, honestly nothing special though. Not worth the $$ in my opinion. Maybe if they did something about the smell I'd give it another shot because it has a lot of really great ingredients. But as of right now, NO. I'll stick with my Caudalie

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. I'd been using Aveda exclusively for the past 3 years and decided to switch all my haircare/skincare about 6 months ago. After trying a few things, I found Biossance about 2-3 months ago and I've fallen in love. The brand has many of the same beliefs Aveda has and packaging is even kind of similar. The similarities end there. The product actually does what it claims. My skin looks awesome and fine lines and wrinkles I'd been worrying about are slowly diminishing. I love that this product is very rich and thick without being heavy or greasy. It completely settles into my skin after about 30 minutes. When I wake up in the morning, my skin still feels hydrated and looks dewy. My complexion and uneven skin tone has evened out and I haven't had any issues with breakouts on my extremely sensitive skin. I'm really impressed and I will be with this skincare line for a while. I'm using other products in the line as well and I've been equally happy with those. The downfalls are price, but you do get a reasonable amount of product and it lasts, and the smell. I feel like it smells somewhere between homemade bread and a brewery. Very yeasty, earthy smell. I don't hate the smell, I don't love it. For what the product does I can definitely look past it and I'd rather the smell than some nasty chemical fragrance covering it up. I can see it being an issue for some, however. Regardless, I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I'm usually dry with crackling skin and now I can wear foundation with confidence. Thank you to the Sephora cutie for showing me this product. I'm sold!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing!! It has seriously saved my combo skin this winter and works so well with the retinol that Biossance makes. So many people hate the smell but I don't mind it..just smells quite herbal and natural. About to repurchase now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so hydrating and soothing. Really good product!

reviews.review_title: Broke out with numerous small red pimples
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high Hope's for this cream.. sadly I broke out with a bunch of small red spots on my face and neck. Not sure what ingredient I'm reacting to..  Will need to return. Going to try Lala retro as I'm looking for a cream with ceramides to help restore my damaged moisture barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample and *really* wanted to like it for the natural ingredients and being 'Clean at Sephora'... While it provides adequate moisture, I didn't see any major benefits in the 4-5 days that I used it and (as others have mentioned) the smell is AWFUL. Unfortunately, the benefits just don't outweigh the negatives on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: sorry for  only 2 stars.. it stinks. I hate the smell. texture was good but smell awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yuck, I get this is a gift, but it shouldn't come dried up and crusty.
