reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was just ok, the texture is nice and creamy for my dry skin but the scent is awful and it really did nothing for my skin other than keep it from feeling dry and tight. No major benefits

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream probably does what it should, moisturizes and stuff but it smells like feet.. I got it as a part of the sample kit. Retinol serum though smell awesome (like freshly cut grass)!

reviews.review_title: liked product but looked like someone used it -__-
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture and unscented aspects of this cream. My skin feels super hydrated. Upon opening my package, it looked like some cream smudges on the jar lid. Then inside under the seal it looked like there was moisturizer missing. I'm guessing it isn't filled to the top? Disappointed with that. Otherwise, I like the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used the gel moisturizer before and loved it so was pretty excited to receive this as a deluxe sample. However as soon as i started using it i started noticing new breakouts. To be fair, i do have a very sensitive skin and most creams break me out but I figure since the gel moisturizer worked I'd be fine using this one. Will stick to DE Protini or the gel moisturizer from now on. If you have drier skin this might work wonders for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This replaced DE Lala Retro for me since the new formula broke me out. I almost didn't get it because of all the reviews talking about the u201csmellu201d since I'm very scent sensitive. This literally is fragrance free and the minimal scent it does have disappears within seconds. It works really well for my sensitive, dehydrated skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually bought this through Biossance after receiving a free sample. I don't normally use thicker cream moisturizers but tested it out when I had a poor reaction to a glycolic acid and felt like my skin needed extra moisture to help heal. I haven't turned back since.   This has been amazing for my skin, I didn't realize how dehydrated my skin was (combo skin, oily but with flaky patches sometimes) until I started using this. My skin was immediately more hydrated and refreshed looking and I've had numerous coworkers comment on how good my skin is looking since starting to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Quite disappointed with this product, for the high price tag I expected at least some hydration.  But this cream did absolutely nothing to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started off with a trial size of this and realized I loved it.  When using the sample size I did not notice a scent at all, however, when I bought the full size I thought maybe it had expired or wasn't mixing well with my routine as it smelled a bit rancid? Then I saw other reviewers posting about the smell and my second jar has the same scent, so I guess it's just par for the course.  I will say though, this moisturizer is completely worth it.  It's heavy so I use it only at night but I wake up looking hydrated and fresh and clear.  It's seriously amazing.  The scent fades very quickly but the results do not.  I will continue to purchase this and the whole Biossance line, it has done AMAZING things for my skin and I get compliments about my u201cglowu201d all the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first review on Sephora and I have to say this cream does wonders! It is very emolliant and moisturizing for my face. It really does sink in the skin and not set on the surface which was very important. Definitely will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a reward and was excited to try it based on reviews and ingredients. My skin is sensitive/dry and does not break out since I went through Accutane. This is the only thing that changed in my routine that I can think of and the result was tiny clogged pores/texture all over my face and neck, almost like a rash. It's like every pore on my face is elevated. You can't even really tell from looking at my face because it's so small. So needless to say I stopped using after a few days. Not sure why this happened since I can use a lot of other heavy creams with no issue.

reviews.review_title: If want DRY and ASHY face...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is it just me or is this product making my face feel DRY? I was hoping this would add moisture to my face however my face feels dry and looks ashy. In addition, I only bought this a few weeks ago and due to the dryness I had to apply so much product that it's almost done. I wanted to love this but unfortunately wouldn't say this is worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was included in a Biossance set I purchased and I was really disappointed with this product.   Every time I used this product I had to hold my breath (not exaggerating) until I felt like it was rubbed in a good while because the odor was so strong and putrid almost like spoiled seaweed.  I'm not faint hearted so I kept on using it even though I found the odor offensive and the product was so thick I would find myself sweating a minute or two after using it (I would only use it at night due to the consistency, I don't mind thicker products for bedtime).   Even though it claims to be good for all skin types I think this product is definitely better suited for dry skin types because the product sat on top of my skin for far too long after massaging it into my face for quite a bit of time.   I started breaking out (not acne just mild irritation) at some point when using this product and now that I've stopped using it my skin is back to normal.  Would only recommend to people with super dehydrated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing moisturizer, absorbs quickly!!! Only thing the smell is a hot off initially- but after a minute it subsides ! Would re-purchase !! Put the rose oil on top... and done!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream. SWapped out my DE Protini for this one. Makes my skin super soft and the moisture levels are increased. Only complaint is the packaging: I wish all moisturizers came in the airless pump like Drunk Elephant. Hate dipping my fingers into a jar! Otherwise lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many high end moisturizers (I used to work for sephora). Some that would work so well for a few weeks, but then it was back to looking for a new moisturizer. I have even seen estheticians and it would be the same thing, loved it for a couple of weeks and my skin would resort back to its combo, dull-like self. I bought this moisturizer on my last day at Sephora, didn't even take a sample, I just loved everything it said on the package and WOW. Even when freshly applied, I had never had a moisturizer absorb the way it did. It made my skin feel so supple and brand new. I have been using this moisturizer day and night for 6 months now. Best decision I ever made for my skin. And everyone I have recommended it to, which are completely different skin types than my own, have loved it as well.

reviews.review_title: Smells like feet, but it works SO well!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the travel size version on the company website (free shipping when you buy to try their samples, yay!), was a bit skeptical, BUT I AM HOOKED. I have sensitive, acne-prone, occasional acne, so I was afraid to use this because it sounded almost TOO hydrating. Yes, it is thick, but wow, it agrees with my skin completely. This hasn't made me break out in any pimples or rash, and overall my skin looks healthier! I use this during the night under their tea tree oil and instead of making me a grease-ball or exacerbating breakouts, my skin feels more balanced and whenever I get pimples during that time of the month, they are SUPER tiny! Would really recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: I cringe to use it because of the smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells awful! I wanted to like this product but it smells like musty/moldy grass. My friend gave me her sample kit because she didn't like it for some reason- maybe that's it. I don't use many perfumed products as I have sensitive & dry skin, so I am used to natural smelling products, but this smells bad. I am out of my Normal cream right now and I am cringing when I go to apply this one for the meantime until I can go get more of my go-to. I only gave two stars because I haven't felt the need to reapply cream which is usually the case having very dry skin, as well since it is not greasy. I'm not sure if I can really say it's because of this product though since I am using hyaluronic acid and burdock oil from The Ordinary and have already noticed an insane difference in hydration from that the past two weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer. Previously I was using the FAB Ultra Repair Cream and this is a million times better. My skin feels amazingly smooth after using this omega repair cream overnight. It doesn't feel heavy on the face but you can tell it's quenching your skin's thirst if that makes sense! Yes it is pricey so I might not purchase as often as I'd like to, but I think this is a top quality product and the fact that it's clean is a huge plus for me. Would definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_title: doesn't work for my oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a Play! box and was so excited because I've been wanting to try this brand. The cream itself is a great texture and is hydrating without being greasy on the skin. Unfortunately, I've been breaking out like crazy since using it. Just small ones, but they're everywhere. This product is the only different thing. I think the additional squalane is too much for my oily/combo skin.  It doesn't smell great, but it also isn't terrible enough to not use if it worked well for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is super hydrating without leaving my skin feeling greasy in the slightest. It layers perfectly under makeup. I love the clean ingredients too! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: ACTUALLY HEALS THE SKIN'S MOISTURE BARRIER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer I have ever tried! My skin was so red with acne and hyperpigmentation however I would've never called my skin u201cdryu201d because it never flakes or peeled. Boy was I wrong, my skin was in such desperate need for moisture. I started seeing an esthetician who told me how I had ZERO moisture barrier. I had no idea what that was anyway. This is the only cream that I've seen specifically call out that it will heal your skins moisture barrier and boy does it. The cream is thick but not pore clogging, didn't make me oily. I'm so impressed and attribute the improved texture and tone of my skin wholly to the addition of this product and to Biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this face cream. The jar is nice, heavy glass so it felt really good to use. The cream was moisturizing and worked well for my skin.   The negative is the price. I don't feel like it was better than a CeraVe cream that I could have gotten from the drugstore. So, I don't personally feel like it is worth the price unless the glass packaging is important for you.

reviews.review_title: It's okay but can't handle the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself was okay. I have combination skin and it actually didn't make my skin feel oily. However, I can't handle the smell...it stinks...the gel version smells so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received in a Play box, glad I tried the sample before I got a larger size.  49 year old caucasian, normal skin, minimal wrinkles, small pimple maybe 1-2x per month, otherwise no issues.  There was a strong mineral oil smell upon opening jar.  Not a smell I was impressed with.   Applied sparingly to face, after about 15 min of other beauty routines I noticed my face was sweating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is lovely.  I've only used it at night since I wear makeup to work and feel it might be a bit heavy for my oily skin throughout the day.  If your skin is more on the dry side, try it as a day cream.  It hasn't broken me out and I can honestly say my skin looks plump / glowy and feels well hydrated!  It has no scent which is an added bonus!  I received this as part of a deluxe sample set and also fell in love with the squaline peptide eye gel!  The only reason I didn't give this a 4 star rating is the price tag.  I'm a bargain hunter and know I can find similar mini-sized quality moisturizers for half the price. But chances are once my sample is finished I will splurge and buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail moisturizer for nighttime! It's thick, luxurious, and keeps my skin moisturized and flake free during these dry winters. It's expensive but so worth it, I'll continue to repurchase this. Other reviews complain about the smell but I don't notice it, and personally, I love that this is fragrance free. Fragrance can sometimes irritate my skin and break me out, so I'm happy this moisturizer doesn't have that. I will layer either Biossance's 100% Squalane oil or rose oil on top of this for extra moisture and glow. Try this!!! You won't regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A time ago i realized my skin loves its own oils. So i try very hard to not to strip it too much and this helps a lot! In this product you just have a ton of beneficial things in just one put. My skin looks healthy, it even reduced my fore head lines and im expecting to see great results with its repairing benefits with time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It makes my skin feel very hydrated and smooth. I have sensitive skin and have had no adverse reactions ( very uncommon for me) or breakouts! I absolutely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer!  Leaves skin soothed & glowing.  I've received many compliments on my u201cglowingu201d skin since switching to this moisturizer.  It is a great night & winter moisturizer.  I have combination skin with pores that easily get congested & then gets dried out from acne products.  This moisturizer soothes, hydrates & repairs without breaking you out.  This moisturizer truly has changed my skin.  I've been switching most of my products to Biossance.  Clean ingredients means a clear face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product may have great restorative properties, but the smell is so horrible that it's hard to use. Please do something about the smell so I can use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 3/5. It is a good moisturizer with great ingredients but it stinks so bad that I just can't repurchase ever. It literally smells like a dirty wet rag and I was told this is how it normally smells when I asked if I got a bad batch. I am now forcing myself to finish the whole pot because I hate returning things (they just throw this out anyway). Will definitely just go back to Drunk Elephant or Skin Fix for moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in a mini size and I have used it for about two weeks and so far I am really enjoying it! It is lightweight but also gives so much moisture to the skin. The only thing I am not a fan of is the smell but once its on the face you can't even smell it. I will buying the full size once I finish the mini size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my new favorites! It is pretty dry where I live and I have sensitive skin. This moisturizer is so soothing and feels amazing on my skin. After finishing the first jar I had to rebuy it right away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this is the best facial moisturizer I've ever used, and, honey, I've tried u2018em all over the years. I have very dry and sensitive skin and this stuff glides on like a dream, leaving my face feeling soft and supple for the entire day. So grateful to have found a clean, unscented product that really WORKS! Can't recommend this stuff enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't recommend this enough.  Lightweight but powerful, perfect for an overnight cream, zero breakouts or reactions.

reviews.review_title: A great winter or evening moisturizer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I have repurchased it three times now and it does wonders for my skin on the winter / colder months. I did use this throughout the summer and it was quite heavy, but in the winter or at night I highly recommend this! The smell is not amazing but it doesn't last long once you put it on your face. The entire biossance line is really nice

reviews.review_title: Best ingredients with the best results!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly such an incredible moisturizer I would recommend to anyone. I have been looking for a really clean skincare routine that works well with my very oily skin and is worthy the price tag and this is truly the best. I notice a drastic difference in the moisture level of my skin and it's plump appearance. The product is thick and luxurious without any residue or grease. Definitely the best I have found so far as far as ingredients and results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this every morning and evening for a week now and it's the perfect winter-time moisturizer for my oily, acne-prone skin. Definitely recommend.   I received this cream complimentary from Influenster for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has a nice thick texture. I don't know if it actually helps. I developed a few significantly red and dry patches on my chin since I became pregnant and was hoping that a cream would help but this one isn't. It's not making it worst! So that's good news. I'll mostly tack on the dry patches to Hormonal changes, as I rarely get blemishes on my face. Not a fan of the smell. I'm not overly impressed with this cream but I wouldn't say no to purchasing it again. Try for yourself!

reviews.review_title: Not as moisturizing as I hoped.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this product was not as moisturizing as I had hoped. I am trying to find a product with vegetable based squalene like this product as opposed to real squalene which is made from shark liver oil. I won't be buying this again. I might work OK for someone who does not have skin as dry as mine. I like that it is a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells disgusting like dirty socks, I don't know how you guys bares it I have to write a honest review. I got a small sample and I don't know if I want to continue use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and like a thicker moisturizer at night. I'm satisfied with this one for now. It has cleaner ingredients and the price is reasonable. Not sure if I will repurchase but it works for now.

reviews.review_title: Dry aging skin?  this stuff is the best!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this whole line.  I  used drunk elephant for years, but honestly, this line i saw greater results with and it felt better on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so impressed with this facial cream! I'm one week in to use during colder weather in SoCal. My face was getting chapped and looking dry and dull, too. I tried La Mer (sample) and it made my skin look greasy. I tried The Ordinary rose oil and that was a little better but i couldn't wear it during the day and it wasn't helping with the dryness as much as i would have liked. Enter Biossance! I ordered an individual Play! box with this product in hopes of finding a great hydrator and im so pleased! my skin is glowing the way it does in the summer! it also looks plump and the texture of my skin looks smoother (i have many very tiny acne scars, nothing dramatic, but it is a concern of mine). Best of all, my skin is soft and moisturized! Will it work in the summer? I don't know but im willing to try it out considering how quickly this delivered results. I knocked off a star for price point. Seems steep for under 2 oz., but take into consideration i compared this against La Mer and i think this worked WAY better. I'm def gonna buy the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this with some other biossance products. Love the brand overall and the vitamin c serum especially. This moisturizer feels great on my skin, but it has kind of a funky smell. If that doesn't bother you, go for it! Great clean product. But for me, for the price, the smell is a dealbreaker.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great moisturizer, however I'm deducting 2 stars and won't be purchasing again since I've discovered Phenoxyethanol is a toxic ingredient in this product, even in low doses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used these two products: SQUALANE   MARINE ALGAE EYE CREAM and SQUALANE   OMEGA REPAIR CREAM for one week. It has amazing outcome for my facial skin. I am a sixty-year-old guy. Most of my facial aging dark spot is gone. I look much younger.

reviews.review_title: MY FAVORITE MOISTURIZER FOR COMBINATION SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer I have ever tried! When I bought a set with this moisturizer in, I did not know I would like it so much! My skin is sensitive combination (more to oily) but during winter it becomes a little dry, so I purchased it, and it is amazing! My skin is very soft, not flaky or dry and most importantly: It did not break me out! Also, it did not feel heavy or greasy on my face, my skin absorbed it very quickly. I research all the ingredients and none of them is comedogenic. I am very happy with my purchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I endured a chemical burn from a retinol treatment that caused my face to peel. Literally everything I tried topically would cause more irritation. This cream soothed my skin and moisturized effectively.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination (normal to oily) skin and I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I am an esthetician student and am learning about clean chemistry and I absolutely love this brand! This cream is not too thick, not too thin, and doesn't make me more oily than I already am. I HIGHLY recommend this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried this would be too heavy for my combination skin (I usually use gel creams), but I've been using it for a week as a night cream and no breakouts. Perfect for winter time when you need a bit more moisture. It's also unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using it for 4 weeks now, day and night  I can see a dramatical change in my texture, tone and the pore size  Also, the skin is so moisturized It's really a super cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started accutane a month ago and started using this cream right away. I use it twice a day, layered on top of an HA serum and under a few drops of oil. I haven't had ANY dryness on my face - just extremely dry lips and inside my nose. I account this mostly to this cream! My skin is glowing. I haven't tried cheaper dry skin creams so I can't say it's better, but I've noticed the majority of people on accutane say they have very noticeable and uncomfortable dry skin :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in the 500 point kit. I always go for stuff meant for sensitive skin but this is the first one I've had 0 reaction to (no burning, itching, tightness). Keeps my skin moisturized in the winter! I haven't used this long term but so far so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with others the scent is not the best. But if you can get past that. (The scent disapear quickly)This is a really really good cream for dry skin. Very hydrating and rich. Perfect for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes. It smells like stinky feet when you first put it on. However, the smell fades within a minute or so and it is literally the best night time moisturizer I have ever used. This may be too heavy for daytime/summer unless your skin is super dry (I'm combo to dry in colder months). A little goes a long way and it absorbs quickly. My face feels sooo good in the morning! This destroyed any dryness I had on my nose (from blowing it constantly in colder weather), which none of my arsenal of other moisturizers have been able to do. I haven't had any breakouts because of this moisturizer and I think it's really is u201crepairingu201d my skin because a lot of my PIH from acne is fading more quickly without any additional changes to my skin care routine. Also this is silicone free, which I love. Yeah, the jar aspect of it isn't so great but just get a little spoon or spatula and get the smallest amount out so your fingers don't have to go into the jar. I will definitely repurchase this and don't want to run out! Better than DE Lala for me and my skin by a long shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me the most horrific acne of my adult life.  I normally will get a large cystic zit once in awhile, but this gave me atleast 30 little white heads all over my face.  I only used it twice before breaking out horribly.  I do not have sensitive skin and have never broke out from a product before.

reviews.review_title: I don't understand the raves, this is not good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this. ordered the set that came with minis of eye cream and rose oil and have been using this for about 5 days. I must be picky because this is not it. I've tried many different face creams, estee Lauder, dr dennis gross, shishedo, DE (both lala and protini), origins and olehenriksen, some high end and some mid range and this stuff manages to be both greasy and not hydrating at the same time. the texture is nice and light but it goes on and almost immediately disappears leaving a greasy film  behind. I usually end up re moisturizing a while later. it also stinks. no no no.  I am returning it tomorrow and already repurchased DE protini for daytime and will stick with Lala for night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light weight, yet very hydrating. Great anti-aging benefits.

reviews.review_title: combine skin types, you need this!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a loyal Drunk Elephant fan and had been using their Protini Peptide moisturizer for the last couple of years and seriously thought that NOTHING would top it, but recently my skin just felt off. A little oilier than usual yet still not feeling moisturized. I'm combination skin type and I know with colder months coming I tend to get a little drier but still oily, weird I know. So I actually was curious to try something new and already knew I liked Biossance products. So I tried this and it's AMAZING and idk if I'll ever go back to my beloved DE moisturizer! This cream isn't heavy and soaks in so fast and leaves me feeling bright and the right amount of hydration. Balance is a big deal for us combination skin types. You need to buy this!

reviews.review_title: too greasy and heavy on skin, feels like oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is hydrating I'll give it that, smells strange which didn't bother me too much either but the fact that it left my skin feeling extremely heavy and greasy almost like I have a large  amount of oil applied on my face isn't cool at all. Biossance has a lot to improve.

reviews.review_title: Feels ok but couldn't get beyond the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted a heavier cream for my sensitive skin that is natural so had high hopes given the reviews. While it felt great going on, and seemed to work fine, I couldn't get beyond the smell, like stinky socks and a damp locker room. I even held my breath as I applied but couldn't stand it after a few days. I am very sensitive to smells and prefer fresh clean scents, if any, so would go check out first in the store if you have scent sensitivities.

reviews.review_title: perfect moisturizer for acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing! Feels really thick going on but quickly absorbs into the skin! Has really helped clear my skin up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In transition from summer to fall/winter, I needed a very moisturizing cream to help me through this period. I'm pretty neutral about this cream and do not have a specific reason to keep it around. The cream doesn't add any moisture/other benefit to my skin and probably the main reason I plan on returning this product is because of the smell. For someone who has sensitive skin and cannot handle fragrance, I am generally fine with no fragrance skincare, but this one smells unpleasant - like that smell from a petting zoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this moisturizer! It's my first recommendation to anyone who wants to know about the best clean beauty products. Between this and Tata Harper's clarifying mask, you can't lose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautifully hydrating moisturizer.  It is fragrance free and features squalane, which agrees with my skin.  Generally I only use it at night because it is a bit rich for daytime, however if I use a very small amount I have been able to wear it under makeup during the day as well.  I think I'm on my third or fourth jar.  The packaging is beautiful and weighty, but I wish that the packaging didn't allow the product to be exposed to air.

reviews.review_title: Good if You Can Get Past The Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and I saw this product mentioned in a YouTube video as being great for dry skin so I figured I'd give it a go. First day I get and go to apply it I open the jar and can't believe that smell, kinda smells like sweaty feet to me. The smell does eventually go away once you work it in and it's been on for a while but it is absolutely horrendous. I'm not a fan of synthetic fragrances in beauty products but this is one of the worst smelling products I've ever encountered and could do with at least a natural fragrance if there's one that non-irritating. I'm going to try and finish it up (because I obviously paid for it) but would not repurchase or recommend. If it had no smell I'd say it's a pretty good moisturizer for dry to very dry skin but the smell completely ruins it for me. Still gave it three stars since it's actually a good product bar the odor which cost it two stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product along with the squaline phyto retinol serum and I have to say I am not fully impressed. I was hoping that my face would feel way more hydrated then it does. It almost seems when using this cream it doesn't absorb fully into the skin. Not sold, I am going to keep using it for another week or so and see if my results changed. I switched to all clean products within the last year and was hopeful with this brand as my sister loves it, I'm not there yet...

reviews.review_title: Could be great, but problems to address
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like some other reviewers, I also found that during the first few uses, it looked like I had a full jar of product... but eventually a giant air bubble surfaced and the product sunk halfway down the jar. Really pretty irritating. Also, I am not usually bothered by smells/ scents, but this legitimately smells like Cheetos!! However, it dissipates upon application. My skin does look dewey and sparkly so I will continue to use it. I would rather have a natural product with an odd scent that dissipates than a scentless product full of chemicals. Just fix this air pocket issue, or your customers will be feeling seriously duped and ripped off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this moisturizer (just ordered another jar!). It's super moisturizing but light, soaks into my skin so well. I also love the clean ingredients and the fact that it's fragrance free. I have crazy sensitive, dry/combo skin that's prone to eczema breakouts and not only did this not cause any breakouts or irritation, but actually helped smooth out my skin and even the tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trail size in my Sephora monthly box back in August. A little bit goes a LONG way. I just finished using it tonight. Unlike the description my skin feels oily after application unless it's soaked up and dried. I do like it, and I do see a difference in my skin especially after a face scrub treatment. Not sure if I'd spend the money for a full sized jar however. I'll try my algenist sleep cream out first before making my final decision.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really don't see why this is so expensive. It's nothing out of the ordinary ingredient wise. At first it made my face sting a little but now I guess my face is used to it. It's not terribly moisturizing either. I can't wait to run out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cream initially feels very silky and luxurious, but after only two days of use my skin started developing a bunch of whiteheads and left an unpleasant layer on top of my skin. I switched back to my old night time moisturizer (skin food lol) and my skin is back to its normal state. So unfortunate because the ingredients are great, it was just too much for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer! I have very sensitive skin and this moisturizer doesn't irritate my skin at all. My skin feels moisturized and supple but I took off a star because it doesn't smell very good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED with this stuff. I don't know why people complain about the smell. It isn't perfumey, true, but it just has a very subtle and natural smell to it. I love it. I have noticed such a difference already a month in to using it. My skin is more plump, radiant, and overall more healthy looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my HOLY GRAIL moisturizer. Wow I'm obsessed. I have been using for two months now and my face couldn't love it more. My skin drinks this stuff up. The squalane helps absorbs the serums I use into my skin, leaving my face fresh and so soft! The packaging is nice and the price point matches the product. I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my sephora PLAY.  Its different from what i usually use. it's a thick cream but not greesy at all. very hydrating for dry skin. it's a bit expense but if you have the extra cash definetly pick this up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favourite face cream ever. I've tried a couple face creams at Sephora, i.e., Caudalie, FAB, Ole Henriksen, Sunday Riley. But THIS just works so well for my oily, dehydrated, and acne-prone skin. IT IS FRAGRANCE-FREE first of all. I feel that I have gained sensitivity to fragrance in skincare/makeup products over the years. Now, it just irritates my skin so I am trying to shift away from those types of products. This product is also vegan and has a bunch of fatty acids that is just so good for your face especially for acne-prone skin. It creates a barrier on your skin to prevent transepidermal water loss - and that is awesome for my dehydrated skin - thanks to the squalane. It does take a bit of time to massage to your face especially if you put too much. Feels like rubbing a sunscreen but it doesn't bother me since I love it so much. I use it day and night. This will forever be a staple on my skincare regimen until they stop producing it (I hope not!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing and light on the face. Excellent for the winter and dry skin! The smell is not the best, for those who care, but it is absorbed in the skin very quickly and is perfect when applied before make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This so far is my favourite moisturizer I have tried. Super moisturizing and calming, and I noticed my skin became way more clear when I used it. I mostly just use it at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant on purchasing online as the store does not carry this.  but wow, it has made my skin so soft.  I usually spray a hydrating mist on my face then put a little cream so it lasts longer.  I have seen a difference in my face from a 2 weeks use. my face is softer and smoother.  I do recommend this product even for hormonal acne as it keeps your hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product. I've been on the hunt for a good moisturizer after switching from the First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream (ingredients aren't amazing). I searched the ingredients of this moisturizer on cosdna website, and I read and watched reviews. There is not a shortage of enthusiasm and support for the quality and effectiveness of this product, so I was hopeful. My skin is sensitive and on the dry side. I will say that this cream makes my skin feel soft to the touch, but I don't exactly believe that it is very moisturizing or hydrating. It also leaves my face feeling slightly oily/greasy after application, to the point that it's uncomfortable. I am used to the feeling of moisturizer and have never had this issue before. I actually had to blot my face after applying. The smell doesn't bother me that much. Sometimes I felt like it smelled like cinnamon? I've been using it for a couple weeks and unfortunately I will be returning it because it has caused texture/tiny clogged pores on both of my cheeks. Wish it worked for me, but I'm definitely disappointed. Also, I agree with other reviews acknowledging the little amount of product you get for the price. I have only used this product for two weeks or so and the jar is more than half empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like feet after a long day.  The cream is so heavy I only used it at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this along with the squalane cleanser also from Biossance. I love how hydrated my skin looks and feels after using it, but I've decided to use this only at night, as I felt like it was making my skin more oily throughout the day than if I used a lighter moisturizer. Overall I'd say it delivers on the promise of hydration, just not a good fit for me as a daily moisturizer. I need something a bit lighter for morning and daytime use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was talked into trying this product by a Sephora employee. Very little product goes a long way. I have not been using it long enough to see any real results but I will say it has a nice texture to it but if you put on too much it gets greasy. I gave it 3 stars for the smell of the product which is overbearing when applying. If I would have smelled it before the purchase it would have discouraged me from buying. Hopefully they figure out the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Love how moisturizing it is without making my skin oily (it does look oily upon application but gets absorbed instantly), love how gentle it feels and how it makes my skin look and feel healthy! It does have a very natural smell to it but I don't mind it and it disappears in 5-10 seconds (don't get people crying about the smell)! Thanks Biossance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just finished my first jar of this and will be reordering immediately! It's thick but not overly so, so my skin feels nourished but not suffocated. This cream has been a huge help making sure that my moisture barrier stays intact amidst the numerous actives I use in my routine. I would highly recommend the product to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the feel and consistency of this product. It does not have a scent, it has clean ingredients that do not irritate or inflame. I wish it had more active ingredients, such a variety of ceramides, peptides and antioxidants. I am still trying this product and as a combo (oily T and dry face) the one ingredient that makes me nervous shea butter. We will see if this will enlarge my pores but I have a feeling this ingredient will save my skin during the cold winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought this was a godsend for my parched skin.  But then noticed it irritated my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Love the cream! Hate the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the weight and feel of this cream. I have dry skin and many creams aren't moisturizing enough or are overly oily. This is a nice balance of feeling moisturized all day without looking oily. However, what is that smell? The lotion smells horrible! It smells like fermented vegetable... I would give it 5 star if the scent wasn't as offensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Y'all this stuff smells so bad. I actually can't stand it. If you have a strong sense of smell and don't want to smell like washed up, rotting seaweed, don't buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and moisturizing properties of this product. Absorbs quickly into my dry skin and leaves no greasy residue. But, UGH, the smell is atrocious! I honestly thought my cat had an accident in my bathroom, the smell was so strong and unpleasant. Maybe I received an expired jar? For the price, I can't risk buying because this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer.... it works well so I can get passed the smell.  It smells weird but doesn't linger. I know it's a price to pay for a clean product with no fragrance.  Perfect for dry skin, their probiotic gel moisturizer would be better suited for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best nighttime moisturizer!! I wake up with my skin feeling so smooth and plump and also didn't break out my sensitive, acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product but the smell is yucky, especially first thing in the morning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Can't wait to buy! It has significantly improved the texture of my skin. I dont like to use creams under makeup because of oily prone acne skin I have but this was suitable for me and pairs well with my foundation and makeup regime. It feels weightless. It reduced redness and pimple agitation. It also dries on quickly prior to primer use.

reviews.review_title: Feels a little heavy on my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and I'm currently using trentinoin, so I expected this to be a good formulation for my dried out skin. Even then my face feels very oily towards the afternoon, I even had to wash my face more often! Might be ok for others, but it didn't work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A bit heavy for a day cream, but this is a lovely nighttime moisturizer. I might put it aside for the winter, when my skin is especially dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rich and super moisturizing! I use it only at night since I have an oily/combo skin. It is a great quality product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does make my skin feels soft and hydrated but sadly broke me out. I do see it potentially being great for many people but it's a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice hydration, but seriously I will not buy again due to the smell-really awful. It may be clean/organic ingredients but if you're sensitive to odors, it may not be worth the investment.
Super moisturizing! It's expensive but it's totally worth the money. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My oily and blemish prone skin is not healing as fast as it used to. This absolutely repairs my skin faster while I'm getting rid of acne. I do not get a dark spot or pot mark on every single pimple anymore! If you are chemically exfoliating and still not seeing results or becoming to sensitive then give this a shot. Also noteworthy, I hate the container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is great. It reminds me a lot of DE Lala, but a bit more moisturizing. One of my new favorites for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the biossance gel moisturizer first and loved it, but I'm more on the dry side so I thought I needed just a little something more for my skin. So after looking at reviews I thought this would be perfect, but it sadly was not. I could only use this a handful of times at night(too heavy for day under makeup) and I had to take it back. It just felt like it sat on my skin and didn't feel soft and smooth or hydrating at all. I've since switched to the lotus cream from fresh and love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second favorite product to Sunday Riley. I immediately noticed a difference in my skin (this is my second time receiving this sample). You only need a small amount goes a long way, my skin soaks this up and helps with those fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm sure this is great for some people, but it gave me a rash! I guess my fault for not spot testing it before using it. I broke out in a rash on my neck and chest after using this product. I have never used a Squalane product before, so it could be the ingredient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I generally have dry to combination skin, currently going through a much needed moisture surge. This product came in my monthly beauty box and in one night, my skin felt less irritated, less dry, and my acne (which forms sometimes due to my dryness) was already clearing up. I have now been using for 5 days and my skin is clear and feels fresh! I generally like to mix up my moisturizers here and there, but this one will now definitely stay in the mix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is light in texture and scent. However, my skin feels slightly tacky after application, so I would recommend to use this as a night cream. It doesn't pill, which is great.  My skin does look a lot smoother in the morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this in my Aephoa Play August 2019. I have a really really dry skin due to eczema on my right hand. I tested a little sample on a finger and all I can say is wow! My finger looks almost normal, and it stayed on after I washed my hands. I have tried so many things for eczema and I know it's probably not for that, but if it could make my dry eczema look completely normal again, then imagine what it will do to your face!! You're in for a treat!! Going to go buy a full-size tomorrow! Thank you so much, Biossance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have developed dry red lines under my nose and along the sides but after just one application of this I saw improvement. Just a little goes a long way and my face doesn't feel greasy or heavy. I would strongly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Though I am definitely one who likes to try out new skincare products...this Biossance moisturizer is definitely one of my all time favorites, along side of moisturizers from SkinCeuticals and Kate Somerville. What I love about this cream is that it doesn't feel heavy and yet provides ample moisture to my skin along with anti-aging properties. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating. Not greasy. I like that it's a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but my skin hated it. The texture is creamy and thick but also provides moisture without being too oily or greasy. After two I had whiteheads all over. Returning this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HG night time moisturizer for me. It is thick and creamy but not greasy. It absorbs quickly and my skin feels plump afterwards. I put it on top of my serums and oils and everything is absorbed. Wake up refreshed with fine lines minimized. Have repurchased multiple times. Can't be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves the skin with long lasting hydration. Exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to try a lot of products in my search for the holy grail of skin moisturizers.  I have dry skin that manages to break out, plus I have constant redness. I have seen a big difference in my skin over the past month using this product.   I'll admit that the first time I used it, I liked it fine but wasn't blown away after one use.  But after a few days, I found myself reaching for this product first out of a sea of other moisturizers in my cabinet.  It occurred to me that this moisturizer is like the guy (or girl)  you marry after you've dated around for years, ha ha. The best quality, in my opinion, is that it hydrates the skin without greasiness which makes it a phenomenal morning moisturizer.  It works so well under makeup.   So buy this and use it for a week before passing judgment.  It really does a great job.

reviews.review_title: lief saver for dry sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best moisturiser I've had in years! very dry and sensitive skin with fragrance allergy. This lasts all day.   Had to drop a star as although it says can be used around eyes, left my eyelids a little flaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the thickness and it worked great on my dry patches but it's making me break out. I stopped using it for about 2 weeks and the the break outs stopped. Started using it again 3 days ago and here I am with white heads on my nose and forehead.

reviews.review_title: My holy Grail!!! I'm not even lying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i rarely review but had to review this. i started becoming more aware of ingredients in my products and i love love love all the ingredients in it!!! even after the 1st application, my skin just sucked up every bit of the product and my face hasnt been oily or slick or greasy (i have oily-normal skin) my skin feels so soft and smooth and I'm trying not to touch my face constantly..... I'm in love. worth every single penny. Just try it!!  con: smells a little funny. but it's not really bad or anything totally bearable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer, it makes my skin so soft and supple, give a bounce back and feel great.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down, my go-to HG status moisturizer. I've gone through 2 jars already and about to buy it yet again. It is pretty expensive but sooo worth it. It gives my skin optimal hydration without feeling heavy. I have a natural glow whenever I put it on and my skin just feels completely nourished after each use. I absolutely love it and would highly recommend to anyone with sensitivity or skin leaning more towards the dry side like mine!

reviews.review_title: MY PERFECT NIGHT TIME AND WINTER MOISTURIZER!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been researching this brand and have been loving a lot of their products! I got this from a friend and I loved it! It is a better version of my dr jart tiger grass cream! I usually top it off with some squalene oil at night and my skin is so soft and moisturized in the morning. If you have sensitive, dry and acne prone skin, this is the perfect cream for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product felt great when I applied it to my face but it is just too slippery.  It felt as if the cream/moisturizer never absorbed into my skin.  When it finally did and I applied foundation, the foundation literally disappeared.  I realize that sounds odd but it just doesn't work as a daytime moisturizer.  Maybe nighttime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing but not greasy. Has a different smell to it but great for sensitive skin!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in search for a great moisturizer for my sensitive   rosacea skin. I was looking for a fragrance, oil-free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with oily skin, I feared this would be too heavy and thus comedogenic. However, I also have rosacea, and was really tempted by the omega complex as I wanted to repair and strengthen my skin barrier. Since my skin is oily, I use a very, very tiny amount. It has not only helped calm and soothe my rosacea, but I do not experience any breakouts. I only use it in the evenings since it is a bit heavy in terms of consistency and moisturizing. I never write reviews, but for anyone with oily, rosacea, acne-prone skin, it is a must-try.

reviews.review_title: what dermitis? only clear skin here honey!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long story short this helped my otherwise u201cpermanentu201d dermatitis go away, but if you want the long story keep reading. I added a before and after picture for the skeptics like me. Trust me my before was really red in person. Also people on the comments say it's really sticky or too thick. Just moderate the amount you use to your needs. But it also absorbs well and keep the skin dewy.   One day I woke up with ugly small bumpy looking pimples that I have never had in my life, so I ran to the dermatologist. He said perioral dermitis is hard to cure and I need to take antibiotics, but caution because you may have vomiting, diarrhea....all the fun stuff.   I walked in to Sephora a mess and honestly was shopping as therapy to some guy telling me my face was randomly and likely permanently a mess. This lovely lady at Sephora helps me out. I buy this product and in a week it was pretty much gone!! Seriously I have made ALL my besties buy this. Not even joking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product yesterday and opened it up this afternoon. This review is for the sole purpose of exposing the company for allowing the distribution of half empty containers. Not a cheap product, highly disappointed to have received half a container of air!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream, it is so lightweight, perfect for summer time. I have really sensitive skin, this cream calms my skin, love love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best face cream i have ever used (and I have tried so many!) It does not break me out and can be worn in the summer or winter time. I just use a little scooper to apply it to my face so i'm not dipping bacteria into the jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this in the middle of winter when it seemed as though nothing could moisturize my skin. This cream is amazing, it is SO SOOTHING. It's thick but absorbs nicely and leaves your skin looking and feeling SOOOOO smooth like silk. Highly highly highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mainly use this for my dry skin and it leaves it soft and smooth all day long. And I've used it for a couple of days and everyone says my skin looks so soft. You can't go wrong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg! Holy grail product right here! I have been suffering from horrible dehydration since having a baby and even more now since I'm pregnant again and this has honestly saved my skin. I've tried so many products but this cream has brought back hydration to my skin. It's a great humectant moisturizer, especially when using in combination with hyaluronic acid, it just seals the goodness in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used this cream for about 2 weeks now, but I love the feel and especially the results. The real test is how this product performs over the long term, particularly for older skin! So far, so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I suffer from rosacea and this cream made me break out terribly.

reviews.review_title: The cheap version of La mer (no joke)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cream is my 10 times that I purchased this amazing rich cream ! I am dry and under make up and to recover after my exfoliating rituals is a must have balance

reviews.review_title: A great moisturizer but smells a bit funny
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great!  I use it during the day after washing my face and before using a SPF.  It's light but my skin feels hydrated throughout the day.  I noticed an improvement in my skin after having used only it for a couple days.  I didn't give it 5 stars because I think it smells a bit foul but after having tried a few other moisturizers that smell better, I'm willing to stick it out because it makes my skin feel so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's great texture and hydrated, but makes my skin super oily after an hour. I'm trying to finish the bottle, however I am seeing mini pimples pop up on my face. I think i'll have to call it quits on this one...disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I agree with all the other reviews that this cream is the bomb.  I have super dehydrated skin since moving to Colorado and this with the micronutrient mist has done wonders!  My skin looks so supple now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product from Biossance. This beauty leaves skin very satisfied with a lovely scent that is not synthetic-smelling. I have pretty sensitive, dry skin and this both hydrated and managed not to irritate my skin or break me out. A Winner.

reviews.review_title: My most favorite and effective product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream lives up to its claims! It is sooo rich and nourishing all without being greasy. It is absolutely perfect for my dry skin or when I've been overzealous with actives. I swear my skin looked noticeably better the next day after using! My face looked overall more healthy and plump. It almost feels like it sinks in and then moisturizes from the inside out. I don't really find it to a have smell, but I guess compared to some fragranced options some people may think it smells u201cbadu201d. I personally prefer no fragrance so this is perfect. I've already repurchased and will forever. HG.

reviews.review_title: Great for Winter, too thick for Summer.
reviews.review_text: This is great for the dry winter, but WAY too thick for the Summer. It left my skin oily and overwhelmed once the weather started getting warm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been trying this product for about 3 days and so far my skin is LOVING IT! It's super thick so a little goes a long ways and I expect this jar will easily last me a year. I can't wait to see my results with continued use but so far I love it!

reviews.review_title: Despite these things, I love it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My jar arrived looking half empty, not sure if that's normal or not. And the cream smells like feet to me. But the results are still worth the price. I thought the signs of aging had caught up with me really quickly this year. Turns out the products I had been using weren't doing enough. This made me look like me again.

reviews.review_title: I saw amazing results after just two days...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a repair cream that really delivers! At 58, my combination skin has become dry and tight. I had been using skincare from the drug store. Having learned about Biossance in a Sephora store and receiving a sample,  I was floored. I have few lines or wrinkles, but this cream has significantly improved them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best moisturizer I have ever used in my entire life. It soaks in fast, smells amazing, and leaves your skin feeling plump and healthy looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm enjoying this product. I do have dry to combination skin and at first I was wishing I purchased something a little thicker but I've just started using a little more for morning and night and I seem to be liking it more. I like that's it's a clean product and no nonsense/fragrance free. I have eczema and sensitive skin and I haven't had any issues. Very soft smell similar to maybe the smell of olive oil. I definitely want to try more of their products. I think this cream will work well as a summer moisturizer for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product that absorbs quickly into my skin. First bought this for my mom, and then once I tried it, I had to get my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer. It's thick and tackles the dry spots on my face. The only downside is the smell. Other reviewers have praised the smell, so I wonder if I got an old bottle or something.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it.  Makes the fine lines disappear.  If I irritate my skin by over exfoliating I can put this on and it doesn't sting (looking at you Protini and all DE products) and helps the skin heal.  It's like using Squalane oil alone but with added benefits.  Plus it doesn't cause breakouts.  Frankly, I've had it with DE.  So many unnecessary ingredients!  And I don't like paying for   fancy plastic packaging that's bad for the environment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. I love this cream. I have combination skin and this makes my face so soft. It feels really thick going on but absorbs quickly and not greasy. My face feels like I just received a facial every morning. I use this night and day with the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this product yesterday and I have to say it is a wonderful face cream. Unfortunately, I'm not impressed with the amount of product that was in the jar. It is not full to the top, there's actually a lot missing from where it should be filled to. It is almost as if there was an air bubble in the middle. Truly unfortunate. I wish I could recommend this product, however with the amount missing from the container, it's not worth the money.. maybe if it was full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer- it has a bit of a nutty smell to it which I don't mind, it's really rich and I don't need to use very much at a time. It soaks into the skin well and doesn't feel tacky or greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not going to lie- this literally saved my skin. Over the past couple of years, my skin has developed a strange sensitivity where a lot of products create weird breakouts and a bumpy texture - it sort of looks like chicken skin, but on my face.  I've been using this with the First Aid Beauty cleanser, and my skin has never felt more soft, supple, clear and bright in YEARS. I have extremely sensitive, acne prone combination skin, and this works wonders. I know some people say it's too heavy for the day, but I honestly don't find that to be the case and I wear this morning and night. Worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this. It's very creamy and moisturizing. I'm not sure if it really does much else, but it is nice. Interesting smell, but not horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think I've finally found my holy grail moisturizer. Once I was a few months from hitting 25 and started noticing my face change I realized I needed to start taking care of my skin. I've found a good skincare regimen with a combination of The Ordinary and Herbivore products. However, the NYC winter air has been a little too much for my dry skin and I needed a more substantial moisturizer from a cream. I've tried a few samples from other cruelty-free brands at Sephora and none had really wowed me yet, but this did. I noticed pretty immediate help for the dryer spots of my face and moisture lasts all day without feeling greasy. It may be too much moisture for someone with Oily skin. It's unscented so it has a slight fatty smell but it goes away almost immediately and I don't really notice it. The smell is similar to Drunk Elephant's La La cream but much less intense. You also don't have to use a lot as it spreads really well and I appreciate that it will last longer than other brands with 50ML of product that are more expensive. Biossance is also an environmentally responsible company using renewable sugarcane for the squalene on top of being a cruelty-free company using good ingredients so it's a win for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best thick cream i ever purchased. My skin feels really dry. I have to put face oil and a thick cream to get decent moisture. Most of the thick creams i purchased in the past, would make my skin so greasy that it would look bad. I felt that they are not absorbing in the skin, so it was not helping with the dryness. This cream hands down is the best. It does not make me greasy. It is working really well in the spring as well. I cannot say how i will feel in summer, but in fall, winter and spring its the best cream to use. It makes my skin moisturized, soft and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great rich moisturizer that is wonderful for the dry cold winter months. Haven't tried it in the summer however it works really well for my dry yet oily skin! I enjoy the experience of putting on this moisturizer and don't feel that it is overly heavy on my face (after 3 layers of skincare underneath). Love this product from Biossance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is very moisturizing and is great for my dry skin. The only downside is it has a slightly unpleasant scent. It's not strong and goes away quickly, but I almost gave 4 stars because of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Doesn't leave my face needing more hydration, which I love!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke out after 3rd application. The cream itself is soft and absorbs well. But after the third application I had a cystic acne on my cheek and from personal exp i only get cystic acne when i react to something new in my facial regimen.  Maybe squalene? Who knows but sad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula has nothing crazy in it. It's simple and I like that. When you layer potent serums it is nice to have a moisturizer that will lock them in (Squalane oil will do that) without adding too many other actives. I personally use it at night because it's a bit heavy but it does sink into skin pretty well after 10/15 minutes and it's nice to not have a thick sticky layer on your face when you go to bed. I wake up moisturized, nourished and my skin looks repaired when I have small disturbances due to shaving for example. I bought it in store just because I was looking to add more Squalane in my routine and I'm super pleased with it. I will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: okay.. the product language describing this moisturizer contains the word luxurious. However, I'm of the mind the word necessary, should have been employed.   I was on the hunt for a nighttime moisturizer that was quenching but also gave my face a chance to breathe overnight as I use some products with silicone during the day.   this. is. it.  quickly absorbs, rich without feeling greasy, serious staying power.   my *only* beef has to be packaging - give me a pump or a sweet little glass spatula for portion control considering the price tag, lol!!

reviews.review_title: DON'T be scared of the thick appearance of this!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since my skin is combo, acne-prone, and sensitive, I usually steer clear of using any creams that seem heavy/rich.  BUT, since I'd never tried a Biossance product that clogged my pores or broke me out, I decided to get a sample anyways and give it a go.  WOW is this product an exception to that!! When you first feel this cream, it will seem thick, but when you smooth it onto your skin, (little goes a long way) it absorbs so quickly and doesn't feel like you have this layer on your skin.
