It's also calming and makes my skin instantly feel comfortable (even when it's angry at me). NEVER broke me out or clogged pores and had no problems using it over existing blemishes (which is rare).   When you wake up and look in the mirror, it's almost shocking how much this evens skin tone, almost completely takes away any redness (coming from someone with Rosacea nonetheless!), and even somehow takes away any bumpy texture or inflammation I had (which I NEVER thought a cream could do)!  Seriously, if you have combo, dry, or oily yet dehydrated skin (ESPECIALLY if your natural moisture barrier has been damaged from winter or too much cleansing/exfoliation), this is a MUST try!!!   It balances out my oily and dry areas and repairs my moisture barrier faster than any of the dozens of products I've tried (from cheap to very expensive).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry sensitive skin.  This cream does a great job of adding moisture and does not irritate my skin.  The smell is a little odd but it goes away quickly.  I am not sure if I saw any improvement in my skin using this.  I am looking for more anti aging benefits as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The second I started using it, a small break out started to form. Continued to use it hoping my skin would adjust to it, and my skin has completely broken out! Also leaves an oily/greasy residue on your skin. Pretty disappointed with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really hydrating.  It revived my dry skin and didn't cause breakouts like every other moisturizer I've tried.  Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful formula... The ingredients are fantastic and fragrance free. The texture of this is silky smooth and applies like a dream. My skin instantly feels like velvet and shines with a dewy glow. I haven't had a moisturizer make my skin feel this lovely in along while. My only wish is that they put this in an airless pump so keep the ingredients stable for longer, otherwise this is a yes from me!

reviews.review_title: Must have for very dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use Epiduo Forte at the moment, and needless to say that my skin is red, flaking and so dry. I use this only once a day, and it is very effective. It is the only cream I tried that is hydrating enough to compensate from the dryness created by my medication. It is very rich, so I will probably use the gel formula for the summer. It doesn't cause breakouts either. Very happy with this cream (and all of Biossance products)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to like this moisturizer, but it made my forehead really dry and I get these red bumps like if something had bite me. I will have to return it.

reviews.review_title: Get it only if you don't mind the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: really tried liking the product but it smelled like manure and was too oily which made me breakout. I'm a bit upset with spending almost 60 for a product like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, wow. This cream is incredible. I have tried so many luxury brands, the cream I used before this was LaMer. I was looking for a somewhat cheaper alternative and to find something that really helped my dry skin. This is amazing. Within a week of using this my skin feels so hydrated, non sticky, and truly absorbed into my skin. I never knew there were cremes out there like this. This is truly lovely, and the fact that it isn't >$100 is awesome. I definitely recommend this to people looking to heal dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and how moisturizing it is. Unfortunately I had a bad breakout after using this within two days. There were clogged pores on my forehead that emerged over night and went away after discontinuing use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It plumps and hydrates as claimed. The formula is very mild and does not irritate my acne prone skin. The cream may seem quick thick at first but upon application, it melts into the skin without leaving greasy surface. I highly recommend it for normal and dry skin type!

reviews.review_title: It just did not work for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This just did not work for me at all. It has a less than pleasant yeasty smell which I could have tolerated but it did not absorb into my skin at all; so much so that I had to rinse it off because I couldn't stand the feel of it just sitting there. Luckily I got this as a sample from the Biossance website and didn't have to return anything. Instead I found the Biossance gel moisturizer to be divine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe this was to heavy for my skin but it didn't sink in at all! My face felt and looked super oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a top product for me. I'm using Differin and haven't experienced ANY flaking and I think this product has a lot to do with it! No scent, it feels lovely, and it lasted me a couple of months using it twice a day. I couldn't believe I was willing to pay so much for it but it really is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Literally almost every moisturizer breaks out my skin. I have not only a bunch of jaw acne but also congested pores all over my face. Luckily, this moisturizer does not give me any more of that. I've also recently damaged my skins moisture barrier because of massive over exfoliation (praying I haven't done permanent damage) but this moisturizer has slowly but surely been plumping my skin and repairing it. I'm hoping over time, I see my skin get better and better from this, I am hopeful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great moisturizer! I have super sensitive skin and get a rash when trying new products; however this cream calms my skin and reverses any drying effects throughout the winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited two weeks to review this cream because so many products I fall in love with right away (looking at you, protini) end up clogging my pores and causing a breakout after about a week. I have dehydrated skin and live in a dry climate, so I've always had to fight closed comedones and texture. This cream is a miracle! I can literally feel my skin healing, becoming more plump and balanced. Yes, it smells real weird (like stale beer?) for the first minute but I'll take that any day over applying strong perfumes to my face! Based on using this twice a day I predict needing to repurchase once a month. I can't wait to try other Biossance products now!

reviews.review_title: Love everything about this -EXCEPT THE SMELL
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super efficient, rich & long lasting moisturizer yet non greasy. Love everything about this -EXCEPT THE SMELL. It smells like dirty sock juice. Thank god it does not linger on the skin. Aside from this horrible stench, this is a really good clean product. I wish they would add some essential oils or something to make the application less stinky.

reviews.review_title: Pleased there was no negative reactions, but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is not a hit not a miss for me. It's a product that does not offer enough moisture for my dry, sensitive skin. I love the Biossance line, every product I have tried has not caused a reaction. When used with the oil this is a decent daytime moisturizer, but not one I would repurchase for dry skin. This may be a great find for oily, or combination skin. The Biossance line holds its own, but I just don't find this worth keeping in regular rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating, but too heavy for me. Left my skin quite oily (which is not usually a problem).  Make sure to smell this before buying and see if you like the scent. I found it really unpleasant (moldy dishcloth?) though it dissipated soon after application.

reviews.review_title: I will never use other product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it ! Amazing product  !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this product needed one! It is WONDERFUL. I live in Colorado and my skin was flaking it was so dry but I also have very sensitive and acne prone skin so it is hard to find something. I have been using this for a month and my skin is back to looking glowing and healthy. Bonus it even reduced lines on my forehead. I have told all my girlfriends this is a must buy!

reviews.review_title: Effective and lighter texture than most
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful clean product, it's not too heavy either and sinks into the skin pretty quickly, my skin wakes up refreshed and smooth.  Only taking a star off because it has a strange smell, almost medicinal but not necessarily bad, but not pleasant either, it is definitely there but doesn't hang around. I like that it doesn't have any added fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I must say I was very encourage to use this product! Seemed like good ingredients and great price! Honestly, my face and neck broke out for two full weeks! Very, very disappointed and I would never recommend this product! Beware!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it's a thick cream and really helps with my dry and flakey skin. The only problem is that it smells so bad!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin gets so dry and angry in the winter, and this cream is lovely and calming. It's very hydrating, but I was able to use it during the day without any problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended by an employee as I've recently had super dry skin from retinol use. It does not smell amazing, not atrocious, just unscented. It does, however, provided amazing moisturizationa nd skin plumping. I was shocked. I'll definitely be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has everything your skin needs. I'm currently using it as a day and night cream, the consistency and texture and nourishing and lovely, not heavy and doesn't pile or sit awkwardly under makeup. Very pleased that there is no fragrance, just a light cream smell (similar to regular aveeno cream) I'm currently using it with The Ordinary Buffet and Max serums and they go lovely together. Honestly for the price, I did not expect to be this pleased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i just finished my first jar, and i can't use anything else! I love the luxurious formula that my skin easily absorbs. It is never greasy but somehow very deeply hydrating and,  making my skin glow. My only complaint is how expensive it is. I've been trying to find something similar with a better price, but nothing even gets close. Definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer. Thick consistency but not as tacky feeling as a drunk elephant lala retro cream. Great for very sensitive skin. Only complaint is that it smells bad, kind of like a fishy smell, but it goes away after a minute or two of putting it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer, really felt that my dry skin was greatly improved, but I could not get passed the horrible smell it has. I cannot even describe it, but it is a noticeable plant smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the omega repair cream and the vitamin c oil samples and incorporated it into my routine. I love the products, especially since I have sensitive, blackhead prone (pore clogging) skin. This works great in the morning with the UFO oil which can dry me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to use this cream for a while before leaving a review, and now that I just finished my first jar I can honestly say it is the best facial cream I've used to date. It's lightweight yet creamy, absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my face greasy. I have a dry skin and this winter has certainly not been kind (polar vortex anyone?) I was using DE cream for several months but as the air got drier, so as my face and DE cream was no longer able to keep my skin moisturized. After my own intense research of u201ccleanu201d products I decided to give this one a shot. I know the price will make you cringe and cry for a week, but honestly it's worth every penny. My boyfriend always comments on how soft my face is, and this is the only thing that I changed in my daily facial routine. I saw some reviewers mentioning of bad scent. I really don't know what they're talking about because this product virtually has no scent. It has a very light u201cnaturalu201d odor which one can expect in every product that is fragrance-free, but I only smell it when I actually stick my nose in the jar. I'm picky with scents and since I have a sensitive skin I'm always in search of unscented products. This product doesn't bother me at all (unlike unrefined shea butter whose earthy scent hits you the moment you pop off the lid). Already purchased a second jar. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my go-to nighttime facial cream, because it is a truly awesome product! I have sensitive skin that can be up and down in terms of how dry or oily it is, and the Squalane   Omega Repair Cream works perfectly no matter what state my skin is in without causing any irritation! The cream is super hydrating, yet I don't hesitate to apply it even when I'm experiencing blemishes, because the cream is totally non-comedogenic. On top of all of these skin benefits, I love what the Biossance brand stands for, with its clean and healthy ingredients, its eco-friendly packaging, and its transparency! I would note that this may not be ideal for use during the day, especially in the summer or if you tend toward oily skin, simply because it does not totally soak in. However, it is perfect for nightly use on all skin types and for daytime use on drier skin or during drier months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying this stuff is amazing. I stopped into Sephora because I had started using a retinol cream that burned my skin and was dry after I used to much so the sales lady suggested I tried the biossance.  This stuff is thick and rich and I was worried I was going to wake up with broken out skin but I haven't and my skin after one day looked amazing. I was able to wear it under my foundation and still looked great. I can't wait to try the whole line. I can't say enough about this cream I have super dry skin. Love this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you want super soft, radiant skin BUY THIS! The first time I used it made my skin a little tingly on but after using it more and more my skin got used to it. It works so well and you really do see AND feel a difference after the first use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a skin rescuer. I'm very conscious of what I product I put on my skin, and am so happy that Sephora started carrying this EWG verified line. I have dry, hyper-sensitive skin that can also sometimes have breakouts or rosacea flare ups. Switched from the odacite daily moisturizer to this product and immediately noticed a difference! My skin is softer, my skin tone is more even (could be due to the vitamin c and rose oil from this line also), and I have had no breakouts. It's also super consistent in delivering these results - I'm on my third jar already and still loving it. In the summer i only used it as a night cream and opted for the gel moisturizer for day and it worked well then too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After researching healthy ingredients which also hydrate the skin I landed on this cream. So far, I've been enjoying how this works with my skin. It doesn't smell like flowers but the funky smell goes away almost immediately [honestly the smell does not bother me].

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has saved my skin! I use a lot of their skin care products and they all are so wonderful! I have dry skin and somewhat sensitive skin. I have smooth clear skin other than I always had some acne on my forehead. After only a little while of using these products, my skin is the best it's been in a while. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the texture of this cream and the way it moisturized my skin. I ultimately ended up returning it because although I wanted to love it, and it kept my skin so soft, it broke me out. I had a huge zit right in the middle of my forehead for an important event thanks to this cream. No, thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this in store and used it for a week before breaking down a buying the full size (I needed a perk anyway, so the timing was perfect). I don't wear make up, so I use it in the morning. It definitely keeps my skin hydrated throughout the day. Before this I was using a water cream, but I soon learned that those are better for oily/combo skin types and I have dry skin, especially in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It is so hydrating and feels amazing on the skin. Perfect pair to the glycolic and lactic acid serums I use because this is so nourishing. It does have a not-so-pleasant smell but I'd rather have my skincare synthetic fragrance free! It also leaves your skin with a slippery smooth feel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream! A little goes a long way and my face feels so smooth and gives it an after glow effect.  I especially found of this because of its natural ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: less than 2 weeks into my jar and people are telling me how great my skin looks. even my hair stylist that saw me with zero makeup on said how great it was looking and asked if I had just had a peel. it's not heavy, not greasy. it leaves the perfect bounce to skin, takes care of any dehydration, tightness, but not too much for oily areas. LOVE .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best winter cream

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail Lightweight Soft Facial Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended I try Biossance as I have sensitive skin and am particular about the ingredients in the products I use.  The cream feels smooth and soaks in quickly.  A little goes a long way and I'm already on my second jar.  For me, a jar lasts approximately 3-4 months which for the size, I think is appropriate. I'm now in my fourth month of daily use and can honestly say this has become my holy grail lightweight moisturizer.  I would rate this 4.5 stars if I could.  The only reason for the 4.5 star rating is because when the weather is dry and cold, I don't feel it is as moisturizing as say Lala-Retro.  For a spring-fall cream, I think it is great for both morning and evening use.  In the winter I personally like to use it at night and the Lala during the day.  However, keep in mind I have senstive skin and due to chronic hives I need a bit extra moisture than most.  I highly recommend the Squalane and Omega cream for anyone who is looking for a nice, light, and soft cream for daytime or night time use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to this line, am excited for the clean product section at Sephora!! This cream goes on really nice, it's a bit thick but for my skin in the winter is just what I wanted. Feels very soothing and hydrating. I mostly use it at night since I am still using my Caudalie during the day. I am happy with this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster but I was very excited to have received it and test it out. The texture is nice and it really hydrated my skin. I have sensitive skin but I didn't break out from it. I recommend this if you're looking for a good moisturizer. It's a little pricey but you get a lot of product in the container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have  sensitive, acne-prone, and combination dry and oily skin. This cream is has no odor and goes on super smooth. Overall, it's an excellent moisturizer and helped gain some elcasticity I haven't seen around my mouth in years. It is rather thick, but the squalene locks in the moisture excellent. I received this product complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This beautiful product saved my winter skin. I have naturally dry skin. When the harsh dry winter air comes knocking, my poor skin takes a beating. I received this heaven sent product to try through Influenster and it has changed my life. I love how supple and hydrated my skin feels after. Also, major bonus for being an all plant based company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the texture of this nourishing cream. It absorbs well and the moisture lasted all day. I'm not crazy about the way the product smells. It's not fragranced, so it's just the smell of the ingredients but it was kind of strange and off putting to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight it is on my skin and the fragrance isn't strong. I have very dry skin and has helped a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for review purposes. I love the packaging. It feels nice and creamy and applies nicely, absorbing quickly. It didn't feel too heavy on my skin. It was effective in moisturizing my skin, but I'm not sure if I'll re-purchase due to the scent after it's applied. The scent fades quickly, so it's not a huge deal, but I feel that I may be able to find a comparable product that has either no scent or a better scent. I feel like the scent is a personal preference, though, so I would still recommend it if you're looking for an effective moisturizer with good ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, just wow. I have dry skin and now that cold weather has sprung upon my chalky skin, it's now extra dry. It's so hard for me to find a night cream that really sinks in and hydrates my skin. I was completely blown away by this moisturizer. I wake up with plump skin every morning and it even cleared up some of my redness. Will definitely repurchase! I received this product complimentary for sampling purposes but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin with occasional pimples. I love how this made my skin feel and how hydrated it was. I received this complimentary from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was really excited to try this. Very moisturizing and hydrating - felt a bit heavy when I first started using it but I think my skin wasn't used to the squalene? Really enjoying it currently.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for cold, dry, Montana weather
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Biossance Squalane   Omega Repair Cream is perfect for the cold, dry, winter mountain air here in my Montana home. The scent is fresh and clean, the texture rich and the results are amazing. It takes a few minutes for my skin to soak up the cream, because it's thick - but there is no greasy residue once it does. The moisture lasts all day and seems to create a barrier between my skin and the cold, dry air. I love this for winter here in Montana! Can't wait to try the entire line! Despite having combination skin, I did not feel as though it was too thick or rich to wear under make up u2014 especially if you give it time to soak in. Overall, I was impressed with this product. It truly exceeded my expectations and is one I would purchase in the future.

reviews.review_text: This cream is fantastic! I did not detect a strong smell at all nor an oil slick feel on the skin. You need to use a small amount as a little goes a long way. I warm the cream in my palms first, then press and pat on my face and rub upwards on my neck. Then I go back to my face and massage it in. I experienced zero skin irritation and no hormonal breakouts. I also tried this cream with my matte foundation and it added a dewy finish. This is a cream I would repurchase with my own funds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product!! I typically have dry skin especially in the winter. This cream has been great in keeping my skin hydrated and healthy. The cream doesn't feel at all greasy and goes on very smoothly. I received this complementary product to test out and give an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I went in to get my foundation color matched as a previous worker matched me with an orange color!  This other worker put a couple of different shades on my neck and had me look in the mirror.  It was then that I noticed my neck was severely dry!!  I moisturize day and night but apparently I was in need of something better.  Desperate to fix this, I bought this recommended cream.  She showed me a couple but I can't do fragrances at all!  This stuff has no fragrance. There's somewhat of a natural scent but it dissipates fast. I've tried many creams on my son who has been having issues with eczema on his hands.  No matter what we used on him, his hands kept getting any and cracked with this cold weather.  One night, I had him try this.  His skin ate it up!!  He started getting just a tad, every night and I can't believe the amazing difference!  I'm soooo very thankful something is helping him!!!  We aren't telling Dad about it though!!$$$$$$ lol!!

I pair it with pure hyaluroinc acid serum and my skin immediately feels plump and hydrated. I received this product complimentary for sampling purposes but all opinions are your own.

It has a lot of excellent ingredients such as squalane, ceramides, omega fatty acids, and plant sterols. I love they it's vegan and cruelty-free, as well as fragrance free.

reviews.review_text: There's a reason this moisturizer rates so highly with everyone overwhelmingly agreeing that it does wonders for hydration. Either leave it be, or spritz a very light mist of water on top and gently pat it in. I'm not sure why the product smells the way it does. It's not a very pleasant smell. However, i would rather take this smell over products that smell too good. I think that's a sign that chemicals have been used.  All in all, I would say I like this moisturizer so far. Aside from my face feeling tight in the morning, my complexion looks bright and glowing.
